U log bahut chakit rahin, aur bolat rahin, “I jon kaam kare hei, achchha hee kare hei. U bahira log ke sune ke aur guuñga log ke bole ke taagat dewe hei.
U ṭaaim ke baat hei, jab fir baṛa bheeṛ jama hoy gais, aur ulog ke paas kuchh khaawe ke nai raha, to Yeeshu aapan chela log ke aapan paas bolaay ke bolis,
“Hamme i bheeṛ pe daya aawe hei, kaahe ke ilog teen din se baraabar hamaar sañghe hei, aur ulog ke lage khaawe ke kuchh bhi nai hei.
Agar ham ilog ke ghare bhuuka bhej dei, to ilog rasta meñ behosh hoy jahiyeñ, kaahe ke ilog meñ se kuchh log to duur se aain hei.”
Chela log jawaab deen, “I suunsaan jagha meñ etna log ke waaste etna khaana kahañ se aai?”
Yeeshu puuchhis, “Tumhaar lage ketna roṭi hei? U log bolin, “Saat.”
Yeeshu sab log ke jameen pe beiṭh jaay ke bolis. U saat roṭi leke, dhanbaad dees aur uske tuuṛ ke baaṭe ke waaste chela log ke dees.
Ulog ke paas kuchh chhoṭa machhri bhi raha. Yeeshu aasheesh maañg ke uske bhi baaṭe ke waaste dees.
Sab peṭ bhar ke khaana khaain. Chela log bacha kucha tukṛa se saat baaskeṭ bharin.
Khaana khaay waala log kul milaay ke chaar hajaar rahin. Yeeshu sab log ke bhej dees.
Aur Yeeshu jurte aapan chela log ke sañghe bauṭ meñ beiṭh ke Daalmanuuta chala gais.
Farisi log aain aur Yeeshu se baad-bibaad kare lagin aur uske ṭesṭ kare ke waaste usse swarag ke koi saain maañgin.
Yeeshu gahira saas leke bolis, “I ṭaaim ke log kaahe saain khoje hei? Ham tum se sachche bolta hei, ki koi saain nai dewa jaai.”
Yeeshu sab log ke chhoṛ ke bauṭ meñ beiṭh ke u paar chala gais.
Chela log khaana laawe ke bhuul gain aur bauṭ meñ ulog ke lage khali ek roṭi raha.
Yeeshu ulog ke chetaaoni dees, “Dekho, Farisi log ke yeesṭ aur Heraḍ ke yeesṭ se bach ke rahna.”
U log apne meñ baat karat rahin ki ulog ke lage roṭi nai hei, aur yahi kaaran Yeeshu eise bole hei.
Yeeshu jaan gais aur puuchhis, “Tum i baat meñ kaahe paṛa hei ki tumhaar lage khaay ke kuchh nai hei? Kaa tum log abhi bhi nai jaana? Kaa abhi bhi tumhaar samajh meñ nai aais?
Aañkhi rakh ke, tum dekhta nai, aur kaan rakh ke bhi, tum sunta nai. Kaa tumme kuchh yaad nai hei?
Jab ham paañch hajaar log ke beech paañch roṭi tuuṛa raha, to tum log tukṛa se bhara ketna baaskeṭ uṭhaay raha?” U log jawaab deen, “Baarah.”
Yeeshu fir puuchhis, “Aur jab ham chaar hajaar log ke beech saat roṭi tuuṛa raha, to tukṛa se bhara ketna baaskeṭ uṭhaay raha?” U log bolin, “Saat.”
Yeeshu bolis, “Kaa tumme abhi bhi samajh meñ nai aais?”
Yeeshu Beitseida meñ aais. Kuchh log Yeeshu ke lage ek añdha admi ke laain aur Yeeshu se binti karin, ki u admi ke chhue.
Yeeshu añdha admi ke haath pakṛis aur uske gaaoñ se bahire le gais, aur uske aañkhi meñ thuuk ke aapan haath rakkhis aur usse puuchhis, “Kaa tumme kuchh dekhaay hei?”
U uppar dekh ke bolis, “Ham admi log ke dekhe sakta hei, lekin eise janaay hei ki ulog chalat firat peṛ hei.”
Tab Yeeshu fir aapan haath uske aañkhi pe rakkhis. Añdha dhyaan se dekhis. Uske aañkhi ṭheek hoy gais raha, aur u sab kuchh safa safa dekhe laga.
Yeeshu usse bolis, “I gaaoñ meñ goṛ nai rakhna,” aur uske ghare bhej dees.
Yeeshu aur uske chela log Kaisaria Filippi ke gaaoñ meñ chala gain. Rasta meñ Yeeshu aapan chela log se puuchhis, “Log hamme kaa bole hei?”
Ulog jawaab deen, “Koi koi bole ki tum Yuhanna baptisma de waala hei, aur koi koi bole hei ki tum Ilaayja hei, lekin koi koi bole hei ki tum koi naa koi nabi hei.”
Tab Yeeshu puuchhis, “Lekin tum kaa bolta ki ham kon hei?” Peeṭa jawaab dees, “Tum Maseeha hei.”
Is pe Yeeshu chela log ke chetaaoni dees ki uske baare meñ koi se kuchh nai bataana.

Yeeshu chela log se bataais ki i bahut jaruuri hei ki Manush ke laṛka dukh uṭhaawe. U elḍa log, baṛa paadri aur Shaastri log ke najar meñ kharaab samjha jaai, maar dewa jaai, aur teen din baad jinda hoy jaai.
Yeeshu i sab baat ulog se safa safa bataay dees. Is pe Peeṭa Yeeshu ke alge le jaay ke bolis ki u chuppe rahe.
Yeeshu ghuum ke aapan chela log ke dekhis aur Peeṭa ke ḍaaṭ ke bolis, “Saitaan, hamaar lage se chala jaao! Tum bhi dusra log ke rakam sochta hei, Parmeshwar ke rakam nai.”
Yeeshu aapan chela log ke sañghe aur sab log ke bolaais aur bolis, “Jon koi hamaar pichchhe aawe maañge hei, to apne aap ke bhulaay ke, aapan kros uṭhaay ke, hamaar pichchhe aay jaao.
Jon koi aapan jaan bachaawe maañgi, to uske khoy dei, lekin jon koi aapan jaan hamaar waaste aur Parmeshwar ke vachan ke waaste dewe maañgi, uske jaan bach jaai.
Agar koi admi dunia meñ sab cheej paay lewe hei, lekin aapan jaan khoy de hei to uske kaa faayda?
Admi aapan jaan ke badle meñ kon cheej de saki?
Agar koi bhi admi i beimaan aur paapi log ke beech meñ hamaar aur hamaar vachan se sarmaai to Manush ke laṛka bhi ulog se sarmaai, jab u aapan Pita ke mahima meñ pawitr ainjals ke sañghe aai.”

Yeeshu ulog se bolis, “Ham tum se sachche bataata hei, ki jon hiañ khaṛa hei, ulog meñ se kuchh log eisan hei, ki jab talak Parmeshwar ke raaj ke saamarth sahit nai dekh le hei, tab tak ulog nai mari.
Chhe roj baad Yeeshu, Peeṭa, Jeims aur Yuhanna ke aapan sañghe lees aur ulog ek uucha pahaaṛ pe akele meñ le gais. Huañ ulog ke saamne Yeeshu ke ruup badal gais.
Yeeshu ke kapṛa chamke laga, ekdam ujjar hoy gais, ki dunia meñ koi bhi dhobi etna ujjar nai kare sake.
Aur huañ ulog Ilaayja aur Maozas ke dekhin jon Yeeshu se baat karat rahin.
Tab Peeṭa Yeeshu se bolis, “Guru ji, ketna achchha baat hei ki ham sab hiañ hei. Aao ham log teen tambu banaai, ek tumhaar waaste, ek Maozas ke waaste, aur ek Ilaayja ke waaste.
Peeṭa nai jaanat raha ki u kaa bole hei, kaahe ke ulog bahut ḍar gain raha.
Tab baadar aay ke ulog ke gher lees aur usman se awaaj aais, “I hamaar pyaara laṛka hei, iske baat suno.”
Tab chela log dekhin ki Yeeshu ke chhoṛ ke, sab koi gaayab hoy gais hei.
Pahaaṛ se utre ke ṭaaim Yeeshu hukum dees, “Jab tak Manush ke laṛka mare ke baad jinda nai hoy jaai, tab tak i jon tum log dekha hei, koi se nai bataana.”
I baat ulog apne meñ rakh ke baad bibaad kare lagin, “Mare ke baad fir jinda hoy ke matlab kaa hei?”
Chela log Yeeshu se puuchhin, “Shaastri log kaahe bole hei ki pahile Ilaayja ke aawe ke jaruuri hei?”
Yeeshu jawaab dees, “Ṭheek hei, Ilaayja pahile aay ke sab kuchh taiyaar kari, lekin Manush ke laṛka ke baare meñ Baaibal meñ eise kaahe likhin hei ki, “U bahut dukh uṭhaai aur ṭhukraawa jaai?
Ham tumme sachche bataata hei, ki Ilaayja aay gay hei, aur jeise uske baare meñ Baaibal meñ likhaan hei, log uske sañghe manmaani kaam kari.”
Jab Yeeshu aur uske teen chela log aur chela log ke lage aais, tab dekhis ki chaaro taraf bheeṛ laga hei aur shaastri log ulog se baad bibaad kare hei.
Yeeshu ke dekh ke sab log chakit hoy gain aur dauṛ ke uske welkam karin.
Yeeshu puuchhis, “Tum log ilog se kaa baad bibaad karta hei?”
Bheeṛ meñ se ek admi bolis, “Guru ji, ham tumhaar lage aapan laṛka ke laaya hei jisman guuñga bhuut hei.

Jahañ kahiñ bhuut uske pakṛe hei, wahiñ uske paṭak dewe hei. U muh meñ se fena nikaare hei, daañt peese lage hei aur aapan deñhi kaṛa kar lewe hei. Ham tumhaar chela log se bola ki ulog uske nikaar dewe, lekin ulog nai nikaare sakin.
Yeeshu bolis, “E abiswaasi log, ham kab tak tumhaar sañghe rahega, aur kab tak i sab sahte rahega? U laṛka ke hamaar lage laao.”
Log laṛka ke Yeeshu ke paas laain. Yeeshu ke jeise dekhis weise bhuut laṛka ke eiñṭhis. Laṛka jameen pe gir paṛis, muh se fena nikre laga aur u loṭe laga.
Yeeshu uske bappa se puuchhis, “Iske i haalat kab se hei?” U jawaab dees, “Chhoṭa pe se.
Uske maare ke waaste bhuut kabhi aagi meñ to kabhi paani meñ giraais. Agar tum kuchh kare sako to hamaar uppar daya karo aur hamaar madat karo.”
Yeeshu usse bolis, “Eise kaahe bolta hei, ‘Agar ham kuchh kare sakta hei.’ Jon log biswaas kare hei, ulog ke khaatir sab kuchh hoy sake hei.”
Wahi lage laṛka ke bappa roy ke bolis, “Ham biswaas karta hei. Hamaar abiswaas duur kare meñ hamme madat karo.”
Jab Yeeshu dekhis ki log bheeṛ lagaay hei, tab u bhuut ke ḍaaṭis, “E guuñga aur bahira aatma, ham tumme hukum deta hei ki isman se nikar jaao aur fir kabhi lauṭ ke isman nai aana.”
Guuñga aatma chillaais, laṛka ke eiñṭhis aur usman se nikar gais. Laṛka dekhe meñ laga jeise mar gais hei, aur bahut log bolin ki u mar gais hei.
Lekin Yeeshu uske haath pakaṛ ke uṭhaais, aur u khaṛa hoy gais.
Jab Yeeshu ghar meñ aais, to uske chela log akele meñ usse puuchhis, “Ham log kaahe nai u bhuut ke nikaare saka?”
Yeeshu jawaab dees, “I rakam ke aatma preya ke bina aur koi rasta se nai nikre hei.”
Yeeshu aur uske chela log aage baṛhin aur Galeel se hoy ke nikar gain. U nai maañgat raha ki koi jaane ki u kahañ hei.
Yeeshu aapan chela log ke sikhaat raha, aur ulog se bolat raha, “Manush ke laṛka ke admi log ke haath meñ de dewa jaai, aur ulog uske maar ḍaliyeñ, lekin mare ke teen roj baad u jinda hoy jaai.”
I baat ulog ke samajh meñ nai aais, lekin ulog puuchhe ke khaatir ḍarat rahin.
Yeeshu aur uske chela log Kafarnahuum meñ aain. Ghar meñ aay ke Yeeshu ulog se puuchhis, “Rasta meñ tum log kon baat pe baad-bibaad karat raha?”
U log chup rahin, kaahe ke rasta meñ ulog aapas meñ i baat pe bahas karat rahin ki ulog meñ se kon sab se baṛa hei?
Tab Yeeshu baarah chela log ke bulaais aur ulog ke bataais, “Agar tum meñ se koi baṛa hoy maañge to u sab se chhoṭa aur sab ke sewa kare.”
Aur u ek chhoṭa laṛka ke laay ke ulog ke beech meñ khaṛa kar dees, aur uske godi meñ leke ulog se bolis,
“Jon koi hamaar naam se eisan laṛka ke apnaay hei, u hamme bhi apnaay hei, aur jon koi hamme apnaay hei, u khali hamme nai, lekin hamme bhejewaala ke bhi apnaay hei.”
Yuhanna Yeeshu se bolis, “Guru ji, ham log ek admi ke tumhaar naam se bhuut nikaarte dekha, to ham log uske roka kaahe ke u hamlog meñ se ek nai raha.”
Yeeshu bolis, “Uske nai roko, kaahe ke eisan koi nai jon hamaar naam se chamatkaar kare aur thoṛa deri ke baad hamaar buraai kare.
Jon hamaar agaiñsṭ nai hei, u hamaar sañghe hei.
Agar koi tum log ke hamaar naam se ek pyaala paani piaay kaahe ke tum Maseehi hei, to ham tum se sachche bolta hei ki u aapan inaam paai.

Ulog ke khaatir achchha nai hoi, jon hamaar pichchhe chalewaala chhoṭa log meñ se, ekko ke bhi paap ke jaal meñ fasaawe hei. Ulog ke khaatir achchha hei ki ulog ke gaṭai meñ ek baṛa patthar laṭkaay ke samundar meñ feñk dewa jaay.

Agar tumhaar haath tumme paap meñ fasaay to uske kaaṭ dewe ke chaahi. Luula hoy ke, mukti ke jeewan paay lena kahiñ achchha hei ki dui haath rahte tum narak meñ chala jaao, jahañ nai butewaala aagi meñ feka jaay.
Agar tumhaar goṛ tumme paap meñ fasaay, to uske kaaṭ ḍaalo. Langṛa hoy ke mukti ke jeewan paay lena isse kahiñ achchha hei ki dui goṛ rahe pe bhi tum narak meñ feka jaao.
Aur agar tumhaar aañkhi tumme paap meñ fasaay to uske nikaar deo. Kaana hoy ke Parmeshwar ke raaj ke paay lena to isse kahiñ achchha hei ki aañkhi rahte tumme narak meñ feñk dewa jaay.
Huañ ke kirwa kabhi nai mare aur aagi kabhi nai bute hei.
Kaahe ke sab log ke aagi se namkeen kara jaai.
Neemak achchha hei, lekin agar neemak ke sawaad chala jaay to sawaad kahañ se laayga? Apne aap meñ neemak rakkho, aur aapas meñ mil ke saanti se raho.”
Huañ se uṭh ke Yeeshu Joḍan nadi ke paar Juḍia ke gaaoñ meñ aais. Ek baṛa bheeṛ fir uske nagichche aay gain aur u aapan reeti riwaaj ke rakam ulog ke fir sikhaay laga.
Tab kuchh Farisi Yeeshu ke lage aain aur uske ṭesṭ kare ke waaste sawaal puuchhin, “Kaa i ṭheek hei ki admi aapan aurat ke ḍivos de?”
Jawaab meñ Yeeshu ulog se puuchhis, “Maozas ke kaanuun tumme kaa kare ke bataawe hei?”
Ulog bolin, “Maozas ke kaanuun ke mutaabik, noṭis likhe ke baad ḍivos dewa jaay sake hei.”
Yeeshu ulog se bolis, “Tumhaar kaṛa man ke kaaran Maozas i ruuls tumme dees hei.
Lekin jab se dunia bana hei, Parmeshwar admi aur aurat ke banaais hei.
Yahi kaaran admi aapan maañ-baap se alge hoy ke aapan aurat ke sañghe rahi, aur ulog ek hoy jahiyeñ.
Ab ulog dui nai lekin ek deñhi hei.
Yahi ke waaste jiske Parmeshwar joṛis hei, uske koi admi alag nai kare.”
Ghar meñ chela log iske baare meñ Yeeshu se fir puuchhin.
Yeeshu ulog se bataais, “Jon aapan aurat ke chhoṛ ke dusra aurat se saadi kare hei, u aapan aurat ke sañghe aḍalṭri kare hei.
Aur agar aurat aapan admi ke chhoṛ ke dusra admi se saadi kare hei, to u bhi aḍalṭri hei.
Kuchh log chhoṭa laṛkan ke Yeeshu ke lage laain, ki Yeeshu ulog ke uppar haath rakkhe, lekin chela log ulog ke ḍaaṭis.
Yeeshu jab i dekhis to gussaay ke ulog se bolis, “Laṛkan ke hamaar lage aawe deo aur ulog ke roko nai, kaahe ke Parmeshwar ke raaj eisane log ke hei.
Ham tum se sachche bataata hei, agar koi admi Parmeshwar ke raaj ke chhoṭa bachcha ke rakam apnaay nai hei, to u raaj ke u nai paay saki.”
Tab Yeeshu laṛkan ke godi meñ lees, ulog ke muuṛ pe haath rakkhis, aur aasheesh dees.
Jab Yeeshu rasta pe jaawat raha, tab ek admi dauṛ ke aais aur ghuṭna ṭek ke usse puuchhis, “He achchha guru, anant jeewan paay ke waaste ham kaa kari?”
“Tum hamme achchha guru kaahe ke bolta hei?” Yeeshu jawaab dees. “Parmeshwar ke chhoṛ ke aur koi achchha nai hei.
Tum to sab ruuls janta hei. ‘Koi ke jaan nai lena, byabhichaar nai karna, chori nai karna, jhuuṭ ke gawaahi nai dena, chhal nai karna, aapan amma aur bappa ke aadar karna.” ’
“He guru,” u admi bolis, “I sab ruuls to ham chhoṭa se maante aaya hei.”

Tab Yeeshu uske bagal dekhis, aur pyaar se bolis, “Tum meñ khali ekke kami hei. Jaao jon kuchh tumhaar lage hei, u sab ke bech ke gareeb log ke de deo, aur tumme swarag meñ dhan mili, tab aay ke hamaar pichchhe hoy leo.”
Jab u i baat sunis, tab uske chehra ekdam udaas hoy gais, aur u dukhi hoy ke chala gais, kaahe ke u ek bahut dhani admi raha.
Yeeshu sab taraf dekh ke aapan chela log se bolis, “Dhani log ke Parmeshwar ke raaj meñ jaay ke waaste ketna kaṛa hei!”
Chela log i baat ke sun ke hairaan hoy gain, ispe Yeeshu fir se bolis, “Hamaar bachcha log, jon peisa pe bharosa rakkhe hei, ulog ke khaatir Parmeshwar ke raaj meñ jaay ke waaste bahut kaṛa hei!
Sui ke naake meñ se ek uuñṭ ke nikar jaay ke sahaj hei, lekin ek dhani admi ke Parmeshwar ke raaj meñ jaay ke bahut kaṛa paṛi.”
Ispe chela log bahut hairaan bhain, aur aapas meñ baat cheet kare lagin, “To fir kon bache sake hei?”
Yeeshu ulog ke bagal dekh ke bolis, “Admi log se to i hoy nai sake hei, lekin Parmeshwar se sab kuchh hoy sake hei.”
Tab Peeṭa bolis, “Dekho, ham sab kuchh chhoṛ ke tumhaar pichchhe aay gaya hei.”
Yeeshu bolis. “Ham tum se sachche bataata hei, jon koi hamaar waaste aur susamaachaar ke waaste ghar, bhaiya, bahini, maañ, baap, laṛkan bachchan ya khet chhoṛis hei,
ulog ke i janam meñ bahut mili. Ulog ke i dunia meñ sao guna jaada ghar, bhaiya, bahini, maañ-baap, laṛkan bachchan aur khet mili, lekin dukh bhi mili. Ṭaaim aay pe ulog ke anant jeewan mili.
Bahut log jon abhi aage hei, pichchhe hoy jahiyeñ aur jon pichchhe hei, aage hoy jahiyeñ.”

Yeeshu aur uske chela log Yarushalam jaawat rahin. Yeeshu ulog ke aage raha. U sab log hairaan rahin aur ḍarat bhi rahin. Ek dafe fir Yeeshu aapan chela log ke alge le jaay ke bataawe laga, ki kon cheej uske uppar hoy waala hei.

Yeeshu bataais, “Dekho, ham log Yarushalam jaata hei jahañ pe Manush ke laṛka baṛa paadri aur shaastri log ke haath pakaṛwaaya jaai. Ulog uske jaan se maare ke hukum dei aur dusra jaati ke haath meñ de dehiyeñ.
Ulog uske hasi uṛaai, us pe thuuki, chaabuk maari, aur maar ḍaari, lekin teen roj ke baad u jinda hoy jaai.”
Tab Zabdi ke laṛkan Jeims aur Yuhanna, Yeeshu ke lage aain. Ulog bolin, “He guru, ham tumse mañgta hei ki jon kuchh ham maañgi, tum hamaar waaste wahi karo.”
Yeeshu puuchhis, “Tum log kaa mañgta hei?”
Ulog bolin, “Ham mañgta hei ki tum jab aapan raaj ke mahima meñ aao, tab ham log meñ se ek tumhaar raaiṭ aur dusra tumhaar lefṭ saaiḍ beiṭhi.
Yeeshu ulog ke bataais, “Tum nai janta ki tum kaa mañgta hei. Kaa tum u dukh ke pyaala piye sakega jon ham piye jaata hei? Kaa tum u baptisma le sakta hei jon ham lewe jaata hei?”
“Haañ, ham le sakta hei,” ulog bolin. Yeeshu ulog se bolis, “Jaruur tum u pyaala piega jon ham piye jaata hei, aur jon baptisma ham lewe jaata hei, u bhi tum log lega.
Lekin hamme i hak nai hei ki ham chune saki ki kon hamaar raaiṭ ya lefṭ saaiḍ beiṭhe. Khali Parmeshwar u jagha uske dei jiske waaste u taiyaar kara gais hei.”
Jab das aur chela log i baat sunin, to ulog Jeims aur Yuhanna pe gussaain.
Lekin Yeeshu, sab chela log ke ek sañghe bolaay ke bolis, “Tum janta hei ki aur jaati ke log meñ jon agua hoy hei, aur usman se jon baṛa hei, u dusra log pe hak jamaay hei.
Lekin tum log eise nai karna. Agar tum meñ se koi baṛa hoy maañge hei to u tumhaar naukar bani.
Aur agar tumme se koi agua bane maañgi, to u sab ke naukar bane.
Manush ke laṛka i waaste nai aais ki sab se aapan sewa karaawe, lekin i kaaran aais ki u dusra log ke sewa kare aur sab ke bachaawe ke waaste aapan jaan de dewe.”
Yeeshu aur uske chela log aur ek baṛa bheeṛ Jeriko aain. Ulog jab huañ se nikrin, tab Timaai ke laṛka Bartimaais, jon ek añdha bhikhaari raha, rasta ke kinaare beiṭha raha.
Jab u sunis ki Yeeshu Naasri aawe hei, to u jor se chillaay ke bole laga, “E Ḍeiviḍ ke laṛka, ham pe daya karo!”
Bahut log uske bolin ki chuppe raho. Lekin u aur jor se chillaay laga, “Ḍeiviḍ ke laṛka, ham pe daya karo!”
Yeeshu ruk gais aur bolis, “Uske hiañ bolaao.” Ulog añdha admi ke bolaain, “Ḍaro nai! Yeeshu tumme bolaay hei.”
U aapan koṭ feñk ke jaldi se uṭhis aur Yeeshu ke lage gais.
“Tum kon cheej mañgta hei ki ham tumhaar waaste kari?” Yeeshu usse puuchhis. “E guru, ham dekhe mañgta hei,” u añdha admi bolis.
Tab Yeeshu bolis, “Jaao, tumhaar biswaas tumme achchha kar dees hei.” Aur u jurte dekhe laga aur rasta meñ Yeeshu ke pichchhe hoy lees.
Jab ulog Yarushalam ke nagichche, Jaituun pahaaṛ pe Beitfage aur Bethni ke lage aain, tab Yeeshu aapan dui chela ke i baat bataay ke aage bhejis.
“U aage waala gaaoñ meñ jaao. Jeise huañ tum log pahuñchega, huañ tumme ek gadha ke bachcha, jispe abhi tak koi nai beiṭhis hei, bañdha dekhaay dei, uske khol laao.
Agar koi tum se puuchhi ki i kaa karta hei, to bataana ki Prabhu ke is ke jaruurat hei, aur u jaldi lauṭaay dei.”
Ulog gain aur bachcha ke duaari pe bañdha paain, aur uske khole lagin.
Huañ jon log khaṛa rahin, ulog se puuchhin, “Kaa karta hei? Gadha ke bachcha ke kaahe kholta hei?”
Jeise Yeeshu bataais raha, weisaiyeñ ulog bol deen, aur ulog bachcha ke le jaay deen.
Ulog bachcha ke Yeeshu ke lage laain, uspe aapan aapan kapṛa bichhaain aur Yeeshu uspe beiṭh gais.
Bahut log rasta pe aapan aapan kapṛa bichhaain aur kuchh log khet se patti kaaṭ ke rasta pe bichhaain.
Aur jon uske aage aage jaawat rahin, aur jon uske pichchhe pichchhe chalat rahin, ulog jor jor se chillaay ke bolat rahin, “Hosaana, dhann hei u jon Prabhu ke naam se aawe hei!
Hamaar bappa Ḍeiviḍ ke raaj aawe hei, uspe Parmeshwar ke aasheesh hoi! Aur Prabhu ke baṛaai hoi!”
Yeeshu Yarushalam pahuñch ke chech meñ aais, aur chaaro taraf sab cheej ke dekhe laga. Lekin kaafi sanjha hoy gais raha, u aapan baarah chela log ke sañghe Bethani chala gais.
Dusra roj sabere jab ulog Bethani se chalin, tab Yeeshu ke bhuuk laga.

Duur pe u ek anjeer ke hariyar peṛ dekh ke uske nagichche aais, i soch ke ki huañ uske kuchh khaay ke mili. Lekin jab u nagichche aais, to patti ke chhoṛ ke u kuchh nai paais, kaahe ke anjeer ke fare ke ṭaaim nai raha.
Yeeshu anjeer ke peṛ se bolis, “Ab se koi i peṛ ke fal nai khaai!” Aur uske chela log i sunat rahin.
Jab ulog Yarushalam meñ aain, tab u Mandir meñ jaay ke huañ len den kare waalan ke nikaare laga. U peisa badle waala log ke ṭaibal aur kabuttar beche waalan ke peeṛha ulaṭ dees.
Aur Yeeshu koi ke Mandir meñ se kuchh bhi laawe aur le jaay nai dees.
Tab u samjhaay ke bataais, “Kaa i Baaibal meñ nai likha hei ki, ‘Hamaar Mandir sab des ke log ke waaste preya kare waala ghar rahi, lekin tum log iske chor ke aḍḍa banaay dia hei!’ ”
I sunke baṛa paadri aur shaastri log uske jaan se maare ke mauka khoje lagin. Kaahe ke ulog usse ḍarat rahin. Sab log uske sikhaawe pe hairaan howat rahin.
Sanjha jeise bhay, Yeeshu aur uske chela log ṭaaun se bahire chala gain.
Dusra roj sabere, jab ulog wahi rasta se jaawat rahin, to dekhin ki anjeer ke peṛ jaṛ tak sukhaay gay hei.
Peeṭa ke yaad aais ki kal kaa bhais raha, aur u Yeeshu se bolis, “E guru, dekho, jon peṛ ke tum saraapa raha, u sukhaay gais hei.”
Tab Yeeshu chela log se bolis, “Parmeshwar pe biswaas karo!

Ham tum se sachche bolta hei, ki jon koi i pahaaṛ se boli ki uṭh ke jaao, aur samundar meñ lag jaao, aur aapan man meñ sandeh nai kari, lekin biswaas kari ki u jon cheej bole hei ki hoi, to u jaruur hoy jaai
Yahi kaaran ham tum se bolta hei, ki jon kuchh tum preya karke maañgo, aur biswaas karo to u tumme mil jaai.
Aur jab tum preya kare ke waaste khaṛa hota hei, tab agar tumhaar man meñ koi ke waaste jaran hei to uske maafi de deo. Tab tumhaar Pita jon swarag meñ hei, u bhi tumhaar paap maaf kari.”

Ulog fir Yarushalam aain, aur jab Yeeshu Mandir meñ ghuumat raha, tab baṛa paadri aur shaastri log aur Mandir ke elḍas, uske lage aay ke puuchhe lagin, “Kon hak se tum i sab karta hei? Aur kon tumme i hak dees hei ki tum i kaam karo?”
Yeeshu jawaab dees, “Ham bhi tum se ek sawaal puuchhega aur tum uske jawaab dena, tab ham tum se bataayga ki i kaam ham kiske bole pe karta hei.
I bataao, Yuhanna ke baptisma swarag ke taraf se ya admi ke taraf se raha?”
Ulog aapas meñ bichaar karin aur ek dusra se bolin, “Ham kaa boli? Agar ham bolta hei ki, ‘Parmeshwar ke taraf se,’ to u boli, ‘Tab kaahe ke tum log Yuhanna pe biswaas nai kara?’
Agar ham boli, ‘Admi ke taraf se,” ’ (U log ḍarat rahin, kaahe ke sab log jaanat rahin ki Yuhanna sachche ek nabi raha.)
Ulog Yeeshu se bolin, “Ham nai jaanta hei.” Yeeshu jawaab dees, “Ham bhi tumme nai bataayga ki i kaam ham kiske bole pe karta hei.”

Yeeshu ulog ke i kahaani sunaais, “Ek dafe ek kisaan añguur ke kheti karis. U uske chaaro bagal se gher dees, ras ke kuñḍ khodis, aur pahra de waala ke ghar bhi banaais. Tab u añguur ke khet renṭ pe de dees, aur u apne bides ghuume chala gais.
Jab añguur tuuṛe ke ṭaaim aais, tab kisaan ek naukar ke renṭ pe rahe waala admi ke lage bhejis, ki u jaay ke uske hissa ke añguur laay.
Lekin renṭ waala log naukar ke pakaṛ ke peeṭin aur khaali haath lauṭaay deen.
Tab kisaan dusra naukar ke bhejis, uske bhi ulog muuṛ meñ maarin aur beijjati karin.
Kisaan fir ek dusra naukar bhejis, lekin ulog uske maar ḍaarin. Tab kisaan aur dusra naukar log ke bhejis, ulog meñ se kuchh ke peeṭin aur kuchh ke pahile ke rakam beijjati kar ke maar ḍaarin.
Ab bheje ke waaste khali kisaan ke pyaara laṛka baaki rahe gais. Haar maan ke kisaan sochis ki renṭ waala log uske laṛka ke ijjat kari, to u aapan laṛka ke ulog ke lage bhejis.
Lekin ulog aapas meñ bichaar karin, “I to maalik ke laṛka hei aur uske waaris bani. Aao ham log iske maar dei, tab iske sab cheej ham log ke hoy jaai.”
Aur ulog laṛka ke pakaṛ ke maar ḍaarin aur khet ke bahire feñk deen.
Yeeshu puuchhis, “Ab añguur ke khet ke maalik kaa kari? U aay ke renṭ waala log ke jaan se maar ke aapan khet ke dusra ke renṭ pe de dei.
Kaa tum log Baaibal meñ i baat nai paṛha? ‘Jon patthar ke kaapenṭa log bekaar samajh ke bagal kar dees raha, wahi kona ke waaste asli patthar banis.
I sab Prabhu ke taraf se bhais raha, aur hamaar dekhe meñ bahut chakit baat hei!”
Tab Yahuudi agua log Yeeshu ke pakṛe maañgat rahin, kaahe ke ulog samajh gay rahin ki Yeeshu ulog ke agaiñsṭ meñ kahaani bataais raha. Lekin u bheeṛ log ke ḍar se uske akele chhoṛ ke chala gain.
Tab ulog Yeeshu ke uske baat meñ fasaawe ke waaste kuchh Farisi aur Heraḍ ke admi log ke uske lage bhejis.

Ulog jaay ke usse bolin, “E guru, ham janta hei ki tum sachche bolta hei, aur koi ke parwaah nai karta hei, kaahe ki tum admi log ke muh dekh ke baat nai karta, lekin Parmeshwar ke rasta sachchaai se bataata hei. Ham log ke bataao ki Raaja ke ṭeks dewe ke ṭheek hei? Kaa hamme uske ṭeks dewe ke chaahi ki nai?
Yeeshu ulog ke chalaaki jaan gais aur jawaab dees, “Tum log kaahe hamme ṭesṭ karta hei? Ek chaañdi ke peisa hamaar lage laao, ki ham dekhe saki.”
Ulog ek chaañdi ke peisa Yeeshu ke lage laain. U puuchhis, “Is meñ kiske chehra hei aur kiske naam hei?” “Raaja ke,” ulog bolin.
Tab Yeeshu bolis, “Jon Raaja ke hei, u Raaja ke de deo, aur jon Parmeshwar ke hei, u Parmeshwar ke de deo.” Tab ulog uske i baat sunke bahut chakit bhain.
Tab Saduuki log bhi, jon bole hei ki koi mar ke jinda nai hoy sake, usman se kuchh Yeeshu ke lage aay ke bolin,

“E guru, Maozas ham log ke khaatir likhis hei, ‘Agar koi ke bhaiya mar jaay, aur uske aurat bina laṛkan ke rahe jaay, to uske bhaiya uske aurat se saadi kar le sake hei aur aapan bhaiya ke waaste laṛkan peida kare sake hei.’
Ek dafe ke baat hei, saat bhaiya rahin, sab se baṛa bhaiya bina laṛkan ke mar gais.
Tab uske dusra bhaiya u aurat se saadi kar lees, lekin u bhi bina laṛkan ke mar gais. Tisra ke sañghe bhi eisehiyeñ bhais.
Aur baaki bhaiya log ke sañghe bhi yahi bhais. Saat bhaiya log u aurat se saadi karin, aur bina laṛkan ke mar gain. Aakhri meñ u aurat bhi mar gais.
To jab mara log jinda hoi to ulog meñ se kiske aurat u hoi? Kaahe ke u saato bhaiya ke aurat rahi.’ ”
Yeeshu bolis, “Tum galti karta hei! Tum nai janta hei Baaibal kon cheej sikhaay hei. Aur tum Parmeshwar ke taagat bhi nai janta hei.
Log jab mare ke baad jinda hoi, tab ulog ainjals ke rakam rahiyeñ, tab ulog meñ saadi waadi nai hoi.

Mare ke baad fir se jinda hoy waala baat Maozas ke buk meñ kaa tum jhaaṛi ke kahaani meñ nai paṛha, jahañ Parmeshwar ulog se bolis raha, ‘Ham Abraham ke Parmeshwar hei, Aayzak ke Parmeshwar, aur Jeims ke Parmeshwar hei?’
Parmeshwar mara log ke nai lekin jinda log ke Parmeshwar hei. Tum log baṛa bhuul karta hei!”
Ek shaastri jon ulog ke baat sunat raha, wahiñ pe raha. U dekhis ki Yeeshu achchha se jawaab dees, to u aay ke usse ek sawaal karis, “Sab se khaas hukum kon hei?”
Yeeshu bolis, “Sab hukum meñ yahi sab se khaas hukum hei, ‘E Israayel suno! Prabhu ham log ke Parmeshwar, ekke Prabhu hei.
Aur tum Prabhu Parmeshwar se aapan puura man se, aur puura praan se, aur puura buddhi se, aur aapan puura taagat se prem rakhna.’
Aur dusra hukum i hei, ‘Tum aapan paṛosi se aapan rakam prem karna.’ Isse baṛa aur koi hukum nai hei.”
Shaastri, Yeeshu se bolis, “E guru, tum ṭheek bola hei, aur sachche bola hei ki u ekke hei aur uske chhoṛ ke koi dusra nai.
Aur usse puura man se, puura buddhi se, puura praan se aur puura taagat se prem karna aur aapan paṛosi se aapan rakam prem karna, i sab rakam ke bali aur balidaan se baṛh ke hei.”
Tab Yeeshu dekhis ki u samajhdaari se jawaab dees hei, to u bolis, “Tum Parmeshwar ke raaj se duur nai hei.” Aur fir koi ke Yeeshu se kuchh puuchhe ke himmat nai bhais.
Yeeshu Mandir meñ updes dewe ke ṭaaim sawaal puuchhis, “Shaastri kaahe bole hei ki Maseeh, Raaja Ḍeiviḍ ke laṛka hei?”
Ḍeiviḍ Pawitr Aatma se bhar ke bolis, ‘Prabhu hamaar Prabhu se bolis, hamaar raaiṭ saaiḍ beiṭho, jab tak tumhaar dusman log ke tumhaar goṛ ke nichche nai kar dei.’
Raaja Ḍeiviḍ to apne aap uske Prabhu bole hei, fir u uske laṛka keise bhais?” Aur bheeṛ ke sab log khusi se i sab sunat rahin.

Tab Yeeshu sikhaay ke ṭaaim ulog se bolis, “Shaastri log se bach ke rahna, jon lamba lamba kapṛa pahin ke ghuume hei, aur jon bajaar meñ namaste aur chech meñ khaas jagha beiṭhe hei, aur neota meñ maan-sammaan ke khoj meñ rahe hei.
Yahi log hei jon bidhwa log ke ghar dhoka se le le hei. aur dekhaawe ke khaatir baṛa deri tak preya karte rahe hei. I log ke to bahut bhaari saja mili.”
Yeeshu Mandir meñ peisa baṭore waala jagha pe beiṭh ke dekhe laga ki log Mandir meñ keise daan dewe hei. Kaafi dhani log bahut peisa deen.
Etne meñ ek gareeb bidhwa aay ke dui taamba ke sikka, jon ek peisa ke baraabar hei, usman chhoṛis.
Yeeshu aapan chela log ke bolaay ke bolis, “Ham tumme sachche bataata hei ki Mandir meñ peisa dewe waalan meñ se i gareeb bidhwa sab se jaada daan dees.
Kaahe ke sab usman se deen jon ulog nai maañgat rahin, lekin i bidhwa to aapan sab kuchh de dees hei.”
Jab Yeeshu Mandir se nikrat raha, to uske ek chela bolis, “He guru, dekho, keisan keisan patthar aur keisan keisan ghar hei?”
Yeeshu bolis, “I baṛa baṛa ghar dekhta hei? Hiañ pe ek bhi patthar nai bachi, ek ek kar ke feñk dewa jaai.”
Jab Yeeshu Jaituun pahaaṛ pe Mandir ke saamne beiṭha raha, to Peeṭa, Jeims, Yuhanna aur Enḍru alge jaay ke usse puuchhin.
“Ham log ke bataao ki i sab cheej kab hoi, aur jab hoi tab u ṭaaim ke saain kaa rahi?”
Yeeshu ulog ke jawaab dees, “Bach ke raho ki koi tum log ke dhoka nai de sake.
Bahut log hamaar naam se aay ke kahiyeñ, ‘Ham wahi hei,’ aur bahut ke dhoka bhi dehiyeñ.
Aur jab tum laṛaai ke baare meñ suno, to ghabraana nai, kaahe ke i sab ke hoy ke jaruuri hei, lekin u ṭaaim ant nai hoi.
Ek jaati dusra jaati pe aur ek des dusra des pe chaṛhaai kari, aur erthquaik aai, akaal paṛi. I sab baat museebat ke suruaat hei.”

“Lekin tum aapan waaste bhi bach ke rahna, kaahe ke log tumme pakaṛ ke koṭ meñ le jahiyeñ. Tumme Mandir meñ maari, aur hamaar kaaran gavna aur raaja log ke aage khaṛa hoy ke paṛi, taaki tum ulog ke waaste gawaahi bano.
Aur susamaachaar sab se pahile sab jaati meñ parchaar kara jaai.
Aur jab ulog tumme pakṛi, to pahile se soch nai karna, ki tum kaa bolega, ṭaaim aawe pe wahi bolna jon tumme bataawa jaai. Kaahe ke jon tum bolega u tumhaar baat nai rahi, lekin Pawitr Aatma se aai.
Bhaiya aapan bhaiya ke maare ke waaste de dei, baap bhi aapan laṛkan ke khaatir yahi kari. Laṛkan bhi aapan maañ-baap ke dusman ban jaai aur marwaay dei.
Hamaar naam ke kaaran sab log tumhaar dusman ban jaai. Lekin jon log aakhri tak dheeraj rakhiyeñ, wahi log bach jaai.”
“Jab tum ‘Ek bhayaanak cheej’ huañ khaṛa dekhega, jahañ uske nai hoy ke chaahi, (jon koi i paṛhe hei uske i samajh lewe ke hei.) “Tab jon Juḍia meñ hei, ulog ke pahaaṛ pe bhaag jaay deo.
Jon ruuf pe hei, ulog huañ se nai utre, aur aapan ghar meñ kuchh lewe ke waaste bhittar nai jaay.
Aur jon admi khet meñ hei, u aapan kapṛa lewe ke waaste pichchhe nai lauṭe.
Jon aurat maañ bane waali hei, aur jon bachcha ke duudh piaawe hei, ulog ke waaste i din bahut ḍar waala hoi!
Parmeshwar se preya karo ki i sab ṭhanḍa ke mausam meñ nai hoy!
Kaahe ke i din eisan dukh ke din hoi ki jab se Parmeshwar dunia banaais hei, eisan dukh abhi tak dekhe ke nai mila hei, aur naa kabhi hoi.
Agar Prabhu din chhoṭa nai karta, to koi nai bachta. Lekin jon ke u chunis hei aur aapan khaas log ke khaatir, u din chhoṭa karis hei.”
“U ṭaaim koi tum se aay ke agar bole, ‘Dekho, Maseeh hiañ hei!’ ya ‘Dekho, huañ hei!’ to biswaas nai karna.
Banauṭi Maseeh aur banauṭi nabi nikar paṛi. Rakam rakam ke saain aur sundar kaam dekhaay ke hiañ tak ki Parmeshwar ke chuna log ke bhi bharmaay dehiyeñ.
Tum husiaar rahna. Dekho tum se sab baat ham pahile se bataay dia hei.”
“U ṭaaim dukh ke baad suuraj añdher hoy jaai, aur chaañd aapan ujera nai dekhaai.
Asmaan se taara gire lagi, aur huañ ke taagat aapan jagha se hile lagi.
Tab Manush ke laṛka saamne aai. U baṛa mahima aur taagat ke sañghe baadar meñ se aate dekhaai.
Tab u aapan ainjals ke bhej ke, dharti ke i kona se asmaan ke u kona tak sab bagal se aapan chuna gay log ke baṭori.”
Anjeer ke peṛ se i cheej seekho. Jab uske ḍaari naram hoy hei aur nawa patti nikre lage hei, tab tum jaan leta hei ki garmi ke mausam aay waala hei.
Wahi rakam jab tum i sab cheej hote dekho, to jaan jaao ki ṭaaim nagichche hei, ya duaari pe hei.
Yaad rakkho, ki jab tak i sab baat puura nai hoy jaai, tab tak ilog mari nai.
Asmaan aur dharti miṭ jaai, lekin hamaar baat kabhi nai miṭi.”
“U din aur u ṭaaim ke baare meñ koi nai jaane, etna tak ki naa swarag ke ainjals aur naa Laṛka, khali Pita jaane hei.
Husiaar raho! Jagte raho aur preya meñ laga raho, kaahe ke tum nai janta ki u ṭaaim kab aai.
I u rakam ke baat hei jeise ek admi aapan ghar chhoṛ ke dusra des jaay hei. Aapan sab naukar log ke kaam bataay ke aur wachmen ke jagte rahe ke hukum de hei.
Yahi rakam se jagte raho. Kaahe ke tum nai janta ki ghar ke maalik kab lauṭi, sanjha ke ya aadha raat ke, ya murga bole ke ṭaaim ya sabere.
Kahiñ eise nai hoy ki u achaanak aay jaay aur tumme sowat paay.
Aur jon cheej ham tum se bolta hei, u ham sab se bataata hei, ‘Jagte raho!” ’
Dui din ke baad fasah aur bina yeesṭ ke roṭi ke teohaar aay waala raha. Baṛa paadri aur shaastri log i baat ke khoj meñ rahin ki Yeeshu ke kon rakam se pakaṛ ke maare sake.
Lekin ulog sochin ki teohaar ke roj nai kaahe ke sab log meñ upadrao hoy sake hei.

Jab Yeeshu Bethani meñ Saayman (jis ke koṛhi ke bimaari raha), ke ghare khaana khaay beiṭha raha, tab ek aurat ek botal meñ sundar mahke waala mahañga pefeum laais. U botal ke khol ke pefeum Yeeshu ke goṛ pe giraais.
Lekin kuchh log jon huañ rahin, gussaay gain aur bolin, “Kaahe ke i pefeum ke barbaad kara jaay hei.
Iske to teen sao ḍola se jaada meñ bech ke gareeb log ke madat kara jaay sakat raha.” Aur ulog aurat ke ḍaaṭe lagin.
Lekin Yeeshu bolis, “Uske chhoṛ deo. Uske tum log kaahe ke tang karta hei? U to hamaar sañghe bhalaai karis hei.
Gareeb log tumhaar sañghe hardam rahiyeñ, aur jab maañgo tab ulog ke madat kare sako hei, lekin ham to tumhaar sañghe hardam nai rahega.
Jon kuchh u kare sakat rahi, karis, u hamme maṭṭi dewe ke taiyaari meñ pahile se pefeum lagaay dees hei.
Ham tum se sachche bolta hei ki dunia bhar meñ jahañ kahiñ susamaachaar ke parchaar kara jaai, huañ iske i kaam ke baare meñ yaad kara jaai.”
Tab Juḍas Iskariyoti jon baarah chela meñ se ek raha, u baṛa paadri ke lage gais, ki u Yeeshu ke ulog ke haath pakaṛwaay dei.
Ulog i sun ke khusi bhain aur peisa dewe ke promis karin. Juḍas Iskariyoti ab eisan mauka khojat raha ki koi rakam u Yeeshu ke pakaṛwaay de.

Bina yeesṭ ke roṭi waala teohaar ke pahila roj, fasah ke khaana ke khaatir bheṛa ke bachcha maara jaat raha. Yeeshu ke chela log usse puuchhin, “Tum kahañ mañgta hei ki ham log jaay ke tumhaar waaste fasah ke khaana ke taiyaari kari?”
Tab Yeeshu aapan dui chela log ke bataay ke bhejis, “Ṭaaun meñ jaao, huañ ek admi paani ke ghaṛa uṭhaay dekhaai. Wahi ke pichchhe hoy lena.
Aur u jon ghar meñ jaai, wahi ghar ke maalik se bolna, “Guru puuchhe hei ki u ruum kahañ hei jisman ham aur hamaar chela log fasah ke khaana khaai?”
Tab u tumme ek saja sajaawal aur taiyaar karal baṛa waala uppar ke ruum dekhaai. Wahiñ pe khaana ke taiyaari karna.”
Tab chela log nikar ke ṭaaun meñ aain aur weisaiyeñ dekhin jeise Yeeshu bataais raha. Wahiñ ulog fasah ke khaana taiyaar karin.
Jab sanjha bhais, tab Yeeshu aapan baarah chela log ke sañghe huañ aais.
Jab ulog beiṭh ke khaana khaat rahin, tab Yeeshu ulog se bolis, “Ham tum se sachche bolta hei ki tum meñ se ek jon hamaar sañghe khaana khaay hei, wahi hamme pakaṛwaai.”
Chela log meñ udaasi chhaay gais, aur ulog ek ek karke usse puuchhe lagin, “Kaa u ham hei?”
Yeeshu bolis, “U tum baarah meñ se ek hei jon hamaar sañghe thariya meñ haath ḍaaris hei.
Manush ke laṛka to weisaiyeñ mari, jeise uske baare meñ Baaibal meñ likhaan hei, lekin uspe haay lagi jon Manush ke laṛka ke pakaṛwaai. Achchha hota ki u janam nai leta!”
Khaana khaay ke ṭaaim Yeeshu roṭi lees aur aasheesh maañg ke uske tuuṛis, aur ulog ke de ke bolis, “Leo, i hamaar deñhi hei” ’
Fir u pyaala lees, Prabhu ke dhanbaad deke ulog ke dees, aur u sab usman se peen.
Tab Yeeshu bolis, “I hamaar khuun hei jon bahut log ke khaatir bahaawa gais hei, aur yahi khuun Prabhu ke promis hei.
Ham tum se sachche bolta hei, ki ab se ham waain nai piega jab tak ham Parmeshwar ke raaj ke nawa waain nai pee lei.”
Tab ulog ek bhajan gaain aur Jaituun pahaaṛ pe chala gain.
Yeeshu ulog se bolis, “Tum sab hamme chhoṛ ke bhaag jahio, jeise ki Baaibal meñ likha hei, ‘Ham charwaaha ke maarega, aur bheṛa idhar udhar bhaag jahiyeñ.’
Lekin ham jinda hoy ke baad tum se pahile Galeel chala jaayga.”
Peeṭa bolis, “Chaahe tumme sab chhoṛ dehiyeñ, lekin ham tumme kabhi nai chhoṛega!”
Yeeshu Peeṭa se bolis, “Ham tum se sachche bolta hei ki aaj hee ke raat, murga ke dui dafe bole se pahile, tum teen dafe bolega ki tum hamme nai janta hei.”
Peeṭa jor deke bolis, “Agar hamme tumhaar sañghe mare ke bhi paṛa to bhi tumme ham kabhi naa nai karega!” Yahi rakam aur sab chela log bhi bolin.
Fir ulog Getsamni naam ke ek jagha pe aain, aur Yeeshu aapan chela log se bolis, “Jab tak ham preya karta hei, tum sab yahiñ beiṭho.”
U Peeṭa, Jeims aur Yuhanna ke aapan sañghe le gais. U bahut udaas aur dukhi hoy lagis.
Aur u bolis, “Hamaar man bahut udaas hei, aur jaan paṛe hei ki ham mare waala hei. Tum hiañ ruko aur jagte raho.”
U thoṛa aage gais aur jameen pe gir ke preya kare laga ki agar hoy sake to i dukh ke ghaṛi usse le lewa jaay.
Fir Yeeshu bolis, “Abba, E Pita, tum sab kuchh kare sakta hei. I dukh ke pyaala ham se le leo, hamaar ichchha nai, lekin tumhaar ichchha puura hoy.
Jab u lauṭ ke aais tab teeno chela log ke sote paais aur Saayman Peeṭa se bolis, “Kaa tum soy gaya hei? Kaa tum ek ghañṭa bhi jaga nai rahe sakta raha?”
“Jagte raho, aur preya karo ki tumhaar ṭesṭ nai hoy, kaahe ke aatma taiyaar hei lekin deñhi kamjor hei.”
Yeeshu fir chala gais, aur wahi baat bol ke preya kare lagis.
Jab u lauṭis tab chela log ke fir sote paais. Kaahe ki neeñd ke kaaran ulog aañkhi nai khole paawat rahin, aur nai jaanat rahin ki Yeeshu ke kaa jawaab dewa jaay.
Tab u tisra dafe lauṭ ke aais aur bolis, “Kaa tum abhi bhi sota hei aur sustaata hei? Bas! Ṭaaim aay gais hei ki Manush ke laṛka paapi log ke haath meñ de dewa jaai.
Uṭho, aao ab ham sab chali. Dekho, hamme dhoka de waala nagichche pahuñch aais hei.”
Yeeshu baat karte raha ki Juḍas jon baarah chela meñ se ek raha, aapan sañghe baṛa paadri, shaastri aur elḍas log ke bagal se ek baṛa bheeṛ jiske lage talwaar aur laaṭhi raha, leke huañ pahuñchis.
Juḍas aage se bheeṛ ke bataay dees raha, “Jiske ham chumma lega, wahi ke pakaṛ ke le jaana.”
Jeise Juḍas huañ pahuñchis, u seedha Yeeshu ke lage gais aur bolis, “E Rabbi!” aur uske chumma le lees.
Ulog Yeeshu ke kas ke pakaṛ leen.
Huañ jon log khaṛa rahin, us meñ se ek admi talwaar nikaar ke baṛa paadri ke naukar ke kaan kaaṭ dees.
Yeeshu ulog se bolis, “Kaa tum ḍaaku samajh ke hamme pakṛe ke khaatir laaṭhi aur talwaar leke aaya hei?
Ham to hardam Mandir meñ tumhaar sañghe updes deta raha, tab tum hamme nai pakṛa. I sab i khaatir hoy hei ki Baaibal meñ likha baat puura hoy.”
Is pe sab chela log uske chhoṛ ke bhaag gain.
Lekin ek naojawaan jon aapan nañga deñhi pe khali ek chaddar lapeṭe raha, Yeeshu ke pichchhe hoy lees. Ulog uske pakṛe maañgat rahin, lekin u aapan chaddar chhoṛ ke nañge bhaag gais.
Tab ulog Yeeshu ke baṛa paadri ke lage laain, huañ sab baṛa paadri aur shaastri baṭur gain.
Peeṭa duur se uske pichchhe pichchhe baṛa paadri ke añgna tak gais, aur gaaḍ ke sañghe beiṭh ke aagi taape laga.
Baṛa paadri aur puura maha sabha Yeeshu ke maut ke saja dewe ke waaste sabuut khojat rahin, lekin kuchh nai mila.
Ketna log Yeeshu ke agaiñsṭ meñ jhuuṭa gawaahi dewat rahin lekin ulog ke gawaahi ekke rakam nai raha.
Fir se kuchh log khaṛa hoy ke jhuuṭṭe ke gawaahi deen.
“Ham log iske bolte suna hei, ‘Ham admi ke banaawal Mandir ke tuuṛ dega aur teen roj meñ dusra banaay dega, jon admi ke haath se nai banaawa gais hei.” ’
Ispe bhi ulog ke gawaahi ekke rakam nai raha.
Tab baṛa paadri beech meñ khaṛa hoy ke Yeeshu se puuchhis, “Kaa tumhaar lage i baat ke koi jawaab nai hei, jon ilog tumhaar uppar lagaawe hei?”
Is pe bhi Yeeshu chuppe raha aur kuchh bhi nai bolis. Baṛa paadri usse fir puuchhis, “Kaa tum mahaan Parmeshwar ke laṛka Maseeh hei?”
Yeeshu bolis, “Haañ, ham hei, aur tum Manush ke laṛka ke sab se Shaktimaan Parmeshwar ke raaiṭ saaiḍ beiṭhe aur swarag ke baadar ke sañghe aate dekhega!”
Tab baṛa paadri aapan raub faaṛ ke bolis, “Ab ham log ke koi gawaahi ke jaruurat nai hei!
Tum sab log Parmeshwar ke ninda sun lia hei, aur ab tumhaar kaa bichaar hei? Sab log uske maut ke saja dewe ke bolin.
Kuchh log Yeeshu pe thuuke lagin, aur aañkhi pe paṭṭi baañdh ke ghuusa maar ke puuchhe lagin, “Bataao tumme kon maaris?” Gaaḍ log bhi uske thappaṛ maarin.
Peeṭa abhi añgna meñ raha, aur baṛa paadri ke ek naukraani huañ aais.
U dekhis ki Peeṭa aagi taape hei, to u ghuur ke uske bagal dekhis aur bolis, “Tum bhi to u Naasri Yeeshu ke sañghe raha.”
Lekin Peeṭa nai kar dees aur bolis, “Ham to uske nai janta hei aur nai samajhta ki tum kaa bola hei,” aur u bahire baranḍa meñ chala gais aur tabhi murga bolis.
U naukraani Peeṭa ke dekh ke, huañ agal bagal khaṛa log se bole lagis, “I bhi ulog meñ se ek hei.”
Lekin Peeṭa fir se nai kar dees. Thoṛa deri baad huañ ke log jon khaṛa rahin Peeṭa se bolin, “Ekdam sachcha baat hei ki tum ulog meñ se ek hei, kaahe ke tum bhi Galeeli hei.”
Tab Peeṭa bolis, “Ham kasam khaata hei, aur sachche bolta hei. Prabhu hamme saja dei agar ham jhuuṭ bolega! Ham u admi ke jiske baare meñ tum bolta hei, nai janta hei!”
Wahi lage murga dusra dafe bolis aur Peeṭa ke u baat jon Yeeshu bataais raha, yaad aay gais, “Murga ke dui dafe bole se pahile tum teen dafe hamme inkaar karega.” Aur u i baat soch soch ke rowe laga.
Sabere hote baṛa paadri, shaastri aur elḍas log puura maha sabha se sallaah kar ke Yeeshu ke chain se bandhwaay ke Paaylaṭ ke haath meñ de dees.
Paaylaṭ Yeeshu se puuchhis, “Kaa tum Yahuudi log ke raaja hei?” Yeeshu jawaab dees, “I to tumahi bolta hei.”
Aur baṛa paadri log us pe bahut rakam ke dos lagaain.
Paaylaṭ usse fir puuchhis, “Kaa tum kuchh nai bolega? Dekho, i sab log tum pe bahut dos lagaawe hei.”
Yeeshu fir bhi kuchh nai bolis, aur Paaylaṭ hairaan rahe gais.
Jab jab fasah ke teohaar aate raha, tab tab Paaylaṭ koi ek keidi ke, jiske u maañge hei, uske chhoṛ dewat raha.
Wahi ṭaaim Barabba naam ke ek admi raaj ke agaiñsṭ kaam kare waala log ke sañghe jel meñ raha, u dañga fasaad (riot) meñ hatya bhi karis raha.
Aur bheeṛ ke log Paaylaṭ se binti kare lagin ki jeise u hardam karat raha, weise abhi bhi kare.
Paaylaṭ puuchhis, “Kaa tum log mañgta hei ki ham tumhaar waaste Yahuudi ke raaja ke chhoṛ dei?”
U jaanat raha ki baṛa paadri log Yeeshu se jaran kare hei aur yahi khaatir uske lage laain hei.
Baṛa paadri log sab ke sikhaain ki ulog Paaylaṭ se bole ki u Barabba ke chhoṛ de.
Paaylaṭ ulog se puuchhis, “Jiske tum log Yahuudi ke raaja bolta hei, uske ham kaa kari?”
Ulog fir chillaain, “Uske kros pe chaṛhaay deo!”
Paaylaṭ ulog se puuchhis, “I kon kharaab kaam karis hei?” Sab log aur jor se chillaay ke bolin, “Uske kros pe chaṛhaay deo!”
Paaylaṭ sab ke khusi kare maañgat raha aur u Barabba ke chhoṛ dees aur Yeeshu ke chaabuk lagwaay ke kros pe chaṛhwaay ke khaatir de dees.
Saulja log Yeeshu ke raajpaal ke bhawan ke bhittar ke añgna meñ le gais aur Romi saulja log ke ek jagha bolaawa gay.
Aur ulog uske pepal (beijani) kapṛa pahinaay ke uske muuṛ pe kaaṭa ke taaj rakh deen.
Tab ulog Yeeshu ke salaam kare lagin aur bolin, “E Yahuudi ke raaja, tumhaar lamba umar hoi!”
Aur ulog uske muuṛ pe ḍanḍa maare lagin, aur uspe thuuke lagin aur ghuṭna ṭek ke uske namaste kare lagin.
Jab ulog Yeeshu ke khilli uṛaay leen, tab pepal kapṛa utaar ke wahi ke kapṛa pahinaain, aur uske kros pe chaṛhaay ke waaste bahire le gain.
Rasta meñ ulog ke Saayman naam ke admi mila, jon gaaoñ se ṭaaun aat raha. Saayman ek Kureni raha jon Elekszenḍa aur Rufus ke bappa raha. Saulja log usse jabran Yeeshu ke kros ḍhowaain.
Ulog Yeeshu ke Gulgutha naam ke ek jagha (jiske matlab khopṛi hei) huañ pe le gain.
Ulog uske huañ añguur ke ras meñ dawaai milaay ke dewe maañgat rahin, lekin Yeeshu nai pees.
Tab ulog uske kros pe chaṛhaay deen aur uske kapṛa apne meñ baaṭ leen, aur baaji lagaay ke dekhin ki kon kapra kiske mili.
Sabere nao baje ke ṭaaim ulog Yeeshu ke kros pe chaṛhaain.
Aur ek noṭis likh ke uske uppar lagaay deen. Usman likhaan raha, “Yahuudi log ke Raaja.”
Yeeshu ke sañghe dui aur chor ke kros pe chaṛhaawa gais raha. Ek ke raaiṭ meñ aur dusra ke lefṭ meñ.
Tab Baaibal meñ likha baat puura bhais, jahañ likhaan raha, “Uske apraadhi log meñ gina jaai.”
Rasta pe jaay waala log muuṛ hilaay hilaay ke uske buraai karat rahin, “E Mandir ke giraay ke teen roj meñ banaay waala! Kros pe se utro aur apne aap ke bachaao!”
Yahi rakam baṛa paadri aur shaastri log bhi khilli uṛaawat rahin aur ek dusra se bolat rahin, “I aur log ke bachaawat raha lekin apne aap ke nai bachaay sake hei.”
Aao ham log Maseeh ke dekhi jon kros pe se utar aai ki ham uske dekh ke uspe biswaas kari.” U duuno chor bhi jon ke Yeeshu ke sañghe kros pe chaṛhaawa gay raha, uske khilli uṛaat rahin.
Baarah baje din se teen baje tak puura des meñ añdhera chhaay gais raha.
Teen baje Yeeshu chillaay ke bolis, “Eloyi, Eloyi, Lama shabaktani!” Jiske matlab raha, “E hamaar Parmeshwar, E hamaar Parmeshwar, kaahe tum hamme chhoṛ dia hei?”
Jon log huañ nagichche meñ khaṛa rahin, ulog sunke bolin, “Dekho, i Ilaayja ke bolaawe hei.”
Aur ek saulja dauṛ ke spanj ke sirka meñ bhijaay ke, ek lakṛi pe rakh ke Yeeshu ke piye ke waaste dees aur bolis, “Ruko, ham dekhi Ilaayja iske utaare ke khaatir aay hei ki nai.”
Tab Yeeshu baṛa jor se chillaay ke aapan praan chhoṛ dees.
Aur Mandir ke parda uppar se nichche tak faṭ ke dui ṭukṛa hoy gais.
Jon Romi ofisa uske saamne khaṛa raha, jab u Yeeshu ke chillaay ke praan chhoṛte dekhis to u bolis, “Sachche ke i admi Parmeshwar ke laṛka raha!”
Bahut aurat log bhi duur se dekhat rahin. Ulog meñ Meri Magdalini, aur chhoṭa Jeims aur Josaf ke amma Meri, aur Shalomi bhi rahi.
I sab log Yeeshu ke pichchhe Galeel se aay rahin, aur uske sewa karat rahin. Ulog ke sañghe aur bahut aurat log bhi rahin jon Yarushalam se sañghe aay rahin.

Sabat se pahile sanjha ke ṭaaim raha aur log uske taiyaari meñ lage rahin, jab Armathia ke rahewaala Josaf huañ aais. I admi sabha ke ek memba raha aur log uske ijjat karat rahin. U Parmeshwar ke raaj ke agorat raha. U baṛa himmat kar ke Paaylaṭ ke lage jaay ke Yeeshu ke boḍi maañgis.
Paaylaṭ hairaan bhais ki Yeeshu etna jaldi keise mar gais, aur aami ofisa ke bolaay ke puuchhis, ki Yeeshu ke mare ketna deri bhais?
Ofisa se pata lagaawe ke baad ki u mar gais hei, Paaylaṭ Yeeshu ke boḍi Josaf ke de dees.
Tab Josaf ek chaddar khareedis, aur boḍi ke utaar ke chaddar meñ lapeṭis, aur ek kabar meñ jon chaṭṭaan meñ khoda gay raha, usman rakh dees.
Meri Magdalini aur Josaf ke amma Meri dekhat rahin ki boḍi kahañ rakha jaay hei.
Jab sabat ke din beet gais, tab Meri Magdalini aur Jeims ke amma Meri aur Shalomi mahke waala cheej khareedin, ki jisse ulog Yeeshu ke boḍi pe lagaay saki.
Etwaar, jon hapta ke pahila din raha, ekdam sabere, suuraj nikre se pahile, ulog kabar pe chala gain.
Rasta pe aawe ke ṭaaim ulog baat karat rahin, “Ham log ke waaste duaari pe se patthar kon haṭaai?” (U bahut baṛa patthar raha) Lekin jab ulog uppar dekhin to patthar haṭa raha!
Ulog kabar ke bhittar gain, huañ ulog ek jawaan admi ke ujjar kapṛa pahine, raaiṭ taraf beiṭha dekhin, aur ulog hairaan rahe gain.

“Hairaan nai ho!” u admi ulog se bolis, “Ham janta hei ki tum Yeeshu Naasri, jiske kros pe chaṛhaawa gais raha, uske khojta hei! U jinda hoy gay hei, hiañ nai hei, dekho i wahi jagha hei, jahañ pe uske rakkhe rahin.
Lekin tum log jaao, uske chela log se aur Peeṭa se bataay deo, ‘Ulog se pahile Galeel chala jaai. Tum log uske wahiñ dekhega, jeise u tum log se bataais raha.” ’
Aur ulog kabar se nikar ke bhaag gain, kaahe ke ulog bahut ghabraay gain raha. Ulog ḍar ke maare koi se kuchh nai bolin.
Hapta ke pahila roj, ekdam sabere Yeeshu ke jinda hoy pe, sab se pahile Meri Magdalini, jisman se u saat dushṭaatma ke nikaaris raha, uske dekhaay dees.
U jaay ke aapan saathi log ke jon dukh meñ ḍuuba rahin, aur rowat rahin, i niuz dees.
Jab ulog sunin ki Yeeshu jinda hoy gais hei aur Meri Magdalini uske dekhis hei, to ulog ke biswaas nai bhais.
Iske baad Yeeshu dusra ruup meñ aapan dui chela log ke dekhaai dees, jon gaaoñ jaat rahin.
I log bhi i baat aur sab se bataain lekin koi biswaas nai karin.

Aakhri meñ Yeeshu u gyaara chela log ke saamne aais, jab ulog khaana khaat rahin. Yeeshu ulog ke jon uspe biswaas nai karin raha, uspe gussa bhais, kaahe ke ulog uske jinda hoy pe dekhin raha, lekin biswaas nai karin.
Yeeshu ulog se bolis, “Tum dunia meñ sab bagal jaao aur sab jaat ke log ke i susamaachaar sunaao.
Jon biswaas kari aur baptisma lei, wahi bache saki, lekin jon biswaas nai kari, u dosi maana jaai.
Aur biswaas kare waalan ke saain rahi ki ulog hamaar naam se dushṭaatma ke nikaari. Ulog nawa nawa bhaasha boli.
Ulog saañp ke uṭhaay lei ya jahar pee jaai to bhi ulog ke kuchh nai hoi, aur agar rogi pe haath rakkhi to rogi achchha hoy jaai.”
Ulog se baat kare ke baad, Prabhu Yeeshu ke swarag meñ uṭhaay lewa gay, aur Parmeshwar ke raaiṭ saaiḍ meñ beiṭha hei.
Aur uske chela log jaay ke sab jagha parchaar karat rahin, aur Prabhu madat karat raha, aur jon chamatkaar ilog karat rahin, usse uske vachan ke majbuut karte gain.
Pyaare Thiufilus Kaafi log hisṭri likhe ke kosis karin hei jon hamaar beech meñ bhais raha.
Ulog wahi baat likhin hei jon ham log tak aais hei, i wahi log hei jon sab baat ke suru se jaanin aur parchaar karin hei.
Yahi kaaran Onrabal Thiufilus ham u sab baat ke achchha se chhaan been kar lia hei aur ab raaiṭ ṭaaim hei ki ham tumhaar khaatir u sab ke weisaiyeñ likhi jeise u sab bhais raha.
Hamme yahi kare ke hei kaahe ki tum sab jaan jaao ki jon sab ham seekha hei, u sab sachcha hei.
Jon ṭaaim Heraḍ, Juḍia ke raaja raha wahi ṭaaim Abiyaah ke grup meñ Zekraaya naam ke ek admi raha, aur uske aurat ke naam Elizabeth raha, aur ulog Eran ke palwaar ke rahin.
U duuno Parmeshwar ke aage dharmi rahin, aur Prabhu ke sab baat aur ruuls ke maanat rahin aur uspe chalat rahin.
U duuno ke koi laṛkan nai rahin kaahe ke Elizabeth baañjh rahi aur u duuno buḍḍha bhi hoy gay rahin.
Ek roj Zekraaya aapan paari pe Parmeshwar ke aage kaam karat raha.
Paadri ke mutaabik huañ ke reeti riwaaj raha ki ek admi ke chuna jaay jon aay ke Mandir meñ roj dhuup jaraay aur yahi kaaran u Mandir meñ gais.
Aur dhuup jaraay ke ṭaaim sab log bahire khaṛa hoy ke preya karat rahin.
Wahi ṭaaim Prabhu ke ek ainjal huañ jahañ batti jaraawa jaay hei, uske raaiṭ saaiḍ aay ke khaṛa hoy gais.
Jab Zekraaya uske dekhis, to ghabraay gay aur ḍare lagis.
Lekin ainjal usse bolis, “He Zekraaya, ḍaro nai kaahe ke Prabhu tumhaar preya sun lees hei aur tumhaar aurat ek bachcha ke peida kari aur tum uske naam Yuhanna rakkhega.”
Uske peida hoy se tumme bahut jaada khusi hoi, aur bhi bahut log iske kaaran khusi hoy jaai.
Prabhu ke aañkhi meñ Yuhanna mahaan hoi, u waain aur daaru nai pee, aur aapan amma ke peṭ meñ se hee Pawitr Aatma se bhar jaai.
Aur Israayel ke log meñ se bahut se log ke u Prabhu Parmeshwar ke taraf lauṭaay laai.

U Ilaayja nabi ke aatma aur taagat se Prabhu se bhi aage chala jaai. U laṛkan aur bappa ke milaai aur jon Parmeshwar ke nai maane hei, u sab ke sachcha rasta pe bhi laai aur Prabhu ke waaste uske laayk log ke taiyaar kari.
Zekraaya ainjal se bolis, “I ham keise jaane sakta hei? Ham to buḍḍha hoy gaya hei, aur hamaar aurat bhi buṛhia hoy gais hei.”
Ainjal uske jawaab dees, “Ham Gaibrial hei, jon Prabhu ke jagha meñ tumhaar saamne khaṛa hei, aur tum se baat karta hei, aur ham achchha khabar yaane ke susamaachaar sunaay ke waaste bheja gaya hei.

Lekin tum i sandes pe biswaas nai kara jon raaiṭ ṭaaim pe aai aur sachche hoi. Kaahe ki tum is pe biswaas nai kara, yahi kaaran tum bole nai sakega, aur u roj tak nai bolega jon roj i promis jon ham kara hei, puura nai hoy jaai.”
I beech jon log bahire khaṛa rahin, u sab Zekraaya ke waiṭ karat rahin aur sochat rahin ki kaahe ke u Mandir meñ etna deri lagaay hei.

Jab u bahire aais tab bole nai sakis. Ulog jon bahire khaṛa rahin jaan gain ki, Mandir meñ u koi ke darshan paais hei. U sab ke aapan haath se ishaara karat raha, lekin bole nai sakis, kaahe ke u guuñga hoy gais raha.
Jab Mandir ke kaam khalaas hoy gais, tab Zekraaya ghare lauṭ gais.
Wahi ṭaaim Elizabeth amma bane waali rahi, aur paañch mahina tak ghar ke bhittar luk ke rahis aur bolat rahi,
“Prabhu ham pe daya karis hei ki jisse sab log hamaar apmaan nai kare saki.”
Ek mahina ke baad Parmeshwar ke bagal se Gaibrial ainjal, fir se Galeel ke Naasrat meñ ek sandes le ke kuaari Meri ke lage bheja gais.
Meri ke mangni Josaf se bhais raha jon Ḍeiviḍ ke palwaar ke raha.
Ainjal, Meri ke namaste karis aur uske paas aay ke bolis, “Tumme aanand aur jay hoy. Prabhu tumhaar sañghe hei.”
I baat sun ke Meri ghabraay gais aur soche lagis ki i baat ke matlab kon cheej hei.
Tab ainjal Meri se bolis, “Ḍaro nai, Prabhu tumse khusi hei.
Tum maañ bane waali hei aur tumhaar ek laṛka peida hoi. Uske naam tum Yeeshu rakhna.
U bahut mahaan hoi aur Prabhu Parmeshwar uske bappa Ḍeiviḍ ke raaj gaddi uske dei.
Aur u Jaykab ke gharaane pe raaj kari. Aur uske raaj ke ant kabhi nai hoi.
Tab Meri bolis, “I keise hoi? Ham to abhi kuaari hei, aur hamaar abhi saadi bhi nai bhais hei.”
Tab ainjal bolis, “Pawitr Aatma tum pe aai aur Prabhu ke sakti tumpe hardam rahi aur tumhaar laṛka, Parmeshwar ke laṛka kahaai.
Aur kaa tumme yaad hei ki tumhaar ek palwaar bhi hei, Elizabeth, jon buṛhia hoy gais hei aur uske ekko laṛkan bhi nai hei? Uske bhi ek laṛka hoi.
Prabhu sab kuchh kare sake hei, kaahe ki uske khaatir koi kaam kaṛa nai hei.
“Ham to Prabhu ke daasi hei,” Meri bolis “Weisaiyeñ hoi jeise tum bola hei.” Aur ainjal uske lage se chala gais.
Thoṛa deri ke baad Meri taiyaar bhais, aur pahaaṛi jagha pe Juḍia ke ek ṭaaun meñ gais.
U Zekraaya ke ghare jaay ke Elizabeth ke namaste karis.
Jeise Elizabeth Meri ke namaste sunis weisaiyeñ uske peṭ meñ bachcha kuudis aur Elizabeth, Pawitr Aatma se bhar gais.
Aur tab u bahut jor se chillaay ke bolis, “Tum sab aurat meñ mahaan hei, aur tum jon bachcha ke peida karegi, u bhi bahut mahaan hoi!
Aur hamaar sañghe etna baṛa cheej kaahe bhais ki hamaar Prabhu ke amma apne hamaar paas aais hei.
Jeise hamaar kaan meñ tumhaar namaste sunaais, weisaiyeñ hamaar peṭ meñ bachcha khusi ke maare kuudis.
Tum dhann hei, jon biswaas karti hei ki Prabhu jon kuchh tum se bolis, u puura hoi.”
Meri bolis, “Ham aapan dil ke gahraai se Prabhu ke baṛaai karta hei.
Aur hamme bahut khusi hei ki Prabhu hamme bachaais hei.
Ham Parmeshwar ke maamuli daasi hei, aur wahi hamaar khayaal rakkhe hei. Abhi se janam janam ke log kahiyeñ ki Prabhu ke daya ham pe hei.
U bahut taagatwaala Parmeshwar hei, aur hamaar khaatir bahut baṛa baṛa kaam karis hei aur uske naam pawitr hei.
Jon bhi koi uske weship kare hei, u sab pe hardam aapan daya barsaay hei.
Aur u aapan etna jaada taagat se ulog ke jon apne aap ke baṛa samjhe hei idhar udhar chhitraay dees.
Aur jon bahut baṛa raaj chalaay hei, u sab ke nichche utaar ke, aur saadhaaran (humble) log ke ulog ke jagha pe beiṭhaay hei.
Prabhu bhuuka log ke khaay ke khaatir achchha achchha cheej dees hei. Aur dhani log ke bina kuchh dewe nikaar dees.
Israayel ke log jon Prabhu ke sewak hei, u sab ke hardam madat kare hei, aur aapan log pe hardam, daya ke najar rakkhe hei.
I promis Prabhu, hamaar baap-daada Abraham aur uske santaan pe hardam ke waaste karis raha.”
Elizabeth ke sañghe Meri lagbhag teen mahina tak rahi. Fir u aapan ghare lauṭ gais.
Jab Elizabeth ke laṛka peida bhais,
tab uske paṛosi aur palwaar i baat sun ke ki Prabhu uske sañghe daya karis hei, ulog bahut khusi bhain.
Jab chhoṭa bachcha aaṭh roj ke bhais, tab ulog laṛka ke khatna karaay laain, aur uske naam uske bappa ke naam pe Zekraaya rakkhe maañgis.
Lekin uske amma bolis, “Nai, iske naam Yuhanna rakkha jaai.”
Ulog usse bolin, “I keise hoy sake hei, kaahe ki tumhaar palwaar meñ i naam ke koi nai hei.”
Aur tab uske bappa se ulog ishaara karke puuchhin ki uske laṛka ke kaa naam hoy ke chaahi.
Tab Zekraaya ek kaagaj aur pen maañgis aur uspe likhis, “Iske naam Yuhanna hei.” Sab koi ghabraay gain.
Wahi ṭaaim Zekraaya bole laga aur Parmeshwar ke baṛaai kare laga.
Agal bagal ke log ḍar gain, aur i niuz Juḍia ke sab pahaaṛ waala des meñ feil gais.
Jon koi bhi i khabar sunis, ulog i bichaar karke bolin, “I laṛka keisan hoi?” Kaahe ki jaruur Prabhu ke haath is pe hei.
Yuhanna ke bappa Zekraaya, Pawitr Aatma se bhara raha, aur u i bole lagis.
“Hamme Prabhu ke baṛaai kare ke hei, jon Israayel ke log ke Parmeshwar hei! U aapan log ke madat ke khaatir aur ulog ke chhoṛaay aais hei.
U hamaar waaste ek bahut baṛa bachaay waala ke dees hei, jon uske naukar Ḍeiviḍ ke palwaar ke hei.
U aapan pawitr nabi ke madat se puraana jamaana meñ, bolis raha
ki u ham sab ke hamaar dusman se bachaai, jon ham se dusmani rakkhe hei.
Ki u hamaar baap daada pe daya karke aapan pawitr promis ke yaad karaai.
Aur u hamaar bappa Abraham se bhi bataais raha, ki u hamaar dusman se hamme chhoṛaay lei aur ham bina ḍar ke uske kaam meñ laga rahega,
ki jisse ham uske saamne pawitrta aur achchha se, jindagi bhar rahi.”
“Aur tum, he beṭa, sab se baṛa Parmeshwar ke nabi kahaayga. Tum Prabhu ke rasta taiyaar kare aaya hei aur uske aage aage chalega.
Aur sab log ke bataayga ki jab ulog ke paap se maafi mili, ulog aapan aapan paap se bache saki.
Hamaar Parmeshwar to bahut dayaalu aur meharbaan hei. Wahi ke kaaran hamaar uupar sabere ke suuraj ke rakam roshni hoi
ki añdhiyaar aur maut ke saaya meñ beiṭhe waala log ke roshni de saki, aur hamaar goṛ saanti ke rasta pe seedha chalaai.”
U laṛka dekhe meñ aur aatma se bahut taagatwaala hote gais. Aur Israayel ke saamne aay waala roj tak ḍezaṭ meñ raha.
U ṭaaim Maharaaja Ogastas sab ke noṭis bhejis ki des ke sab log gina jaay.
Is se pahile log tab gina gain raha, jab Quirinius, Siria ke gavna raha.
Aur sab log naam likhaay ke waaste aapan aapan ṭaaun chala gain.
Josaf, jon Ḍeiviḍ ke palwaar ke raha, aur jon Naasrat jon Galeel meñ hei, huañ se aapan gaaoñ Bethlaham gais.
Uske sañghe uske mañgetar, Meri jon maañ banewaali rahi bhi naam likhaay ke waaste gais.
Aur jab ulog Bethlaham meñ rahin, bachcha ke peida hoy ke ṭaaim hoy gais.
Aur u wahiñ pe aapan pahila bachcha peida karis, aur uske kapṛa meñ lapeṭ ke charni meñ jahañ jaanwar rahe hei, huañ rakkhis, kaahe ke huañ ke sab hoṭel bhar gais raha aur ekko jagha nai raha.
Wahi des meñ kuchh bheṛa charaay waala log rahin jon raat ke khet meñ rahe ke aapan bheṛa ke pahra det rahin.
Wahi ṭaaim Prabhu ke ek ainjal ulog ke lage aais aur ulog ke uppar Prabhu ke laaiṭ chamkis. Ulog ḍar gais rahin.
Lekin ainjal bolis, “Ḍaro nai! Ham hiañ achchha khabar leke aaya hei, jon tum sab log meñ khusi laai.
Aaj, Ḍeiviḍ ke ṭaaun meñ tumhaar waaste ek tumme bachaay waala ke janam bhais hei, aur yahi Prabhu Maseeh hei!
Aur ham tumme uske pata bataayga. Tum ek laṛka jon kapṛa meñ lapṭaan tumme charni (jon meñ jaanwar graas khaawe hei) meñ mili, wahi hei”
Wahi lage ainjal ke ek jhunḍ swarag se huañ aais aur Prabhu ke jayjaykaar kare lagis.
“Swarag pe Parmeshwar ke jay! Hiañ dharti pe u admi log ke jon log se u khusi hei, u sab ke saanti mile!”
Jab ainjals chala gais tab bheṛa ke charaay waala log bolin, “Aao chalo, Bethlaham chalo, aur jon baat ke baare meñ Prabhu hamme bataais hei, uske dekh ke aai.”
Wahi lage ulog chal paṛin, aur huañ pahuñch ke Meri, Josaf aur charni meñ leṭa baibi ke dekhin.
Jab bheṛa charaay waala log Yeeshu ke dekh leen to uske amma bappa ke u baat bataain jon baat ainjal bachcha ke baare meñ u sab se bataay rahin.
Sab koi u baat sunin, aur achambha karin.
Lekin Meri sab baat man meñ rakh ke soche lagis ki u sab ke kaa matlab hoy sake hei.
Aur bheṛa charaay waala log ke jeise bataawa gais raha, wahi rakam sab kuchh dekh ke aur sun ke, Parmeshwar ke jayjaykaar karte lauṭ gain.
Aṭhwa roj, bachcha ke khatna ke ṭaaim aais, aur uske naam Yeeshu rakkha gais, jeise ki ainjal uske peida hoy se pahile bataais raha.
Ab ṭaaim aay gais raha ki Maozas ke kaanuun ke mutaabik, Josaf aur Meri ke suddhi waala sanskaar karwaay ke raha. Ulog bachcha ke Yarushalam le gain aur Prabhu ke aage laain.
Jeise Prabhu ke vachan, bole hei, “Sab pahila laṛka Prabhu ke khaatir hoy hei.”
Prabhu ke kaanuun ke mutaabik, kabuttar ke ek joṛa, ya uske dui bachcha laay ke chaṛhaay ke rahe hei. Josaf aur Meri bhi wahi karin.
Wahi ṭaaim Yarushalam meñ Simion naam ke ek admi raha. U Prabhu ke bhakt aur dharmi admi raha, aur Israayel meñ log ke bache ke rasta dekhat raha. Prabhu ke Aatma uspe raha.
Aur uske bataawa gais raha ki jab tak u Prabhu Maseeh ke dekh nai lei, tab tak u nai mari.
Tab Pawitr Aatma ke aguaai meñ Simion Mandir meñ gais. Wahi ṭaaim baalak Yeeshu ke uske maañ baap Mandir meñ le ke aain kaahe ki huañ ke reeti ke mutaabik u sab kare ke raha.
Simion uske aapan godi meñ le lees aur Parmeshwar ke dhanbaad deke bolis,
“He Prabhu hamme saanti se mare deo kaahe ke ham to tumhaar naukar hei, aur tum aapan promis ham se puura kar dia hei.
Ham aapan aañkhi se dekha hei, ki tum aapan log ke bachaay ke waaste, kon kon cheej kara hei!
I sab tum sab des ke log ke saamne taiyaar kara hei, ki ulog bhi dekh le.
Ki jisse tumhaar i roshni, aur sab des ke khaatir, ujaala dei aur, tumhaar log Israayel pe mahima laai.”
Yeeshu ke amma bappa hairaan rahe gain ki Simion uske baare meñ kaa bolis raha.
Tab u uske aasheesh deke, Meri se bolis, “Dekho, i laṛka Israayel meñ bahut log ke khaatir chetaaoni hei ki keise ulog uṭhi aur giri, aur ulog iske pichchhe iske baare meñ bahut baat kari.

Aur Meri tumme to eise sahe ke paṛi jeise ki tumme koi talwaar se maare hei aur tumme bahut choṭ lage hei. Tumhaar dil to ekdam ṭuuṭ jaai, lekin wahi ṭaaim ilog ke dimaag meñ jon baat hei u sab bahire aai.”
Wahi ṭaaim Ena nabi bhi wahi Mandir meñ rahi. U Asher palwaar ke Fanuel ke laṛki rahi, aur buṛhia hoy gais raha. U khali saat saal tak saadi suda jeewan bitaais.
U ṭaaim u chauraasi (84) saal ke bidhwa rahis. Aur u hardam Mandir meñ hee rahat rahi, aur upwaas aur preya kar ke raat aur din Parmeshwar ke bhajan gaawat rahi.
Wahi ṭaaim u aay ke Prabhu ke dhanbaad dees aur jon log Prabhu se Yarushalam ke khaatir chhuṭkaara maañgat rahin, u sab se baalak Yeeshu ke baare meñ bataais.
Jab Josaf aur Meri Prabhu ke kaanuun ke mutaabik sab kaam kar leen, tab ulog Galeel meñ aapan ghare Naasrat lauṭ gain.
Baalak Yeeshu baṛa aur taagatwaala hote gais, aur u buddhi se baṛhte chala gais. Parmeshwar ke aasheesh uspe raha.
Yeeshu ke amma bappa har saal, Yarushalam meñ fasah ke, teohaar meñ jaawa karat rahin.
Jab Yeeshu baarah saal ke bhais, tab teohaar ke reeti ke mutaabik, ulog Yarushalam gain.
Jab teohaar khalaas hoy gais, tab ulog aapan ghare chal paṛin, lekin baalak Yeeshu wahiñ rahe gais, lekin uske amma bappa ke i baat ke pata nai raha.
Ulog to i samjhat rahin ke Yeeshu aur sab log ke sañghe hei. Din bhar chale ke baad ulog Yeeshu ke aapan palwaar aur dost meñ khoje lagin.
Lekin ulog jab uske nai paain tab uske khojte khojte Yarushalam lauṭ gain.
Teen roj baad ulog uske Mandir meñ parchaar kare waala log ke beech meñ beiṭha aur, sawaal puuchhte paain.
Aur jon jon log uske sawaal aur jawaab sunat rahin, ulog uske samajh se hairaan rahin.

Uske amma bappa bhi uske huañ dekh ke achambha kare lagin, aur uske amma usse bolis, “E beṭa, tum hamaar sañghe eise kaahe ke kara? Tumhaar bappa aur ham to bahut ghabraay gay raha aur tumme bahut khojat bhi raha.”
Tab Yeeshu ulog se bolis, “Tum hamme kaahe ke khojat raha? Kaa tum i nai janta ki hamme hamaar Pita ke ghar meñ rahe ke jaruuri hei?”
Lekin ulog uske jawaab ke nai samjhin.
Tab Yeeshu ulog ke sañghe Naasrat lauṭ aais, aur ulog ke sab baat sune lagis. Uske amma i sab baat aapan man meñ rakkhis aur hardam uske baare meñ sochat rahi.
Aur Yeeshu waais aur taagatwaala hoy gais. Parmeshwar aur manush usse khusi raha.

Pandra (15) saal tak Raaja Tibiriyaas u jagha pe raaj karis, aur Pontias Paaylaṭ, Juḍia ke gavna raha, aur Galeel meñ Heraḍ raaja raha, aur uske bhaiya bhi, Filip, Ituria aur Trakhonitis meñ Lusiyaas, Abilene meñ raaj karat rahin,
Enas aur Keifa baṛa paadri rahin, aur u ṭaaim Parmeshwar ke vachan, ḍezaṭ meñ Zekraaya ke laṛka Yuhanna tak pahuñchis.
Joḍan ke agal bagal ke sab jagha pe aay ke, Yuhanna parchaar karis. U bolis, “Aapan paap se ghuum jaao, aur baptisma le leo, aur Prabhu tumhaar sab paap ke maaf kari.”
Jeise Aayzaaya nabi ke buk meñ likhaan hei, “Ḍezaṭ meñ koi bolaay hei, ‘Prabhu ke rasta taiyaar karo, Uske khaatir sab rasta seedha banaao.
Sab gaḍḍha bhar deo, Sab pahaaṛ baraabar kar deo, Tirchha rasta ke bhi seedha kar deo, Ṭehṛa mehṛa rasta bhi chikkan kar deo.
Aur tab sab koi, Parmeshwar ke uddhaar dekhi.” ’
Aur fir bheeṛ pe bheeṛ uske lage baptisma le aay lagin, lekin Yuhanna u sab se bolis, “He saañp ke bachcha log. Kon tumme saaodhaan karis ki Prabhu ke krodh aay waala hei, usse duur bhaago?

Tum sab, kuchh eise karo ki dekhaai ki tum aapan paap se pachhtaata hei. Aur aapan log se i nai bolo ki Abraham tumhaar bappa hei. Kaahe ki ham tumme bataata hei, ki Parmeshwar i patthar meñ se Abraham ke waaste laṛkan peida kare sake hei.
Peṛ ke kaaṭe ke waaste ṭañgaari taiyaar hei. Koi peṛ jon achchha fal nai de hei, uske kaaṭ dewa jaai aur aagi meñ jhok dewa jaai.
Sab log usse puuchhin, “Tab ab ham kon cheej kari?”

Yuhanna jawaab dees, “Tum meñ se jiske paas dui sheṭ hei, usman se ek uske de deo jiske paas nai hei. Agar tumhaar lage khaana hei tab uske bhi usse baaṭ lo jiske paas khaay ke waaste kuchh bhi nai hei.”
Kuchh ṭeks baṭore waala log bhi baptisma lewe aais, aur puuchhin, “He guru, hamme kon cheej kare ke hei?”
U bolis, “Jetna tumhaar hei, khali otne leo, usse jaada nai.”

Kuchh saulja log bhi usse puuchhis, “Bataao, hamme kon cheej kare ke hei?” Tab u ulog se bolis, “Koi se jabarjasti, peisa nai lena, ya koi pe jhuuṭṭe ke dos nai lagaana. Jetna kamaata hei wahi se khusi rahna.”
Sab log ke man meñ aasra hoy lagis ki kahiñ Yuhanna to Maseeha nai hei.

Yuhanna u sab se tab bolis, “Ham to tum log ke khali paani se baptisma deta hei, lekin u jon aay waala hei, u ham se bahut taagatwaala hei. Ham to i laayk bhi nai hei ki uske juuta ke bañdhan ke kholi. U to tum sab ke Pawitr Aatma aur aagi se baptisma dei.
Uske suup uske haath meñ hei, jon se u fasal ke achchha se safa kari aur geñhu ke godaam meñ baṭori, lekin bhuusi ke u aagi meñ jaraay dei jon kabhi bhi bute nai saki.”
Bahut rakam se u sab koi ke paaṭh paṛhaay ke achchha khabar yaane ki susamaachaar sunaat raha aur kosis karat raha ki sab koi aapan aapan rasta badal lei.
Lekin Rula Heraḍ jon aapan bhaiya ke aurat Herodiaas se saadi kar lees raha, u bahut kharaab kharaab kaam bhi karis raha, uske Yuhanna ḍaaṭis.
Tab Heraḍ, ek aur usse bhi kharaab kaam karis. U Yuhanna ke jel meñ bhejwaay dees.
Jab sab koi baptisma le leen aur Yeeshu bhi baptisma leke preya karat raha, tab asmaan khul gais.
Aur kabuttar ke ruup meñ Pawitr Aatma Yeeshu pe utris. Asmaan se ek awaaj sunaay dees, “Tum hamaar pyaara laṛka hei, aur ham tum se khusi hei.”
Jab Yeeshu parchaar suru karis, tab u kareeban tees (30) saal ke raha. Sab ke samajh meñ raha ki u Josaf ke laṛka hei. Lekin uske palwaar to Eli se raha,
jon Mattaat ke, aur u jon Levi ke, aur u jon Malki ke, aur u Jannai ke, aur u Josaf ke,
aur u jon Matityaah ke, aur u Amos ke, aur u Nahum ke, aur u Esli ke, aur u Naggai ke,
aur u Maat ke, aur u Matityaah ke, aur u Semein ke, aur u Josekh ke, aur u Joda ke,
aur u Joanan ke, aur u Rhesa ke, aur u Zarubbabel ke, aur u Shaaltiyal ke, aur u Neri ke,
aur u Melki ke, aur u Addi ke, aur u Kosaam ke, aur u Elmadam ke, aur u Yer ke,
aur u Joshua ke, aur u Elieza ke, aur u Joreem ke, aur u Mattaat ke, aur u Levi ke,
aur u Simion ke, aur u Juḍa ke, aur u Josaf ke, aur u Jonam ke, aur u Ilyaakim ke,
aur u Melea ke, aur u Menna ke, aur u Mattaat ke, aur Nathan ke, aur u Ḍeiviḍ ke,
aur u Jesse ke, aur u Obed ke, aur u Boaz ke, aur u Salmon ke, aur u Nahshon ke,
aur u Ameenaadaab ke, Admin ke, aur Arni ke, aur u Hesron ke, aur u Perez ke, aur u Juḍa ke,
aur u Jaykab ke, aur u Aayzak ke, aur u Abraham ke, aur u Terah ke, aur u Nahor ke,
aur u Serug ke, aur u Reu ke, aur u Peleg ke, aur u Eber ke, aur u Shelah ke,
aur u Kenaan ke, aur u Arafyaad ke, aur u Shem ke, aur u Noa ke, aur u Limik ke,
aur u Mathushilah ke, aur u Enok ke, aur u Jared ke, aur u Mahallel ke, aur u Kenan ke,
aur u Enosh ke, aur u Shet ke. Yeeshu ke palwaar Eiḍam se leke, Parmeshwar tak ke raha.
Jab Yeeshu Pawitr Aatma se bhar ke, Joḍan nadi se lauṭis, tab Aatma uske ḍezaṭ meñ le gais.
Aur chaalis (40) roj tak saitaan uske ṭesṭ karte raha. Otna roj tak u kuchh bhi nai khaais aur chaalis roj ke baad uske bahut jor se bhuuk lagis.
Saitaan Yeeshu se bolis, “Agar tum Parmeshwar ke laṛka hei to i patthar se bolo ki roṭi ban jaay.”
Yeeshu jawaab dees, “Baaibal meñ likhaan hei, ‘Admi khali khaana se jinda nai rahe sake.” ’
Tab saitaan uske uucha jagha le gais aur ek minaṭ meñ dunia dekhaay dees.
Aur tab u bolis, “Ham tumme raaj ke chamak dhamak aur raaj kare ke hak dega. I sab hamme dewa gais hei, aur ham jiske maañgega uske de dega.
Khali tum hamaar weship karo, i sab tumhaar hoy jaai.”
Yeeshu bolis, “Baaibal meñ likhaan hei, ‘Prabhu, aapan Parmeshwar ke weship karo, aur khali wahi ke sewa karo!”
Tab saitaan Yeeshu ke Yarushalam le gais aur Mandir ke sab se uucha jagha pe khaṛa kar dees, aur bolis, “Agar tum Parmeshwar ke laṛka hei to apne aap ke hiañ se nichche giraao.
Baaibal meñ likhaan hei, ‘Parmeshwar aapan ainjals ke bataai, ki u tumhaar dekh bhaal kare. Ulog tumme haato haath uṭhaay lei, ki jisse tumhaar goṛ ke bhi patthar se choṭ nai lage.’ ”
Yeeshu jawaab dees, “Baaibal meñ i bhi likhaan hei ki ‘Tum aapan Prabhu Parmeshwar ke ṭesṭ nai karo.’ ”
Jab saitaan Yeeshu ke sab ṭesṭ kar lees, tab thoṛa deri ke waaste uske chhoṛ dees.
Tab Yeeshu, Pawitr Aatma se bharke Galeel lauṭ gais. Sab jagha uske baare meñ niuz feil gais.
Aur u ulog ke chech meñ parchaar kare laga, aur sab log uske baṛaai kare lagin.

Ab Yeeshu, Naasrat lauṭis jahañ u baṛa bhais raha, aur aapan reeti ke mutaabik, sabat ke roj chech meñ gais. U Baaibal paṛhe ke waaste khaṛa bhais, aur uske Aayzaaya ke buk paṛhe ke bataawa gais. U buk ke khol ke, u paaṭh nikaaris jahañ likhaan raha,

“Prabhu ke Aatma ham pe hei, kaahe ke u hamme chunis hei, ki ham, sab gareeb tak achchha khabar sunaai. Aur hamme i kaaran bheja gais hei ki jon bañdi hei, ham u sab ke chhuṛaai, añdha log ke aañkhi dei, aur jon sab ke nichche dabaawa gais hei u sab ke chhoṛaay lei
aur sab ke i bataai ke ṭaaim aay gais hei jab Prabhu aapan log ke bachaai.”
Tab Yeeshu buk bañd kar ke ek kaam kare waala ke haath meñ de ke beiṭh gais. Mandir meñ sab log ke aañkhi wahi pe laga rahis.
Tab Yeeshu ulog se bolis, “Jeise tum sab hamme paṛhte suna hei, weisaiyeñ aaj Baaibal ke i paaṭh puura bhais hei.”
Sab log hairaan hoy gain, aur achambha kare lagin ki u keise etna achchha achchha baat kare hei. Ulog bolis, “Kaa i Josaf ke laṛka nai hei?”

Yeeshu tab ulog se bolis, “Ham janta hei ki tum i kahaawat ham se jaruur bolega, ‘E ḍokṭa pahile apne aap ke achchha karo.’ Aur i bhi bolega ki jon kaam tum Kafarnahuum meñ kara hei, aapan des meñ bhi karo.”
Yeeshu ulog se bolis, Ham tumme sachche bataata hei, “Koi nabi aapan des meñ aadar nai paay hei.
Hamaar suno, i baat sachche hei ki Ilaayja ke ṭaaim meñ, jab teen aur aadha saal tak des meñ paani nai barsa raha, aur bahut suukha paṛa raha tab Israayel meñ bahut bidhwa rahin.
Lekin Ilaayja ke usman se sab ke paas nai, khali Seida ke Saarfat meñ ekke bidhwa ke paas bheja gais raha.
Aur Israayel meñ bhi bhawish bataay waala Elisha ke ṭaaim bahut log ke koṛhi ke bimaari raha lekin Siria ke Naaman ke chhoṛ ke aur koi achchha nai bhais.”
I sab sune ke baad chech meñ jetna log rahin, ulog gussaay gain.
Ulog sab khaṛa hoy gais, aur Yeeshu ke ghaseeṭ ke ṭaaun se bahire jon pahaaṛ pe u ṭaaun raha, wahi ke choṭi pe uske le gain. Ulog wahiñ se uske nichche giraay maañgat rahin,
lekin Yeeshu ulog ke beech meñ se nikar gais.
Huañ se Yeeshu, Galeel ke Kafarnahuum ṭaaun meñ gais, aur sabat ke roj log ke sikhaay laga.
Uske sikhaay se sab log chakit hoy gain, kaahe ki u adhikaar se sikhaat raha.
Wahi Mandir meñ ek aur admi raha jisman dushṭ aatma raha, u jor se chillaay ke bolis,
“E Naasrat ke Yeeshu, tum ham se kaa mañgta hei? Kaa tum hamme naas kare ke waaste aaya hei? Ham janta hei ki tum kon hei! Tum Parmeshwar ke pawitr jan hei.”
Tab Yeeshu u aatma ke ḍaaṭis, “Chup hoy jaao, aur u admi se bahire nikar jaao!” Tab dushṭ aatma, bina kuchh bigaaṛe, u admi ke beech meñ paṭak ke chala gais.
I baat pe sab koi chakit rahe gain aur ek dusra se bole lagin, “I keisan vachan hei? Adhikaar se i admi dushṭ aatma ke hukum de hei aur u bhi nikar ke bhaag jaay hei!”
Aur puura des meñ Yeeshu ke i kaam ke niuz feil lagis.
U Mandir se uṭh ke Saayman ke ghare chala gais, jahañ pe uske saas bahut tej bukhaar se kaapat rahi, aur Saayman uske baare meñ Yeeshu se binti karis.
Yeeshu jaay ke uske lage khaṛa hoy gais aur bukhaar ke ḍaaṭis tab bukhaar utar gais aur u uṭh ke sab ke sewa kare lagis.
Suuraj ke ḍuube pe, bahut rakam ke rogi Yeeshu ke aage laawa gais, aur u ek ek pe haath rakh ke sab ke ṭheek kar dees.
Dushṭ aatma bhi chillaay ke bolis, “Tum Parmeshwar ke laṛka hei!” Aur u sab log meñ se nikar gais. Aur Yeeshu ulog ke ḍaaṭis, aur ulog ke bole ke mauka nai dees ki u Maseeha hei.
Sabere hote Yeeshu ṭaaun chhoṛ ke ek suunsaan jagha pe gais. Sab log uske khoje lagin, aur jab paain to uske jaay se roke lagin.
Lekin Yeeshu ulog se bolis, “Hamme aur bhi jagha Parmeshwar ke raaj ke vachan sunaay ke hei, kaahe ke yahi khaatir hamme bheja gais hei.”
Aur tab u Galeel ke chech meñ parchaar kare lagis.
Ek roj Yeeshu Ganesarat laik ke kinaare khaṛa hoy ke, Parmeshwar ke vachan sunaat raha, jab bheeṛ uspe gir paṛis.
U dekhis ki laik ke kinaare dui bauṭ lagis hei, aur machhua log usman se utar ke jaal dhowat rahin.
Yeeshu, Saayman ke bauṭ pe chaṛh ke usse bolis ki uske laik ke kinaare se thoṛa duur pe le chale. Yeeshu bauṭ meñ beiṭh gais, aur sab ke sikhaay laga.
Jab Yeeshu baat kar lees, tab u Saayman se bolis, “Ab gahira paani meñ chalo, aur machhri pakṛe ke waaste jaal ḍaaro.”
Saayman bolis, “E Prabhu, ham sab to raat bhar mehnat kara, lekin kuchh nai pakṛa. Fir bhi jab tum bolta hei to ham jaal ḍaarega.”
Ulog weisaiyeñ karis aur etna jaada machhri jaal meñ aay gais ki jaal faṭe waala raha.
Ulog aapan saathi log ke jon dusra bauṭ meñ rahin, ishaara kar ke bolaain, ki aay ke ulog ke madat kare. Ulog aay ke duuno bauṭ meñ etna machhri bharin ki bauṭ ḍuube laga.
Jab Saayman Peeṭa i dekhis, to u Yeeshu ke goṛ pe gir paṛis aur bolis, “E Prabhu, hamaar lage se chala jaao, ham ek paapi admi hei!”
Peeṭa ke saathi jab dekhin ki ulog etna jaada machhri pakaṛ leen hei, tab ulog hairaan hoy gain.
Uske aur saathi, Zabdi ke laṛka Jeims aur Yuhanna bhi hairaan bhain. Tab Yeeshu, Saayman se bolis, “Ḍaro nai! Ab se tum machhri ke badle admi pakṛega.”
Ulog bauṭ ke kinaare le aain aur sab kuchh chhoṛ ke Yeeshu ke pichchhe hoy leen.

Ek dafe Yeeshu ek ṭaaun meñ aais jahañ ek admi raha, jiske koṛhi ke bimaari raha. U Yeeshu ke jeise dekhis, weise jameen pe gir paṛis aur binti kare lagis, “E Prabhu, agar tum maañgo to hamme achchha kare sakta hei.”
Yeeshu haath aage baṛhaay ke uske chhuis, aur bolis, “Ham mañgta hei ki tum achchha hoy jaao.” Aur wahi lage u koṛhi achchha hoy gais.

Tab Yeeshu usse bolis, “Iske baare meñ koi se nai bataana, lekin seedha aapan paadri ke lage jaao, aur apne aap ke dekhaao. Tab gawaahi ke khaatir, ki tum achchha hoy gaya hei, Maozas ke kaanuun ke mutaabik, balidaan chaṛhraao.”
Lekin Yeeshu jon cheej karis raha, i khabar bahut jor se sab bagal feil gais, aur bheeṛ pe bheeṛ uske sune ke khaatir aur achchha hoy ke waaste aay lagin.
Lekin Yeeshu ek suunsaan jagha jaay ke akele meñ preya kare lagis.

Ek roj Yeeshu parchaar karat raha, aur kuchh Farisi log aur kaanuun ke agua log huañ beiṭha rahin. Ulog Galeel aur Juḍia ke kona kona se aur Yarushalam se aain raha. Changa kare ke waaste Yeeshu pe Parmeshwar ke sakti raha.
Kuchh log, ek admi ke jiske lakwa maaris raha, ek khaṭia pe uṭhaay ke Yeeshu ke saamne ghar ke bhittar laay maañgat rahin.
Lekin bahut bheeṛ ke kaaran, ulog uske Yeeshu ke lage nai laay paain. Aur tab, ulog uske khaṭia sahit ruuf pe le gain aur ruuf ukhaaṛ ke, ghar meñ bheeṛ ke beecho beech, Yeeshu ke saamne utaar deen.
Tab Yeeshu ulog ke biswaas dekh ke bolis, “E dost, tumhaar paap maaf hoy gais hei.”
Tab huañ ke baṛkue aur Farisi log ek dusra se baat biwaad kare lagin, “I kon hei jon Parmeshwar ke ninda kare hei! Khali Parmeshwar hamaar paap ke maaf kare sake hei.”
Yeeshu to u sab ke bichaar jaanat raha aur ulog se bolis, “I rakam ke baat kaahe sochta hei?
I bole ke sahaj hei, ‘Tumhaar paap ke maafi mil gais hei,’ ya i bole ke, ‘uṭho aur chalo firo!’

Lekin ab tum dekhega ki Manush ke laṛka ke lage bhi, dharti pe paap ke maafi dewe ke adhikaar hei.” Aur tab u jiske lakwa maaris raha, u admi se bolis, “Ham tum se bolta hei, aapan khaṭia uṭhaao aur ghare jaao!”
Wahi lage u admi sab ke aage uṭhis, aur aapan khaṭia uṭhaay ke Prabhu ke baṛaai karte aapan ghare chala gais.
Sab koi takte rahe gain aur Prabhu ke naam lete, ḍar se bole lagin, “I keisan chamatkaar hamme aaj dekhe ke mila hei!”
Iske baad Yeeshu bahire gais aur ṭeks baṭorewaala Levi ke dekhis, u aapan ofis meñ beiṭha raha. Yeeshu usse bolis, “Hamaar pichchhe aao.”
Levi sab kuchh chhoṛ ke Yeeshu ke pichchhe hoy lees.
Tab Levi, Yeeshu ke khaatir aapan ghar pe ek baṛa paaṭi rakkhis. Mehmaan bahut rahin, jisman bahut ṭeks baṭorewaala bhi rahin.
Bahut Farisi aur paṛha likha log jon huañ rahin, Yeeshu ke chela log pe kurkuraain, “Tum sab kaahe ke ṭeks baṭorewaala log aur paapi log ke sañghe khaata peeta hei?”
Tab Yeeshu u sab se bolis, “Jon admi ke kuchh bimaari nai hei, uske ḍokṭa ke jaruurat nai hei, lekin ulog ke hei jon bimaar hei.
Ham dharam pe chalewaala log ke nai lekin paapi log ke bachaay ke waaste aaya hei.”
Kuchh log Yeeshu se bolis, “Yuhanna ke chela log hardam upwaas karat rahin aur preya bhi karat rahin, aur Farisi log ke chela bhi wahi kare hei, lekin tumhaar chela log khaay piye hei.”
Tab Yeeshu bolis, “Jab tak baraati log dulha ke sañghe rahe hei, bina khaay piye nai rahe hei.
Lekin jab ṭaaim aai aur u huañ se uṭhaay lewa jaai, tab ulog upwaas kari.”
Tab Yeeshu ulog ke ek kahaawat sunaais, “Tum nawa kameez ke faaṛ ke puraana kameez pe chakti nai lagaata. Agar tum lagaayga to, tum nawa ke bhi faaṛ dega aur u puraana meñ bhi mil nai paai.
Aur koi nawa waain, puraana waain ke beg meñ nai bhari, kaahe ke nawa waain, puraana waain ke beg ke faaṛ ke bahe jaai, aur waain ke beg bhi naas hoy jaai.
Lekin nawa waain nawa beg meñ bhare ke chaahi!
Aur koi bhi puraana waain piye ke baad nawa waain nai piye maañgi. Ulog bole hei, ‘Puraana waain hee achchha hei!” ’
Ek sabat ke roj jab Yeeshu aur uske chela log geñhu ke khet se hoy ke jaawat rahin, tab chela log kuchh geñhu tuuṛ ke, haath se mal ke khaay lagin.
Kuchh Farisi log puuchhis, “Sabat ke roj kaahe ke geñhu tuuṛta hei? Tumme i nai kare ke chaahi.”
Yeeshu bolis, “Kaa tum i nai paṛha ki Ḍeiviḍ aapan saathi ke khaatir, jab ulog bhuuka rahin, tab kon cheej karis raha?
U Prabhu ke ghar meñ jaay ke jon bheñṭ huañ chaṛhaawa gais raha, aur jon khali paadri khaay sakat raha, usman se kuchh uṭhaay ke apne khaais, aur aapan sab saathi log ke khawaais.”
Yeeshu bolis, “Manush ke laṛka, sabat ke roj ke bhi Prabhu hei.”
Ek dusra sabat ke roj, Yeeshu chech meñ parchaar karat raha, huañ pe ek apaahij admi bhi raha, jiske raaiṭ haath nai chalat raha.
Kuchh paṛha likha agua log aur Farisi log i taak meñ rahin ki kab Yeeshu u admi ke ṭheek kare. Ulog uspe dos lagaay ke mauka khojat rahin.
Yeeshu to ulog ke bichaar jaanat raha. Tab u admi se bolis ki u khaṛa hoy jaay ki jisse sab koi uske dekhe sake. Aur u admi khaṛa hoy gais.
Tab Yeeshu ulog se puuchhis, “Sabat ke roj kon cheej achchha hei? Ham achchha kaam kari ki kharaab kaam? Kaa ham koi ke jaan bachaai ki naas kari?”
Aur u sab bagal dekh ke u admi se bolis, “Aapan haath baṛhaao.” U haath baṛhaais aur ekdam ṭheek hoy gais.
Paṛha likha agua log aur Farisi gussaay gain aur ek dusra se bole lagin, “Ham Yeeshu ke sañghe kon cheej kari?”
U ṭaaim Yeeshu pahaaṛ pe preya kare nikris, aur puura raat wahiñ bitaais.
Dusra roj sabere u aapan chela log ke aapan lage bolaais, aur usman se baarah ke aapan parchaar kare waala chunis.
Usman se ek Saayman raha, jiske naam Yeeshu, Peeṭa rakkhis. Dusra Peeṭa ke bhaiya, Enḍru raha. Aur ulog ke sañghe Jeims, Yuhanna, Filip, Bartimaais,
Methiu, Thomas aur Halfai ke laṛka Jeims rahin. Baaki parchaarak meñ Saayman, jon Jelotes kahaat raha,
aur Jeims ke laṛka Juḍ aur Juḍas Iskariyoti, jon dhoka se Yeeshu ke pakaṛwaais raha.

Jab Yeeshu aapan sab parchaarak log ke sañghe nichche aais, tab ek baraabar jagha khoj ke u aapan chela log ke beech meñ khaṛa hoy gais. Huañ pe bahut bheeṛ raha kaahe ke log puura Juḍia, Yarushalam, Taaya (Tyre) aur Seida ke samundar ke kinaare se aain raha.
