Ulog Yeeshu ke parchaar sune ke waaste, aur aapan aapan bimaari se ṭheek hoy ke waaste huañ pe aain raha. Dushṭ aatma se jon log sataawa gain raha, u bhi ṭheek hoy gain.
Sab koi Yeeshu ke chhue maañgat rahin, kaahe ke usman se sakti nikar ke sab ke achchha karat raha.
Tab Yeeshu aapan chela log ke taraf dekhis aur bolis, “Dhann hei tum jon gareeb hei, kaahe ke Parmeshwar ke raaj tumhaar hei!
“Dhann hei tum log, jon bhuuka hei, kaahe ke tumhaar peṭ bhara jaai! “Dhann hei tum log, jon abhi rota hei, kaahe ke tum sab hasega!
“Tum log bhi dhann hei, jab Manush ke laṛka ke kaaran, log tumme haiṭ kari, aur tum sab se dusmani lei, tumme nikaar dei, aur tumhaar ninda kari, lekin Parmeshwar tumhaar bhala kari.
Khusi hona jab i sab hoi, khusi se kuudna, kaahe ke tumhaar waaste swarag meñ sab se baṛa inaam rakkha hei. Kaahe ki ulog ke baap daada log bhi nabi log ke sañghe yahi karin raha.
Tum pe taras hei, jon dhani hei, kaahe ke tumhaar saanti tumme mil gais hei!
Tum pe bhi taras khaata hei, jiske peṭ bhara hei, kaahe ke tum bhuuka rahega! Haay tum pe, jon abhi hase hei, kaahe ke tum royga!
Haay tum pe, jab sab log tumme achchha boli, kaahe ke ulog ke baap daada bhi jhuuṭa nabi log ke sañghe eisehiyeñ karis raha.
“Lekin tum, jon sune sake hei, ham usse bolta hei. Aapan dusman se prem karo, jon tum se dusmani kare hei, uske bhi bhala karo,
jon tumme saraapi, uske tum aasheesh dena, aur jon tumhaar buraai kari, uske khaatir preya karo.
Agar koi tumhaar ek gaal pe thappaṛ maari, to tum uske aapan dusra gaal bhi deo, agar koi tumhaar paijaama chheen le, to tum uske aapan kurta le se bhi nai rokna.
Jon koi tum se kuchh maañge, tum uske de deo aur agar tum se koi kuchh chheen le, to usse fir lauṭ ke nai mañgna.
Tum jeise mañgta hei, ki log tumhaar sañghe kare, weisaiyeñ tum ulog ke sañghe bhi karo.”
“Agar tum wahi se prem karega, jon tum se prem kare hei, to tum kon cheej baṛa kara? Kaahe ke paapi log bhi, jon usse prem kare hei, ulog se prem rakkhe hei!
Aur agar tum wahi ke bhalaai karo, jon tum se bhalaai kare hei, tab tum kon se baṛa kaam kara? Kaahe ke paapi bhi to yahi kare hei.
Aur agar tum koi ke karja deta hei, aur sochta hei ki u tumme lauṭaay dei, tab tumhaar keisan baṛaai? Kaahe ke paapi log bhi paapi ke karja dewe hei, ki jisse ulog se otna lauṭ ke mil jaai.

Lekin aapan dusman se prem karo aur dusra ke bhalaai karo. Jab karja deo to aasra nai rakkho ki lauṭ ke mili. Aur tab tumme bahut baṛa fal mili, aur tab tumme sab se baṛa Pradhaan ke laṛka bola jaai. Kaahe ke u kharaab log ke bhi daya kare hei, aur ulog ke bhi achchha kare hei jon kabhi dhanbaad nai de hei.
Dusra pe hardam daya karo, jon rakam tumhaar Pita ji, tum pe daya kare hei!”
Yeeshu bolis, “Dusra pe dos kabhi nai lagaana, tab tum pe bhi kabhi dos nai lagi, koi ke kharaab nai bolo, to tumme bhi koi kharaab nai boli, maaf karo tab tumme bhi maaf kara jaai.

Agar tum koi aur ke kuchh dega, to tumme bhi mili. Aur etna nai, log to tumme puura naap se dabaay ke, hilaay hilaay ke, puura muh tak bhar ke tumhaar godi meñ ḍaar dei, kaahe ke jon naap se tum naapat raha, wahi naap se tumhaar waaste bhi naapa jaai.”
Tab Yeeshu, sab log ke ek kahaawat sunaais. U bolis, “Kaa ek añdha dusra añdha ke rasta dekhaay sake? Kaa duuno gaḍḍha meñ nai gir jaai?
Chela aapan guru se baṛa nai hei? Lekin jab chela seekh lei, tab aapan guru ke rakam ban jaai.
Tum aapan bhaiya ke aañkhi ke meila ke kaahe dekhta hei? Kaa tumme aapan aañkhi ke laṭṭha nai dekhaay hei?

Aapan bhaiya se keise tum bole sakta, “Bhaiya, laao ham tumhaar aañkhi se meila nikaar dei,” lekin aapan aañkhi ke laṭṭha nai dekhe sakta? E muurakh! Pahile aapan aañkhi ke laṭṭha to nikaaro, tab dusra ke aañkhi ke meila ke nikaare sakega.”
“Koi achchha peṛ kharaab fal nai de sake hei, aur naa hee ek kharaab peṛ achchha fal de saki.
Sab peṛ aapan aapan fal se pahichaana jaay hei, kaahe ke jhaaṛi se añguur ya anjeer nai tuuṛa jaay sake hei.
Ek achchha admi aapan man se achchha achchha baat nikaari, aur ek kharaab admi aapan man se kharaab kharaab baat nikaare hei, kaahe ke jon cheej man meñ rahe hei wahi muh se nikre hei.”
“Tum hamme, ‘E Prabhu, E Prabhu,’ kaahe ke bolaata hei, jab ki tum hamaar baat nai maanta hei?
Jon bhi koi hamaar lage aay hei aur hamaar baat sune hei, aur hamaar baat bhi maane hei, ham tumme bataayga ki u keisan hei.
U u admi ke rakam hei jon ghar ke banaay ke ṭaaim chaṭṭaan khod ke faaunḍeishan ḍaaris hei. I kaahe ke kare hei? Ki jisse jab baaṛh aai to uske hilaay nai saki, kaahe ke u majbuut ghar rahi.
Lekin jon koi sun ke bhi nai maane hei, u u admi ke rakam hei, jon maṭṭi pe bina faaunḍeishan khode aapan ghar banaay lees. Aur jab baaṛh aai, tab u wahi lage gir jaai aur naas hoy jaai.’.
Jab Yeeshu sab baat bataay dees, tab u Kafarnahuum chala gais.
Ek aami ofisa ke naukar jon uske bahut pyaara raha, bimaar paṛ gais, aur mare waala raha.
Jab aami ofisa Yeeshu ke baare meñ sunis, tab u chech ke baṛa jan ke uske lage bhejis ki ulog jaay ke Yeeshu ke bolaay laay ki jisse u naukar ke ṭheek kar de.
Chech ke baṛa jan Yeeshu ke lage jaay ke usse binti karin aur bolin, “I naukar ke aay ke dekh leo, kaahe ke i tumhaar madat ke laayk hei.
U ham log ke des se prem kare hei, aur ham log ke chech bhi banaais hei.”

Tab Yeeshu ulog ke sañghe bimaar admi ke ghare gais. Ulog abhi ghar se kuchh duur pe rahin, jab aami ofisa aapan kuchh dost se i bol ke Yeeshu ke lage bhejis, “E Prabhu dukh nai uṭhaao. Ham i laayk nai ki tum hamaar ghare aao.
Aur ham i laayk bhi nai ki tumhaar lage aai. Khali hukum karo, aur hamaar naukar ṭheek hoy jaai.

Ham bhi to aapan uppar ke baṛkuan se hukum leta hei, aur dusra bagal saulja hamaar hukum pe chale hei. Jab ham bolta hei ‘Jaao’ tab u jaay hei. Dusra se bolta hei ‘Aao’ tab u aay hei. Aur jab ham aapan naukar se bolta hei, ‘I karo’ tab u kare hei.” ’
I sun ke Yeeshu hairaan hoy gais, u ghuum ke u bheeṛ se jon uske pichchhe pichchhe aat raha, bolis, “Ham to puura Israayel meñ i rakam biswaasi nai dekha hei!”
Tab bheje waala log jab lauṭ ke aami ofisa ke ghare gais, to dekhis ki naukar ṭheek hoy gais hei.
Thoṛa roj baad Yeeshu aapan chela log ke sañghe Nain ṭaaun gais, uske sañghe ek bahut baṛa bheeṛ bhi jaat raha.
Jeise ulog Nain ṭaaun ke gaiṭ pe pahuñchis, ulog dekhis ki kuchh log ek murda ke maṭṭi dewe le jaay hei. U laash, ek bidhwa ke eklauta laṛka ke raha. Aur ṭaaun ke bahut se log uske sañghe rahin.
Uske dekh ke Prabhu ke man meñ daya aais, aur u bolis, “Nai ro!”
Yeeshu jaay ke arthi ke chhuis, ulog jon arthi ke uṭhaain raha, ruk gain. Yeeshu bolis, “E naojawaan, uṭho!”
Aur wahi lage u laṛka uṭh ke beiṭh gais aur sab se baat kare lagis. Tab Yeeshu u laṛka ke uske maiya ke de dees.
Sab log ḍar gain aur Parmeshwar ke jayjaykaar kare lagin. Ulog bole lagin, “Ek baṛa nabi hiañ ham log ke beech meñ hei! Parmeshwar aapan log ke bachaay aay gais hei.”
Jon cheej Yeeshu karis raha, uske khabar chaaro bagal Juḍia aur agal bagal ke des meñ feil gais.
Jab Yuhanna ke chela log Yeeshu ke baare meñ sab baat bataay deen, tab u dui chela ke bolaay ke Yeeshu ke lage i puuchhe ke bhejis,
“Kaa tum wahi hei jon aay waala hei ki ham koi aur ke agori?”
Jab duuno Yeeshu ke lage pahuñchin, tab bolin, “Yuhanna hamme i puuchhe ke waaste bhejis hei, ki kaa tum wahi hei jon aay waala hei, ki ham koi aur ke waiṭ kari?”
U ṭaaim Yeeshu bahut log ke ṭheek karat raha, jon bimaar rahin, ya koi rakam ke peeṛa meñ rahin, ya dushṭ aatma se dukhi rahin, aur jon añdha rahin, uske aañkhi det raha.

Yeeshu, ulog se bolis, “Yuhanna se jaay ke bataao ki tum kon cheej dekha aur suna hei. Añdha ab dekhe sake hei, langṛa ab chale sake hei. Koṛhi log ab achchha hoy gain hei, bahra log ab sune sake hei, murda bhi jinda hoy gais hei, aur kangaal log vachan sune hei.
Dhann hei ulog jon hamaar kaaran, ṭhokar nai khaai.”
Jab Yuhanna ke duut log chala gain, tab Yeeshu sab log ke Yuhanna ke baare meñ bataay lagis, “Ḍezaṭ meñ tum Yuhanna ke lage kon cheej dekhe gay raha? Kaa u hawa meñ uṛte ek lamba graas ke rakam raha?
Tum huañ kaa dekhe gay raha? Ek admi jon mahañga kapṛa pahine raha? Jon koi mahañga kapṛa pahine hei aur sab sukh maañge hei, ulog raaja ke mahal meñ rahe waala hei.
Tab tum kon cheej dekhe gay raha? Koi nabi ke? Haañ, ham tumme bataata hei ki u ek nabi se bhi baṛa hei.
Baaibal meñ, Yuhanna ke baare meñ likhaan hei, “Ham aapan duut ke tum se aage bhejta hei, ki jisse u tumhaar khaatir sab cheej taiyaar kare.
Yuhanna se baṛa abhi tak i dharti pe koi nai peida bhais hei. Lekin jon Parmeshwar ke raaj meñ sab se chhoṭa hei, u Yuhanna se baṛa hei.”
Sab koi Yuhanna ke baat sunat rahin, aur ṭeks baṭore waala log bhi i sab sun ke Yuhanna se baptisma leen, aur Parmeshwar ke sachcha maan leen.
Lekin Farisi log aur Maozas ke kaanuun ke guru log, Yuhanna se baptisma nai lees aur Parmeshwar ke ichchha ṭaal dees.
Yeeshu fir bolis, “Tum sab keisan log hei? Kon rakam ke log tum sab hei?

Tum sab to u laṛkan ke rakam hei jon maakeṭ meñ beiṭh ke ek dusra ke bolaay ke bole hei, ‘Ham tumhaar khaatir baañsuri bajaaya, lekin tum naacha nai! Ham tumhaar khaatir bilaap kara lekin tum nai roya!”
Yuhanna, Baptisma dewaala aais, naa roṭi khaais, aur naa waain pees, aur tum bolta hei, “Usman dushṭ aatma hei!”
Lekin Manush ke laṛka khaate, peete, aais, aur tum bola, “I admi ke dekho! I to peṭṭu aur piakkaṛ hei, i to ṭeks baṭore waala aur paapi log ke dost hei.”
Fir bhi Parmeshwar ke buddhi, uske khaatir sachcha hei jon uske maane hei.”
Ek Farisi Yeeshu ke aapan ghare khaana pe bolaais, aur Yeeshu huañ gais aur khaana khaay beiṭh gais.
Wahi ṭaaun meñ ek paapi aurat rahat rahi. Jab u sunis ki Yeeshu u Farisi ke ghare khaana khaay aais hei, tab u ek botal meñ mahañga pefeum laais.
Tab u aay ke Yeeshu ke pichchhe khaṛi hoy gais. U roy roy ke aapan aañsu se uske goṛ dhoy lagis aur aapan baar se pochhis. Tab u uske goṛ pe chumma le ke uspe pefeum lagaais.

Jab u Farisi jon uske bolaais raha, i sab dekhis to aapan man meñ sochis, “Agar i admi sachche ek nabi hei, to jaan leta ki i kon rakam ke aurat hei jon iske chhue hei! U jaan jaata ki i ek paapin hei.”
Yeeshu Farisi se bolis, “Saayman, hamme tum se kuchh bole ke hei.” “Guru, kon cheej hei?” Saayman bolis.
Yeeshu bolis, “Ek dafe dui admi ek mahaajan ke karja rahin. Ek paañch sao chaañdi ke sikka baaki raha, aur dusra pachaas baaki raha.
Duuno meñ se koi ek bhi uske peisa lauṭaay nai sakat raha, aur mahaajan u duuno ke maaf kar dees. Ab u duuno meñ se kon usse jaada prem kari?”
Saayman jawaab dees, “Ham sochta hei u, jiske jaada udhaar raha, aur lauṭaay nai sakat raha.” “Tum raaiṭ hei,” Yeeshu bolis.

Tab Yeeshu u aurat ke bagal ghuum ke Saayman se bolis, “Kaa tum i aurat ke dekha hei? Jab ham tumhaar ghare aaya, tab tum hamaar goṛ dhoy ke khaatir paani bhi nai dia, lekin i to aapan aañsu se hamaar goṛ dhois, aur aapan baar se pochhis.
Tum to hamme chumma leke welkam nai kara, lekin jab se ham hiañ aaya hei, tab se i aurat hamaar goṛ chuume nai band karis.
Tum to hamaar muuṛ pe tel bhi nai lagaaya, lekin i to hamaar goṛ pe pefeum malis.
Ham tumme bataata hei, ki iske jaada prem se iske sab paap ke maafi hoy jaai. Lekin jiske thoṛa maafi mile hei, uske prem bhi thoṛa rahe hei.”
Tab Yeeshu u aurat se bolis, “Tumhaar paap maaf hoy gais.”
Kuchh mehmaan jon ṭaibal pe beiṭhe rahin, aapan aapan man meñ soche lagin, “I kon hei, jon paap ke bhi maaf kar de hei?”
Lekin Yeeshu u aurat se bolis, “Tumhaar biswaas tumme bachaay lees hei, saanti se chali jaao.”
Iske baad, Yeeshu gaaoñ gaaoñ aur ṭaaun ṭaaun parchaar karte, aur Parmeshwar ke raaj ke baat sunaate raha. Uske sañghe uske baarah chela bhi rahin,

aur ulog ke sañghe u aurat log bhi rahin, jon sab dushṭ aatma se chhuṭkaara paay leen raha, aur bimaari se achchha hoy gain raha. Usman se ek, Meri jon Magdalini kahaawat rahi aur jisman saat dushṭ aatma rahis.
Joanna, jis ke admi Khoja raha aur jon Heraḍ ke meneja raha, aur Susanna, aur kaafi aur aurat log, jon aapan peisa se Yeeshu aur uske chela log ke madat karat rahin.
Jab ek baṛa bheeṛ dusra dusra ṭaaun se aay ke Yeeshu ke chaaro taraf jama hoy lagin, tab u ulog ke ek kahaani bataais,
“Ek ṭaaim ek admi khet meñ bia bowe gais raha. Jab u khet meñ bia chheeṭat raha, tab kuchh bia rasta ke kinaare gir gais, u sab ke goṛ se kachar dewa gais, aur chiṛia aay ke uske khaay lees.
Kuchh bia chaṭṭaan pe gira, aur jab u jamis, tab uske paani nai mile se sukhaay gais.
Kuchh bia jañgal jhaaṛi ke beech meñ gira, u sab jamis lekin jhaaṛi u sab ke dabaay dees.
Aur kuchh bia achchha jameen pe giris, peṛ jamis, aur baṛa hoy ke sao guna fal laais.” Jab Yeeshu kahaani sunaay dees, tab ulog se bolis, “Agar tum log ke lage kaan hei to suno!”
Yeeshu ke chela log kahaani ke matlab puuchhin.

Yeeshu jawaab dees, “Tum sab ke Parmeshwar ke raaj ke seekraṭ ke samajh dewa gais hei, dusra log ke kahaani sunaawa jaay hei, ki jisse ulog dekhi lekin dekhe nai paai, aur suni lekin samjhe nai paai.”
“I kahaani ke matlab i hei, bia Parmeshwar ke vachan hei.

Jon bia rasta ke kinaare giris raha, i ulog hei, jon sandes sune hei, lekin saitaan aay ke ulog ke dil se vachan leke chala jaay hei, ki kahiñ eise nai hoy ki log vachan pe biswaas kare aur bach jaay.
Jon bia chaṭṭaan pe gira, i ulog hei jon vachan ke to khusi se le lewe hei, lekin jaṛ nai pakṛe ke kaaran ilog khali thoṛa deri biswaas rakkhe hei, aur ṭesṭ ke ṭaaim gir jaay hei.
Jon bia jhaaṛi meñ giris, i ulog hei jon vachan sune hei, lekin chinta, aur peisa aur jeewan ke sukh dukh meñ fañs jaay hei, aur eisan log ke fal pake nai paay.
Jon bia achchha maṭṭi meñ giris, i ulog hei jon vachan ke sune hei, aur achchha bhala samjhe hei. Aur eisane log achchha fal laay hei.

Koi batti baar ke pyaala ke nichche nai rakkhe hei aur naa to khaṭia ke nichche rakkhe hei. Lekin batti hardam batti rakkhe waala jagha pe rakkha jaay hei, ki jisse jon koi bhi bhittar aai, uske ujera mili.
Koi eisan cheej lukaan nai hei, jon mile nai sake hei. Aur jon bhi chhipaan cheej hei u to saamne aai.

Yahi kaaran saaodhaan raho ki tum keise sunta hei! Jon koi ke lage kuchh hei, uske aur dewa jaai, lekin jon log ke lage kuchh bhi nai hei, ulog se to u bhi le lewa jaai jon ulog samjhe hei ki uske lage hei.
Yeeshu ke amma aur bhaiya log uske lage aain, lekin usse mile nai paain kaahe ke huañ bahut baṛa bheeṛ raha.
Koi Yeeshu se bolis, “Tumhaar amma aur bhaiya log bahire khaṛa hei aur tum se mile maañge hei.”
Yeeshu bolis, “Hamaar amma aur bhaiya log, ulog hei jon Parmeshwar ke vachan sune hei aur uske maane hei.”
Ek roj Yeeshu aur uske chela log bauṭ meñ gain, aur u ulog se bolis, “Aao ham sab laik ke u bagal chali.”
Aur jab ulog bauṭ meñ jaawat raha, tab Yeeshu soy gais. Achaanak laik pe tufaan aay gais, aur bauṭ ḍuube laga. Ulog museebat meñ paṛ gain.
Tab ulog jaay ke Yeeshu ke jagaain, “Swaami, Swaami! Ham log ḍuubta hei!” Yeeshu uṭh ke hawa aur halkora ke ḍaaṭis. Hawa aur halkora ruk gais, aur sab saanti hoy gais.

Tab Yeeshu aapan chela log se bolis, “Kaa tum log ke lage biswaas nai hei?” Lekin ulog to ḍar ke maare aur hairaan hoy ke ek dusra se bole lagin, “I kon hei? I to hawa aur halkora ke bhi hukum dewe hei aur u sab iske baat sune hei!”
Yeeshu aur uske chela log Galeel ke laik paar kar ke Gerasa ke des meñ pahuñchin.
Jeise Yeeshu bauṭ se utris, u ṭaaun ke ek admi ulog se milis. U admi meñ dushṭ aatma raha. U bahut roj se nañge ghuumat raha, aur ghar meñ nai lekin kabrastaan meñ rahat raha.
U Yeeshu ke dekhis aur chillaais, aur uske aage aay ke gir ke jor se bolis, “He Yeeshu, Parmeshwar ke laṛka, tumme ham se kaa kaam hei? Ham binti karta hei hamme nai sataao!”

U i baat bolis kaahe ke Yeeshu u dushṭ aatma ke hukum dees ki u admi se nikar jaay. U admi ke bhuut hardam hamla karat raha. Aur chaahe uske haath aur goṛ chain se bañdha rahe ya kaṛa pahra rahe, u sab ke tuuṛ dewat raha. Aur tab jon dushṭ aatma rahis, uske jañgal meñ suunsaan jagha pe le jaawat raha.
Yeeshu usse puuchhis, “Tumhaar naam kaa hei?” U jawaab dees, “Hamaar naam sena hei.” U i khaatir i bolis raha, kaahe ke uske bhittar bahut dushṭ aatma rahin.
U sab Yeeshu se binti kare lagin ki ulog ke gahira gaddha meñ nai jaay de. (U jagha pe dushṭ aatma log ke saja mile hei, aur ilog ke bhi saja mili.)
Wahi log ke lage, ek suar ke baṛa jhunḍ charat rahin. Ulog Yeeshu se binti karin, ki u ulog ke suar meñ bhej de, aur Yeeshu wahi karis.
Tab dushṭ aatma, ulog se nikar ke aur suar meñ ghus gais. Aur u jhunḍ harharaay ke laik meñ kuud gain aur wahiñ ḍuub marin.
Jab suar charaay waala log i sab dekhin, tab ulog dauṛ ke ṭaaun aur gaaoñ meñ sab bagal i khabar feilaay deen.

Huañ ke log i dekhe ke waaste aain ki huañ kon cheej bhais raha, aur jab ulog Yeeshu ke lage aain, to dekhe hei ki jon admi meñ dushṭ aatma raha, u achchha hoy gais aur kapṛa pahin ke, Yeeshu ke goṛ ke lage beiṭhis hei. U sab log ḍar gain.
Tab u sab log jon dekhin raha ki u admi ṭheek hoy gais hei, sab ke jaay ke bataain.
Tab Gerasa ke agal bagal ke sab log Yeeshu se binti kare lagin ki u huañ se chala jaay, kaahe ke ulog sab ḍar gain. Jab Yeeshu bauṭ meñ chaṛh ke jaay laga,
tab jon admi se dushṭ aatma nikra raha, u bhi Yeeshu se binti kare laga, “Hamme aapan sañghe le chalo.” Lekin Yeeshu usse bolis,

“Aapan ghare lauṭ jaao, aur sab log se bataao ki Parmeshwar tumhaar khaatir ketna baṛa baṛa kaam karis hei.” U admi jaay ke puura ṭaaun meñ parchaar kare laga, ki Yeeshu uske waaste ketna baṛa baṛa kaam karis raha.
Jab Yeeshu lauṭis, tab huañ ek baṛa bheeṛ uske welkam kare ke waaste waiṭ karat raha.
Tab Jaayras naam ke ek admi, jon huañ ke chech ke agua raha, aay ke Yeeshu ke aage ghuṭna ṭek dees, aur binti karis ki u uske ghare chale,
kaahe ke uske baarah saal ke eklauti laṛki mare waali rahi. Jab Yeeshu Jaayras ke sañghe jaat raha, tab bheeṛ uske uupar girat paṛat rahin.
Bheeṛ meñ ek aurat rahi jiske baarah saal se khuun bahe waala bimaari raha, aur u aapan etna peisa ḍokṭa pe kharcha kar dees raha, aur fir bhi u koi ke haath se achchha nai bhais.
Aur jeise u pichchhe se aay ke Yeeshu ke kapṛa chhuis, uske khuun bahe ke band hoy gais.
Yeeshu puuchhis, “Hamme kon chhuis?” Sab koi nai bol dees lekin Peeṭa aur uske saathi bolis, “E Swaami! Etna bheeṛ meñ tumhaar chaaro bagal se log tumme dabaay hei aur tumhaar uppar gire hei”
Lekin Yeeshu bolis, “Koi hamme chhuis hei, kaahe ke ham meñ se sakti nikris hei.”

U aurat dekhis ki u baat chhupaay nai saki, aur kaapte Yeeshu ke lage aay ke uske goṛ pe gir paṛis. Aur sab ke saamne bataais ki kaahe ke u Yeeshu ke chhuis raha, aur keise u wahi lage achchhi hoy gais hei.
Yeeshu u aurat se bolis, “Tum aapan biswaas se ab achchhi hoy gayi hei. Ab saanti se chali jaao!”
Yeeshu baat karat raha, jab Jaayras ke ghar se khabar aais, “Tumhaar laṛki mar gais hei. Ab guru ke tang nai karo.”
Lekin i sun ke Yeeshu Jaayras se bolis, “Soch nai karo! Khali biswaas rakkho, tumhaar laṛki bach jaai.’.
Yeeshu uske ghare pahuñch ke, aur khali Peeṭa, Yuhanna, Jeims aur laṛki ke maiya aur bappa ke bhittar le gais.
Sab koi u laṛki ke mare pe rowat rahin. Lekin Yeeshu bolis, “Ro nai, u laṛki maris nai hei. U to khali sowe hei.”
Sab log Yeeshu pe hase lagin, kaahe ke ulog jaanat rahin ki laṛki mar gais hei.
Yeeshu laṛki ke haath pakaṛ ke jor se bolis, “E laṛki uṭho!”
Uske saas lauṭ aais aur u uṭh ke beiṭh gais. Yeeshu bolis ki uske khaay ke waaste kuchh deo.
Laṛki ke maiya bappa hairaan rahin, lekin Yeeshu ulog ke rokis ki huañ jon cheej bhais raha, uske baare meñ koi se kuchh nai bataana.
Yeeshu aapan baarah chela log ke ek sañghe bolaais, aur ulog ke dushṭ aatma nikaare ke aur bimaari ṭheek kare ke sakti aur adhikaar dees.
Aur ulog ke Parmeshwar ke raaj ke parchaar kare ke aur bimaari ṭheek kare ke khaatir bhejis.
Aur u bolis, “Rasta ke waaste kuchh nai lena, chale ke waaste naa laaṭhi, naa beg, naa khaana, ya peisa aur hiañ tak ki badle ke khaatir kapṛa bhi nai lena.
Jon ghar meñ welkam mili, wahiñ ruk jaana, aur fir wahiñ se bida hona.
Agar koi tumme welkam nai kari, to u ṭaaun se nikarte ṭaaim aapan goṛ ke garda wahiñ jhaaṛ dena. Yahi ulog ke waaste chetaaoni hoi.”
Tab chela log gaaoñ gaaoñ jaay ke susamaachaar sunaawat rahin aur sab jagha log ke achchha karte, jaat rahin.
Galeel ke raaja Heraḍ, jab i baat sunis tab u ghabraay gais, kaahe ke bahut log bolin ki Yuhanna, baptisma de waala jinda hoy gais hei.
Ketna log to i bhi bolin ki Ilaayja dekhaay dees hei, aur kaafi log bolat rahin ki puraana nabi log meñ se ek jinda hoy gais hei.
Heraḍ bolis, “Yuhanna ke muuṛ to hamahi kaṭwaaya raha, ab i kon hei jis ke baare meñ i sab baat sunaai de hei?” Heraḍ, Yeeshu ke dekhe maañgat raha.
Tab chela log lauṭ ke aay ke Yeeshu se sab bataain ki ulog kon kon cheej karin raha. Tab u ulog ke alag kar ke Bethseida naam, ek ṭaaun meñ le gais.

Lekin kaafi log jaan gain ki u kahañ hei, aur uske pichchhe aain. Yeeshu u sab ke welkam karis aur Parmeshwar ke raaj ke baare meñ baat cheet karis aur kaafi log jon achchha bhi hoy maañgat raha ulog ke achchha karis.

Sanjha ke ṭaaim, baarah chela log Yeeshu ke lage aay ke bolin, “I sab log ke ghare bhej deo ki ilog jaay ke khaana paani ke parband kare aur raat meñ soy ke khaatir jagha khoje, kaahe ke i suunsaan jagha hei.”

Lekin Yeeshu bolis, “Tumahi ilog ke khaay ke waaste parband karo.” Ulog bolin, “Hamaar lage to khali paañch roṭi aur dui machhri hei. Kaa tum mañgta hei ki ham jaay ke ilog ke waaste khaana khareedi?”
Huañ pe lagbhag paañch hajaar log rahin. Yeeshu chela log se bolis, “I sab ke laain meñ pachaas pachaas kar ke beiṭhaay deo.”
Ulog eisehiyeñ karin.
Tab Yeeshu paañch roṭi aur dui machhri leke, uppar swarag ke bagal dekh ke dhanbaad dees, aur uske tuuṛ tuuṛ ke chela log ke dete gais, ki sab ke baaṭ de.
Sab koi peṭ bhar ke khaain. Aur baarah baaskeṭ bhar ke bacha kucha ṭukṛa chela log bharin.
Jab Yeeshu akele preya karat raha, tab uske chela log uske lage rahin. Yeeshu ulog se puuchhis, “Log hamaar baare meñ kon cheej bole hei?”
Ulog jawaab deen, “Koi bole hei tum Yuhanna, baptisma de waala hei, aur koi bole hei tum Ilaayja hei, aur kuchh log bole hei ki tum puraana nabi meñ se ek hei jon jinda hoy gais hei.”
“Lekin tum hamme kon cheej bolta hei?” Peeṭa bolis, “Tum Parmeshwar ke bheja Maseeha hei.”
Yeeshu ulog se bolis ki i baat koi aur se nai bataana.

Yeeshu i bhi bolis, “Manush ke laṛka ke khaatir dukh uṭhaay ke jaruuri hei, u des ke neta log, baṛa paadri, aur Maozas ke kaanuun ke guru log, ke haath se dukh uṭhaai. Ulog uske ṭhukraai, aur maar ḍaari, lekin teen roj baad jinda hoy jaai.”
Tab Yeeshu sab se bolis, “Agar koi hamaar pichchhe aay maañge, to apne aap ke bhulaay de. Sab roj aapan kros uṭhaay ke hamaar pichchhe chale.
Kaahe ke agar koi aapan jaan bachaay maañge to uske khoy dei, lekin jon koi hamaar waaste aapan jaan khoi, u uske bachaai.
Tumme kon cheej mili, agar tum puura dunia apnaay lega lekin aapan jaan khoy dega?
Agar tumme hamaar baat se saram lage hei, tab Manush ke laṛka bhi jab u aapan aur aapan Pita ke aur ainjal ke mahima ke sañghe aai to tum se sarmaai.
Ham sachche bolta hei ki jon sab hiañ khaṛa hei, usman se kuchh log bina Parmeshwar ke raaj dekhe nai mari.
Lagbhag aaṭh roj ke baad Yeeshu, Peeṭa, Yuhanna, aur Jeims ke sañghe leke pahaaṛ pe preya kare chala gais.
Jab u preya karat raha, uske chehra ke ruup badal gais, aur uske kapra ekdam ujjar hoy ke chamke lagis.
Wahi lage Maozas aur Ilaayja huañ aay ke usse baat kare lagin.
I duuno swarag ke mahima meñ dekhaai deen, aur Yeeshu ke mare ke baare meñ baat cheet kare lagin, jon Yarushalam meñ hoy waala raha.
Peeṭa aur uske sañghe dui aur chela, neeñd meñ suta rahin. Achaanak ulog uṭhin aur mahima se bhara Yeeshu ke dekhin. Aur sañghe u duuno admi ke bhi dekhin.

Jab Maozas aur Ilaayja jaay lagin, tab Peeṭa Yeeshu se bolis, “E Swaami, ketna achchha raha ki ham hiañ hei! Ham teen ṭenṭ banaayga, ek tumhaar waaste, ek Maozas ke waaste aur ek Ilaayja ke waaste.” Lekin Peeṭa nai jaanat raha ki u kaa bole hei.
Peeṭa baat karte raha, ki baadar ulog ke uppar chhaay gais aur ulog ḍar gain.
Baadar meñ se ek awaaj sunaais, “I hamaar chuna laṛka hei. Iske suno.”
U awaaj ke baad, ulog khali Yeeshu ke dekhin. Thoṛa deri tak ulog chuppe rahin, aur jon kuchh dekhin raha, uske baare meñ kuchh nai bolin.
Dusra roj jab ulog pahaaṛ se utrin, tab ek baṛa bheeṛ ulog se milis.
Ek admi bheeṛ meñ se chillaay ke bolis, “E guru, ham binti karta hei, hamaar eklauta laṛka pe daya karo!
Ek dushṭ aatma uske pakṛe hei aur u chillaay hei. U iske eise shaik kare hei ki iske muñh se fena nikar aay hei, aur tab tak nai chhoṛe hei jab tak i ekdam thak nai jaay.
Ham tumhaar chela log se binti kara ki ulog i bhuut ke nikaar de lekin ulog nikaar nai paain.”
Yeeshu ulog se bolis, “Tum jiddi aur thoṛa biswaas waala log! Ham kab tak tumhaar sañghe rahe paayga aur jon tum karta hei uske sahe paayga?” Tab Yeeshu bolis, “Aapan laṛka ke hamaar lage laao.”
Jab laṛka ke Yeeshu ke lage laawa jaat raha, tab bhuut uske pakaṛ ke puura shaik kar dees. Yeeshu u bhuut ke ḍaaṭis. Aur u laṛka ke achchha karke, uske bappa ke lauṭaay dees.
Sab koi Parmeshwar ke mahaan sakti se hairaan rahe gain.

Sab log u kaam se jon Yeeshu karat raha hairaan rahin, tab Yeeshu aapan chela log se bolis, “Yaad rakhna, jon baat ham tum se bataay waala hei! Manush ke laṛka ke, uske dusman ke hawaale kar dewa jaai.”
Lekin chela log nai jaane sakin ki Yeeshu kaa bole hei. Uske matlab ulog se lukaan raha. Ulog samajh nai sakin, aur puuchhe se ḍarat rahin.
Chela ek dusra se laṛe lagin, ki ulog meñ se sab se baṛa kon hei.
Yeeshu jaanat raha ki ulog kaa soche hei, aur u ek bachcha ke aapan bagal khaṛa kar ke,

tab u chela log se bolis, “Jab tum hamaar naam se ek bachcha ke welkam karega, tab tum hamme bhi welkam karta hei. Aur jab tum hamme welkam karta hei, tab tum uske bhi welkam karta hei, jon hamme bhejis hei. Kaahe ke tum log meñ se jon sab se chhoṭa hei, wahi sab se baṛa hei.”
Yuhanna bolis, “E guru, ham ek admi ke dekha, jon tumhaar naam se dushṭ aatma ke nikaarat raha. Ham uske roka, kaahe ke u ham log ke grup ke nai raha.”
Yeeshu bolis, “Uske nai roko, jon koi tumhaar agaiñsṭ nai hei, u tumhaar sañghe hei.”
Yeeshu ke swarag jaay ke ṭaaim nagichche raha, aur u Yarushalam jaay ke bichaar karis.
U aapan kuchh log ke aage bhej dees raha, ki jisse ulog jaay ke Saamri gaaoñ meñ sab taiyaari kari.
Lekin huañ ke log uske welkam nai karin, kaahe ke u Yarushalam jaat raha.
I dekh ke uske chela Jeims aur Yuhanna bolin, “E Swaami! Kaa tum mañgta hei ki ham hukum dei aur swarag se aagi gir ke i sab ke bhasam kar dei?”
Lekin Yeeshu ulog ke ḍaaṭis, “Tum nai janta ki tum kon aatma ke hei. Manush ke laṛka sab log ke naas kare nai aais hei, lekin ulog ke bachaay aais hei.”
Aur ulog dusra gaaoñ chala gain.
Jab ulog rasta pe jaat rahin, tab koi bolis, “Tum jahañ jaayga, ham tumhaar sañghe chalega.”
Yeeshu bolis, “Lomṛi ke gaḍḍha hei aur asmaan ke chiṛia ke ghosla hei, lekin Manush ke laṛka ke to sir rakkhe ke bhi jagha nai hei.”
Yeeshu ek dusra admi se bolis, “Hamaar pichchhe aao.” Lekin u admi bolis, “E Prabhu, pahile jaay ke ham aapan bappa ke maṭṭi de dei.”
Yeeshu bolis, “Jon mara hei, ulog ke aapan murda apne gaaṛe deo, lekin tum jaay ke Parmeshwar ke raaj ke baare meñ parchaar karo.”
Tab koi dusra Yeeshu se bolis, “E Prabhu, ham to tumhaar pichchhe chalega, lekin pahile jaay ke ham aapan ghar ke sab log se bida le lei.”
Yeeshu usse bolis, “Jon koi aapan haath hal pe rakh ke aur pichchhe taake hei, u Parmeshwar ke raaj ke laayk nai hei.”
Baad meñ Prabhu bahattar (72) aur admi log ke chunis aur dui dui karke u sab ṭaaun meñ usse aage bhejis jahañ uske jaay ke raha.
Yeeshu ulog se bolis, “Khet meñ bahut jaada fasal hei, lekin bahut kamti majuur log hei. Yahi kaaran khet ke maalik se bolo, ki u kaaṭe ke waaste majuur bheje.
Ab jaao, lekin yaad rakhna, ham tumme bheṛiya log ke beech meñ bheṛa ke bachcha ke rakam bhejta hei.
Aapan sañghe naa to aapan pes, naa to juuta, aur naa beg leke jaana, aur rasta bhar koi ke namaste bhi nai karna.
Jab bhi koi ghar meñ jaana, to pahile bolna, “I ghar meñ saanti rahe.”
Agar huañ koi saanti se rahat hoi, to tumhaar saanti uspe rahi nai to u tumhaar lage lauṭ aai.
Wahi palwaar meñ rahna, wahiñ khaana aur peena jon ulog tumme dei, kaahe ke naukar ke talab to mile ke chaahi. Ek ghar se dusra ghar nai ghuumna.
Jab tum koi ṭaaun meñ jaayga, aur ulog tumhaar welkam kari, aur kuchh khaay ke dei to khaay lena.
Huañ ke bimaar log ke achchha karna aur bolna, “Parmeshwar ke raaj tumhaar nagichche aay gais.”
Lekin agar u ṭaaun ke log tumhaar welkam nai kari, to rasta pe jaay ke bolna,
“Ham sab tumhaar ṭaaun ke garda jon hamaar goṛ meñ lag gais hei, hiañ pe jhaaṛta hei. Lekin yaad rakkho Parmeshwar ke raaj tumhaar nagichche aay gais hei.”
Ham tumme bataata hei jon roj nyaay kara jaai, u roj Prabhu u ṭaaun ke dasa Sodom ke dasa se bhi kharaab kar dei.

E Khuraazin! Aur Bethseida ke log! Tum pe haay! Jon chamatkaari kaam tumhaar sañghe bhais hei, agar u sab Taaya (Tyre) aur Seida meñ kara jaata, to huañ ke log bahut pahile Parmeshwar se maafi maañg leta. Ulog basta ke kapṛa pahin ke aur raakhi pe beiṭh ke, i dekhaatin ki ulog paap se dukhi hei.
Lekin nyaay ke roj Parmeshwar, Taaya (Tyre) aur Seida ke log pe tum se jaada daya dehkaai.
E Kafarnahuum ke log, kaa tum sochta hei ki swarag meñ tumme aadar mili! Kabhi nai, tum to narak jaruur jaayga.
Jon koi bhi tumhaar sune hei, u hamaar bhi sune hei. Jon koi tumme ‘Nai’ apnaay hei, u hamme bhi “Nai’ apnaay. Aur jon bhi hamme ‘Nai’ apnaai, u jon hamme bhejis hei, uske bhi ‘Nai’ apnaai.
Jab u bahattar (72) log lauṭin, to ulog bahut khusi rahin. Ulog bolin, “E Prabhu, tumhaar naam se to dushṭ aatma bhi hamaar baat maanat rahin!”
Yeeshu ulog se bolis, “Ham saitaan ke, bijli ke rakam swarag se girte dekha hei.
Ham tum log ke saañp aur bichchhu ke kachre ke aur tumhaar dusman, saitaan ke taagat ke uppar hak dia hei. Tumme kuchh haani nai hoy sake hei.
Lekin isse khusi nai hona, ki dushṭ aatma tumhaar bas meñ hei. Lekin i kaaran khusi hona ki tumhaar naam swarag meñ likha gais hei!”

Wahi ṭaaim, Yeeshu u khusi jon Pawitr Aatma ke bagal se aais raha, usse bhar gais, aur bolis, “E Pita, swarag aur dharti ke Prabhu, ham tumme dhanbaad deta hei, ki tum i sab baat paṛha likha aur samajhdaar log se chhipaay ke rakkha, aur saadhaaran log ke saamne laaya. Haañ Pita ji, yahi tumme achchha laga.

Hamaar Pita hamme sab kuchh de dees hei, aur wahi hei jon laṛka ke jaane hei. Aur Pita ke bhi khali laṛka jaane hei. Aur laṛka aapan baap ke baare meñ bataay maañge hei, ki jisse sab koi uske baare meñ jaane sake.”
Tab Yeeshu aapan chela log ke bagal ghuum ke chuppe se bolis, “Tum pe aasheesh hei ki jon tum i sab dekhta hei!
Ketna raaja aur nabi log, i sab dekhe aur sune maañgat rahin, jon tum abhi dekha aur suna hei. Lekin ham tum se bataata hei, ki ulog naa to kuchh dekhin aur naa to kuchh sunin.”
Ek Maozas ke kaanuun ke guru uṭh ke Yeeshu se puuchhis, “Guru, ham kon cheej kari ki hamme anant jeewan mile?”
Yeeshu jawaab dees, “Baaibal meñ kon cheej likhaan hei? Tum uske keise samajhe sakta hei?”

U admi jawaab dees, “Baaibal meñ likha hei, ‘Tum aapan Prabhu Parmeshwar se aapan puura man aur jaan se aur aapan puura taagat, aur aapan puura buddhi se prem karo. Aur aapan paṛosi se bhi apne rakam prem karo.’ ”
Yeeshu bolis, “Tum hamme raaiṭ jawaab dia hei. Agar eisehiyeñ karte rahega, tab anant jeewan mil jaai.”
Lekin u admi janaay maañgat raha ki u sab kuchh jaane hei, aur Yeeshu se ek aur sawaal puuchhis, “Hamaar paṛosi kon hei?”

Yeeshu bolis, “Ek admi raha, jon Yarushalam se Jeriko jaat raha, rasta meñ uske ḍaaku log gher leen, aur uspe hamla kar deen. Uske kapṛa utaar ke, aur maar peeṭ ke uske adhmara kar ke, wahiñ chhoṛ ke chala gain.
Ek paadri wahi rasta se jaat raha, lekin jab u choṭaan admi ke dekhis, tab u dusra bagal se chala gais.
Wahi rakam ek Levi bhi wahi rasta se aais, aur u choṭaan admi ke dekhis aur u bagal se chala gais.
Tab ek Saamri jon ghuume nikra raha, wahi rasta se aais, aur u choṭaan admi ke dekh ke daya karis.
Aur uske lage aay ke uske ghaao pe tel aur waain ḍaar ke uske marham paṭṭi karis, aur gadha pe beiṭhaay ke ek hoṭel le gais, aur wahiñ uske dekh bhaal karis.
Dusra roj sabere u hoṭel ke maalik ke dui chaañdi ke sikka deke bolis, “Iske dekh bhaal karna aur jab ham lauṭ ke aayga, tab jetna bacha kucha rahi ham sab bhar dega.” ’
Tab Yeeshu puuchhis, “I teeno meñ se kon uske paṛosi hei, jon ke ḍaaku log maar ke choṭ pahuñchaain raha?”
U ṭeecha jawaab dees, “Wahi jon uspe taras khaais raha.” Yeeshu bolis, “Jaao, aur eisehiyeñ karo!”
Yeeshu aur uske chela log jaate jaate ek gaaoñ pahuñchin, aur huañ pe Maatha naam ke ek aurat ulog ke welkam karis aur ghare le gais.
Maatha ke ek bahini rahi, jiske naam Meri raha, aur jon Prabhu ke goṛ ke lage beiṭh ke uske updes sunat rahi.

Maatha kaam karte karte dukhi hoy gais aur u Yeeshu ke lage jaay ke bolis, “E Prabhu, kaa tumme koi parwaah nai, ki hamaar bahini sab kaam hamaar uppar chhoṛ dees hei? Usse bolo ki u aay ke hamaar madat kare!”
Prabhu jawaab dees, “Maatha, Maatha! Tum bahut baat ke waaste wari karti aur dukhi hoti hei,
lekin ek baat ke jaruuri hei. Meri wahi cheej chunis, jon sab se achchha hei, aur u usse nai chheena jaai.”
Ek roj ek jagha pe Yeeshu preya karat raha, tab uske ek chela usse bolis, “Prabhu, hamme preya kare ke sikhaao wahi rakam jeise Yuhanna aapan chela log ke sikhaais raha.”
Yeeshu usse bolis, “Jab tum preya karo, to bolo, ‘E Pita, madat kar ki tumhaar naam pawitr maana jaay, aay ke aapan raaj banaao.
Hamaar din bhar ke roṭi, hardam hamme dena.
Hamaar paap ke maafi karna, Jeise ham u sab ke maaf karta hei jon hamaar sañghe kharaab karis hei. Aur hamme ṭesṭ meñ nai laana.’ ”
Tab Yeeshu aapan chela log se bolis, Maan lo tum meñ se ek aadha raat ke aapan dost ke lage gay aur bolis, ‘Dost, hamme teen roṭi deo.
Hamaar ek dost hamaar ghare ghuume aais hei, lekin uske khaatir hamaar lage kuchh khaana nai hei!’
Aur maan lo u dost ghar meñ se bole, ‘Hamme tang nai karo! Palla band hei, aur hamaar sab laṛkan aur ham sota hei. Aur ham uṭh ke tumme kuchh nai de sakta.’
U tumhaar dost hei, fir bhi u uṭh ke tumme roṭi nai de hei. Lekin agar tum sarmaayga nai aur fir se usse mañgte rahega, tab u jaruur uṭh ke tumme jetna tum maañgega, otna dei.
Yahi kaaran ham tum se bolta hei, maañgo to tumme mili, khojo to tum paayga, nok karo to tumhaar khaatir khola jaai.
Kaahe ki jon koi maañgi, uske mili, jon khoji, u paai, aur jon nok kari, uske khaatir khola jaai.
Tum meñ se kon eisan baap hei ki jab tumhaar laṛka roṭi maañgi, to tum uske patthar dega, ya machhri maañgi to tum uske saañp dega?
Tum meñ se kon aapan laṛka ke añḍa ke badle bichchhu dei?
Tum kharaab hoy ke bhi aapan laṛkan ke achchha achchha cheej deta hei. To tumhaar swarag ke Pita se, agar koi Pawitr Aatma maañgi to u dewe ke waaste hardam taiyaar rahi.”
Yeeshu ek dushṭ aatma, jon guuñgi rahi, ek admi ke bhittar se nikaaris. Aur jeisehiyeñ u guuñgi aatma nikar gais, u admi baat kare laga, aur huañ pe jon bheeṛ rahis, u sab ekdam hairaan hoy gais.
Lekin kuchh admi log bolin, “I Baalazbul jon dushṭ aatma log ke agua hei, wahi iske sakti de hei ki i dushṭ aatma ke bahire nikaare sake!”
Kuchh aur log bhi Yeeshu ke ṭesṭ kare maañgat rahin. Aur ulog asmaan se ek saain maañgin.

Lekin Yeeshu jaanat raha ki ulog kon cheej soche hei, aur u bolis, “Ek raaj meñ jahañ sab koi ek dusra se jhagaṛe hei, u raaj ke naas hoy jaai. Aur ek ghar meñ jahañ jhagṛa hoy hei, uske bhi naas hoi.
Agar saitaan apne meñ jhagṛa kare, to uske raaj keise chali? Tum log bolta hei ki ham Baalazbul ke sahaara se dushṭ aatma ke nikaarta hei.
Agar ham Baalazbul ke sahaara se dushṭ aatma ke nikaarta hei, tab jon sab tumhaar pichchhe chale hei, u sab kiske sahaara se dushṭ aatma ke nikaare hei? Ulog bhi tum se yahi jaane maañgi.
Lekin agar ham Parmeshwar ke taagat se dushṭ aatma nikaarta hei, to Parmeshwar ke raaj tumhaar lage aay gais hei.
Agar ek tagṛa admi apne aap hatiaar leke aapan ghar ke rakhwaali kare, to uske ghar baar bacha rahi.
Lekin agar ek usse bhi tagṛa admi aay ke uske haraay de, tab u wahi hatiaar jon pe ghar waala ke bharosa raha, sab leke chala jaai. Aur fir u luuṭmaari ke sab cheej baaṭ dei.
Jon hamaar sañghe nai hei, u hamaar agaiñsṭ hei. Agar tum hamaar sañghe anaaj nai baṭorta, tab tum uske chhitraata hei.”
“Jab ek dushṭ aatma ek admi meñ se nikre hei, tab u araam kare ke waaste ek jagha khoje hei. Aur jab uske weisan jagha nai mile hei, tab u bole hei, ‘Ham wahiñ lauṭ jaayga jahañ se ham nikra hei.” ’
Jab u huañ lauṭe hei, tab u ghar ke safa aur sab kuchh ṭheek ṭhaak dekhe hei,
aur tab u jaay ke apne se kharaab saat aur dushṭ aatma ke bolaay le hei, aur ghar meñ ghus jaay hei aur wahiñ rahe lage hei. Ab to u ghar ke admi ke dasa to pahile se bhi aur kharaab hoy jaay hei.
Jab Yeeshu baat karat raha, to bheeṛ meñ se ek aurat bol paṛi, “Khus kismat hei u aurat jon tumme peida karke baṛa karis hei!”
Lekin Yeeshu bolis, “I sach hei, lekin ulog khush kismat hei jon Parmeshwar ke vachan sune hei aur uspe chale hei!”
Jeise jeise bheeṛ jaada hote raha, Yeeshu aage bolte raha, “I jamaana ke log bahut kharaab hei, tum sab khali saain khojta hei, aur ilog ke to khali Jona ke saain ke chhoṛ ke aur koi saain nai mili.
Jeise Jona, Ninweh ke log ke khaatir ek saain raha, wahi rakam Manush ke laṛka bhi i jamaana ke log ke waaste saain hoi.

Jab nyaay ke roj aai, tab saauth ke raani, Sheeba, i jamaana ke log ke beech meñ khaṛi hoy ke ulog pe dos lagaai, kaahe ke u bahut duur se Soloman ke gyaan ke baat sune aais hei, lekin hiañ to u hei jon Soloman se bhi baṛa hei.
Ninweh ke log bhi tumhaar sañghe khaṛa hoy ke tum pe dos lagaai, kaahe ke ulog Jona ke updes sun ke apne aap ke badlin, lekin hiañ to u hei jon Jona se bhi baṛa hei.”
“Koi bhi batti jaraay ke pyaala ke nichche ya kahiñ aur chhipaay ke nai rakkhe hei, lekin uske aur uppar ke jagha pe rakkhe hei ki jisse jon koi bhi ghar meñ aai u laaiṭ dekhi.

Tumhaar aañkhi tumhaar deñhi ke roshni hei. Jab tumhaar aañkhi ṭheek hei, tab tumhaar deñhi roshni se bhara hei. Lekin agar tumhaar aañkhi achchha nai hei, tab tumhaar deñhi meñ bhi añdhera bhar jaay hei.
To shua rahna ki tumhaar jon roshni hei, u añdhera nai hoy jaay.
Jab tumhaar deñhi meñ roshni hei, tab koi bhi bhaag añdhera nai rahi, sab bagal khali añjora hee añjora rahi, wahi rakam jeise jab batti bara rahe hei, tab sab bagal añjora rahe hei”
Jab Yeeshu sab bol lees, tab ek Farisi uske aapan ghare khaana pe bolaais. Yeeshu jaay ke khaana khaay beiṭhis.
U Farisi hairaan rahe gais, jab dekhis ki khaana khaay se pahile Yeeshu aapan haath nai dhois.
Lekin Prabhu Yeeshu usse bolis, “E Farisi log, tum to bartan aur pyaala bahire se dhoy deta hei, lekin bhittar se to tum laalchi, aur dushṭ hei.
Tum muurakh log! Kaa Parmeshwar duuno bahire aur bhittar nai banaais?
Lekin, jon bhi kuchh tumhaar lage hei, agar gareeb meñ baaṭ dega, to jon bhi kuchh tum karega usse Parmeshwar khusi rahi.

“Lekin E Farisi log! Tum pe haay! Tum pudeena, sudaab aur sab rakam ke masaala ke daswa bhaag to de deta hei, lekin tum log dhoka deta hei aur Parmeshwar se pyaar nai karta. Tum sab ke ek rakam dekho aur sab pe daya karo, aur aapan daswa hissa bhi deo.”
“E Farisi log! Afsos hei tumpe! Chech meñ tum sab se aage waala kursi mañgta hei, aur mañgta hei ki bajaar meñ sab koi tumme haath joṛ ke namaste kare.
Tumhaar waaste i ketna kharaab hei! Tum sab to ulog ke rakam hei, jon bina jaane kabar ke uppar se chal de hei.”
Ek Maozas ke kaanuun pe chale waala bolis, “E guru, eise baat bol ke to tum hamaar apmaan karta hei!”
Yeeshu jawaab dees, “Tum kaanuun maane waala log pe bhi bahut afsos hei! Kaahe ke tum, sab pe khuub bojha laad deta hei, aur madat kare ke waaste ek uñgri bhi nai uṭhaata.
Tum sach much museebat meñ hei. Kaahe ke tum u nabi log ke waaste kabar banaaya hei, jon ke tumhaar baap daada log hatya kar deen raha.
Tum sab sochta hei ki tum raaiṭ kaam karta hei, nai to tum ulog ke waaste kabar nai banaata jon ke tumhaar baap daada maar ḍaaris raha.”
Yahi sab tumhaar kharaab kaam ke kaaran, Parmeshwar ke buddhi bolis, “Ham tumhaar lage nabi aur chela log ke bhejega. Aur tum usman se kuchh ke to hatya kar dega aur baaki ke sataayga.
Yahi kaaran abhi tak jetna nabi ke khuun, dunia ke suru hoy se bhais hei, uske saja ab sab log ke mili.
Isman Aibal se le ke Zekraaya ke khuun tak ke saja mila hei, jon ke hatya Parmeshwar ke ghar meñ bedi ke beech meñ bhais raha. Tum sab to jaruur iske saja bhuktega.”
“Tum kaanuun ke guru log ke khaatir ketna dukh ke baat hei! Tum to gyaan ke chaabhi apnaay lia hei, lekin bhittar khud nai jaata hei aur jon jaay maañge hei, uske bhi rokta hei.”
Jab Yeeshu huañ se jaay waala raha, tab Farisi aur ṭeecha log uske saja de ke soche lagin. Ulog Yeeshu se bahut cheej ke sawaal jawaab karin,
ki jisse ulog uske fasaay sake aur ulṭa baat pe pakaṛ le.

Jab ki hajaar meñ log Yeeshu ke agal bagal jama hoy gain, hiañ tak ki dhakkam dhukka aur ek dusra ke uppar girat paṛat rahin, tab Yeeshu sab se pahile aapan chela log se bolis, “Farisi log ke jhuuṭa parchaar se bach ke rahna. Ulog to yahi rakam ke log ke beokuuf banaay hei.
Jon kuchh bhi lukaan hei u saamne aai, aur sab seekraṭ bhi saamne aai.
Jon kuchh bhi tum añdhera meñ bolega u sab ujaala meñ sunaai dei, aur jon bhi tum band ruum meñ fusfusaayga, u chhat pe se parchaar kara jaai.”
“E dost, ham tum sab se bataata hei, log se nai ḍarna. Ulog tumme maar dei, lekin uske baad, ulog aur kuchh nai kare sake hei.
Khali Parmeshwar hei jisse, tumme ḍare ke hei. U khali tumhaar jaan nai lei, lekin u tumme narak meñ bhi feke sake hei. Yahi khaatir khali Parmeshwar hei jisse tum ḍaro!”
“Kaa paañch chiṛia khali dui peisa meñ nai bikaay hei? Lekin Parmeshwar usman se ek ke bhi nai bhulaay hei.
Hiañ tak ki tumhaar muuṛ ke ek ek baar bhi gina gais hei. Yahi khaatir, nai ḍaro! Tum to bahut chiṛia se bhi jaada keemti hei!”
“Agar tum sab ke bataayga ki tum hamaar hei, tab Manush ke laṛka, Parmeshwar ke ainjals se bataai ki tum sab hamaar pichchhe chalta hei.
Lekin agar tum log manush ke saamne hamme nai apnaayga, tab tum log bhi Parmeshwar ke ainjal ke saamne nai apnaawa jaayga.
Agar tum Manush ke laṛka ke agaiñsṭ baat karega, tab tum maaf kar dewa jaayga, lekin agar tum Pawitr Aatma ke agaiñsṭ baat karega, tab tum maaf nai kara jaayga.”
“Jab tumme ofisa log ke saamne laawa jaai, tab tum chinta nai karna ki tum aapan bachaao meñ kaa bolega.
Kaahe ke Pawitr Aatma tumme wahi ṭaaim bataai ki tumme kon cheej bole ke hei.”
Bheeṛ meñ se ek admi Yeeshu se bolis, “Guru, hamaar bhaiya se bolo ki u hamaar sheya, jon hamaar bappa ham log ke khaatir chhoṛ gais raha, hamme de de.”
Yeeshu usse bolis, “Hamme kon u adhikaar dees hei ki ham tum log ke jaj bani aur sheya baaṭi?”
Tab Yeeshu ulog se bolis, “Saaodhaan raho, aur laalach se apne aap ke bachaao, kaahe ke koi ke jeewan uske dhan daulat se baṛa nai hoy hei.”
Aur Tab Yeeshu i kahaani sunaais, Ek dhani admi ke khet meñ khuub fasal bhais,
aur u aapan man meñ sochis, “Ham kon cheej kari? Hamaar lage to i sab rakkhe ke etna baṛa jagha nai hei.”
Baad meñ u bolis, “Ham janta hei ki hamme kon cheej kare ke hei. Ham aapan i godaam tuuṛ ke aur baṛa godaam wahiñ pe banaayga, aur wahi meñ ham aapan sab anaaj aur baaki cheej bhi rakkhega.
Aur tab ham apne aap se bolega, ‘Tum aapan waaste bahut saal ke khaatir cheej baṭor lia hei. Ab jio! Khaao, pio, aur mauj masti karo!’
Lekin Parmeshwar usse bolis, ‘Beokuuf! Tum aaj raat ke mar jaayga. Tab jon sab cheej tum baṭora hei u kiske hoi?” ’
“Eisane u admi hei jon aapan waaste peisa baṭore hei, lekin Parmeshwar ke najar meñ dhani nai hei.”
Tab Yeeshu aapan chela log se bolis, “Ham tum log se bataata hei ki aapan jeewan ke waaste wari nai karo! I nai socho ki tum kon cheej khaayga aur kon cheej pahinega.
Khaana aur kapṛa se kahiñ jaada baṛh ke jeewan hei.

Kaua ke dekho! Ulog naa to kuchh bowe hei aur naa to kaaṭe hei, aur ulog ke lage rakkhe ke waaste jagha bhi nai hei. Lekin Parmeshwar u sab ke dekh bhaal kare hei! Aur tum to i chiṛia se jaada keemti hei!
Tum log meñ se kon hei jon wari kare se aapan jeewan lamba kare lei?.
Agar tum chhoṭa chhoṭa kaam nai kare sakta tab aur baat ke wari kaahe karta?
Dekho keise jañgli fuul fulaay hei! Ulog mehnat kar ke aapan kapṛa nai banaay hei. Aur i bhi sun lo, Soloman bhi aapan sab peisa se, i fuul ke rakam kapṛa nai pahine sakis.
Parmeshwar to jañgli graas ke bhi jon aaj hei aur kal aagi meñ feñk dewa jaai, u sab ke sundar sundar kapṛa pahinaay hei, to tumme kaahe nai pahinaai? Tumhaar biswaas ketna chhoṭa hei!
Wari nai karo ki kaa khaay ke hei aur kaa piye ke hei.
Khali wahi log jon Parmeshwar ke nai jaane hei, i sab cheej ke khaatir wari kari. Tumhaar Pita jaane hei ki tumme kaa chaahi.
Khali Parmeshwar ke raaj ke khojte raho, aur baaki sab kuchh tumme mil jaai.
“E hamaar chhoṭa chela log ke jhunḍ, ḍaro nai! Tumhaar Pita tumme raaj de maañge hei.

Jon kuchh bhi tumhaar lage hei, u sab bech ke aur gareeb meñ baaṭ deo. Aapan waaste eisan pes banaao jon kabhi faṭi nai, iske matlab hei ki swarag meñ eisan dhan baṭoro, jahañ naa to koi choraay sake hei aur naa to usman koi kirwa paṛe sake hei.
Tumhaar dil wahiñ laga rahi jahañ tumhaar khajaana hei.”
“Hardam taiyaar raho aur aapan batti baare raho,
ṭheek u naukar log ke rakam jon aapan maalik ke saadi meñ se lauṭe tak waiṭ kara kare hei. Jeise u aay ke nok kare hei, naukar wahi lage palla khol de hei.

U naukar log ketna khush naseeb hei, jon ke maalik lauṭe pe ulog ke jagte aur taiyaar paay hei! Ham tum se bataata hei ki u maalik aapan koṭ utaar ke aur aapan naukar ke beiṭhaay ke khaana khawaai aur sewa kari.
U naukar log khush naseeb hei jon ke maalik ulog ke taiyaar paay hei, chaahe u aadha raat ke aay ya dusra roj sabere!
I yaad rakhna ki agar ghar ke maalik janta ki kab chor aai, tab u aapan ghar meñ chori nai hoy deta.
Yahi kaaran hardam taiyaar raho, kaahe ke koi nai jaane hei ki Manush ke laṛka kab aai.”
Tab Peeṭa bolis, “E Prabhu, i kahaani khali tum ham se bataata hei, ki sab log se?”
Prabhu jawaab dees, “Eisan laayk aur samajhdaar naukar kon hei? I wahi hei jon ke maalik aapan sab naukar ke uppar ke leeḍa banaay hei ki u sab log ke ṭaaim se bhojan paani dei.
Khush naseeb hei u naukar jiske maalik jab lauṭe to uske weisaiyeñ karte paay!
Ham tum se bataata hei ki maalik eisan naukar ke aapan puura kaarbaar sambhaale ke de dei.
Lekin agar u naukar aapan man meñ i baat soche, ki uske maalik ke lauṭe meñ deri hei, aur baaki naukar ke maare peeṭe, aur apne khaay piye meñ laga rahe aur nasa meñ hoy jaay.

Aur eise hoi ki maalik wahi roj lauṭi jon roj uske koi waiṭ nai karat hoi, aur tab kaa hoi, uske maalik uske kaṛa se kaṛa saja deke bahire ulog ke sañghe chhoṛ dei jon pe bharosa nai kara jaay sake hei.
Agar naukar log u kaam kare ke taiyaar nai rahe hei, jon ulog ke maalik chaahe hei, tab ulog ke bahut maar lagi.

Lekin u naukar jon nai jaane ki ulog ke maalik kon cheej maañge hei, aur maar khaay ke kaam kare hei, to ulog ke kamti maar paṛi. Jon ke sab se jaada dewa gais hei, usse jaada maañga jaai, aur jon ke bahut jaada dewa gais hei, usse to aur jaada maañga jaai.”
“Ham dharti pe aagi lagaay aaya hei, aur yahi mañgta hei ki u jaldi se sulag jaay!
Hamme to abhi ek baptisma lewe ke hei, aur jab tak u hoy nai jaai, hamme bahut dukh sahe ke paṛi!
Kaa tum samajhta hei ki ham hiañ mel karaay aaya hei? Nai, ham to alag kare aaya hei.
Kaahe ki ab se jon ghar meñ paañch log hei, ulog meñ aksar jhagṛa hote rahi, teen ke agaiñsṭ dui, aur dui ke agaiñsṭ teen.
Sab ek dusra ke agaiñsṭ rahiyeñ, baap, beṭa ke aur beṭa, baap ke. Maañ, beṭi ke aur beṭi, maañ ke. Saas, bahu ke aur bahu, saas ke.”
Yeeshu bheeṛ se bolis, “Jab tum wesṭ se baadar aate dekhta hei, tab tum bolta hei, ‘Paani barsi,’ aur barse bhi hei.
Jab saauth se hawa chale hei, tab tum bolta hei, ‘Bahut jaada garam paṛi,’ aur weisaiyeñ hoy hei.
E muurakh log! Tum dharti aur asmaan dekh ke bataay sakta hei ki kaa hoy waala hei, lekin tum i nai janta ki abhi kaa hoy waala hei?”
“Kaahe nai tum apne aap samajh jaata hei ki kon raaiṭ cheej kare ke hei?

Jab koi tum pe dos lagaay hei, koṭ jaay se pahile uske hal kar leo. Agar tum eise nai kara to jaj ke aage ghaseeṭa jaayga. Aur tab jaj tumme jel ke adhikaari ke de dei, huañ tumme jel meñ band kar dewa jaai.
Tum huañ se nai chhuuṭ paayga jab tak ek ek senṭ nai chukaay dega.”
Wahi ṭaaim Yeeshu ke bataawa gais ki Paaylaṭ kuchh Galeeli log ke marwaais raha jab ulog balidaan chaṛhaay gain raha.
Yeeshu jawaab dees, “Kaa tum samajhta hei ki ilog jon maara gain raha, u baaki Galeeli log se jaada paapi rahin, aur yahi kaaran u sab ke i dasa bhais raha?
Hargiz nai! Lekin tumme ham bataata hei ki agar tum nai pastaayga, to tum sab bhi maara jaayga.

U aṭhaara (18) log ke sañghe kon cheej bhais raha, jon log ke uppar Shiloh ke ṭaawa (tower) gira aur u sab dab ke mar gain. Kaa tum samajhta hei ki ulog Yarushalam meñ rahe waala log se jaada kharaab log rahin?
Hargiz nai! Lekin jab tak tum nai pastaayga, tum sab bhi yahi rakam naas hoy jaayga.”
Yeeshu ulog ke i kahaani sunaais, “Ek admi ke ek añguur ke khet raha aur usman ek anjeer ke peṛ bhi bois raha. Ek roj u admi usman se anjeer khoje gais, lekin uske ek bhi nai mila.
Tab u gaaḍna ke bolaay ke bolis, ‘Ham teen saal se i anjeer ke peṛ meñ fal khojte raha, lekin ek bhi nai mila. Iske kaaṭ ḍaaro! Khaahe ke jhuuṭṭe ke i jagha ghere hei?’
Gaaḍna jawaab dees, ‘Maalik, i saal iske aur rahe deo, ham iske chaaro taraf khod ke khaad ḍaarega.
Aay waala saal agar isman fal nai lagi to jaruur ham iske kaaṭ dega.’ ”
Ek sabat ke roj Yeeshu ek Yahuudi ke parchaar kare waala jagha pe parchaar karat raha.
Wahiñ pe ek aurat rahi jon ke aṭhaara saal se dushṭ aatma bimaar rakkhis raha, uske kamar ṭehṛa hoy gais raha aur u koi rakam se seedha nai hoy sakat rahi.
Jab Yeeshu uske dekhis, tab aapan lage bolaay ke usse bolis, “E aurat, tum ab aapan bimaari se achchhi hoy gayi hei.”
U aurat ke uppar haath rakkhis, aur wahi lage u seedha khaṛi hoy gais aur Parmeshwar ke baṛaai kare lagis.

Huañ ke jon dekh bhaal karat raha, u Yeeshu pe bahut gussa bhais, kaahe ke u sabat ke roj koi ke achchha karis raha. Aur tab u sab log se bolis, “Ek hapta meñ chhe roj hoy hei jab hamme kaam kare ke rahe hei. Aur wahi ṭaaim aay ke aapan bimaari dekhaao, sabat ke roj nai.”
Prabhu tab jawaab dees, “Tum log kon ke bahkaay mañgta hei? Kaa tum meñ se koi aapan beil ya gadha ke khol ke sabat ke roj paani piaay nai le jaata hei?
I aurat jon Abraham ke gharaane ke hei, saitaan iske aṭhaara saal tak jakaṛ ke rakkhe raha. Kaa sabat ke roj iske bañdhan se mukti nai mile sake?”
Yeeshu ke jawaab se sab dusman log sarmaay gain. Lekin aur jon log huañ rahin, u sab khusi bhain i dekh ke ki Yeeshu keisan keisan kaam kare hei.
Yeeshu tab bolis, “Parmeshwar ke raaj keisan hei? Uske ham kis se tulna kari?
U eisan hei ki jab koi ek raai ke daana le jaay ke gaaḍan meñ boy de hei. Daana jame hei aur ek baṛa peṛ hoy jaay hei, aur chiṛia usman aapan ghosla banaay hei.”
Yeeshu fir se bolis, “Parmeshwar ke raaj ke tulna ham kisse kari?
I eisan hei ki jab ek aurat aaṭa ke tisra hissa meñ yeesṭ milaay hei. Aur thoṛa deri meñ sab aaṭa fuul ke ḍher hoy jaay hei.”
Yeeshu, nagar nagar, gaaoñ gaaoñ parchaar karte karte, Yarushalam ke bagal chala jaat raha.
Tab koi usse puuchhis, “E Prabhu, kaa khali thoṛa log hee bache saki?” Yeeshu jawaab dees,
“Patra palla se bhittar jaay ke kosis karo! Ham tum log se bataata hei ki bahut log patra palla se bhittar jaay ke kosis kari lekin jaay nai paai.

Jab ghar ke maalik uṭh ke ghar ke palla band kar de hei aur tum bahire khaṛa hoy ke palla nok karta hei, ‘E Swaami, hamaar waaste palla khol deo!’ Tab u boli, 'Ham tumme nai janta! tum kahañ se aaya hei.’
Tab tum bolega, ‘Ham to tumhaar sañghe khaaya pia, aur tum to hamaar ṭaaun meñ parchaar kara!”
Lekin u boli, ‘Ham to tumme sachche ke nai janta hei! E dushṭ log! Ham se duur hoy jaao!’
Tab tum daañt peesega aur royga kaahe ke tum Parmeshwar ke raaj meñ Abraham, Aayzak, Jaykab aur sab nabi ke dekhega, jab tum log ke bahire feka jaai.
Aur tab log eesṭ aur wesṭ, noth aur saauth se aay ke Parmeshwar ke raaj meñ bhojan kari.
Aur dekhna, jon pichchhe hei, u aage hoy jaai, aur jon koi aage hei u sab pichchhe rahe jaai.”
Ṭheek wahi ṭaaim kuchh Farisi aay ke Yeeshu se bolin, “Hiañ se chala jaao, kaahe ke Heraḍ tumme maare maañge hei.”
Yeeshu ulog se bolis, “U lomṛi se jaay ke bolo, ‘Ham aaj aur kal dushṭ aatma ke nikaarta hei aur bimaar log ke achchha karta hei aur tisra roj hamaar kaam khalaas hoy jaai.’
Lekin hamme aaj, kal aur parso jaruur jaay ke hei. Kaahe ke i hoy nai sake ki koi nabi Yarushalam ke bahire maara jaai.”

“E Yarushalam! E Yarushalam! Tumhaar log to nabi log ke maar deen hei aur jon jon tumhaar lage bheja gain hei, ulog ke patthar se maarin hei! Ketna dafe ham mañgta raha ki jeise murgi aapan bachcha ke aapan pañkha ke nichche lukaay le hei, wahi rakam tumhaar bachchan ke saathe ham bhi kari.
Dekho, ab tumhaar Mandir ujaaṛa jaai, aur tum hamme u ṭaaim tak nai dekhega jab tak i nai bolega, ‘Ki dhann hei u jon Prabhu ke naam se aay hei!”
Ek sabat ke roj, jab Yeeshu ek khaas Farisi ke ghare khaana khaay gais raha, tab uske bagal sab log dhyaan se dekhat rahin.
Aur achaanak huañ pe ek admi aais jiske haath aur goṛ fuula raha.
Yeeshu, Farisi log aur ruuls banaay waala baṛkua log se puuchhis, “Kaa i ṭheek hei ki sabat ke roj koi ke changa kara jaay?”
Lekin ulog chuppe rahin aur kuchh nai bolin. Yeeshu u bimaar admi ke haath pakṛis aur uske ṭheek kar ke ghare bhej dees.
Tab Yeeshu ulog se puuchhis, “Agar tum meñ se koi ke bul ya laṛka kuaañ meñ gir jaay tab kaa tum uske wahiñ chhoṛ dega kaahe ki u sabat ke roj hei, aur uske wahi lage bahire nai nikaarega?”
Ulog ke paas koi jawaab nai raha.
Jab Yeeshu dekhis ki kon rakam pahuna log aapan aapan waaste achchha achchha jagha khoje hei, tab u ulog se bataais,
“Jab tumme koi saadi meñ bulaay hei, tab sab se achchha jagha pe nai beiṭhna, kaahe ke ulog shaayd tum se bhi baṛa koi aur ke bhi bulaain hoi.
Aur fir ghar waala tum se aay ke boli, “Aapan jagha iske de deo, kaahe ki i tum se baṛa hei.” Tab tumme sarmaay ke dusra jagha beiṭhe ke paṛi.

Lekin agar tumme saadi meñ bulaawa jaay aur tum jaay ke pichchhe jagha khoj ke beiṭha, aur gharwaala aay ke tum se boli, “Dost, hiañ nai lekin i aage waala kursi pe beiṭho.” Tab tumhaar aadar sab ke saamne hoi.
Kaahe ki agar koi samjhe ki u sab se baṛa hei, tab uske nichche kara jaai, aur jon apne aap ke chhoṭa samjhe hei, uske baṛa kara jaai.”

Tab Yeeshu, jon uske bulaais raha, usse bolis, “Agar tum koi ke khaana pe bolaata hei, to aapan dost, bhaiya, saga palwaar, ya dhani log ke nai bolaana, kahiñ eise nai hoy jaay ki ulog bhi tumme badle meñ bolaay le aur jon cheej tum ulog ke sañghe kara hei u tumme lauṭaay de.
Lekin jab tumme koi ke khaana pe bolaay ke hei, to gareeb, langṛa luula, aur añdha log ke bolaao.
Tumme aasheesh mili kaahe ki ulog tumme lauṭaay ke nai bolaai, lekin uske badle meñ jab uske log jinda hoy jaai, tab uske fal tumme mili.”
Tab uske sañghe khaana khaaywaala ek mehmaan usse bolis, “Ulog ketna khush kismat hei jon Parmeshwar ke raaj meñ khaana khaai!”
Yeeshu usse bolis, “Ek dafe ek admi ek baṛa paaṭi rakkhis, aur usman bahut log ke bolaais.
Jab sab khaana taiyaar hoy gais, tab aapan naukar ke bolaay ke u bolis ki sab pahuna log se jaay ke bolo, ‘Aao, khaana taiyaar hei.’ ”
Lekin sab ke sab bahaana banaay lagin. Ek to bolis, 'Ham ek khet khareeda hei, hamme jaay ke uske dekhe ke hei. Hamme maaf kar deo, ham nai aay paayga.’
Dusra bolis, ‘Ham aaj paañch joṛi bul khareeda hei, hamme u sab ke traay ke hei. Hamme maaf kar dena, ham nai aay paayga.’
Ek aur bolis, “Ham aaj saadi kara, yahi kaaran ham nai aay sakta.”

Naukar aay ke aapan maalik se sab baat bataais. Aur tab ghar ke maalik gussaay ke naukar se bolis, “Ṭaaun ke kona kona meñ jaay ke jetna langṛa luula, añdha aur gareeb log mile, u sab ke jaldi se hiañ le aao.”
Aur jab naukar lauṭis, tab maalik se bolis, ‘Maalik, jeise tum ham se bola raha, weisaiyeñ ham kara, lekin abhi bhi aur log ke waaste bahut jagha hei.’
Tab maalik bolis, “Jaao aur rasta rasta, kona kona chhaan leo, jon koi bhi mile, ulog ke jabran le aao, ki jisse hamaar ghar puura ke puura bhar jaay.
Ham tum se bolta hei ki jiske ham pahile bolaaya raha, usman se koi ek bhi hamaar khaana nai cheekhi!’ ”
Aur jab, ek baṛa bheeṛ Yeeshu ke sañghe chalat raha to u ghuum ke ulog se bolis,
“Agar koi hamaar pichchhe aay maañge hei, lekin aapan amma bappa, aurat aur laṛkan, bhaiya-bahini aur hiañ tak ki aapan jaan se bahut prem kare hei, to u hamaar chela nai bane sake hei.
Agar koi aapan kros uṭhaay ke hamaar pichchhe nai chali, to hamaar chela nai bane saki.
Maan leo, tum ek mahal banaay mañgta hei. To sab se pahile tum kaa karega? Kaa tum beiṭh ke hisaab kitaab nai karega ki ketna kharcha beiṭhi?
Nai to jab tum faaunḍeishan ḍaar dega aur fir uske puura nai kar paayga, to sab log tum pe hasi.
Ulog boli, ‘I admi mahal banaay ke suru to karis, lekin puura nai kare paais.’
Kaa koi eisan raaja hei jon laṛaai kare jaai aur pahile beiṭh ke sallaah nai kari ki uske lage khali das hajaar saulja hei, aur uske dusman ke lage bees hajaar, tab hamla keise kara jaai?
Agar uske hamla kare ke taagat nai hei to u duur khaṛa hoy ke aapan duut bheji, aur saanti aur mel ke baat cheet kari.
Yahi rakam, tum meñ se koi hamaar chela nai bane sake hei jab tak tum aapan sab kuchh chhoṛ nai deo.’ ”
“Neemak to achchha hei, lekin agar uske sawaad chala jaay, to kon cheej se sawaad kara jaai?
Ab to u naa to khaad ke kaam aay sake aur naa to maṭṭi ke, khali uske bahire feka jaay hei. Agar tumhaar lage kaan hei aur tum sune sakta hei, to suno!”
Ek roj ṭeks baṭore waala aur paapi log Yeeshu Maseeh ke lage uske sune ke waaste aain.
Farisi aur Maozas ke kaanuun ke ṭeecha log bhunbhunaay lagin aur bolin, “I admi to paapi log ke sañghe mile hei aur wahi log ke sañghe khaay piye hei!”
Tab Yeeshu ulog ke i kahaani sunaais,

“Agar tumhaar lage ek sao bheṛa rahta aur usman se ek heraay jaay, to tum kaa karta? Kaa tum u naainṭinaain ke khula meidaan meñ chhoṛ ke u ek jon heraay gais hei, uske jab tak mil nai jaay, nai khojta?
Aur jab u mil jaay to uske tum aapan kañdha pe uṭhaay ke khusi se,
ghare laay ke aapan dost aur paṛosi ke bolaay ke bolta hei, ‘Khusi manaao! Kaahe ke hamaar jon bheṛa heraay gais raha, u mil gais hei.’

Ham tumme bataata hei ki yahi rakam ek man firaay waala paapi ke waaste swarag meñ bhi bahut khusi manaawa jaai, jab ek paapi u sao meñ se Parmeshwar ke bagal ghuumi aur naainṭinaain achchha log ke ghuume ke nai jaruurat hei.”

Aur tab Yeeshu ulog ke ek aur kahaani sunaais, “U aurat kon cheej kari jis ke lage das chaañdi ke sikka hei, aur usman se ek heraay jaay. Kaa u batti baar ke aur jhaaṛu lagaay ke tab tak nai khoji jab tak uske u mil nai jaai?
Aur jab mil jaai tab aapan dost ke bolaay ke boli, 'Aao hamaar sañghe khusi manaao, kaahe ke ham jon sikka heraay dia raha, u ab mil gais hei.’
Yeeshu fir se bolis, “Yahi rakam Parmeshwar ke ainjals bhi khusi manaai, jab ek paapi aapan paap se pastaai.”
Yeeshu ulog se ek aur kahaani bataais, “Ek admi ke dui laṛka rahin.

Usman se jon chhoṭa raha, u aapan bappa ke lage aay ke bolis, “E bappa, jon hamaar hissa ke peisa hei, u hamme de deo.” Aur uske bappa weisaiyeñ karis. Jetna peisa raha, duuno meñ aadha aadha baaṭ dees.
Aur tab thoṛa roj meñ chhoṭa laṛka aapan hissa leke pardes chala gais, aur huañ puura peisa bekaar kaam meñ luṭaay dees.
U aapan puura peisa khalaas kar dees, aur wahi ṭaaim u des meñ akaal paṛ gais, aur u kangaal hoy gay.
Aur tab u jaay ke wahiñ ek admi ke ghare kaam kare laga, u admi uske khet meñ suar charaay ke waaste bhejis.
U bahut bhuuka raha, aur suar ke khaana khaay maañgat raha, uske koi khaana dewe ke taiyaar nai raha.
Aakhiri meñ u aapan hosh meñ aais aur bolis, ‘Hamaar bappa ke ketna naukar hei aur ulog ke peṭ bhar ke khaana mile hei, aur ham hiañ bhukke marta hei!
Ham aapan bappa ke lage jaayga aur usse bolega, ‘E bappa, hamme maaf kar deo. Ham tumhaar aur Parmeshwar ke agaiñsṭ paap kara hei.
Ab ham tumhaar laṛka bolaay ke kaabil nai hei, hamme ab ek naukar samajh ke rakh leo.’ ”

Aur wahi lage u uṭh ke aapan bappa ke ghare jaay laga. Lekin jab u ghar se kuchh duur pe raha ki uske bappa uske aate dekh lees aur uske uspe taras aay gais, aur dauṛ ke aapan laṛka ke gale lagaais aur chumma le lees.
U laṛka bolis, “E bappa, ham to tumhaar aur Parmeshwar ke agaiñsṭ paap kara hei, aur ab ham tumhaar laṛka bolaay laayk nai hei.”
Lekin uske bappa aapan naukar se bolis, “Jaldi se achchha achchha kapṛa laao, aur iske pahinaao. Iske haath meñ chhalla aur goṛ meñ juuta pahinaao,
aur jaldi se ek moṭa waala bachhṛa maaro aur pakaao, aur ham sab khaay ke khusi manaayga!
Kaahe ke i jon hamaar laṛka mar gais raha, ab jinda hoy gais hei aur heraay gais raha, ab mil gais hei.” Aur sab khusi manaay lagin.
Etne meñ uske baṛa laṛka, jon khet meñ kaam karat raha, ghare lauṭis, aur gaana bajaana aur naache ke awaaj sunis.
U ek naukar ke bolaay ke puuchhis, “I kaa hoy hei?”
Naukar bolis, “Tumhaar chhoṭa bhaiya lauṭ aais hei, aur yahi khaatir jab tumhaar bappa uske bhala changa dekhis, to khusi hoy ke sab se moṭa bachhṛa kaṭwaais hei.”
Aur tab u baṛa bhaiya gussaay gais aur ghar ke bhittar nai jaay maañgis. Ispe uske bappa bahire aay ke baṛa laṛka ke bhittar chale ke chirauri kare laga.

Lekin u aapan bappa se bolis, “Ham etna saal se tumhaar sewa karte raha, aur tumhaar ek baat bhi nai ṭaala, lekin tum aaj tak hamme ek bakri ke bachcha bhi nai dia ki ham aapan yaar dost ke bolaay ke paaṭi kari.
Aur tumhaar i laṛka jon tumhaar sab peisa veshya pe luṭaay dees, aur ab tum uske khaatir ek moṭa bachhṛa kaṭwaaya!”
Uske bappa bolis, “Hamaar beṭa, tum to hardam hamaar sañghe hei, aur jon kuchh hamaar hei u tumhaar to hei.
Lekin hamme khusi manaay ke chaahi kaahe ke i jon tumhaar bhaiya hei, i mar gais raha, aur ab jinda hoy gais hei, heraay gais raha, ab mil gais hei.”
Yeeshu aapan chela log se bolis, Ek dhani admi ke ek meneja raha, jon uske kaam ke dekh bhaal karat raha. Lekin koi aay ke dhani admi ke bataais ki meneja uske peisa khuub uṛaay hei.
Dhani admi uske bolaay ke bolis, “I ham tumhaar baare meñ kaa sunta hei? Hamme bataao ki tum kon cheej kara hei! Ab tum hamaar meneja nai rahe sakta.”
Ab u meneja aapan man meñ sochis, “Ab ham kon cheej karega, hamaar maalik to hamme kaam se nikaare hei. Ham to mohṛhi bhi nai khode sakta, aur bheek maañge ke saram lage hei.
Ham samajh gaya ki hamme kaa kare ke chaahi ki jisse hamaar kaam bhi nai chhuuṭi aur sab koi aapan ghar meñ hamme ijjat se bolaai.”
Aur tab u ek ek karke aapan maalik ke sab karajdaar ke bolaais aur sab se pahila admi se puuchhis, “Tum hamaar maalik ke ketna karja hei?”
U admi bolis, “Ek sao leeṭa tel.” Meneja usse bolis, “I aapan bil leo aur beiṭh ke jaldi se isman ‘pachaas (50) ’ likho.”
Tab u dusra admi se puuchhis, “Tumhaar ketna karja hei?” U bolis, “Ek hajaar basta geñhu,” “I tumhaar hisaab hei, isman ‘aaṭh sao’ likho.”

Aur tab uske maalik u dhokebaaj meneja ke khuub baṛaai karis, kaahe ke u chalaaki se kaam nikaar lees raha, kaahe ke i ṭaaim ke log eisan bartaao kare hei ki jon roshni meñ kaam kare hei, ulog se bhi jaada chalaak rahe hei.
Ham tum se bolta hei, “Chalaaki ke peisa se aapan dost to banaay lega. Lekin jab u khalaas hoy jaai, tab tum anant jeewan meñ bulaay lia jaayga.

Jon koi ke chhoṭa chhoṭa baat pe biswaas kara jaay sake hei, u baṛa baat pe biswaas ke laayk hei. Aur jon pe chhoṭa baat ke biswaas nai kara jaay sake hei, tab u baṛa baat pe bhi biswaas kare laayk nai hoi.
Agar tumme paap ke dhan pe biswaas nai kara jaay sake hei to tumme kon sachcha dhan saupi?
Agar tum dusra ke dhan pe biswaas kare ke laayk nai hei, to jon tumhaar hei u tumme kaahe ke koi dei?”
“Tum dui maalik ke naukar nai hoy sakta hei. Tum ek ke dusra se jaada chaahega ya ek ke nai laaik karega aur dusra se jaada prem karega. Tum Parmeshwar aur peisa ke ek sañghe nai sewa kare sakta.”
Farisi log bahut jaada peisa se pyaar karat rahin. Aur jab ulog sunin ki Yeeshu kaa bole hei, to uske khilli uṛaay lagin.

Yeeshu ulog se bolis, “Tumahi log hei jon apne aap ke bahut achchha samajhta hei, lekin Parmeshwar tum sab ke dil ke baare meñ jaane hei. U sab jon admi ke khaatir bahut mahañga hei, Parmeshwar ke saamne bahut sasta hei.”
“Yuhanna baptisma de waala ke ṭaaim tak, Maozas ke kaanuun aur nabi log Parmeshwar ke raaj ke baare meñ susamaachaar parchaar karin raha aur, sab koi jabarjasti usman ghuse maañge hei.
Asmaan aur jameen heraay jaay sake hei, lekin Maozas ke kaanuun se ek chhoṭa baat bhi nai heraay sake hei.
Jon admi aapan aurat ke chhoṛ ke dusra aurat se saadi kar le hei, u byabhichaar kare hei. Aur jon u aurat se saadi kare hei jon ke admi uske chhoṛ dees hei, u bhi byabhichaar (aḍalṭri) kare hei.”
Ek dhani admi raha jon hardam mahañga kapṛa pahinat raha, aur hardam chamak dhamak aur bahut sukh se rahat raha.
Dusra bagal Laazras naam ke ek bahut gareeb admi, jon ghaao se bhara raha, aur u dhani admi ke faaṭak pe hardam chhoṛa jaat raha,
ki jisse u aapan peṭ, jon u dhani admi ke ṭaibal se tukṛa gire, wahi se bhar le. Aur khali yahi nai, kutta bhi uske ghaao ke chaaṭa karat rahin.
Eisan bhais ki jon kangaal admi raha, u mar gais aur ainjals aay ke uske Abraham ke godi meñ pahuñchaay dees. U dhani admi bhi mara aur uske maṭṭi de dewa gais.
U dhani admi narak gais, aur bahut peeṛa sahis, aur aapan aañkhi uṭhaais to dekhis ki u kangaal Laazras Abraham ke godi meñ hei.
Tab u dhani admi jor se Abraham se bolis, “Ham pe daya karo! Laazras ke bhejo ki u aapan uñgri paani meñ bhijaay ke hamaar jeebh ke ṭhañḍa kare, kaahe ke ham to i aagi meñ taṛapta hei!”

Lekin Abraham bolis, “Yaad karo beṭa, tum aapan laaif meñ bahut sukh uṭhaaya, tumhaar lage sab achchha cheej raha aur Laazras ke lage sab kharaab cheej raha, lekin ab i to saanti paais hei aur tum taṛapta hei.
Iske chhoṛ ke tumhaar aur hamaar beech meñ ek gahira gaḍḍha hei, agar hiañ se koi u paar jaay maañge to nai jaay sake hei, aur huañ se koi hiañ aay maañge to nai aay sake.”
Tab u dhani admi bolis, “E Abraham, hamaar pita, ham binti karta hei ki Laazras ke hamaar bappa ke ghare bhejo,
kaahe ke hamaar lage paañch bhaiya hei, ulog ke chetaaoni de ke hei, kahiñ eise nai hoy ki ulog bhi i narak meñ aay jaai.”
Abraham bolis, “Tumhaar bhaiya log ke lage Maozas aur baaki nabi ke buks hei, ulog uske suni.”
Dhani admi bolis, “E Pita Abraham, etna bas nai hei. Agar murda se lauṭ ke koi ulog ke lage jaay, tabahi ulog badli.”
Lekin Abraham bolis, “Agar ulog Maozas aur nabi ke nai suni, to jon murda se lauṭ ke jaai, uske bhi nai maani.”
Yeeshu aapan chela log se bolis, “Hardam kuchh naa kuchh rahi jon log ke paap kare ke kaaran hoy sake hei, aur jon i karaay hei, uspe afsos hei!
Yahi achchha hota agar uske gaṭai meñ ek baṛa patthar baañdh ke aur uske samundar meñ giraay dewa jaay, ki jisse u chhoṭa log se paap nai karwaay.
Yahi kaaran saaodhaan raho. “Agar tumhaar bhaiya paap kare hei to uske ḍaaṭo, aur agar u pastaay hei to uske maaf kar deo.
Agar u ek roj meñ saat dafe tumhaar agaiñsṭ paap kare aur fir aay ke saato dafe tum se maafi maañge aur bole, ‘Ham pastaata hei,’ to tum uske maaf kar deo.”
Tab chela log Yeeshu se bolis, “Ham log ke biswaas majbuut banaao!”
Yeeshu jawaab dees, “Agar tumhaar biswaas sarso ke daana ke baraabar hota, aur tum malbari ke peṛ se bolta, ‘Jaṛ se ukhaṛ ke jaao aur samundar meñ lag jaao,’ to u tumhaar baat maan leta.
Tum meñ se kon hei ki jab tumhaar naukar jon khet jote hei aur bheṛa charaay hei, aur jab u khet se lauṭ ke aay, to u usse boli, ‘Jaao jaldi se khaana khaay leo?’
Nai, tum i nai bolega. Tum bolega ‘Hamaar khaana banaao, aur jab tak ham khaai pee, tab tak tum hamaar sewa karo, tab tum khaay pee lena.’
Kaa ek naukar ke uske maalik uske sewa kare ke khaatir dhanbaad nai de sake hei?
Aur yahi rakam tum bhi jab u sab kaam kar leta hei, jon tumme dewa gais hei tab bolo, ‘Ham to wahi maamuli kaam kara jon hamme kare ke raha.’ ”
Jab Yeeshu Yarushalam ke taraf jaat raha, tab Saamria aur Galeel ke beech se hoy ke nikris.
Aur ek gaaoñ meñ gais, to thoṛa duur pe khaṛa das koṛhi uske milin.
Ulog chillaay ke bolin, “E Yeeshu, E Swaami, ham pe daya karo!”
Yeeshu ulog ke bagal dekh ke bolis, “Jaao aur apne aap ke paadri ke dekhaao.” Aur eise bhais ki rasta meñ jaate jaate ulog ṭheek hoy gain.
Aur jab usman se ek dekhis ki u achchha hoy gais hei, tab bahut jor se chillaay ke Parmeshwar ke baṛaai karte lauṭ aais.
U muh ke bal Yeeshu ke goṛ pe gir paṛis aur uske bahut dhanbaad dees. U admi ek Saamri raha.
Is pe Yeeshu puuchhis, “Kaa das admi achchha nai bhain raha? To u nao admi kahañ hei?
Kaahe ke khali ekke pardesi Parmeshwar ke dhanbaad de ke waaste lauṭ ke aais hei?”
Tab Yeeshu u admi se bolis, “Uṭho aur jaao, tumhaar biswaas tumme achchha kar dees hei.”
Kuchh Farisi Yeeshu se puuchhin ki Parmeshwar ke raaj kab aai. Yeeshu ulog ke jawaab dees, “Jab Parmeshwar ke raaj aai tab dekhaai nai dei.
Koi nai boli, ‘Dekho u hiañ hei! Ya huañ hei!’ Kaahe ke Parmeshwar ke raaj tumhaar beech meñ hei.”
Yeeshu aapan chela log se bolis, “U ṭaaim aai jab tum Manush ke laṛka ke roj dekhe ke maañgega, lekin dekhe nai paayga.
Log tum se boli, ‘Huañ dekho!’ ‘Hiañ dekho!’ U ṭaaim tum chala nai jaana aur ulog ke pichchhe bhi nai bhagna.
Manush ke laṛka ke roj, u rakam rahi jeise asmaan meñ ek bagal se dusra bagal tak bijli chamke hei.
Lekin pahile to, uske bahut dukh uṭhaay ke hei, aur i jamaana ke sab log uske rijekṭ kar dei.
Jab Manush ke laṛka aai, tab jeise Noa ke roj raha, weisaiyeñ rahi.
Log u roj tak khaat piyat rahin, saadi byaah karat rahin, jon roj tak Noa jahaaj meñ nai gais. Tab ek baṛa baaṛh aais aur sab kuchh naas hoy gais.
Loṭ ke ṭaaim meñ bhi eisehiyeñ bhais raha. Sab koi khaawat piyat, len den karat, peṛ paudha lagaawat aur ghar baar banaawat rahin.
Lekin jon roj Loṭ, Sadom se nikar gais, wahi roj asmaan se aagi aur flaims giris aur sab ke naas kar dees.
Jon roj Manush ke laṛka saamne aai, u roj bhi ṭheek eisehiyeñ hoi.”
“U roj jon chhat pe rahi aur ulog ke cheej ghar ke bhittar rahe jaai, to uske lewe ke waaste nichche nai utarna, aur yahi rakam jon khet meñ rahi, ulog ke ghar nai lauṭe ke chaahi.
Loṭ ke aurat ke yaad karna.
Jon koi bhi aapan jaan bachaay ke kosis kari, u uske khoy dei, aur jon aapan jaan suru meñ khoi, u uske bachaay lei.
Ham tum se bataata hei u raat ke dui jane ek chaṭaai pe rahi, ek ke le lewa jaai aur dusra ke chhoṛ dewa jaai.
Dui aurat ekke jagha pe chakki peesat hoi, ek ke le lewa jaai aur dusri ke chhoṛ dewa jaai.
Dui admi khet meñ hoi, ek ke le lewa jaai aur dusra ke chhoṛ dewa jaai.”
Tab chela log Yeeshu se puuchhis, “E Prabhu, i sab kahañ hoi?” Yeeshu bolis, “Jon jagha laash rahi huañ geedaṛ to jaruur rahi.”
Yeeshu aapan chela log ke ek kahaani bataais ki keise ulog hardam bina niraas hoy, preya karte rahin,
“Ek ṭaaun meñ ek jaj raha, jon Parmeshwar se bhi nai ḍarat raha aur naa to koi admi ke parwaah karat raha.
Wahi ṭaaun meñ ek bidhwa bhi rahat rahi jon uske lage roj roj aay ke bolat rahi, “Hamaar nyaay karo aur hamaar dusman se hamme bachaao!”
Kuchh ṭaaim tak to u jaj uske nai sunis. Lekin aakhri meñ haar maan ke aapan man meñ sochis, ‘Ham to Parmeshwar se nai ḍarta hei aur naa to koi ke parwaah karta hei.
Fir bhi bhale i bidhwa hamme roj roj tang kare hei, ham iske nyaay jaruur karega, nai to i hamaar naak meñ dam kar dei.’ ”
Prabhu bolis, “U kruk jaj kaa bolis, suno!
To fir Parmeshwar jiske u apne chunis hei, kaa uske nyaay nai kari jon raat din uske bolaate rahe hei? Kaa u ulog ke khaatir deri lagaai?
U jaruur jaldi kari aur ulog ke madat kari. Lekin jab Manush ke laṛka aai to kaa u dharti pe koi biswaasi ke paai?”
Yeeshu kuchh log ke kahaani sunaais, jon sochat rahin ki ulog dusra se achchha hei aur baaki log ulog se nichche hei.
“Ek dafe dui admi Mandir meñ preya kare gain, usman se ek Farisi aur dusra ṭeks baṭore waala raha.

Farisi khaṛa hoy ke aapan man meñ preya kare laga, “E Parmeshwar, ham tumme dhanbaad deta hei ki ham dusra log ke rakam ṭhaggu, ya peṭṭu aur byabhichaar kare waala nai hei, aur naa to i ṭeks baṭore waala ke rakam hei.
Ham to ek hapta meñ dui dafe upwaas rakhta hei aur jon kuchh hamme mile hei uske daswa hissa tumme de deta hei.’
Lekin ṭeks baṭorewaala duur khaṛa hoy ke asmaan ke taraf bhi nai dekhis, aur aapan chhaati peeṭ peeṭ ke bolis, ‘E Parmeshwar, ham paapi pe daya karo!’

Tab Yeeshu bolis, ‘Jab duuno admi ghare gain, tab ṭeks baṭorewaala naa ki Farisi, Parmeshwar ke najar meñ achchha admi maana gais. Kaahe ke jon koi apne aap ke baṛa banaay hei, wahi chhoṭa kara jaai, aur jon koi apne aap ke chhoṭa kare hei, uske baṛa banaawa jaai.’ ”
Kuchh log to aapan laṛkan ke bhi Yeeshu ke lage laay lagin ki jisse u laṛkan pe aapan haath rakkhe, lekin jab chela log i dekhin to sab ke ḍaaṭe lagin!
Lekin Yeeshu u bachcha log ke aapan lage bolaay ke bolis, “Bachcha log ke hamaar lage aay deo, aur ulog ke roko nai, kaahe ke Parmeshwar ke raaj eisane log ke hei.
Ham tum se sachche bolta hei! Jon koi Parmeshwar ke raaj bachcha log ke rakam nai apnaay hei, ulog uske raaj meñ kabhi nai jaay saki.”
Ek khaas admi Yeeshu se puuchhis, “E achchha guru, ham kaa kari ki hamme anant jeewan mili?”
Yeeshu usse bolis, “Tum hamme kaahe ke achchha bolta hei? Khali Parmeshwar achchha hei.
Tum kaanuun to janta hei, ‘Byabhichaar nai karna. Hatya nai karna. Chori nai karna. Dusra ke waaste jhuuṭa gawaahi nai dena. Aapan maiya aur bappa ke aadar karna.”
U admi tab bolis, “Ham to chhoṭa se i sab kaanuun maanta hei.”

Jab Yeeshu i sunis, tab bolis, “Abhi bhi tumme ek cheej kare ke bacha hei. Sab kuchh jon tumhaar lage hei, u sab bech ke gareeb meñ baaṭ deo, aur tab tumhaar khaatir swarag meñ bahut dhan hoi. Aur fir aay ke hamaar pichchhe chalo.”
Lekin i sab sun ke u bahut soch meñ paṛ gais, kaahe ke u bahut dhani admi raha.
Yeeshu jab dekhis ki u ketna udaas hoy gay hei, tab bolis, “Dhani log ke Parmeshwar ke raaj meñ aay ke waaste bahut kaṛa baat hei!
Usse sahaj to i hei ki ek uuñṭ, ek sui ke naake meñ se eezi se nikar jaai, lekin i nai hoy sake hei ki ek dhani admi Parmeshwar ke raaj meñ jaay saki.”
Jab bheeṛ i baat sunin, ulog puuchhin, “Tab keise koi bache saki?”
Yeeshu bolis, “Jon cheej admi log nai kare sake, u Parmeshwar kare sake hei.”
Tab Peeṭa bolis, “Dekho, ham bhi to sab kuchh chhoṛ ke tumhaar pichchhe chal paṛa.”

Yeeshu bolis, “Ham tumme sachche bataata hei eisan koi nai hei, jon aapan ghar, aurat, bhaiya-bahini, maiya-bappa aur laṛkan bachchan Parmeshwar ke khaatir chhoṛe hei, i ṭaaim uske laaif meñ bahut kuchh mili. Lekin aage chal ke wahi log ke anant jeewan bhi mili.”
Tab Yeeshu aapan baarah chela log ke alge le jaay ke bolis, “Suno! Ham log ab Yarushalam jaata hei. Jon bhi kuchh Manush ke laṛka ke baare meñ nabi log likhin raha, u sab ab puura hoi.
U ab geir Yahuudi ke haath meñ de dewa jaai aur uske bahut apmaan hoi. Uske sañghe log kharaab kharaab harkat kari aur uspe thuuki bhi.
Uske bahut jaada peeṭe ke baad uske maar dei, lekin tisra roj u jinda hoy jaai.”
Lekin i sab baat u chela log nai samajhe sakin, ki Yeeshu kaa bole hei. U jon bhi kuchh bolis raha, u gupt ruup meñ raha, aur ilog ke samajh meñ nai aais.
Jab Yeeshu Jeriko ke nagichche pahuñchis, tab wahiñ pe ek añdha, rasta ke kinaare beiṭha bheek maañgat raha.
Jab u añdha bheeṛ ke chale ke awaaj sunis, tab puuchhe lagis, “I sab kaa hoy hei?”
Log uske bataais, “Naasrat ke Yeeshu jaay hei.”
Tab u añdha jor se chillaay ke bolis, “E Yeeshu, Ḍeiviḍ ke laṛka, ham pe daya karo!”
Jon log rasta pe aage aage jaat rahin, ulog añdha ke ḍaaṭin aur bolin ki u chuppe hoy jaay. Lekin u añdha kaahe ke chuppe rahe, u aur jor se chillaais, “Ḍeiviḍ ke laṛka, ham pe daya karo!”
Yeeshu ruk gais aur hukum dees ki u admi uske lage laawa jaay, aur jab u nagichche aay gais, tab puuchhis,
“Tumhaar waaste ham kon cheej kare sakta hei?” Añdha bolis, “E Prabhu, yahi ki ham fir se dekhe lagi.”
Yeeshu usse bolis, “Tab dekho! Tumhaar biswaas tumme ṭheek kar dees hei.”
Aur wahi lage u añdha dekhe laga aur Parmeshwar ke baṛaai karte Yeeshu ke pichchhe pichchhe chal paṛis. Aur jab sab log dekhis to Parmeshwar ke baṛaai kare lagin.
Jeriko se hoy ke Yeeshu jaat raha.
Huañ pe Zekias naam ke ek ṭeks baṭore waala log ke leeḍa raha, aur u bahut dhani admi raha.
U Yeeshu ke dekhe maañgat raha, lekin bheeṛ bahut raha aur u bauna raha. Yahi kaaran u Yeeshu ke nai dekhe paat raha.
U jaldi se dauṛ ke ek gular ke peṛ pe chaṛh gais, kaahe ke Yeeshu wahi rasta se jaata.
Jab Yeeshu u jagha pe pahuñchis, tab uppar dekh ke bolis, “Zekias, jaldi nichche aao, kaahe ke hamme aaj tumhaar ghare rahe ke hei.”
Khusi khusi, Zekias wahi lage nichche aay gais aur Yeeshu ke aapan sañghe aapan ghare le gais.
Jon log i sab dekhis, to baṛbaṛaay lagin aur bolin, “I admi to ek paapi hei aur Yeeshu yahi ke ghare jaay hei!”
Tab Zekias khaṛa hoy ke Yeeshu se bolis, “Prabhu, dekho ham aapan aadha propaṭi gareeb meñ baaṭ dega aur agar ham koi se bhi anyaay kar ke kuchh lia hoyga, to ham ulog ke chaar guna lauṭaay dega.”
Tab Yeeshu Zekias se bolis, “Aaj i ghar meñ mukti aais hei, kaahe ke i admi bhi Abraham ke laṛka hei.
Lekin Manush ke laṛka to eisan log ke khoj ke mukti dewaay ke waaste aais hei.”

Jab bheeṛ Yeeshu ke baat sunat rahin, to Yeeshu ulog ke ek kahaani bataais kaahe ki u sab Yarushalam ke nagichche pahuñch gain raha, aur log soche lagin ki Parmeshwar ke raaj aay ke ṭaaim hoy gay hei.
Yeeshu tab bolis, Ek raaj kumaar raha aur ek dafe u ek duur des gais ki raaja ban ke fir lauṭe.
Jaay se pahile u aapan das naukar ke bolaais aur ek ek ke kuchh peisa dees aur bolis, “Hamaar lauṭe tak is se kamaai karna.”
Lekin huañ ke log uske haiṭ karat rahin, aur ulog ek duut ke uske pichchhe bhejis aur bataain ki jaay ke sab log ke bataao ki, “Ham sab nai mañgta ki i admi ham pe raaj kare.”
Aur jab u raaja ban ke lauṭis tab u aapan das naukar ke bolaais, jiske u peisa dees raha, ki jisse u pata lagaay sake ki uske peisa se ketna kamaais hei.
Sab se pahila naukar aay ke bolis, “E swaami, tumhaar peisa se ham das guna aur jaada kamaay lia hei.”
Raaja bolis, “Saabaas, hamaar achchha naukar, tum to chhoṭa chhoṭa kaam meñ bharosa ke laayk hei. Ham tumme das ṭaaun ke bos banaayga.”
Fir dusra naukar aay ke bataais, “E swaami, tumhaar peisa se ham paañch guna aur kamaaya.”
Raaja bolis, “Tum paañch ṭaaun ke bos bano.”
Ek aur naukar aay ke bolis, “Swaami, dekho i tumhaar peisa hei, ham iske rumaal meñ baañdh ke sambhaal ke rakkha raha.
Ham to tum se bahut ḍarta hei, kaahe ke tum bahut kaṛa admi hei. Jon cheej tum nai rakhta hei, uske uṭhaay leta hei, aur jon tum nai boya, wahi jaay ke kaaṭ leta hei.”
Raaja bolis, “E bekaar naukar! Tum jon sab hamme bola wahi tum pe laagu hei! Tum to janta hei ki ham kaṛa admi hei, aur jon ham nai rakhta, uske uṭhaay leta hei aur jon nai boya, wahi kaaṭ leta hei.
Tum hamaar peisa kaahe nai benk meñ rakkha ki ham aapan peisa byaaj sahit le leta?”
Jon log huañ khaṛa raha usse bolis, “Isse u sab peisa le leo aur uske de deo jiske lage das guna hei.”
Lekin ulog usse bolin, “Swaami, uske lage to das guna hei!”
Raaja jawaab dees, “Jiske lage hei uske aur mili. Lekin jiske lage nai hei, usse u bhi le lewa jaai jon uske lage hei.
Ab hamaar dusman log ke leke aao, jon hamme nai maañgat rahin ki ham u sab ke raaja bani. Hamaar saamne ulog ke jaan se maar ḍaaro!”
Jab Yeeshu sab baat bol dees, tab sab ke aage aage Yarushalam ke bagal chalis.
Jab u Beitfage aur Bethani meñ u pahaaṛ jis ke naam ‘Jaituun’ raha, uske lage aais, tab aapan chela log meñ se dui ke aage i bol ke bhej dees.
“Saamne waala gaaoñ meñ jaao. Huañ pahuñchte tumme ek gadhi ke bachcha bañdha mili, u bachcha pe abhi tak koi bhi sawaar nai karis. Uske khol ke hamaar lage le aao.
Agar koi tum se puuchhi, ‘Iske kaahe kholta?’ to bolna, ‘Prabhu ke iske jaruurat hei.” ’
Uske chela log jaay ke weisaiyeñ paain jeise Yeeshu bataais raha,
Jab ulog gadhi ke bachcha ke kholat rahin, tab uske maalik aay gais aur puuchhis, “Tum log i bachcha ke kaahe ke kholta hei?”
Ulog jawaab deen, “Prabhu ke iske jaruurat hei.”
Aur tab u bachcha ke Yeeshu ke lage le gain, aur uske uppar aapan kapṛa bichhaay ke Yeeshu ke us pe beiṭhaay deen.
Aur jab u jaay laga, tab huañ ke log aapan aapan kapṛa rasta pe bichhaay lagin.

Jab Yeeshu Jaituun pahaaṛ se nichche utre laga to huañ pe jon chela log ke bheeṛ raha ek sañghe jor se chillaay ke Parmeshwar ke baṛaai kare lagin, kaahe ke ulog sab chamatkaari kaam dekhin raha jon Yeeshu karis raha.
