“Dhann hei u raaja jon Prabhu ke naam se aay hei. Swarag meñ saanti hoy aur asmaan meñ. Prabhu ke mahima hoy.”
Bheeṛ meñ se kuchh Farisi Yeeshu se bolin, “E guru, aapan chela log ke ḍaaṭo!”
Lekin Yeeshu bolis, “Agar ilog chup hoy jaai to patthar chillaay lagi.”
Aur jab Yeeshu Yarushalam ke nagichche pahuñch gais, tab u jagha dekh ke roy dees,
aur u bolis, “Kaa achchha hota ki tum, khali tum, aaj ke roj saanti ke baat janta. Lekin ab u tumhaar aañkhi se sab chhipaan hei.
Lekin, ṭaaim aai ki jab tumhaar dusman tumme chaaro bagal se gher lei aur tumme dabaay dei.
Aur tab ulog tumme aur tumhaar laṛkan ke maṭṭi meñ milaay dei. Ek patthar pe patthar khaṛa nai rahe saki. I eise hoi kaahe ke tum u ṭaaim ke nai pahichaana jab tum pe daya kara jaat raha.”
Tab Yeeshu Mandir meñ gais aur biznes kare waalan ke bahire nikaare laga, aur bolis,
“Baaibal meñ likhaan hei, ‘Hamaar ghar preya ke ghar rahi,’ lekin tum log to iske ḍaaku ke aḍḍa banaay dia!”
Sab roj Yeeshu Mandir meñ parchaar karat raha, lekin huañ ke baṛa paadri aur paṛha likha log ke mukhia uske maare ke waaste kosis kare lagin.
Lekin ulog ke koi bhi mauka nai milat raha ki Yeeshu ke naas kare, kaahe ke sab log uske baat dhyaan se sunat rahin.
Ek roj Yeeshu Maseeh Mandir meñ susamaachaar ke baare meñ bataat raha aur parchaar karat raha, tab huañ ke baṛa paadri aur paṛha likha log aapan sañghe des ke jaana maana admi ke sañghe aay ke,
Yeeshu se sawaal kare lagin, “Kiske hukum se tum i kaam karta hei? Aur u kon hei jon tumme hukum dees hei?”
Tab Yeeshu jawaab dees, “Ham bhi tum se ek sawaal puuchhega. Tum hamme bataao,
Yuhanna ke kon baptisma dees raha? Kaa swarag se hukum mila raha ki admi log ke bagal se?”
Is ke baare meñ u sab apne meñ baat cheet kare lagin, “Agar ham bolega ‘Swarag se’, to u boli, tab tum sab uspe biswaas kaahe nai kara.
Lekin agar ham bolega, ki ‘Admi log ke bagal se’ to sab koi ham log ke patthar se maari, kaahe ke sab jaane hei ki Yuhanna ek nabi hei.”
Tab ulog jawaab dees, “Ham nai janta ki kiske bagal se u hukum mila raha.”
Tab Yeeshu bolis, “Ham bhi tumme nai bataay sakta ki i kaam kare ke hamme kon hukum dees hei.”
Tab Yeeshu ulog ke ek kahaani sunaais, “Ek dafe ek admi añguur ke khet boy ke, kisaan ke kiraaya pe de dees aur apne duur des ghuume chala gay.
Jab fasal kaaṭe ke ṭaaim aais, tab u admi aapan ek naukar kisaan ke lage bhejis ki kuchh añguur leke aay jaay. Lekin kisaan log uske maar peeṭ ke khaali haath lauṭaay deen.
Ab maalik ek dusra naukar ke bhejis, lekin kisaan log wahi kaam karin, naukar ke maar peeṭ ke beijjati kar ke khaali haath lauṭaay deen.
Tisra roj wahi rakam maalik tisra naukar ke bhejis, aur kisaan uske bhi maar peeṭ ke nikaar deen.
Tab khet ke maalik bolis, 'Ab ham kaa kari? Ham aapan dulaara laṛka ke bhejega. Ham janta hei ki ulog iske aadar kari!’
Lekin jeise kisaan log u laṛka ke dekhin, aapas meñ baat kare lagin, 'Ek roj yahi khet ke maalik ban jaai. Aao ham log iske maar ḍaari aur i khet ham log ke hoy jaai!’
Ulog u laṛka ke khet se bahire nikaar ke maar ḍaarin. Yeeshu puuchhis, “Tab u khet ke maalik u sab ke kaa kari?
U aay ke sab kisaan ke maar ḍaari aur aapan khet ke dusra kisaan ke de dei.” I baat sun ke sab log bole lagin, “Eise kabhi nai hoy paay!”
Lekin Yeeshu ulog ke bagal dekh ke bolis, “Tab is ke matlab kaa hei jon vachan meñ likha hei, ‘Jon patthar ke kaapenṭa log ṭhukraay deen raha, ab wahi kona ke khaas patthar ban gais hei.’
Jon bhi koi i patthar se ṭakraai, uske ṭukṛa ṭukṛa hoy jaai, aur jon ispe giri u pisaay jaai”
Baṛa paadri log aur paṛha likha log samajh gain ki Yeeshu i kahaani wahi log ke baare meñ bole hei. Ulog to Yeeshu ke wahi lage pakṛaay maañgat rahin lekin huañ jon bheeṛ raha usse ulog ḍarat rahin.
Ab Yeeshu ke dusman mauka khojat rahin. Ulog kuchh jaasuus, jon dharam ke naam pe chalat rahin, huañ bhejin ki Yeeshu ke chhoṭa se galti pe pakaṛ ke aur Romi adhikaari ke haath meñ de de.

Jaasuus log Yeeshu se puuchhin, “E guru, ham sab to janta hei ki tum hardam sachche bolta hei aur raaiṭ baat bataata hei, aur i bhi ki tum kabhi koi ke saaiḍ bhi nai leta, iske sañghe Parmeshwar ke rasta sachchaai se bataata hei.
Hamme bataao, ‘Raaja ke ṭeks dewa jaay ya nai?’ ”
Yeeshu to jaanat raha ki ulog uske fasaay maañge hei.
Tab u bolis, “Hamme ek chaañdi ke sikka dekhaao. Ispe kis ke chhaapa aur naam hei?” “Raaja ke,” ulog bolin.
Tab Yeeshu ulog se bolis, “Tab jon bhi Raaja ke hei, u uske deo. Aur jon Parmeshwar ke hei, u Parmeshwar ke deo.”
Ab to Yeeshu ke dusman bhi uske koi galti nai pakaṛ paain, lekin uske jawaab sun ke hairaan hoy gain aur chuppe rahe gain.
Saduuki log, jon log murda meñ se jinda hoy pe biswaas nai karat rahin, ulog Yeeshu ke lage aain. Aur puuchhin,

“E guru, Maozas to hamaar khaatir likhis hei, ‘Agar ek admi saadi kare aur uske ekko bachcha nai hoy, aur u mar jaay, to u admi ke bhaiya aapan bhaiya ke aurat se saadi kar le ki u aapan bhaiya ke waaste aulaad peida kare.’
Ek dafe saat bhaiya rahin. Pahila bhaiya saadi karis, lekin bina laṛkan ke mar gais.
Dusra bhaiya aapan bidhwa bhauji ke sañghe saadi karis, aur u bhi bina laṛkan ke mar gais.
Tisra ke sañghe bhi yahi bhais. Yahi rakam saato bhaiya bina aulaad ke mar gais.
Aakhri meñ u aurat bhi mar gais.
Aur jab u sab bhaiya fir se jinda hoi, tab u aurat kon ke patni hoi? Kaahe ke saato to uske sañghe saadi karin raha.”
Yeeshu jawaab dees, “I janam ke log saadi byaah kare hei.
Lekin aay waala ṭaaim meñ pichhla janam meñ jon maris raha aur fir se jinda hoy ke laayk hei, ulog meñ saadi byaah nai hoi.
Ulog to ainjals ke rakam rahi jon kabhi nai mare saki. Ulog to Parmeshwar ke santaan hei, kaahe ke ulog mar ke jinda hoy gain hei.
Maozas bhi to i baat ke jare waala jhaaṛi ke kahaani meñ dekhaais raha, hiañ pe u Prabhu ke ‘Abraham ke Parmeshwar, Aayzak ke Parmeshwar aur Jaykab ke Parmeshwar’ bole hei.
U mara log ke nai, lekin jon jinda hei, ulog ke Parmeshwar hei, kaahe ke sab log uske khaatir jinda hei.”
Kuchh log jon Maozas ke kaanuun pe chalat rahin, ulog jawaab deen, “E guru, tum ṭheek bola hei!”
Aur fir iske baad Yeeshu se koi baat puuchhe ke himmat nai karis.
Yeeshu puuchhis, “Log kaahe ke bole hei ki Maseeha, Raaja Ḍeiviḍ ke santaan ke hoi?
Ḍeiviḍ to apne aapan Psalms meñ bole hei, ‘Prabhu hamaar Prabhu se bolis, hamaar raaiṭ saaiḍ beiṭho,
jab tak tumhaar dusman ke tumhaar goṛ tak nai kar dei.
Ḍeiviḍ to khud uske ‘Prabhu’ bole hei. Tab u uske laṛka keise hoy sake hei?”
Jab sab koi sunat rahin aur Yeeshu aapan chela log se bolis,

“Kaanuun ke guru log se saaodhaan rahna, khaas karke ulog se jon lamba lamba kapṛa pahine aur idhar udhar ghuume hei, aur jab ulog maakeṭ aay hei to sab log jhuk ke ulog se namaste kare hei, aur chech meñ ulog ke khaas jagha mile hei, aur paaṭi ke ṭaaim ulog achchha achchha jagha maañge hei.
Wahi log bidhwa ke ghar haṛap le hei aur dekhaawe ke khaatir lamba lamba preya kare hei. Ulog ke to bahut jaada saja mili.”
Yeeshu fir aapan aañkhi uṭhaay ke dekhis ki keise dhani log aapan aapan daan beg meñ chhoṛe hei.
Aur u i bhi dekhis ki ek gareeb bidhwa dui sikka usman chhoṛis hei.
Aur tab Yeeshu bolis, “Ham tum log se sachche bataata hei ki i gareeb bidhwa sab se jaada daan chhoṛis hei.
Kaahe ki sab log aapan bachat meñ se daan dees, lekin i to jon kuchh bhi iske kamaai raha, u sab daan kar dees.”
Jab kuchh log Mandir ke baare meñ baat karat rahin, ki keise u sundar sundar patthar se bana hei, tab Yeeshu bolis,
“Kaa tum i sab patthar ke dekhta hei? Ek ṭaaim aai jab ek bhi aapan jagha pe nai bacha rahi. Sab giraay dewa jaai.”
Kuchh log puuchhin, “Guru ji, i sab baat kab hoi? Aur jab hoi tab hamme keise pata lagi?”

Yeeshu bolis, “Saaodhaan raho, kahiñ tumme koi bahkaay nai de, kaahe ke bahut log hamaar naam se aay ke boli, ‘Ham wahi hei’ aur ‘Ṭaaim aay gais hei’ lekin tum sab saaodhaan rahna, uske pichchhe pichchhe nai chala jaana.”
Jab tum laṛaai aur hañgaama ke charcha sunega, tab ḍar nai jaana, kaahe ke i sab ke hoy ke jaruuri hei, lekin ant wahi ṭaaim nai hoi jaai.”
Tab u bolis, “Ek jaati dusra jaati se, aur ek raaj dusra raaj pe hamla kari.
Bhayaanak erthquaik aai, jagha jagha pe kharaab kharaab bimaari aur akaal paṛi, asmaan pe bhayankar cheej aur baṛa baṛa saain dekhaai.

Lekin i sab baat hoy se pahile hamaar naam ke kaaran tum pakṛaayga aur museebat sahega. Tum sab ke chech meñ le jaay ke tumhaar uppar koṭ kachahri karke tumme saja mili aur jel meñ ḍaara jaai. Aur hamaar kaaran tum log raaja aur hakeem ke saamne laawa jaayga.
Tab yahi ṭaaim tumhaar gawaahi aur dewe ke ṭaaim hoi.
Chinta nai karna ki tum aapan bachaao meñ kaa bolega.
Kaahe ke ham tumme eisan buddhi aur boli de dega ki tumhaar dusman bhi tumhaar saamne tumhaar apmaan nai kare paai.
Aur tumhaar maiya bappa, bhaiya, palwaar, aur dost bhi tumme dhoka deke pakaṛwaai aur tum meñ se ketna log ke marwaay bhi ḍaari.
Hamaar naam ke kaaran tumme kaafi log nai laaik kari.
Fir bhi tumhaar muuṛ ke ek bhi baar naas nai hoi.
Aapan majbuuti se tum bacha rahega.”
Jab tum dekhega ki Yarushalam ke chaaro bagal saulja hei, tab jaan lena ki iske naas hoy waala ṭaaim aay gay hei.
Agar tum Juḍia meñ rahta hei, to pahaaṛ pe bhaag jaao, aur jon ṭaaun ke bhittar rahe hei, ulog bahire nikar jaao, aur jon log gaaoñ meñ rahe hei, ulog ṭaaun meñ nai aana.
I jon saja ke ṭaaim hei yahi sab baat likhaan raha aur ab puura bhi hoi.
I ṭaaim maañ bane waali aurat ke khaatir bahut kharaab rahi, aur jon duudh piaay hei uske khaatir bhi kharaab hoi. Kaahe ke des meñ bahut museebat aai aur bahut log ke Parmeshwar ke saja bhi mili.
Bahut log talwaar se bhi maara jaai aur kaafi log to dusra des bandi banaay ke le jaawa jaai. Yarushalam pe bhi dusra des ke raaj chali, jab tak ki ulog ke ṭaaim puura nai hoy jaai.
“Suuraj, chaañd aur taara meñ rakam rakam ke saain dekhaay lagi. Aur dunia meñ sab jaati ke log meñ sankaṭ aay lagi. Samundar garji aur baṛa baṛa halkora uṭhi, tab sab log ghabraay jaai.
Log i dekh ke ḍar jaai ki dunia meñ kaa hoy hei aur behosh hoy jaai. Asmaan ke sab sakti hilaawa jaai.
Tab Manush ke laṛka dekhaai dei, u baadar meñ se bahut baṛa mahima ke sañghe aai.
Aur jab i sab hoy lagi, tab ḍarna nai, seedha muuṛ uṭhaay ke khaṛa hoy jaana, kaahe ke tab tumhaar mukti nagichche rahi.
Tab Yeeshu ek kahaani sunaais, “Tum anjeer ke peṛ aur dusra peṛ ke dekhega,
jab usman nawa patti nikre lagi, tab tum samajh jaata ki garmi ke mausam aay waala hei.
Aur yahi rakam, jab tum i sab hote dekhega to samajh jaana ki Parmeshwar ke raaj nagichche hei.”
“Yaad rakhna, jab tak i sab baat nai hoi, tab tak i peeṛhi ke ant nai hoi.
Asmaan aur jameen nai rahi, lekin hamaar vachan hardam rahi.”
“Saaodhaan rahna, eise nai hoy ki tum khali khaay piye meñ mast raho, aur jindagi ke chinta meñ daba raho, aur achaanak u roj fanda ke rakam tumhaar uppar aay jaai.
Yahi rakam u roj dunia ke sab log pe bina bataay aay jaai.
Sab ṭaaim saaodhaan rahna, aur preya karte rahna, ki jisse i sab baat se tum bache sako aur Manush ke laṛka ke saamne khaṛa hoy ke tumme himmat rahi.”
Din meñ Yeeshu Maseeh Mandir meñ jaay ke parchaar karat raha, lekin raat meñ u jaay ke Jaituun pahaaṛ pe rahat raha.
Aur sab log sabere uṭh ke uske lage Mandir meñ uske achchha achchha baat sune ke waaste aat rahin.
Ab Akhmeeri (bina yeesṭ ke) roṭi ke teohaar, jon ke fasah bhi bole hei, aay waala raha.
Baṛa paadri aur agua log i taak meñ rahin ki keise Yeeshu ke maara jaay, kaahe ke ulog usse ḍare lagin raha.
Aur tab saitaan Juḍas Iskariyoti meñ ghus gais, jon baarah chela log meñ se ek raha.
Juḍas jaay ke baṛa paadri aur Mandir ke pulis se baatcheet karis ki keise u Yeeshu ke pakaṛwaay sake hei.
Ulog bahut khusi bhain aur Juḍas ke peisa deke khaatir raaji hoy gain.
Juḍas ulog ke baat maan ke achchha mauka khoje laga ki keise u bina koi ke janwaay uske pakaṛwaai.
Akhmeeri roṭi waala teohaar aay gais, aur isman fasah ke bheṛa ke bachcha ke bali chaṛhaay ke raha.
To Yeeshu, Peeṭa aur Yuhanna se bol ke bhejis, “Jaao aur hamaar khaatir fasah ke teohaar ke khaana ke taiyaari karo ki ham sab usman bhaag lei.”
Lekin ulog puuchhin, “Ham kahañ tumhaar khaatir iske taiyaari kari?”
Yeeshu ulog se bolis, “Jeise tum ṭaaun meñ ghusega, tumme ek admi mili jon paani ke ghaṛa liye hoi, uske pichchhe pichchhe tum bhi u ghar meñ chala jaana jisman u jaai.
U ghar ke maalik se bolna, ‘Hamaar guru puuchhe hei ki u aapan chela log ke sañghe kahañ fasah ke khaana khaai?’
Ghar ke maalik tumme uppar le jaai aur baṛa ruum dekhaai jon kaam meñ laay ke waaste taiyaar hei. Wahiñ taiyaari karo.”
Peeṭa aur Yuhanna chala gain. Ulog wahi sab paain jeise Yeeshu bataais raha, aur ulog huañ pe fasah ke bhojan taiyaar karin.
Jab ṭaaim bhais ki Yeeshu aur uske chela log bhojan kare,
tab Yeeshu ulog se bolis, “Hamaar etna dil karat raha ki dukh uṭhaay se pahile ham tum log ke sañghe i fasah ke bhojan kari.
Ham tum se bataata hei ki ham tum log ke sañghe dusra fasah ke bhojan nai karega jab tak Parmeshwar ke raaj puura nai hoy jaai.”
Tab Yeeshu ek pyaala añguur ke ras aapan haath meñ leke, dhanbaad deke bolis, “Iske leo aur aapas meñ baaṭ leo.
Ham tumme bataata hei ki jab tak Parmeshwar ke raaj nai aai, ham waain nai piega.”

Tab u aapan haath meñ roṭi leke, dhanbaad dees, aur uske tuuṛ ke aapan chela log ke dees. Tab u bolis, “I hamaar deñhi hei jon tumhaar waaste dewa jaay hei, iske khaao aur hamme eisehiyeñ yaad karna!”
Jab ulog khaay leen, tab Yeeshu ek dusra pyaala aapan haath meñ lees, aur bolis, “I khuun jon tumhaar waaste bahaaya jaay hei, ek nawa vaacha hei.
Lekin, dekho! Jon hamme dhoka dei, u yahiñ hamaar sañghe ṭaibal pe hei!
Manush ke laṛka to weisaiyeñ mari jeise uske khaatir Parmeshwar maañgat raha, lekin jon uske dhoka se pakaṛwaai, uske khaatir bahut kharaab hei!”
Tab ulog aapas meñ puuchhe lagin ki kon i kaam kari.
Chela log jhagṛa kare lagin ki ulog meñ se kon sab se baṛa hei.
Tab Yeeshu ulog ke bataais, Aur raaja log aapan log pe hukum chalaawe hei, aur shaktishaali neta apne aap ke sab ke dost bataay hei.
Lekin tum eise nai rahna. U jon tum meñ sab se baṛa hei, u sab se chhoṭa bani, aur jon neta hei, u naukar ke rakam rahi.
Baṛa kon hei? Jon khaana khaay hei ki jon khaana baaṭe hei? Kaa wahi jon khaana khaay hei? Lekin ham to tumhaar beech meñ khaana baaṭewaala hei.
Tum sab hamaar sañghe sab museebat meñ raha.
Aur jeise hamaar Pita hamme raaj dees hei, weisaiyeñ ham bhi tumme wahi hak deta hei.
Tum hamaar raaj meñ hamaar sañghe beiṭh ke khaayga aur piega, aur raaj gaddi pe beiṭh ke Israayel ke baarah ṭraaib pe nyaay karega.
Yeeshu bolis, “Saayman, hamaar baat suno! Saitaan i hak maañg lees hei ki tumhaar ṭesṭ le, tum sab ke geñhu ke rakam faṭak ke, aur achchha ke kharaab se alag kar dei.”
Lekin Saayman, ham tumhaar khaatir preya kara hei ki tumhaar biswaas bana rahe. Aur jab tum hamaar lage lauṭ ke aayga, tab aapan bhaiya log ke madat karega.”
Peeṭa bolis, “E Prabhu, ham to tumhaar sañghe jel meñ jaay ke aur mare ke waaste bhi taiyaar hei!”
Yeeshu jawaab dees, “Peeṭa ham tumme bataata hei ki murga ke bole se pahile teen dafe tum bolega ki tum hamme nai janta hei.”
Tab Yeeshu aapan chela log se puuchhis, “Jab ham tumme bina pes, bina beg aur bina juuta ke bheja raha, tab kaa tumme koi cheej kamti bhais raha?” Ulog bolin, “Nai to, koi cheej kamti nai bhais!”
Tab Yeeshu ulog se bolis, “Lekin ab jiske paas pes hei, u uske leke jaay, wahi rakam beg bhi leke jaay, aur jiske paas talwaar nai hei, u aapan kapṛa bech ke talwaar khareed le.
Kaahe ke Baaibal meñ likhaan hei, ‘U apraadhi ke sañghe gina jaai.’ Yahi hamaar baare meñ likhaan raha, aur bahut jaldi puura bhi hoi.”
Chela log bolin, “Prabhu hiañ dui talwaar hei!” “Etna bas hei!” Yeeshu bolis.
Jeise u hardam karat raha, Yeeshu Jaituun pahaaṛ pe gais, aur uske chela log bhi uske sañghe gain.
Aur jab ulog huañ pahuñchin tab u aapan chela log se bolis, “Preya karo ki tumhaar ṭesṭ nai lewa jaay.”
Tab Yeeshu thoṛa aage jaay ke ghuṭna ṭek ke preya karis,
“E Pita, agar tum maañgo, to i dukh ke pyaala hamme piye nai dega. Fir bhi hamaar ichchha nai, lekin tumhaar ichchha puura hoi”
Tab ek ainjal uske madat ke khaatir aais.
Yeeshu gahira peeṛa meñ raha aur dukhi hoy ke dil se preya karis, ki uske paseena khuun ban ke jameen pe gir paṛis.
Preya kar ke Yeeshu uṭhis, aur aapan chela log ke lage gais. Ulog dukh ke kaaran thak ke soy gay rahin.
Yeeshu ulog se bolis, “Tum log kaahe ke sota hei? Uṭho aur preya karo ki tum log ke ṭesṭ nai lewa jaai.”
Jab Yeeshu baat karat raha, tab ek baṛa bheeṛ aay gais. Usman sab se aage Juḍas raha, jon baarah chela meñ se ek raha. U seedha aay ke Yeeshu ke chumma lees.
Yeeshu, Juḍas se puuchhis, “Kaa tum Manush ke laṛka ke chumma leke, dhoka se pakaṛwaay mañgta hei?”
Jab Yeeshu ke chela log dekhis ki kaa hoy waala hei, tab ulog Yeeshu se puuchhis, “He Prabhu, bolo to ham talwaar chalaai?”
Etna bhi nai, usman se ek to baṛa paadri ke naukar pe talwaar chalaay dees aur uske lefṭ kaan kaaṭ dees.
“Bas karo!” Yeeshu bolis. Tab u naukar ke kaan chhuis aur uske achchha kar dees.
Tab Yeeshu baṛa paadri aur Mandir ke pulis aur agua log, jon uske pakṛe aain raha usse bolis, “Kaa tum log ḍanḍa aur talwaar leke koi chor ke pakṛe aaya hei?
Ham to tumhaar sañghe raat din Mandir meñ raha, aur tum hamme tab nai pakṛa. Lekin i ṭaaim tumhaar hei aur añdhera ke taagat bhi hei.”
Yeeshu pakṛaay gais aur ulog uske baṛa paadri ke ghare le gain, aur Peeṭa duur se ulog ke peechha karat raha.
Kuchh log añgna meñ aagi baar ke uske bagal meñ beiṭhe rahin, aur Peeṭa bhi wahi log ke lage jaay ke beiṭh gais.
Tab ek naukraani uske dekhis, aur dhyaan se uske bagal dekh ke bolis, “I bhi to Yeeshu ke sañghe raha!”
Peeṭa bolis, “E aurat, ham i admi ke nai janta!”
Kuchh deri ke baad koi aur uske bagal dekhis aur bolis, “Tum bhi to ulog meñ se ek hei!” “Nai, bilkul nai!” Peeṭa jawaab dees.
Aur ek ghañṭa ke baad ek dusra admi jor deke bolis, “Ham daawa se bolta hei ki i admi ulog ke sañghe raha, kaahe ki i bhi to Galilee hei!”
Lekin Peeṭa bolis, “E bhaai, ham nai janta ki tum kaa bakta hei!” Aur jab, Peeṭa bolte raha, tab murga bolis.
Aur tab Prabhu Yeeshu ghuum ke Peeṭa ke bagal dekhis. Aur Peeṭa ke yaad aais ki Prabhu usse kon cheej bolis raha, “Bihaan sabere murga bole se pahile tum teen dafe bolega ki tum hamme nai janta hei.”
Aur Peeṭa bahire jaay ke fuuṭ fuuṭ ke roy lagis.
Jon log Yeeshu ke pakṛin raha, uske bahut beijjati karin aur khuub maarin aur peeṭin.
Ulog Yeeshu ke aañkhi pe paṭṭi baañdh ke bolin, “Bataao, tumme kon maaris?”
Ulog uske khilli uṛaat rahin aur jhuuṭ jhuuṭ baat bolat rahin.
Sabere sabere, des ke neta log, baṛa paadri log, aur paṛha likha Maozas ke kaanuun jaane waala baṛkuan, ek sañghe milin aur Yeeshu ke ulog ke aage laawa gais.
Ulog bolin, “Hamme bataao! Kaa tum Maseeh hei?” Yeeshu jawaab dees, “Agar ham tumme bataayga to tum sab biswaas nai karega.
Aur agar ham ek sawaal karega, to tum sab jawaab nai dega.
Lekin abhi se, Manush ke laṛka, Mahaan Parmeshwar ke raaiṭ saaiḍ beiṭhi.”
Tab sab koi puuchhin, “Kaa tum Parmeshwar ke laṛka hei?” Yeeshu bolis, “Tumahi to bolta hei ki ham hei!”
Ulog bolin, “Ab hamme gawaahi ke kaa jaruurat hei! I to aapan muh se khud ugal dees hei aur ham sab sun lia hei.”
Sabha se sab koi uṭh ke, Yeeshu ke Paaylaṭ ke saamne le gay.
Huañ ulog Yeeshu pe dos lagaay lagin, “Ham log i admi ke aur log ke bahkaate aur ham log ke raaja ke ṭeks de se rokte pakṛa hei. Aur i bole hei ki yahi hamaar raaja Maseeha hei.”
Paaylaṭ Yeeshu se puuchhis, “Kaa tum Yahuudi ke raaja hei?” “I to tum khud bolta hei,” Yeeshu jawaab dees.
Tab Paaylaṭ, baṛa paadri aur bheeṛ se bolis, “Ham i admi meñ kuchh dos nai paaya.”
Lekin ulog jor deke bolin, “I Galeel se leke sab Juḍia meñ parchaar kar ke sab ke bahkaay hei, aur etna hee nai, hiañ bhi i aay gais hei.”
Jab Paaylaṭ i sunis tab puuchhis, “Kaa i admi Galeel ke hei?”
Jab Paaylaṭ jaanis ki Yeeshu, Heraḍ ke raaj se aais hei, tab u Yeeshu ke Heraḍ ke paas bhej dees. Heraḍ u ṭaaim Yarushalam meñ raha.

Jab Heraḍ, Yeeshu ke dekhis to bahut khusi hoy gais, kaahe ki u bahut roj se Yeeshu ke dekhe maañgat raha. Heraḍ, Yeeshu ke baare meñ bahut kuchh sunis raha, aur aasra karat raha ki u uske chamatkaar karte dekhi.
Heraḍ, Yeeshu se bahut sawaal karis, lekin Yeeshu ek bhi jawaab nai dees.
Baṛa paadri aur Maozas ke kaanuun ke guru log bhi huañ khaṛa hoy ke Yeeshu ke agaiñsṭ kharaab kharaab cheej ke dos lagaay lagin.
Heraḍ aur uske saulja log Yeeshu pe hase lagin aur uske sañghe kharaab saluuk kare ke baad uske chamke waala kapṛa pahinaay ke Heraḍ ke paas lauṭaay deen.
Wahi roj se Heraḍ aur Paaylaṭ dost ban gain, isse pahile u duuno dusman rahin.
Paaylaṭ tab baṛa paadri, aur agua log aur baaki log ke bolaais.

U sab se bolis, “Tum Yeeshu ke hamaar paas laaya hei ki u samasya peida kare hei. Lekin ham tum sab ke saamne usse sawaal kara, aur ham to usman koi dos nai paaya, jon tum sab bolta hei ki i karis hei.
Heraḍ bhi isman galti nai paais hei yahi khaatir iske hamaar lage lauṭaay dees hei. I admi ke maut ke saja nai mile ke chaahi!
Yahi khaatir ham iske khali chaabuk lagwaay ke chhoṛ dega.” Paaylaṭ i kaaran eise bolis raha ki fasah ke teohaar meñ uske ek keidi ke chhoṛe ke raha.
Lekin bheeṛ chillaay uṭhis, “Yeeshu ke maar deo! Hamme Barabba ke deo!”
Barabba wahi admi raha jon ṭaaun meñ hañgaama karaais raha aur hatya ke jurum meñ jel meñ rakkha gais raha.
Paaylaṭ to maañgat raha ki u Yeeshu ke chhoṛ de, yahi kaaran u bheeṛ se ek dafe fir se baat karis.
Lekin ulog chillaate rahin, “Uske kros pe chaṛhaao! Kros pe chaṛhaao!”
Paaylaṭ fir tisra dafe ulog se bolis, “I admi kaa galti karis hei? Ham to isman koi kharaabi nai dekha ki jisse iske maut ke saja mile. Ham iske chaabuk lagwaay ke chhoṛ dega.”
Sab log jor jor se chillaate rahin aur uske pichchhe paṛ gain ki Yeeshu ke kros pe chaṛhaawa jaay.
Aakhri meñ, Paaylaṭ u sab ke baat maan lees.
Tab u Barabba ke, jon hatya aur hañgaama karaat raha, ulog ke maañg pe, chhoṛ dees. Aur fir Paaylaṭ, Yeeshu ke ulog ke hawaale kar dees, ki jisse ulog jon cheej maañge uske sañghe kare.
Jeise saulja log Yeeshu ke le jaat rahin, ulog gaaoñ se ṭaaun ke taraf aate Saayman naam ke ek Kureni ke pakṛin aur kros ke uske kañdha pe rakkhin, ki jisse u Yeeshu ke pichchhe pichchhe le chale.
Yeeshu ke pichchhe ek bahut baṛa bheeṛ aat raha, aur bheeṛ meñ aurat log bhi rahin jon Yeeshu ke waaste rowat aur chillaat rahin.
Yeeshu aurat log ke taraf ghuum ke bolis, “Yarushalam ke sab beṭi. Hamaar khaatir nai ro! Aapan aur aapan laṛkan ke waaste ro.
Ek roj log boli, ‘U aurat jis ke paas aulaad nai hei ulog khush kismat hei!’
U ṭaaim sab log pahaaṛ se boli, ‘Hamaar uppar giro!’ aur chhoṭa chhoṭa pahaaṛ se boli, ‘hamme lukaay leo!’
Kaahe ki agar i hariyar peṛ ke sañghe hoy sake hei to suukha peṛ ke sañghe kaa hoi?”
Dui aur admi jon apraadhi rahin, ulog ke bhi Yeeshu ke sañghe maut ke saja hoy gais.
Jab saulja log u jagha pe pahuñchin, jiske naam “Khopṛi” raha, tab huañ pe Yeeshu ke sañghe dui aur apraadhi ke kros pe chaṛhaain, ek ke Yeeshu ke i bagal aur dusra ke uske u bagal.
Yeeshu bolis, “E Pita, ilog ke maaf karo, kaahe ke ilog nai jaane hei ki ilog kaa kare hei.” Saulja log daaoñ lagaay ke Yeeshu ke kapṛa ke apne meñ baaṭ leen.

Sab log huañ khaṛa khaṛa sab dekhat rahin, hiañ tak ki agua log bhi Yeeshu ke taana maarat rahin, “I to ketna log ke bachaais. Agar i Parmeshwar ke chuna Maseeh hei, to kaahe nai apne aap ke bachaay!”
Kuchh saulja Yeeshu ke khilli uṛaay ke uske khaatir sasta waain leke aain.
Aur ulog bolin, “Agar tum Yahuudi ke raaja hei to apne aap ke bachaay leo!”
Uske uppar ek saain lagaay deen raha, jisman likha raha, “I Yahuudi ke raaja hei.”
Jon dui Yeeshu ke sañghe laṭkaan rahin, usman se ek apraadhi i bol ke uske ninda karis, “Kaa tum Maseeh nai hei? Agar hei to apne aap ke aur hamme bhi bachaao!”
Lekin dusra apraadhi uske ḍaaṭis aur bolis, “Kaa tum Parmeshwar se bhi nai ḍarta hei? Tumme bhi to wahi saja mila jon iske mila hei?
Hamme to wahi saja mila jon hamme mile ke chaahi, lekin i to koi kharaab kaam nai karis hei.”
Tab u Yeeshu se bolis, “E Yeeshu, jab tum aapan raaj meñ aana, tab hamme yaad karna!”
Tab Yeeshu bolis, “Ham tum se promis karta hei ki aaj tum hamaar sañghe swarag lok meñ rahega.”
Baarah baje ke ṭaaim, suuraj chhip gais aur asmaan kariya hoy gay, aur teen baje tak puura des meñ añdhiyaar chhaais raha, Mandir ke parda bhi beech meñ se faṭ gais.
Yeeshu jor se chillaay ke bolis, “Pita ji, ham aapan jaan tumhaar haath meñ deta hei!” Yahi bol ke Yeeshu mar gais.
Jab Romi saulja i dekhis to Parmeshwar ke baṛaai kare laga aur bolis, “Sachche ke i admi ke koi dos nai raha!”
Ek baṛa bheeṛ i bhayaanak seen dekhe ke waaste huañ rahin. Ulog jab i sab dekhin, tab ulog ke dil ṭuuṭ gais aur ulog ghare chale gain.
Jon sab Yeeshu ke kareeb dost aur aurat log jon Galeel se uske sañghe aain rahin, ulog kuchh duur pe khaṛa hoy ke i sab dekhat rahin.

Huañ pe ek admi raha jiske naam Josaf raha, u Armathia ke rahe waala raha aur huañ ke maha sabha ke memba bhi raha. Josaf ek achchha aur dharam pe chale waala admi raha. Lekin u sabha ke kaam se raaji nai raha aur u Prabhu ke raaj ke khoj meñ hardam laga rahat raha.
Josaf jaay ke Paaylaṭ se Yeeshu ke boḍi maañgis.
U boḍi ke kros se nichche utaaris, aur malmal ke kapṛa meñ uske lapeṭ ke kabar meñ rakkhis, jon chaṭṭaan kaaṭ ke banaawa gais raha, aur jisman koi aur boḍi abhi tak nai rakkha gais raha.
Suk ke roj raha, aur sabat suru hoy waala raha.
U aurat log jon Galeel se Yeeshu ke sañghe aain raha, pichchhe pichchhe jaay ke kabar ke dekhin aur i bhi dekhin ki laash keise rakkha gais hei.
Tab ulog jaay ke achchha mahke waala masaala aur senṭ taiyaar karin aur, sabat ke roj ulog araam karin kahe ke yahi Maozas ke kaanuun raha.
Hapta ke pahile roj suuraj jeise nikra, weise u sab aurat mahke waala masaala, jon ulog taiyaar kare rahin, leke kabar pe gain.
Ulog jab dekhin ki kabar se patthar haṭa hei.
Tab bhittar gain. Lekin Prabhu Yeeshu ke laash nai paain.
Ulog ekdam hairaan hoy ke wahiñ khaṛe ke khaṛe rahe gain, tab dui admi ujjar chamke waala kapṛa pahin ke ulog ke lage khaṛa hoy gain.
U aurat log ekdam ḍar ke maare aapan muuṛ jameen tak jhukaay leen, tab usman se ek admi bolis, “Tum jinda ke murda meñ kaahe ke khojta hei?

Yeeshu hiañ nai hei, kaahe ke u jinda hoy gais hei. Yaad karo jab u Galeel meñ raha tab u tum se bolis raha, ‘Manush ke laṛka ke jaruuri hei ki uske admi ke haath meñ saupa jaai aur u tisra roj jinda hoy jaai.’ ”
Tab ulog ke yaad aais ki Yeeshu kaa bolis raha.
Meri Magdalini, Joanna aur Jeims ke amma, Meri aur ulog ke sañghe aur jon aurat rahin, jon kabar pe gain raha, aay ke huañ jon sab baat bhais raha, u gyaara chela log ke bataain.
Chela log sochin ki i sab baat bekaar hei, aur ulog biswaas nai karin.
Lekin Peeṭa uṭhis aur dauṛ ke kabar pe gais, aur jab u jhuk ke bhittar dekhis to khali malmal ke kafan ke kapṛa dekhaai dees, aur sab baat pe hairaan hoy ke ghar lauṭ aais.
Wahi roj usman se dui admi Immaaus naam ke gaaoñ jaat rahin, jon Yarushalam se lagbhag saat meel ke duuri pe raha.
Jeise ulog baat karat rahin ki i sab keise bhais raha,
Yeeshu apne aap aay ke ulog ke bagal meñ chale laga.
Ulog uske dekhis lekin nai pahichaanin.
Yeeshu ulog se bolis, “Tum sab log chalte chalte kon baat karat raha?” Aur u duuno udaas hoy ke khaṛa hoy gain.
Usman se ek ke naam Kliyopaas raha, aur u jawaab dees, “Kaa tumahi ekke admi Yarushalam se aaya hei jon nai janta ki pichhle kuchh din huañ kon baat bhais hei?”

Tab Yeeshu puuchhis, “I kon baat hoy hei?” Ulog jawaab dees, “Wahi sab baat jon Naasrat ke Yeeshu ke sañghe bhais raha.” Aur aage bhi kahin, “I admi Parmeshwar aur sab log ke najar meñ, aapan kaam aur boli meñ ek taagat waala nabi raha.
Hamaar sab se baṛa paadri log aur kaam kare waala log uske pakṛaay ke maut ke saja dewaay deen aur uske kros pe bhi chaṛhwaay deen.
Lekin ham log to yahi aas lagaay raha ki wahi Israayel ke chhoṛaay waala admi hoi. Lekin i baat ke hoy aaj teen roj hoy gais hei.
Hamaar sañghe ke kuchh aurat ham log ke hairaan kar deen hei.
Jab ulog sabere sabere kabar pe gain raha, tab huañ pe ulog ke laash nai mila, aur ham log ke aay ke bataain ki ulog ke huañ ainjal dekhaan raha, jon ulog ke bataais ki Yeeshu jinda hei.
Hamaar sañghe aur jon log rahin, usman se bhi kuchh kabar pe gain raha aur jeise u aurat log bataais raha, weisaiyeñ ulog bhi paain aur Yeeshu ke nai dekhe paain.”
Tab Yeeshu ulog se bolis, “Tum murakh hei, jon baat nabi log bolin, uske biswaas kare meñ kaahe etna deri lagaata hei!
Kaa Maseeh ke khaatir i jaruuri nai raha ki u dukh uṭhaay aur mahima paay?”
Tab Yeeshu Maozas se suru kar ke aur sab nabi ke aur jetna Baaibal meñ likhaan raha, usman se aapan baare meñ baat ke matlab ulog ke samjhaais.
Jab ulog gaaoñ ke nagichche pahuñch gain jahañ ulog ke jaay ke raha, tab Yeeshu bahaana karis ki uske aage jaay ke hei.
Tab u admi log usse binti karin, “Aaj hamaar sañghe rahe jaao, sanjha hoy gais hei aur bahut deri bhi hoy gais hei.” Aur tab Yeeshu ulog ke sañghe raat ruke ke waaste bhittar chala gais.
Jab Yeeshu khaana khaay beiṭhis, tab u roṭi lees aur dhanbaad deke, aur usman se tuuṛ ke sab ke dees.
Tab ulog ke aañkhi khul gais aur jaan gain ki u kon hei, lekin tab tak u ulog ke saamne se chala gais.
Aur ulog ek dusra se bole lagin, “Jab u rasta meñ ham se baat karat raha aur hamme Baaibal ke matlab samjhaat raha, to kaa hamaar man meñ jaran nai hot raha?”

Wahi lage ulog uṭhin aur Yarushalam lauṭ gain, aur jaay ke u gyaara chela log aur uske aur saathi jon ek sañghe rahin u sab se bataain, “Prabhu sachche ke jinda hoy gais hei aur Saayman ke dekhaay bhi dees hei!”
Aur fir ulog rasta waala baat aur roṭi tuuṛe waala baat aur keise ulog uske cheenh gain raha, sab baat bataay lagin.
Jab u duuno baat bataat rahin, tab Yeeshu aay ke ulog ke beech meñ khaṛa hoy gais, aur fir u bolis, “Tum sab ke saanti mile.”
Ulog to ḍar gain, yahi sochin ki u bhuut hei.
Lekin Yeeshu bolis, “Tum log kaahe ke ghabraata hei? Tumhaar man meñ kaahe ke dubidha hei?
Hamaar haath aur goṛ dekho, ham wahi hei. Hamme chhui ke dekho aur apne aap pata lagaao. Bhuut ke paas haḍḍi aur maas nai rahe hei jeise tum hamme dekhta hei.”
I bole ke baad Yeeshu aapan haath aur goṛ ulog ke dekhaais.
Lekin khusi ke maare ulog ab bhi biswaas nai kare sakin aur hairaan hoy gain. Tab Yeeshu u sab se bolis, “Kaa tumhaar lage hiañ kuchh khaay ke hei?”
Ulog uske bhujaan machhri ke ek ṭukṛa deen, aur u uske leke ulog ke saamne khaay lees.

Tab Yeeshu u sab se bolis, “Jab ham tumhaar sañghe raha, ham tumme u sab bataay raha jon kuchh Maozas ke kaanuun meñ likhaan hei, aur sab nabi ke buk aur Bhajan Sañhita meñ hamaar baare meñ jon kuchh bhi likhaan hei, u sab ke puura hoy ke hei.”
Tab Yeeshu ulog ke madat karis ki ulog samajh le ki Baaibal meñ kaa likhaan hei.
Yeeshu ulog se bolis, “Yahi likhaan hei ki Maseeh dukh uṭhaai aur tisra roj murda meñ se jinda hoy jaai.
Ulog i bhi bolin ki Yarushalam se leke sab jaati ke log meñ uske naam se paap ke maafi aur pastaawa ke parchaar kara jaai.
Tum log i baat ke gawaah hei.
Jis ke promis hamaar bappa tum se karis raha, ham uske bhejega, lekin tumme yahi jagha rahe ke paṛi, jab tak tumme swarag se sakti nai mil jaay.”
Tab Yeeshu aapan chela log ke ṭaaun se bahire le gais aur aapan haath uppar uṭhaay ke ulog ke aashirbaad dees.
Jeise u ulog ke aashirbaad det raha, weisaiyeñ Yeeshu ulog se alag hoy gay aur swarag meñ uṭhaay lia gais.
Tab uske chela log uske bhajan gaain, aur bahut khusi se Yarushalam lauṭ gain.
Ulog jaada ṭaaim Mandir meñ uske baṛaai karte bitaain.
Dunia ke bane se pahile vachan raha, u Ishwar ke sañghe rahis, aur u sachche meñ Ishwar raha.
Sab se pahile u vachan Ishwar ke sañghe raha.
Aur wahi vachan ke sahaare, Ishwar sab cheej banaais. U shabd ke bina ek bhi cheej nai banis. Aur jon cheej bhi banis
uske jeewan ke sota wahi vachan raha, aur yahi jeewan ham log ke khaatir roshni laais.
Wahi roshni añdhiyaar meñ chamkat raha aur u añdhera bhi u roshni ke butaay nai sakis.
Ishwar aapan ek duut bhejis, uske naam Yuhanna raha,
u roshni ke baare meñ bataay aais raha aur sab log ke rasta dekhaais ki log biswaas kare.
Yuhanna u roshni nai raha. U to khali u roshni ke baare meñ bataay aais raha.
Jon sachcha roshni sab ke uppar chamke hei u dunia meñ aais hei.
Vachan dunia meñ raha, lekin uske koi nai pahichaanis, jab ki Parmeshwar aapan vachan se dunia banaais.
U to aapan log meñ bhi gais, lekin aapan log bhi uske nai apnaais.
Jon jon bhi uske apnaais aur uske naam pe biswaas karis. U sab log ke u hak dees ki u sab Parmeshwar ke laṛkan bane.
U sab Ishwar ke laṛkan weisaiyeñ to nai ban gais aur admi ke maañge se bhi nai banis Parmeshwar khud apne u sab ke aapan laṛkan banaais.

Vachan admi ke ruup dhar lees, aur hamaar beech meñ rahe lagis. Ham uske sachcha mahima dekha, u mahima uske mila kaahe ki u aapan baap ke ekke laṛka raha Usman se Prabhu ke sachchaai aur daya hamaar lage aay gais hei.

Yuhanna uske baare meñ chillaay ke bolis, “Yahi ke baare meñ to ham bataata raha, jab ham bola raha, ‘U hamaar pichchhe aay hei, lekin u ham se bahut baṛa hei, kaahe ki u hamaar peida hoy se bahut pahile se raha.” ’
Uske baṛappan raha ki u ham pe daya dekhaais, aur aasheesh pe aasheesh dete gais.
Maozas ke bagal se to Ishwar hame kaanuun dees, lekin sachchaai aur baṛappan to Yeeshu Maseeh ke bagal se aais.
Koi bhi Ishwar ke nai dekhis, khali wahi laṛka jon Ishwar ke godi meñ hei, hame dekhaais ki Ishwar keisan hei.
Yahuudi agua log, Yarushalam ke kuchh paadri aur madat kare waala log ke, Yuhanna ke lage puuchhe bhejis ki u kon hei.
Yuhanna khula aam bataais, “Ham Maseeha nai hei.”
“Tab tum kon hei?” ulog puuchhis, “Kaa tum Ilaayja hei?” “Nai, ham to u bhi nai,” Yuhanna bolis. “Tab kaa tum nabi hei?”, u sab puuchhin. “nai”, u jawaab dees.
“Tum hame bataao, tum kon hei?” u sab bolin. “Uske lage hamme jawaab le jaay ke hei, jon hamme bhejis hei.”
Tab Yuhanna, Aayzaaya nabi ke vachan meñ bolis, “Ham khali wahi hei jon akele jagha pe chillaay ke bole hei, ‘Prabhu ke waaste seedha rasta banaao!” ’
Kuchh log ke bhi Yuhanna ke lage bheja gais raha.
U log us se puuchhis, “Tum Maseeh bhi nai hei, nabi bhi nai hei, aur Ilaayja bhi nai hei, to tum kaahe ke baptisma deta hei?”
Yuhanna jawaab dees, “Ham to khali paani se baptisma deta hei, lekin tumhaar beech meñ ek admi aais hei jiske tum sab nai janta hei.
Jon hamaar pichchhe aaywaala hei uske to ham juuta ke bandhan tak khole laayk nai hei.”
Yuhanna i sab baat tab bolis jab u Bethni gaaoñ meñ Joḍan nadi ke kinaare baptisma det raha.
Dusra roj Yuhanna dekhis ki Yeeshu uske lage chala aay hei aur u bolis, “Yahi hei Parmeshwar ke memna, jon dunia ke sab paap ke aapan uppar uṭhaay le jaai!”
Yahi hei jiske baare meñ ham bataata raha jab ham bola, “Ek admi hamaar pichchhe aay hei, aur u ham se bahut baṛa hei, kaahe ki u hamaar peida hoy se pahile raha.”
Ham nai janta raha ki u kon hei. Ham to khali paani se baptisma dewe aay raha, ki jisse Israayel ke sab log uske dekhe saki.
Yuhanna aapan gawaahi dees, “Ham dekha ki ek Aatma kabuttar ke rakam, asmaan se utar ke Yeeshu pe ruk gais.”

Tab bhi ham nai jaan paaya ki i wahi hei, lekin jon hamme bhejis raha ki ham paani se baptisma dei, ham se bataais, “Tum dekhega ek Aatma aay ke koi pe ruki. Tab tum jaanega ki i wahi hei jon Pawitr Aatma se baptisma dei.”
Ham dekh lia hei aur tumme bataata hei ki yahi Parmeshwar ke laṛka hei.
Dusra roj Yuhanna fir aapan chela log ke sañghe wahiñ khaṛa raha,
jab u dekhis ki Yeeshu bagal se jaay hei, tab u bolis, “Yahi Ishwar ke memna hei.”
Yuhanna ke dui chela i baat sunke Yeeshu ke lage gain.
Jab Yeeshu ghuum ke u duuno ke dekhis to puuchhis, “Tumme kaa chaahi?” U duuno jawaab deen, “Guru ji, tum kahañ rahta hei?”
Yeeshu jawaab dees, “Aao aur dekho!” U ṭaaim sanjha ke lagbhag chaar baja raha aur u sab chela jaay ke dekhin ki Yeeshu kahañ rahe hei. Aur baaki ṭaaim wahi ke sañghe bitaain.
Usman se ek admi, jon Yuhanna ke sun ke Yeeshu ke lage gais raha, uske naam Enḍru raha aur u Saayman Peeṭa ke bhaiya raha.
Sab se pahile u aapan bhaiya Saayman se milis aur bataais, “Ham Maseeha ke khoj lia hei.”

Enḍru aapan bhaiya ke Yeeshu ke lage le aais. Jab Yeeshu uske dekhis to bolis, ‘Tumhaar naam Saayman hei aur tum Yuhanna ke laṛka hei. Tum "Kaifa" yaane ki "chaṭṭaan" ke naam se jaana jaayga. (U Peeṭa ke rakam hei jiske matlab ‘ek patthar’ hei.)
Dusra roj Yeeshu Galeel jaay ke waaste plen banaais. Huañ u Filip se milis aur bolis, “Hamaar sañghe aao!”
Filip, Beitseida ṭaaun ke rahe waala raha, wahiñ pe jahañ Peeṭa aur Enḍru rahat rahin.

Filip, Natanyel se milis aur usse bataais, “Hamme u mil gais hei jiske baare meñ Maozas kaanuun ke buk meñ likhis raha, aur yahi ke baare meñ nabi bhi likhis raha. Uske naam Yeeshu hei, u Josaf ke laṛka hei aur Naasrat meñ rahe hei.”
Natanyel puuchhis, “Kaa Naasrat meñ se kuchh achchha nikre sake hei?” “Aao aur dekho,” Filip bolis.
Jab Yeeshu dekhis ki Natanyel uske lage aay hei, tab u uske baare meñ bolis, “I to sachcha Israayeli hei, isman kuchh bhi jhuuṭ nai hei!”
Natanyel usse puuchhis, “Tum hamme keise janta hei?” Yeeshu jawaab dees, “Filip ke bolaay se pahile ham tumme anjeer ke peṛ ke nichche dekh lia raha.”
Natanyel tab bolis, “Guru ji, tum Ishwar ke laṛka hei aur Israayel ke raaja hei!”
Yeeshu jawaab dees, “Kaa tum i kaaran ham pe biswaas karta hei ki ham tumme bataaya ki ham tumme anjeer (fig) ke peṛ ke nichche dekh lia raha? Tum isse bhi bahut baṛa kaam dekhega.
Ham tum se sachche sachche bataata hei, tum dekhega ki asmaan khuli aur ainjals uppar jaay ke fir Manush ke laṛka pe utri.”
Teen din ke baad Kaana ṭaaun jon Galeel meñ hei, huañ ek saadi raha. Yeeshu ke amma bhi huañ rahi.
Yeeshu aur uske chela log ke bhi u saadi ke neota milis raha.
Jab sab waain khalaas hoy gais, tab Yeeshu ke amma usse bolis, “Uske lage aur waain nai hei.”
Yeeshu bolis, “Tum hamme nai bataao ki hamme kaa kare ke hei. Hamaar ṭaaim abhi nai aais hei.”
Meri tab naukar se bolis, “Wahi karo jon i bataay hei.”

Neota meñ chhe (6) baṛa baṛa patthar ke bartan raha, huañ ke log usman se paani nikaar ke apne aap ke safa karat rahin. I huañ ke reeti riwaaj raha. Ek ek bartan meñ lagbhag ek sao leeṭa paani bhara jaay sakat raha.
Tab Yeeshu ek naukar se bolis, “I sab bartan meñ paani bharo.” U sab usman muh tak paani bhar deen.
Tab Yeeshu fir bolis, “Ab isman se kuchh paani nikaar ke u admi ke lage le jaao, jon i sab ke dekh bhaal kare hei.” Naukar wahi karis jon Yeeshu usse bolis raha.
Jab dekhbhaal karewaala admi uske cheekhis tab u paani waain meñ badal gais raha. U nai jaanat raha ki u waain kahañ se aais hei. Lekin u naukar, to jaanat raha.
Tab u dulha ke bolaay ke bolis, “Sab koi pahile achchha waain de hei, aur jab pahuna log jaada pee le hei tab uske saadhaaran waain dewa jaay hei. Lekin tum to abhi tak achchha waain rakha hei!”
Yahi Yeeshu ke pahila chamatkaar raha jon Galeel ke Kaana ṭaaun meñ suru karis raha, aur aapan mahima dekhaais aur uske chela log uspe biswaas karin.
Iske baad, Yeeshu aur uske amma, aur bhaiya aur chela log Kafarnahuum ṭaaun chala gais aur huañ kuchh din rahin.
Yahuudi log ke fasah ke teohaar aay waala raha, aur Yeeshu Yarushalam chala gais.
Huañ u dekhis ki chech meñ kuchh log chaua aur kabuttar beche hei, aur ṭaibal pe peisa badli kare waala log bhi beiṭhin hei.

Tab Yeeshu ek rassi ke chaabuk banaais aur sab log ke bheṛa aur beil ke sañghe chech ke bahire kar dees. Aur jon peisa badli kare waala log rahin uske bhi ṭaibal ulṭaay dees aur sab peisa idhar udhar chhitraay dees.
Tab Yeeshu jon kabuttar bechat rahin, usse bolis, “I sab ke hiañ se le jaao! Hamaar Pita ke ghar ke khareed been ke jagha nai banaao.”
Tab uske chela log ke yaad aais ki Baaibal meñ likha raha, “Hamaar bhakti aur prem tumhaar ghar ke waaste, He Prabhu, ham meñ aagi ke rakam bare hei.”
Yahuudi agua log Yeeshu se ek sawaal karin, “Kon se chamatkaar tum hamme dekhaayga, ki ham biswaas kari ki tumme i kaam kare ke hak hei?”
“I chech ke ujaaṛ deo, aur ham teen roj meñ iske fir se banaay dega.”
Agua log jawaab deen, “Kaa tum iske teen roj meñ banaay dega? Hamme to i chech ke banaay meñ forṭi siks (46) saal laga raha.”
Lekin jon chech ke baat Yeeshu karat raha, u uske deñhi raha.
Aur jab Yeeshu mar ke jinda hoy gais, tab uske chela log ke yaad aais ki u kaa bolat raha. Aur tab u sab Baaibal aur usman kaa likha hei, uspe biswaas karin.
Jab Yeeshu Yarushalam meñ fasah ke teohaar ke ṭaaim raha tab bahut se log uspe biswaas karin, kaahe ki ulog dekhin ki Yeeshu ketna chamatkaar karis raha.
Lekin Yeeshu jaanat raha ki u sab ke dil meñ kaa hei, aur u sab pe bharosa nai karis.
I jaruurat nai raha ki koi Yeeshu ke u sab ke baare meñ bataay, kaahe ki u apne aap sab ke dil ke baat jaanat raha.
Huañ ek Yahuudi ke sardaar Nikoḍimas naam ke admi raha, aur u Farisi dal ke raha.

Ek raat u Yeeshu ke lage aais aur usse bolis, “Guru, ham janta hei ki Ishwar tumme bhejis hei ki tum aay ke hamme sikhaao. Agar Ishwar tumhaar sañghe nai rahta to jon chamatkaar tum hamme dekhaaya hei, nai dekhaay sakta.”
Tab Yeeshu jawaab dees, “Ham tum se sachche bolta hei, jab tak koi admi nawa janam nai le le, tab tak u Parmeshwar ke raaj nai dekhe saki!”
Nikoḍimas fir se puuchhis, “Keise ek baṛa admi fir se peida hoy sake hei? Kaa u aapan amma ke peṭ meñ fir se jaay ke dusra dafe peida hoy sake hei?”
Tab Yeeshu jawaab dees, “Ham tum se sachche bolta hei, jab tak ek admi paani aur Aatma se janam nai le, tab tak u Parmeshwar ke raaj meñ nai jaay sake.
Ek admi aapan amma bappa ke deñhi se laaif paay hei, lekin aatmik jeewan to khali Aatma se paay hei.
Ghabraana nai jab ham tumme bataayga ki tumme fir se janam le ke hei.

Khali Parmeshwar ke Aatma nawa jeewan de sake hei. Aatma u hawa ke rakam hei jon jab maañge chale hei. Tum khali hawa ke awaaj sune sakta hei, lekin tum nai janta ki u kahañ se aay hei, aur kahañ jaay hei.”
“I keise hoy sake hei?” Nikoḍimas puuchhis.
Tab fir Yeeshu jawaab dees, “Keise tum Israayeli log ke guru hoy ke bhi i baat nai samjha?
Ham tum se sachche bolta hei, ham sab wahi bolega jon ham dekha hei aur janta hei. Lekin jon ham bolta hei, tum hamaar u baat nai maanega.
Jab ham tum se dunia ke baat karta hei to tum ham pe biswaas nai karta, to agar ham swarag ke baat karega to kaa tum ham pe biswaas karega?
Khali manush ke laṛka ke chhoṛ ke koi bhi admi swarag pe nai gais, jon fir se huañ se nichche utar aais hei.
Jeise Maozas jañgal meñ ek nakli saañp ke uppar chaṛhaais raha, weisaiyeñ i bhi jaruuri hei ki Manush ke laṛka ke bhi uppar chaṛhaawa jaay,
ki jisse jon koi bhi uspe biswaas kari u anant jeewan paai.
Parmeshwar dunia ke log se etna pyaar karis ki aapan eklauta laṛka ke dunia meñ bhejis, ki jon koi bhi uspe biswaas kari, u naas nai hoi lekin anant jeewan paai.
Ishwar aapan beṭa ke dunia meñ i kaaran nai bhejis ki u dunia ke saja de. Uske bhejis hei ki u dunia ke bachaay!
Jon koi bhi Ishwar ke beṭa pe biswaas kare hei, u naas nai hoi, lekin jon uspe biswaas nai kare hei to uske satyanaas hoy jaai, kaahe ki ulog Ishwar ke eklauta beṭa pe biswaas nai karin.
Roshni dunia meñ aay gais hei, aur jon koi bhi kharaab kaam kari uske saja mili, kaahe ki ulog añjora se jaada añdhera se pyaar kare hei.
Jon bhi koi kharaab kaam kare hei, u añjora se haiṭ kare hei, aur roshni ke lage nai aay hei, kaahe ki añjora meñ u sab ke kharaab kaam dekhaay jaay.
Lekin jon seedha rasta pe chale hei, u jyoti ke saamne aay hei ki jisse sab log i dekhe saki ki Ishwar ke marji ke mutaabik kaam kare hei.
Iske baad Yeeshu aur uske chela log Juḍia meñ aais, aur huañ uske sañghe kuchh din rahe ke, log ke baptisma det raha.
Yuhanna bhi Salim ke nagichche Aenon meñ baptisma det raha, kaahe ki huañ ḍher paani raha, aur log aay ke usse baptisma let rahin.
Yuhanna ke abhi tak jel meñ nai rakha gay raha.
Wahiñ pe Yuhanna ke chela log se aur ek Yahuudi se sudh hoy ke baare meñ jhagṛa bhais.

U log Yuhanna ke lage jaay ke bolin, “He Guru, u jon admi Joḍan nadi ke eesṭ meñ tumhaar sañghe raha, aur uske baare meñ tum ham se bola raha, u ab baptisma dewe hei, aur sab log wahi ke paas jaay hei.”
Yuhanna jawaab dees,
“Tumme yaad hoi ham bataay raha ki ham Maseeha nai hei. Ham to khali usse pahile bheja gaya hei.
Saadi meñ dulha hei jiske saadi hoy hei. Dulha ke dost to uske awaaj sunke khusi hoy hei. Yahi kaaran ham bhi bahut khusi hei.
Ab bahut jaruuri hei ki Yeeshu baṛa hoy aur ham chhoṭa bani.”
Jon swarag se aay hei u bahut mahaan hoy hei. Aur jon koi bhi dunia se aay hei, dharti ke hee rahe hei, aur khali duniadaari ke baat kare hei. Lekin jon swarag se aay hei u sab se achchha hei.
Jon kuchh bhi u dekhis aur sunis hei, wahi bataais hei, lekin fir bhi koi uspe biswaas nai karin.
Lekin jon koi bhi uspe biswaas kare hei, u jaane hei ki Ishwar sachcha hei.
Ishwar aapan beṭa bhejis ki u uske sandesa sab ke sunaay, aur u uske Pawitr Aatma se bhar dees hei.
Pita aapan beṭa se bahut pyaar kare hei, aur sab hak uske haath meñ de dees hei.
Jon koi beṭa pe biswaas kare hei, anant jeewan uske mile hei. Lekin jon beṭa ke nai maane hei, u anant jeewan nai paai aur Parmeshwar usse hardam gussa meñ rahi.”
Yeeshu jaanat raha ki Farisi log sun leen hei ki u Yuhanna se jaada log ke jeet ke baptisma de hei, aur ulog uske pichchhe chale lagin hei.
Yeeshu apne aap baptisma nai det raha, lekin uske chela log det rahin.
Yeeshu Juḍia chhoṛ ke Galeel ke bagal jaay laga.
I dafe uske Samaaria se hoy ke jaay ke raha.
Rasta meñ uske Sukhaar ṭaaun mila. Uske nagichche meñ u jameen raha, jon Jaykab bahut din pahile aapan laṛka Josaf ke dees raha.

Jaykab ke kuaañ bhi wahiñ raha. Chalte chalte lagbhag baarah baje ke ṭaaim jab Yeeshu thak gais raha, to u wahi kuaañ ke bagal meñ beiṭh gais. Aur Yeeshu ke chela log ṭaaun khaana khareede chala gain.
Wahi ṭaaim ek Saamri aurat kuaañ pe paani bhare aais.
Yeeshu usse bolis, “Kaa tum hamme paani piyaay sakti hei?”
Saamri aurat Yeeshu se bolis, “Tum ek Yahuudi hei aur ham ek Saamri aurat. Tum keise ham se paani mañgta hei jab ki Yahuudi aur Saamri ek dusra se kuchh sambandh nai rakkhe hei?”
Yeeshu jawaab dees, “Tum nai jaanti ki Ishwar tumme kaa de maañge hei, aur tum i bhi nai jaanti ki tum se kon paani maañge hei. Agar tum jaanti, to ham se jeewan jal maañgti.”
“E guru,” u aurat bolis, “Tumhaar paas to paani bhare ke waaste kuchh bhi nai hei, aur kuaañ bhi bahut gahira hei. Tum kahañ se jeewan jal laayga?
Tum hamaar bappa Jaykab se to baṛa nai hei, jon hamaar waaste i kuaañ khodis raha ki jisse uske palwaar aur jaanwar isman se paani piye saki?”
Tab Yeeshu uske jawaab dees, “Jon koi i paani pee u fir se pyaasa hoy jaai.
Lekin jon koi bhi i paani pee jon ham deta hei, u kabhi pyaasa nai hoi. Jon paani ham dega u ek sota ke rakam hei jon anant jeewan ke waaste hardam nikarte rahi.”
U aurat fir se bolis, “E Prabhu, hamme u paani deo ki jisse ham kabhi pyaasa nai rahi aur hiañ kabhi paani bhare ke waaste nai aai.”
Yeeshu tab bolis, “Jaao, aapan admi ke le aao.”
“Hamaar lage admi nai hei,” u aurat bolis. “Tum sachche bolti hei,” Yeeshu bolis, “tumhaar admi nai hei.
Abhi tak tum paañch ke sañghe saadi kari, aur abhi jon tumhaar sañghe hei u tumhaar admi nai hei.”
U aurat bolis, “Ab ham samajh gaya ki tum koi nabi hei
Hamaar baap daada yahi pahaaṛ pe Parmeshwar ke weship karin, lekin tum bolta hei ki Yarushalam hee u jagha hei jahañ weship kare ke chaahi.”
Tab Yeeshu usse bolis, “E aurat, ham pe biswaas karo, ṭaaim aay hei jab tum log naa to i pahaaṛ pe aur naa to Yarushalam meñ Pita ke weship karega.
Tum Saamri log nai janta ki tum sab kiske weship karta hei. Aur ham Yahuudi u Parmeshwar ke janta hei jiske ham weship karta hei, kaahe ki Parmeshwar ham Yahuudi ke jariye dunia ke bachaai.
Lekin u ṭaaim aay waala hei, yaane ki aay gais hei jab sachcha weship kare waala log Pita ke weship, aatma aur sachchaai se kari, kaahe ki Pita aapan weship ke khaatir eisane log ke khojis hei.
Parmeshwar Aatma hei, aur i jaruuri hei ki u sab weship kare waala Aatma aur sachchaai se weship kare.”
U aurat tab bolis, “Ham sab janta hei ki Maseeha aay waala hei. Wahi hei jiske ham Krisṭ bolega. Jab u aai tab hamme sab samjhaai.”
“Ham wahi hei,” Yeeshu bolis, “aur ham abhi tum se baat karta hei.”
Wahi ṭaaim sab chela log lauṭ aain, aur i dekh ke achambha kare lagin ki Yeeshu u aurat se baat kare hei. Lekin koi bhi i nai puuchhis ki, “Tum usse kaahe ke baat karta hei?”
Tab u aurat aapan bartan wahiñ chhoṛ ke ṭaaun ke bagal bhaagis, aur sab log se bataay lagi,
“Aao aur dekho, u admi ke dekho, u sab jaane hei jon ham abhi tak kara hei, aur hamme sab bataay dees hei! Kahiñ yahi Maseeh to nai?”
Ṭaaun ke sab log Yeeshu ke dekhe ke waaste uske lage chal deen.
Jab tak i sab hot raha, Yeeshu ke chela log usse binti karat rahin, “Guru ji, kuchh khaay leo.”
Lekin Yeeshu u sab se bataais, “Hamaar lage eisan khaana hei jiske baare meñ tum sab nai janta.”
Tab sab chela log aapas meñ baat kare lagin, “Kaa koi iske khaay ke waaste kuchh laais hei?”
Yeeshu tab fir se bolis, “Hamaar khaana yahi hei jon Parmeshwar chaahe hei! Wahi hamme bhejis hei, aur hamme u kaam puura kare ke hei jon u hamme kare ke bhejis hei.
Tum saait bolega ki kaṭni ke abhi chaar mahina aur baaki hei. Lekin ham tum se bataata hei, aañkhi uṭhaay ke dekho ki sab khet meñ anaaj kaṭe ke khaatir taiyaar hei.
Aur jon log kaaṭe hei uske majduuri mile hei, aur anant jeewan ke khaatir fal baṭore hei. Tab jon koi bhi bowe hei aur jon koi kaaṭe hei duuno milke khusi manaai.
Iske waaste i kahaawat achchha hei. “Bowe koi aur kaaṭe koi aur.”
Ham tumme u khet meñ kaaṭe ke waaste bhejta hei, jahañ dusra sab mehnat karin.
U ṭaaun ke bahut Saamri log Yeeshu pe biswaas kare lagin, kaahe ki u aurat bole rahi, “I admi hamme sab bataay dees jon kaam ham kare raha.”
U log aay ke Yeeshu se binti kare lagin ki u uske sañghe ruke, aur u uske sañghe dui roj aur rukis.
Yeeshu ke parchaar sunke bahut se Saamri Yeeshu pe biswaas karin.
U log u Saamri aurat se bolin, “Ab ham log khali tumhaar bole pe Yeeshu pe biswaas nai karta hei. Ab to ham khud sun lia hei, aur samajh lia hei ki wahi dunia ke bachaay aais hei!”
Yeeshu bolis raha, “Aapan des meñ nabi ke aadar nai hoy hei.” Fir dui roj huañ rahe ke baad u Galeel chala gais.
Huañ ke log uske welkam karin, kaahe ki ulog teohaar meñ dekh leen raha ki Yeeshu kon kon kaam huañ karis raha.
Jab Yeeshu Galeel meñ raha, to u Kaana ṭaaun gais jahañ u paani ke waain meñ badlis raha. Huañ ek sarkaari naukar mila jiske laṛka Kafarnahuum meñ bimaar raha.
Aur jab u admi sunis ki Yeeshu, Juḍia meñ hei, to uske lage jaay ke chirauri karis ki u jaay ke uske laṛka ke mare se bachaay.
Yeeshu, u kaam kare waala se bolis, “Jab tak tum achambha ke kaam aur chamatkaar nai dekhega, tab tak tum biswaas nai karega!”
U admi fir se bolis, “Prabhu ji, aay ke hamaar laṛka ke mare se bachaay lo!”
Tab Yeeshu bolis, “Tumhaar laṛka nai mari. Jaao, ghare jaao, uske lage.” Yeeshu pe biswaas karke u admi ghare jaay laga.
Rasta meñ uske naukar usse milin aur bataain, “Tumhaar laṛka ab bilkul ṭheek hei!”
U usse puuchhis ki kon ṭaaim laṛka achchha bhais? U log bolin, “Lagbhag ek baje uske bukhaar utar gais raha.”
Laṛka ke bappa ke yaad aais ki wahi ṭaaim Yeeshu bolis raha, “Tumhaar laṛka jee!” Aur tab se u admi aur uske palwaar Yeeshu pe biswaas kare lagin.
Yahi dusra chamatkaar raha jon Yeeshu, Juḍia se lauṭ ke Galeel meñ karis raha.
Iske baad Yahuudi ke ek aur teohaar aais aur Yeeshu Yarushalam chala gais.
Yarushalam meñ ek sheep gaiṭ hei, jiske bagal meñ ek kunḍ hei jon Beitseida ke naam se jaana jaay hei. Usman paañch poch hei.
U poch meñ bahut se bimaar log, añdha, langṛa, luula aur lunj log paṛa rahat rahin. U log paani ke hile ke waiṭ karat rahin.

Is ke kaaran i raha ki kabhi kabhi ek ainjal kunḍ meñ utar ke paani hilaawat raha. Jeise paani hile to jon sab se pahile kunḍ meñ utar jaay hei u wahi ṭaaim achchha hoy jaay hei, chaahe uske koi bhi bimaari hoy.
Kunḍ ke bagal meñ ek admi beiṭha raha, jon 38 saal se bimaar raha.
Jab Yeeshu uske dekhis to jaan gais ki u bahut roj se bimaar hei, tab u usse jaay ke puuchhis, “Kaa tum achchha hoy mañgta hei?”
U admi jawaab dees, “He Prabhu, hamaar lage koi admi nai ki jab paani hile to hamme jaldi se kunḍ meñ utaar de. Aur hamaar huañ pahuñchte pahuñchte dusra admi ham se pahile kunḍ meñ utar paṛe hei.”
Yeeshu usse bolis, “Uṭho, aapan chaṭaai uṭhaao aur chalo!”
Wahi ṭaaim u admi achchha hoy gais. U aapan chaṭaai uṭhaay ke chale lagis. Jon roj i baat bhais, u sabat ke roj raha.

Jab Yahuudi agua log dekhis ki u admi jon achchha bhais raha, aapan chaṭaai uṭhaay ke chale fire hei to usse bolin “Aaj sabat ke din hei. Tumhaar chaṭaai uṭhaay ke chalna firna kaanuun ke agaiñsṭ hei.”
Lekin u jawaab dees, “Jon hamme achchha karis hei, u hamme bataais ki chaṭaai uṭhaay ke chalo.”
U sab fir puuchhin, “Kon hei u admi jon tumme chaṭaai uṭhaay ke chale ke bataais hei?”
Lekin u to nai jaanat raha ki Yeeshu kon raha, aur Yeeshu to bheeṛ ke kaaran huañ se chala gais raha.
Baad meñ Yeeshu u admi se chech meñ mila, aur usse bolis, “Tum ab achchha hoy gaya hei. Ab aur paap nai karna nai to aur kaṛa saja tumme mili.”
Tab u admi jaay ke Yahuudi log se bataais ki jon uske achchha karis raha u Yeeshu hei.
Ab Yahuudi log Yeeshu ke sataay lagin, kaahe ki u sabat ke roj changaai ke kaam karat raha.
Lekin Yeeshu bolis, “Hamaar Pita to sab roj kaam kare hei, wahi kaaran ham bhi kaam karte rahta hei.”

Ab to agua log dui kaaran se Yeeshu ke maare ke kosis kare lagin. Ek to u sabat ke kaanuun tuuṛis aur dusra is se bhi kharaab, jab u bolis ki Parmeshwar uske Pita hei, ab to u Ishwar ke baraabar hoy gais.
Yeeshu sab log se bolis, “Ham tum se sachche bolta hei, beṭa apne aap kuchh nai kare sake hei. U wahi kare sake hei jon aapan baap ke karte dekhe hei. Jeise baap kare hei weisaiyeñ beṭa bhi kare hei.
Pita aapan laṛka ke bahut pyaar kare hei, aur Pita jon kuchh bhi kare hei aapan laṛka ke dekhaay de hei. Aur Pita isse bhi baṛa kaam uske dekhaai ki tum sab ke achambha hoi.
Jeise Pita jon mar gais hei uske jeewan de hei, wahi rakam laṛka jiske maañge jeewan de sake hei.
Pita koi ke nyaay nai kare hei. Lekin u aapan laṛka ke sab ke uppar nyaay kare ke adhikaar de dees hei.
Pita maañge hei ki jeise sab uske aadar kare hei wahi rakam uske laṛka ke bhi aadar kare. Jon koi laṛka ke aadar nai kare hei u Pita jon uske bhejis hei uske bhi aadar nai kare hei.

Ham tum se sachche bolta hei, ki jon hamaar sandesa sune hei, aur jon hamme bhejis hei uspe biswaas kare hei, anant jeewan wahi ke mili. Uske saja kabhi nai mili. Ulog maut ke paar karke anant jeewan meñ aay gain hei.
Ham tumme bataata hei ki u ṭaaim aai, aur u aay gais hei, jab sab mara log Parmeshwar ke laṛka ke awaaj suni, aur khali yahi nai, jon sune hei, uske anant jeewan mili!
Pita ke lage sakti hei ki u jeewan dei, aur u wahi sakti aapan laṛka ke de dees hei.
Aur uske i bhi adhikaar dees hei ki u sab ke nyaay kare saki, kaahe ki u Manush ke laṛka hei.
Achambha nai karna! Ṭaaim aai ki jon sab mara log hei u sab Manush ke laṛka ke awaaj suni,
aur u sab aapan aapan kabar se nikar ke aai. Jon bhi koi jeewan meñ achchha kaam karis hei uske jeewan mili, lekin jon kharaab kaam karis hei uske saja mili.

Ham apne aap kuchh nai kare sakta. Pita jon hamme bhejis hei, wahi hamme bataay hei ki ham nyaay keise kari. Ham ṭheek se nyaay karta hei kaahe ki ham aapan nai lekin uske ichchha puura karta hei aur wahi ke sunta hei.
Agar ham aapan gawaahi khud dei, to u gawaahi sachcha nai hoi.
Lekin ek aur hei jon hamaar gawaahi dewe hei, aur ham janta hei ki u jon kuchh bhi bole hei wahi sachche hei.
Tum Yuhanna ke lage duut bheja, aur u sachchaai se gawaahi dees.
I nai ki log hamaar gawaahi dewe, lekin i sab ham i kaaran tum se bataata hei ki tum sab bache sako.
Yuhanna u batti raha jon bahut jaada añjora det raha, aur kuchh ṭaaim ke khaatir tum bhi u añjora meñ khusi manaaya.

Lekin hamaar lage jon gawaahi hei u Yuhanna ke gawaahi se bahut khaas hei. Kaahe ki jon kaam Pita hamme kare ke waaste dees hei jeise ki i kaam jon ham abhi karta hei, wahi hamaar gawaahi hei, ki Pita hamme bhejis hei.
Wahi Pita jon hamme bhejis hei, hamaar gawaahi de hei, lekin tum uske awaaj kabhi nai suna aur uske chehra bhi nai dekha.
Aur uske vachan bhi tum dil se nai maanta, kaahe ki jon uske bhejis hei, uspe tum biswaas nai karta.
Baaibal meñ tum khojta hei, kaahe ki tum sochta hei ki usman se tumme anant jeewan mili. Wahi Baaibal hei jon hamaar gawaahi de hei.
Fir bhi tum hamaar lage nai aata ki tumme anant jeewan mile.
Ham manush ke baṛaai nai mañgta.
Aur ham i bhi janta hei ki tum meñ se koi bhi Prabhu se prem nai kare hei.
Ham aapan Pita ke adhikaar se hiañ aaya hei, aur tum hamme nai apnaaya. Lekin agar koi aur naam se aai, to tum uske apnaayga.
Tum keise biswaas kare sakta hei? Tum wahi ke mañgta hei jon tumhaar baṛaai kare, aur tum uske parwaah nai karta jon khali Parmeshwar tumme de sake hei!
I nai sochna ki Pita se ham tumhaar chugli karega. Tum aapan bharosa Maozas pe rakha, aur wahi tumme jhuuṭa saabit kari.
Maozas hamaar baare meñ likhis hei, aur agar tum Maozas pe biswaas karta hei, to hamme bhi biswaas karta.
Jab tum Maozas ke likhaai pe biswaas nai karta, tab hamaar baat pe keise biswaas karega?
Iske baad Yeeshu, Galeel ke kunḍ jon Tabariyaas ke kunḍ ke naam se jaana jaay hei, uske u paar chala gais.
Ek baṛa bheeṛ jon dekhis raha ki chamatkaar se keise u bimaar ke achchha kare hei, uske pichchhe hoy leen.
Pahaaṛ pe chaṛh ke Yeeshu aapan chela log ke saathe beiṭh gais.
Yahuudi log ke fasah ke teohaar nagichche raha.
Jab Yeeshu dekhis ki ek baṛa bheeṛ uske lage aay hei, tab u Filip se bolis, “Hamme kahañ se etna khaana mili ki ham i sab log ke khawaay sakega?”
Yeeshu khali uske ajmaay ke waaste eise bolis raha, kaahe ke u to jaanat raha ki uske kaa kare ke hei.
Filip tab jawaab dees, “Sab ke khaatir thoṛa thoṛa baaṭe ke waaste, dui sao ḍola se kahiñ jaada ke to khali roṭi khareede ke paṛi.”
Yeeshu ke ek chela, Enḍru jon Saayman Peeṭa ke bhaiya raha, bolis,
“Hiañ ek laṛka hei jiske lage paañch roṭi aur dui machhri hei, lekin isse etna log ke waaste kaa hoi?”
“Sab ke laain meñ beiṭhaao,” Yeeshu usse bolis. Huañ pe bahut graas raha. Kul milaay ke kuchh paañch hajaar log rahin. U sab laain meñ graas pe beiṭh gain.
Tab Yeeshu aapan haath meñ roṭi le ke, Ishwar ke dhanbaad de ke jon sab laain meñ beiṭha rahin uske baaṭ dees. Wahi rakam machhri ke bhi karis, aur jetna ulog maañgat rahin, otna sab ke dees.
Sab log jetna khaay sakat rahin, otna khaain, aur Yeeshu aapan chela log se bolis, “Jetna ṭukṛa hei, sab baṭor leo, ki jisse kuchh barbaad nai hoy.”
Chela log baarah baaskeṭ meñ, u paañch roṭi ke bacha ṭukṛa se bhar leen.
Yeeshu ke i chakit kaam dekh ke sab log bole lagin, “Yahi to u nabi hei, jon ke dunia meñ aay ke raha!”
Yeeshu jaanat raha ki yahi log uske pakaṛ ke raaja banaai. Tab u pahaaṛ pe chala gais jahañ u akele rahe saki.
Sanjha ke ṭaaim, Yeeshu ke chela log kunḍ ke kinaare gain.
U sab bauṭ meñ beiṭh ke kunḍ ke dusra paar Kafarnahuum ṭaaun ke taraf chal paṛin. Raat bhi hoy gais aur Yeeshu abhi tak ulog ke lage nai aais raha.
Aur jor hawa chale lagis jisse baṛa baṛa halkora uṭhe lagis.
Jab ulog kareeban teen ya chaar kilomeeṭa bauṭ chalaay leen, tab dekhin ki Yeeshu paani pe chal ke ulog ke lage aay hei. Jeise jeise u nagichche aate gais, chela log ḍar gain.
Lekin Yeeshu ulog se bolis, “Ham Yeeshu hei! Ḍaro nai!”
Chela log Yeeshu ke bauṭ meñ beiṭhaay waala rahin ki kinaara aay gais.
Jon log kunḍ ke eesṭ ke bagal rahe gain raha i jaanat rahin ki huañ khali ekke bauṭ raha. Aur ulog i bhi jaanat rahin ki Yeeshu aapan chela log ke saathe nai gais raha.
Tabriyaas se kuchh bauṭ huañ aais jahañ Prabhu, dhanbaad de ke baad paañch hajaar log ke khaana khawaais raha.
U log dekhin ki Yeeshu aur uske chela huañ se chala gain hei. Tab ulog bauṭ meñ beiṭh ke Yeeshu ke khoje ke waaste Kafarnahuum gain.
U log Yeeshu ke kunḍ ke wesṭ meñ paain aur puuchhin, “Guru ji, tum hiañ kab aaya?”
Yeeshu bolis, “Ham sachche bolta hei, tum hamme i kaaran nai khojta hei ki tum hamme chakit kaam karte dekha hei, lekin i kaaran khojta hei ki tum jetna mañgta raha otna khaaya.

Kharaab hoy waala khaana ke khaatir mehnat nai karo, lekin weisan khaana ke khaatir mehnat karo jon hardam rahe, aur u tumme khali Manush ke laṛka dei, kaahe ke Pita yaane Parmeshwar uspe aapan adhikaar dees hei.”
U log puuchhis, “Parmeshwar kaa maañge hei ki ham uske khaatir kari?”
Yeeshu jawaab dees, “Parmeshwar maañge hei ki tum uspe biswaas karo jiske u bhejis hei.”
U sab jawaab deen, “Tab tum kaa chakit kaam karega ki ham biswaas kari? Tum kaa karega?
Jeise ki hamaar baap daada to jañgal meñ mana khaais raha, aur Baaibal meñ likha hei ki ulog ke swarag se roṭi khaay ke khaatir mila raha.”
Tab Yeeshu u sab ke bataais, “Ham tum se sachche bolta hei ki tumme swarag ke roṭi Maozas nai dees raha. Hamaar Pita jon swarag meñ hei wahi tumme sachcha swarag ke roṭi de hei.
U Parmeshwar ke roṭi hei jon swarag se utar ke nichche dunia meñ aay ke jeewan de hei.”
Ulog tab bolin, “Prabhu, hamme hardam wahi roṭi dena!”
Yeeshu jawaab dees, “Jeewan ke roṭi ham hei! Jon koi bhi hamaar lage aay hei, u kabhi bhuuka nai rahi. Jon koi bhi ham pe biswaas kare hei, u pyaasa nai rahi.
Ham tum se bol dia hei ki tum dekh ke bhi ham pe biswaas nai karta.
Jon koi ke bhi aur jon bhi cheej hamaar Pita hamme dees hei, u hamaar lage aai, aur ham uske kabhi duur nai karega.
Kaahe ke ham aapan waaste nai lekin jon hamme bhejis hei uske ichchha puura kare ke waaste swarag se aaya hei.
Aur jon hamme bhejis hei u maañge hei ki jiske u bhejis hei u sab kabhi heraay nai. Uske badle meñ u maañge hei ki aakhri roj ham u sab ke fir se jinda kar dei.
Hamaar Pita ke i ichchha hei ki jon koi bhi laṛka ke dekh ke aur uspe biswaas kari, u anant jeewan paai aur ham uske aakhri roj jinda kar dega.
Sab log bhunbhunaay lagin kaahe ke Yeeshu bolis raha ki wahi u roṭi hei jon swarag se aais hei.
Ulog ek dusra se puuchhe lagin, “Kaa i Josaf ke laṛka Yeeshu nai hei? Kaa ham iske amma bappa ke nai janta? I keise bole hei ki i swarag se aais hei?”
Yeeshu tab u sab se bolis, “Bhunbhunaao nai!
Koi bhi hamaar paas nai aay sake, jab tak hamaar Pita jon hamme bhejis hei, nai maañgi. Agar ulog aai, to ham ulog ke aakhri roj jinda karega.
Ek nabi likhis raha, 'Prabhu sab ke sikhaai.’ Yahi khaatir jon koi Pita ke sune hei aur usse seekhe hei aur wahi log hamaar lage aai.
Pita ke bagal se jon aais hei khali wahi Pita ke dekhis hei. Uske chhoṛ ke koi aur Pita ke nai dekhis hei.
Ham tum se sachche bolta hei ki jon koi ham pe biswaas kare hei wahi ke anant jeewan mili.
Ham jeewan ke roṭi hei!
Tumhaar baap daada jañgal meñ mana khaay ke mar gain.
Lekin i u roṭi hei jon swarag se utris hei, ki jisse jon koi bhi khaai u kabhi nai mari.
Hamahi u jeewan ke roṭi hei jon swarag se utris hei! Jon koi bhi i roṭi khaai u sab roj jinda rahi. Aur jon roṭi jeewan ke khaatir ham dunia ke log ke dega, u hamaar deñhi hei.”
Ispe Yahuudi log aapas meñ baad biwaad karin aur puuchhin, “I keise aapan deñhi hamme khaay ke waaste dei?”
Yeeshu jawaab dees, “Ham tum se sachche bolta hei, jab tak tum Manush ke laṛka ke deñhi nai khaayga aur uske khuun nai piyega, tum nai jiyega.
Agar tum hamaar deñhi khaayga aur hamaar khuun piyega, to tumme anant jeewan mili, aur ham tumme aakhri roj jiyaay dega.
Hamaar deñhi asli khaana hei, aur hamaar khuun asli piye ke cheej hei.
Agar tum hamaar deñhi khaayga aur hamaar khuun piyega, tum ham meñ rahega aur ham tum meñ rahega.
Jeise jeewit Pita hamme bhejis hei, aur ham Pita ke kaaran jinda hei, weisaiyeñ jon hamaar deñhi khaay hei, u hamaar kaaran jinda rahi.
Jon roṭi swarag se utris hei weisan nai hei jon tumhaar baap daada khaain hei. Ulog to mar gain hei, lekin jon koi i roṭi khaai u hardam jinda rahi.”
I sab baat Yeeshu Kafarnahuum ke ek chech meñ updes dete ṭaaim bolis raha.
Uske kaafi chela log i baat sunin aur usse puuchhin, “I to bahut kaṛa baat hei, iske kon suni?”
Yeeshu jaanat raha ki uske chela log bhunbhunaay hei. Tab u puuchhis, “Etna chhoṭa baat ke kaaran tumhaar biswaas hil gais hei?
U ṭaaim kaa hoi jab tum sab dekhega ki Manush ke laṛka uppar swarag jaay hei jahañ se u aais hei?
Aatma hee jeewan dees hei! Manush ke taakat kuchh nai kare sake. Jon baat ham tum se bataaya hei, u jeewan de waala Aatma se aais hei.
Fir bhi tum meñ se ketna ham pe biswaas nai kare maañge hei.” Yeeshu i sab baat bolis kaahe ke u suru se jaanat raha ki kon kon uspe biswaas kare hei. U i bhi jaanat raha ki uske kon pakaṛwaai.
Tab Yeeshu bolis, “Tum hamaar lage nai aay sakta, jab tak Pita nai chaahi. Yahi khaatir ham i sab baat tum sab se bataaya hei.”
Yahi sab baat ke kaaran bahut se chela log uske saath chhoṛ deen.
Tab Yeeshu aapan baarah chela log se puuchhis, “Aur tum sab? Kaa tum bhi hamme chhoṛe mañgta hei?”
Saayman Peeṭa jawaab dees, “Prabhu, ham kiske lage jaai? Anant jeewan ke baat to khali tumhaar lage hei.
Ham tum pe biswaas karta hei, aur i bhi jaan lia hei ki tumahi Parmeshwar ke pawitr jan hei.”
Tab Yeeshu aapan chela log se bolis, “Ham, tum baarah log ke chuna, lekin tum meñ se ek saitaan hei!”
Yeeshu to Saayman Iskariyoti ke putr Juḍas ke baare meñ bolis raha jon u baarah chela meñ se ek raha. Wahi aage chal ke Yeeshu ke pakaṛwaai.
Iske baad Yeeshu Galeel gais. U Juḍia nai jaay maañgat raha, kaahe ke huañ pe Yahuudi agua log uske maare ke waaste rasta khojat rahin.
U ṭaaim Yahuudi log ke poch banaay waala teohaar nagichche raha.
Aur Yeeshu ke bhaiya log usse bolin, “Tum kaahe nai Juḍia chala jaata hei? Tab tumhaar chela log bhi dekhe saki ki tum kaa karta hei.
Kaahe ki jon koi bhi naami bane maañge hei, to u luk ke kaam nai kari. Yahi khaatir dunia ke janaao ki tum kaa karta hei!”
Abhi tak Yeeshu ke bhaiya bhi uspe biswaas nai karat rahin.
Yeeshu jawaab dees, “Hamaar ṭaaim abhi nai aais hei, lekin tumhaar ṭaaim to hardam ek rakam rahe hei.
Sansaar ke log tumme haiṭ nai kari. Lekin wahi log ham se dusmani rakkhe hei kaahe ke ham uske bataay deta hei ki ulog kharaab kaam kare hei.
Tum sab teohaar meñ jaao. Hamaar ṭaaim abhi nai aais hei, aur ham nai jaayga.”
I sab bol ke Yeeshu wahiñ Galeel meñ ruk gais.
Jab Yeeshu ke sab bhaiya teohaar meñ chala gais, tab u bhi chuppe se huañ gais.
Teohaar ke ṭaaim Yahuudi agua log Yeeshu ke khojat rahin, aur sab se puuchhat rahin, “U kahañ hei?”
Aur sab koi chuppe chuppe Yeeshu ke baare meñ baat kare lagin, kuchh to bolat rahin, “Yeeshu achchha admi hei,” aur kuchh bolat rahin, “U sab ke kharaab rasta dekhaay hei.”
Lekin Yahuudi agua ke ḍar ke maare koi Yeeshu ke baare meñ khul ke nai bolat rahin.
Jab teohaar aadha khalaas hoy gais raha, tab Yeeshu chech meñ gais aur updes de laga.
Uske updes sunke Yahuudi agua log chakit hoy gain, aur bolin, “Iske gyaan kahañ se mila? I to kabhi skuul bhi nai gais hei!”
Yeeshu jawaab dees, “Jon updes ham deta hei, u hamaar bagal se nai hei, lekin jon hamme bhejis hei uske bagal se hei.
Agar koi sachche ke uske ichchha puura kare maañge hei to u jaan lei ki ham jon kuchh bhi sikhaata hei u Parmeshwar ke bagal se aay hei, hamaar bagal se nai.
Agar ham aapan baṛaai mañgta, to ham aapan bagal se bolta. Lekin ham aapan bheje waala ke baṛaai mañgta hei, yahi khaatir ham sachche bolta hei jhuuṭ nai.
Kaa Maozas Parmeshwar ke kaanuun tumme nai dees? Fir bhi tum sab uske nai maanta hei! Tab kaahe ke tum sab hamme maare mañgta hei?”
Tab sab log jawaab deen, “Tum pagla hei! Tumme keise pata hei ki koi tumme maare maañge hei?”
Yeeshu bolis, “Jab ham ek chamatkaar dekhaaya, tab tum chakit hoy gaya.
Yahi kaaran Maozas khatna ke aagya dees raha. U Maozas ke bagal se nai raha lekin tumhaar baap daada se chala aais hei. Tum to sabat ke din bhi laṛka log ke khatna karta hei.
Jab sabat ke roj laṛka log ke khatna kare ke, Maozas ke kaanuun ke mutaabik achchha hei to ham se kaahe ke gussa hei ki sabat ke roj ham ek admi ke achchha kara.
Muh dekh ke nyaay nai karo, lekin raaiṭ rakam se nyaay karo.”
I baat pe Yarushalam ke kuchh log bolin, “Kaa i wahi admi nai jiske sab log maare maañgat rahin?
Dekho i sab se baat kare hei, fir bhi iske koi kuchh nai bole hei. Kaa eise to nai ki hamaar agua log iske sachcha maan leen hei ki yahi Maseeh hei?
Lekin i keise hoy sake hei? Iske to ham janta hei ki i kahañ ke hei, lekin jab Maseeh aai to koi nai jaani ki u kahañ ke hei.”
Yeeshu chech meñ updes de ke ṭaaim chillaay ke bolis, “Kaa tum sachche ke janta hei ki ham kahañ se aaya hei? Ham apne aap nai aaya! Jon hamme bhejis hei u sachcha hei, aur tum uske nai janta.
Lekin ham janta hei ki hamme kon bhejis hei, kaahe ke ham uske bagal se aaya hei.”
Ispe kuchh log Yeeshu ke wahi ṭaaim pakṛe maañgat rahin. Lekin koi bhi uspe haath nai lagaais, kaahe ke abhi uske ṭaaim nai aais raha.
Ulog meñ se bahut log rahin jon Yeeshu pe biswaas karat rahin, aur bolin, “Jab Maseeh aai, to kaa i admi se jaada chamatkaar dekhaai!”
Jab Farisi log sunin ki Yeeshu ke baare meñ log kaa bole hei, to u sab Baṛa Paadri ke sañghe milke chech ke pulis ke bhejis ki Yeeshu ke pakaṛ le.
Lekin Yeeshu usse bolis, “Ham to tumhaar sañghe thoṛa deri aur rahega, aur tab ham huañ chala jaayga jahañ hamaar bheje waala hei.
Tum hamme khojega lekin nai paayga. Tum huañ nai jaay sakta jahañ ham jaata hei.”
Yahuudi agua log ek dusra se puuchhe lagin, “I kahañ jaay hei jahañ ham iske nai paayga? Kaa i koi duur des jaay hei jahañ hamaar log rahe hei? Kaa i Greek log ke bhi updes dei?
I bole hei ki ham iske khojega, lekin khoj nai paayga, iske matlab kaa hei? Kaahe nai ham huañ jaay sakta hei jahañ i jaay hei?”
Teohaar ke aakhri aur khaas roj Yeeshu khaṛa hoy ke chillaay ke bolis, “Agar tum pyaasa hei, to hamaar paas aao aur pio!
Jeise ki Baaibal meñ likha hei, jon ham pe biswaas kari, uske bhittar se jeewan ke paani bahi.”
I vachan u Pawitr Aatma ke baare meñ bolis, jon ki khali biswaas kare waala ke mili. Aatma abhi koi ke bhi nai mila, kaahe ke Yeeshu ke abhi puura mahima nai mila hei.
Jab bheeṛ sunis ki Yeeshu kaa bole hei, to usman se kuchh bolin, “I to nabi hoy sake hei!”
Dusra log bolin, “I to Maseeha hei!” Kuchh aur log bolin, “Kaa Maseeha Galeel se aay sake hei?”
Baaibal bole hei ki Maseeha, Raaja Ḍeiviḍ ke palwaar se aai. Kaa iske matlab i nai hoy hei ki uske janam Bethlaham gaaoñ meñ hoi jahañ Ḍeiviḍ rahe hei?”
Yeeshu ke kaaran huañ ke log meñ dusmani hoy gais.
Kuchh admi uske pakṛwaay maañgat rahin, lekin uske haath nai lagaay sakin.
Jab chech ke pulis, baṛa paadri aur Farisi log ke lage lauṭ aain, tab usse puuchha gais, “Tum kaahe Yeeshu ke nai laaya?”
Ulog bolin, “Koi bhi abhi tak u admi ke rakam baat nai karis!”
Farisi log usse bolin, “Kaa tum bhi pagla hoy gaya hei?
Koi bhi adhikaari ya Farisi uspe kabhi biswaas nai karis.
Aur ilog jon kaanuun nai jaane, uspe Parmeshwar ke saraap hei.”
Nikoḍimas bhi u ṭaaim huañ raha. U huañ ke ek adhikaari raha, aur ek dafe pahile Yeeshu ke lage aais raha.
U bolis, “Hamaar kaanuun ke mutaabik ham koi admi ke saja nai de sakta jab tak ham uske baat nai sun lei aur i jaan lei ki u kaa karis raha.”
Tab u sab bolin, “Nikoḍimas, saait tum Galeel se aaya hei! Baaibal paṛho, aur tumme pata lagi ki koi bhi nabi Galeel se nai aais hei.”
Aur sab aapan aapan ghare chala gain.
Yeeshu Jaituun pahaaṛ pe chala gais.
Dusra din sabere u chech gais. Sab log uske lage aain, Yeeshu beiṭh ke u sab ke sikhaay laga.
Tab kaanuun ke guru aur Farisi log ek aurat ke le ke aain, u aurat aḍalṭri meñ pakṛi gay rahi. U log uske sab ke beech meñ khaṛa kar deen.
Tab u sab bolin, “Guru ji, i aurat ek dusra admi jon iske admi nai raha, ke sañghe sote pakṛi gais.
Maozas ke kaanuun hamme bataay hei ki eisan aurat ke patthar se maar deke chaahi! Tum kaa bolta hei?”
I sawaal ulog Yeeshu se i kaaran karin raha, kaahe ke ulog uske fasaay maañgat rahin aur dos lagaay maañgat rahin. Lekin Yeeshu nichche jhuk ke uñgri se maṭṭi pe likhe lagis.
Ulog Yeeshu se sawaal puuchhte rahin. Aakhri meñ Yeeshu khaṛa hoy ke bolis, “Agar tum meñ se koi kabhi paap nai kara hei to, pahila patthar se iske maaro!”
Fir se u jhuk ke maṭṭi pe likhe laga.
I baat sun ke baṛa se leke chhoṭa tak ek ek kar ke sab chal deen. Aakhri meñ, Yeeshu aur u aurat akele rahe gais.
Yeeshu khaṛa hoy ke puuchhis, “Sab kahañ hei? Kaa koi nai bacha jon tumme saja dei?”
U aurat bolis, “Prabhu, koi nai.” Tab Yeeshu usse bolis, “Ham bhi tumme saja nai dega. Tum ab jaao, lekin ab se paap nai karna.”
Ek dafe fir Yeeshu bheeṛ se baat karis. I dafe u bolis, “Ham dunia ke jyoti hei! Hamaar pichchhe aao, aur tum kabhi añdhera meñ nai chalega. Tumhaar lage u roshni rahi jon jeewan de hei.”
Farisi log nai maanin aur bolin, “Tumahi ek hei jon aapan baare meñ bolta hei, aur jon tum bolta hei, u sachche nai hei!”

Yeeshu jawaab dees, “Agar ham aapan baare meñ bolta hei, to i sab baat sachcha hei! Kaahe ke ham janta hei ki ham kahañ se aaya hei aur kahañ jaayga. Lekin tum sab nai janta hei ki ham kahañ se aaya hei aur kahañ jaata hei.
Tum sab i dunia ke log ke ekke rakam feisla karta hei, lekin ham koi ke feisla nai karta.
Agar ham feisla kari, to ham insaaf ke saath feisla karega, kaahe ke ham akele feisla nai sunaata. Hamaar Pita jon hamme bhejis hei hamaar sañghe rahe hei.
Tumhaar kaanuun maañge hei ki aur koi cheej ke maana jaay ke khaatir dui gawaah ke jaruurat hei
Ham aapan gawaahi khud deta hei, aur hamaar Pita jon hamme bhejis hei, u bhi hamaar gawaahi de hei.
Tab ulog puuchhin, “Tumhaar Pita kahañ hei?” “Tum hamme aur hamaar Pita ke nai janta!” Yeeshu bolis, “Agar tum hamme janta to hamaar Pita ke bhi janta.”
Yeeshu i sab baat tab bolis raha, jab u jahañ daan waala ḍibba rakha jaay hei, huañ updes dewat raha. Fir bhi koi uske nai pakṛis, kaahe ke uske ṭaaim abhi nai aais raha.
Yeeshu fir aur log se bolis, “Ham jaata hei, aur tum sab hamme khojega. Lekin tum sab huañ nai jaay sakta hei jahañ ham jaata hei, tum sab aapan paap meñ marega.”
Tab Yahuudi guru log puuchhin, “Kaa i apne aap ke maare maañge hei? Iske matlab kaa hei jab i bole hei ki ham huañ nai jaay sakta jahañ i jaai?”
Yeeshu bolis, “Tum nichche ke hei, lekin ham uppar ke hei. Tum i dunia ke hei lekin ham i dunia ke nai hei.
Yahi kaaran ham bola ki tum sab aapan aapan paap meñ marega. Agar tum biswaas nai karta ki ham “Ham hei” to tum aapan paap meñ marega.
Sab log puuchhis, “Tum kon hei?” Yeeshu jawaab dees, “Wahi jon ham suru se bataate aaya hei.
Tumhaar baare meñ hamme aur bahut bole ke hei aur feisla kare ke hei, lekin jon hamme bhejis hei, u sachcha hei, jon bhi kuchh ham usse suna hei, wahi dunia ke bataata hei.”
Koi nai samjhis ki Yeeshu aapan Pita ke baare meñ baat kare hei.
Yeeshu aur aage bolis, “Jab tum Manush ke laṛka ke uppar uṭhaayga, tab jaanega ki, ‘Ham wahi hei’ aur ham apne aap se kuchh nai karta, lekin ham wahi bolta hei jon Pita Parmeshwar hamme bataais hei.
Jon hamme bhejis hei, u hamaar sañghe hei. Ham hardam wahi karta jon u maañge hei, aur u hamme kabhi nai chhoṛi.”
Jab Yeeshu i sab bol dees, to kaafi log uspe biswaas karin.
Jon log Yeeshu pe biswaas karin, usse Yeeshu bolis, “Agar tum hamaar baat pe chalo to sachche ke hamaar chela hei.
Tum sachchaai jaanega, aur wahi sachchaai tumme chhuṭkaara dewaai.”
U sab jawaab deen, “Ham sab Abraham ke khaandaan ke hei! Ham kabhi kisi ke gulaami nai kara. Kon rakam se ham aajaad hoyga?”
Yeeshu jawaab dees, “Ham sachche bolta hei ki jon koi bhi paap kare hei, u paap ke gulaam hei!
Aur gulaam, hardam ekke ghar meñ nai rahe hei, lekin laṛka sada ekke palwaar ke sañghe rahe hei.
Agar laṛka tumme ajaadi de hei to tum ajaad hei!
Ham janta hei ki tum Abraham ke khaandaan ke hei. Fir bhi tum hamme maare mañgta hei, kaahe ke hamaar sandes tumme achchha nai lage hei.
Ham wahi bolta hei jon ham aapan Pita ke hiañ dekha hei, wahi rakam jeise tum wahi karta hei jon tum aapan Pita (Abraham) se suna hei.”
Tab sab log Yeeshu se bolin, “Hamaar Pita Abraham hei!” Yeeshu jawaab dees, “Agar tum sachche ke Abraham ke laṛkan hota to wahi karta jon Abraham karis raha.
Fir bhi tum hamme maare mañgta hei, kaahe ke ham wahi sachcha baat bataata hei jon hamaar Pita hamme dees hei. Abraham to kabhi eise nai karis raha.
Lekin tum wahi karta hei jon tumhaar Pita karis raha.” Ulog tab bolin, “Ham log pe dos nai lagaao ki ham log ke bappa koi aur hei. Parmeshwar hamaar Pita hei, aur ham sab uske laṛkan hei.”
Yeeshu tab bolis, “Agar Parmeshwar tumhaar Pita hota, to tum sab ham se prem karta, kaahe ke ham khali Parmeshwar ke bagal se aaya hei. U hamme bhejis hei. Ham apne aap nai aaya hei.
Tum kaahe nai samajhta hei ki ham kaa bolta hei? Kaa tum hamaar baat sunke sahe nai sakta hei?

Tumhaar Pita to saitaan hei, aur tum wahi karta hei jon u maañge hei. U suru se hatyaara aur jhuuṭa raha. Usman kuchh sach nai hei. U aapan bhaasha bole hei, aur jon kuchh bhi bole hei, u sab jhuuṭ hei. U khali jhuuṭa nai hei lekin u sab jhuuṭ ke baap hei.
Jon kuchh bhi ham bola hei, u sab sach hei, aur tum abhi bhi ham pe biswaas nai karta.
Tum meñ se kon i saabit kare sake hei ki ham paapi hei? Agar koi nai to kaahe ke hampe biswaas nai karta? Aakhir, ham sachche bolta hei.
Jon koi bhi Parmeshwar ke hei, u uske sandes suni. Lekin tum Parmeshwar ke nai hei, yahi kaaran tum uske baat nai sunta.”
Log Yeeshu se bolis, “Ham sab sachche bolat raha ki tum Saamri hei, tum meñ saitaan hei!”
Yeeshu jawaab dees, “Ham meñ saitaan nai hei. Ham aapan Pita ke aadar karta hei, lekin tum hamme aadar nai karta.
Ham aapan baṛaai nai mañgta. Lekin ek hei jon maañge hei ki hamaar aadar hoy, aur u wahi hei jon hamaar waaste nyaay kare hei.
Ham tum se sachche bolta hei ki agar koi hamaar baat maan ke uspe chale hei to kabhi nai mare hei.”
Tab fir Yahuudi log bolin, “Ab hamme biswaas hoy gais hei ki tum meñ saitaan hei. Abraham to mar gais hei, aur sab nabi bhi. Keise tum bole sakta hei ki jon tum pe biswaas kari u kabhi nai mari?
Kaa tum Abraham se bhi baṛa hei? U to mar gais hei, aur sab nabi bhi mar gais hei. Tum apne aap ke kaa samajhta hei?”
Yeeshu jawaab dees, “Agar ham apne aap aapan baṛaai kari to kaa faayda. Hamaar Pita hei jon hamaar baṛaai kare hei. Tum bhi to bolta hei ki u tumhaar Parmeshwar hei.
Tum to uske nai janta hei. Agar ham boli ki ham uske nai janta hei, to ham tum sab ke rakam jhuuṭa hoy jaayga. Lekin ham uske janta hei, aur i bhi janta hei ki u kaa bole hei.
Tumhaar Pita Abraham hamme dekh ke bahut khusi bhais raha.”
Tab Yahuudi log usse bolis, “Abhi to tum pachaas ke bhi nai hei! Keise tum bole sakta hei ki tum Abraham ke dekha hei?
Yeeshu jawaab dees, “Ham tum se sachche bolta hei, Abraham ke peida hoy se pahile se ham hei.”
Tab sab log Yeeshu ke maare ke waaste patthar uṭhaain, lekin u chuppe se chech se chala gais.
Rasta meñ Yeeshu ek admi ke dekhis, jon janam se añdha raha.
Yeeshu ke chela log usse puuchhis, “Guru ji, i admi kaahe ke añdha peida bhais hei? Kon paap karis raha, i admi, ki iske amma bappa?”
Yeeshu jawaab dees, “Nai, i kaaran nai raha! Lekin iske añdha hoy ke kaaran, tum sab dekhega, keise Parmeshwar iske khaatir chamatkaar kari.
Jab tak din rahi, hamme u kaam kare ke hei, jiske waaste u hamme bhejis hei. Jab raat hoy jaai, koi kaam nai kare saki.
Jab tak ham dunia meñ hei, ham i dunia ke jyoti hei.”
I baat bol ke Yeeshu maṭṭi pe thuukis, thuuk se maṭṭi ke saan ke u añdha ke aañkhi pe lagaay dees.
Tab u bolis, “Silom ke kunḍ meñ jaay ke aapan aañkhi dhoy leo.” U admi huañ jaay ke aapan aañkhi dhoy lees aur dekhe laga. Silom ke matlab hei, jon bheja gais hei
Uske paṛosi aur ulog jon uske bheek maañgat dekhat rahin, bolin, “Kaa i u admi nai jon huañ beiṭh ke bheek maañgat raha?”
Kuchh admi bolin ki u wahi bhikhaari hei, baaki log bolin ki i u admi nai hei lekin uske rakam lage hei. Lekin u sab se bataais, “Ham wahi admi hei.”
“Tab tum keise dekhe sakta hei?” ulog puuchhin.
U jawaab dees, “Yeeshu naam ke admi maṭṭi saan ke hamaar aañkhi pe lagaais aur bolis ki Silom ke kunḍ meñ jaay ke aapan aañkhi dhoy leo. Ham huañ jaay ke aapan aañkhi dhoy lia aur dekhe laga.”
“Ab u kahañ hei?” ulog puuchhin. “Ham nai janta,” u bolis.
Tab ulog u admi ke jon añdha raha aur dekhe laga raha, Farisi ke paas le gais.
Jon din Yeeshu uske aañkhi kholis raha, u sabat ke din raha.
Farisi log usse fir se puuchhin, ki u keise dekhe lagis hei, aur u fir jawaab dees, “Yeeshu maṭṭi saan ke hamaar aañkhi pe lagaais. Aur jab ham dhoy lia tab dekhe laga.”

Kuchh Farisi tab bolin, “I admi Parmeshwar ke bagal se nai aais hei. Agar aata to sabat ke kaanuun ke nai tuuṛta.” Dusra log bolin, “I bataao ki keise ek paapi eisan chamatkaari kaam kare sake hei?” Aur u sab dui bhaag meñ baṭ gain.
Farisi log ek dafe fir se u admi se puuchhin, “U admi ke baare meñ tum kaa bolta hei, jon tumhaar aañkhi achchha karis raha?” “U nabi hei.” u bolis.
