Lekin Yahuudi agua log biswaas nai kare maañgat rahin, ki u admi añdha raha. U log uske amma-bappa ke bulaain,
aur puuchhin, “Kaa i tumhaar u laṛka hei jon añdha peida bhais raha? Ab u keise dekhe sake hei?”
U admi ke maiya-bappa bolin, “Ham janta hei ki i hamaar laṛka hei, aur i bhi janta hei ki i añdha peida bhais raha.
Lekin ham i nai janta ki ab i keise dekhe sake hei, aur kon iske aañkhi kholis. Wahi se puuchho! U ab baṛa hoy gais hei aur aapan baare meñ apne bataay sake hei.”
Uske maiya-bappa i baat i kaaran bolin raha ki u Yahuudi log se ḍarat rahin. Kaahe ke agua log bol deen raha ki jon koi bhi Yeeshu Maseeh se kuchh sambandh rakkhi uske chech se nikaar dewa jaai.
Yahi kaaran ulog bolin raha, “U baṛa hoy gais hei, wahi se puuchho.”
Fir se ek dafe Yahuudi agua log u admi ke bolaay ke bolin, “Parmeshwar ke aage sachche bolo! Ham sab janta hei ki u admi ek paapi hei.”
U admi bolis, “Ham nai janta ki u paapi hei ki nai. Ham to bas etna janta ki ham añdha raha aur ab dekhe sakta hei!”
“U tumhaar sañghe kaa karis?” Yahuudi agua log bolin. “Keise tumhaar aañkhi achchha karis?”
U admi jawaab dees, “Ham to tum se ek dafe bataay dia hei. Tum to sune nai mañgta hei. Kaahe ke tum mañgta hei ki ham fir se bataai? Kaa tum bhi uske chela bane mañgta hei?”
Ispe Yahuudi agua log uspe gussaay ke bolin, “Tum uske chela hoyga! Ham to Maozas ke chela hei!
Ham sab janta hei ki Parmeshwar Maozas se baat karis raha, lekin ham i nai janta ki Yeeshu kahañ se aais hei.”
U admi jawaab dees, “Ham chakit hei! U hamaar aañkhi achchha karis, fir bhi tum nai janta ki u kahañ se aais hei?
Ham janta hei ki Parmeshwar khali wahi ke sune hei, jon usse prem kare hei aur uske baat maane hei. Parmeshwar paapi ke nai sune hei.
Hisṭri meñ i pahila dafe dekha gais hei ki koi janam ke añdha ke aañkhi kholis hei.
Yeeshu i nai kare sakta agar u Parmeshwar ke lage se nai aata.”
Agua log u admi se bolin, “Tum jab se janam lia tab se paapi raha! Kaa tum hamme kuchh sikhaay sakta hei?” Fir ulog bolin, “Tum ab hamaar chech meñ kabhi nai aana!”
Jab Yeeshu sunis ki kaa bhais hei, tab u admi ke lage gais, aur puuchhis, “Kaa Manush ke laṛka meñ tum biswaas karta hei?”
U jawaab dees, “He Prabhu, agar tum bataayga ki u kon hei, tab ham uspe biswaas karega.”
Yeeshu jawaab dees, “Tum to uske dekh lia hei aur u wahi hei jon se tum baat karta hei.”
U admi bolis, “Prabhu, ham puura biswaas karta hei!” aur Yeeshu ke aage ghuṭna ṭek lees.
Yeeshu tab usse bolis, “Ham dunia meñ nyaay ke waaste aaya hei, ki jon nai dekhe hei, u dekhe lage aur jon dekhe hei u añdha hoy jaay.”
Jab Farisi log i baat sunin to bolin, “Kaa ham añdha hei?”
Yeeshu jawaab dees, “Agar tum añdha hota to paapi nai hota, lekin tum bolta hei ki tumme dekhaay hei, aur yahi kaaran tum paapi bhaya.”
Yeeshu bolis, “Ham tum se sachche bolta hei, ki jon duaari se nai lekin dusra rasta se bheṛa ke gaiṭ ke bhittar jaay hei, u chor aur ḍaaku hei.
Lekin jon duaari se bhittar jaay hei u bheṛa log ke shepaḍ rahe hei.
Uske khaatir gaiṭkeepa gaiṭ khol dewe hei, aur u bhittar chala jaay hei. Bheṛa log bhi uske awaaj jaan le hei. U ek ek ke naam leke bolaay hei aur bahire le jaay hei.
Jab u aapan sab bheṛa ke nikaar le hei tab u aage aage chale hei, aur uske bheṛa uske pichchhe pichchhe chale hei, kaahe ki u sab uske awaaj jaane hei.
Bheṛa koi aur admi ke pichchhe nai chali. U sab uske awaaj nai jaani aur duur bhaag jaai.”
Yeeshu i kahaani u sab ke sunaais, lekin ulog samajh nai paain ki u kaa bole hei.
Yahi kaaran Yeeshu fir se bolis, “Ham tum se sachche bolta hei ki sab bheṛa ke duaari hamahi hei.
Jon sab ham se aage aay rahin, u sab chor aur ḍaaku rahin aur bheṛa usman se koi ke nai sunin.
Ham gaiṭ hei. Jon koi ham se bhittar aai uske uddhaar hoi, u bahire aur bhittar aay jaay saki aur chaara paai.
Chor to khali chori kare, jaan se maare aur nuksaan kare aay hei. Ham to aaya hei ki u sab ke jeewan mile, aur puura jeewan mile.
Hamahi achchha shepaḍ hei, jon aapan bheṛa ke waaste jaan bhi de sake hei.
Ek majduur, jon maalik bhi nai hei aur shepaḍ bhi nai hei, bheṛiya ke aate dekh ke bhaag jaay hei, tab bheṛiya bheṛa ke pakaṛ le hei aur baaki ke idhar udhar bhagaay de hei.
Majduur bhaag jaay hei kaahe ki u to khali ek majduur hei aur uske kuchh parwaah nai rahe hei.
Ham achchha shepaḍ hei. Ham aapan bheṛa ke janta hei aur u sab hamme jaane hei.
Wahi rakam jeise hamaar Pita hamme jaane hei aur ham aapan Pita ke janta hei, ham aapan bheṛa ke khaatir jaan bhi de sakta hei.
Hamaar paas aur bhi bheṛa hei jon i gaiṭ meñ nai hei. Jab u hamaar awaaj suni tab hamme uske bhi jaay ke laay ke hei. Tab khali ekke gaiṭ rahi aur ekke shepaḍ rahi.
Pita ham se prem kare hei, kaahe ki ham aapan jaan dewe ke khaatir taiyaar hei, ki jisse ham uske fir se paay lei.

Hamaar laaif ke ham se koi nai chheene sake hei, lekin ham apne uske khusi se deta hei. Hamme aapan laaif dewe ke adhikaar hei, i bhi adhikaar hei ki uske fir se lauṭaay lei. Aur yahi hei jon hamaar Pita hamme hukum dees hei.”
Yahi baat ke kaaran admi log meñ dui bhaag hoy gais.
Bahut log bolin, “Isman saitaan hei aur i to pagla hei! Tab iske kaahe ke suno?”
Lekin kuchh aur log bolat rahin, “Jon admi meñ saitaan rahe hei, u eisan baat nai kare sake hei! Keise ek saitaan ek añdha ke aañkhi achchha kare sake hei?”
Ṭhanḍa ke mausam raha. Yarushalam meñ chech ke teohaar manaawa jaat raha.
Yeeshu chech ke Soloman duaari ke baranḍa pe ghuumat raha.
Yahuudi log uske chaaro taraf se gher leen aur puuchhin, “Tum kab tak hamme ḍaauṭ meñ rakkhega? Agar tum Maseeh hei to hamme sachche bataay deo.”
Yeeshu jawaab dees, “Ham tumme bataay dia, lekin tum hamaar biswaas nai karta. Jon kaam ham Pita ke naam se karta hei usse to tum samajh jaao.
Lekin tum biswaas nai karega kaahe ki tum hamaar bheṛa nai hei.
Hamaar bheṛa to hamaar awaaj sune hei, ham ulog ke janta hei aur ulog hamaar pichchhe aay hei.
Ham u sab ke anant jeewan deta hei, aur u kabhi nai mari aur u sab ke ham se koi nai chheene saki.
Jon hamaar Pita hamme dees hei wahi sab se mahaan hei aur uske koi bhi hamaar Pita se nai chheene saki.
Pita aur ham ek hei.”
Fir se Yahuudi log Yeeshu ke maare ke waaste patthar uṭhaain.
Yeeshu u sab se bolis, “Tumhaar saamne ham ketna achchha kaam jon Pita hamme dees raha, kara, isman se kon kaam ke waaste tum sab hamme patthar se maare mañgta hei?”
U log bolin, “Achchha kaam ke waaste ham tumme nai maarta hei, lekin jon tum Parmeshwar ke ninda karta hei uske khaatir! Tum to khali ek manush hei, lekin tum apne aap ke Ishwar banaay mañgta hei!”
Tab Yeeshu jawaab dees, “Tumhaar vachan meñ kaa i nai likha ki Parmeshwar bolis raha, ‘Tum sab Ishwar hei?’
Tum vachan ke jhuuṭa nai bole sakta, aur Parmeshwar wahi log se baat karis aur ulog ke Ishwar bolis.
Parmeshwar hamme chunke dunia meñ bhejis, tab tum keise bolta hei ki ham Ishwar ke ninda karta hei? Ham to i bola ki ham Parmeshwar ke laṛka hei.”
Agar ham u kaam nai karta jon hamaar Pita maañge hei to ham pe biswaas nai karo.

Aur agar ham u kaam kari jon hamaar Pita kare hei, to tum ham pe biswaas karo, chaahe tumme ham pe bharosa hei ya nai. Aur tab tum samajh lega ki wahi Pita hamaar sañghe hei, aur ham wahi hei jon Pita ke sañghe hei.
Ek dafe fir Yeeshu ke ulog pakṛe ke kosis karin, lekin u sab ke haath se nikar gais.
Aur Joḍan nadi ke paar u jagha pe chala gais, jahañ Yuhanna pahile baptisma det raha.
Jab Yeeshu huañ raha to bahut se log uske paas aain aur bolin, “Yuhanna baptisma dewe waala koi chamatkaar nai karis raha, u jon kuchh Yeeshu ke baare meñ bolis raha, u sab sachche raha.”
Aur huañ bahut se log Yeeshu pe biswaas kare lagin.
Laazras naam ke ek admi bimaar raha. U Meri aur uske bahini Maatha ke gaaoñ Bethni meñ rahat raha.
I wahi Meri rahi jon Prabhu ke goṛ pe mahke waala pefeum chhoṛ ke aapan baar se pochhis raha. Yahi ke bhaiya Laazras bimaar raha.
Duuno bahini Yeeshu ke lage khabar bhejin, “Prabhu tumhaar ek pyaara dost Laazras bimaar hei.”
Jab Yeeshu i sunis to bolis, “Uske bimaari ke ant maut nai hei. I to Pita aur uske laṛka ke mahima ke ṭaaim hei.”
Yeeshu, Meri, Maatha aur uske bhaiya Laazras se bahut prem karat raha.
Lekin fir bhi u wahiñ pe dui aur roj ruk gais.
Tab u aapan chela log se bolis, “Aao ham ab fir se Juḍia chali.”
Chela log bolin, “Thoṛa din pahile wahiñ pe kuchh log tumme patthar se maare maañgat rahin, fir bhi tum wahiñ jaay mañgta hei?”
Yeeshu bolis, “Kaa din meñ baarah ghanṭa nai hei? Agar tum din meñ chalega to suuraj ke roshni meñ dhakka nai khaayga.
Lekin agar tum raat meñ chalega, to dhakka jaruur lagi, kaahe ki u ṭaaim añdhiyaar rahi.”
Yeeshu i baat bol ke fir se bolis, “Hamaar dost Laazras soy gais hei, aur ham jaay ke uske jagaayga.”
Chela log jawaab deen, “Prabhu, agar u sowe hei, to iske matlab hei ki u achchha hoy jaai.”
Yeeshu to Laazras ke maut ke baare meñ bolat raha, lekin chela log sochin ki u khali uske neeñd meñ soy ke baare meñ bole hei.
Tab Yeeshu u sab se safa safa bol dees, “Laazras mar gais hei!
Ham khusi hei ki ham huañ pe nai raha, kaahe ki ab tumme mauka mili ki tum ab ham pe biswaas karega. Aao uske paas chalo.”
Thomas, jon ke Didumas naam se bolaay jaat raha, u aapan saathi log se bolis, “Aao. Chalo, ki jisse ham bhi uske sañghe mare saki.”
Jab Yeeshu Bethni meñ pahuñchis, to pata laga ki chaar roj pahile Laazras ke dafnaay dewa gais raha.
Bethni, Yarushalam se lagbhag teen kilomeeṭa ke duuri pe raha.
Aur bahut se Yahuudi log Maatha aur Meri ke ghare jaay ke uske bhaiya ke mare pe shok manaat rahin.
Jab Maatha sunis ki Yeeshu aay hei, to usse mile ke waaste u gais. Lekin Meri ghar pe hee rahe gais raha.
Maatha Yeeshu se bolis, “Prabhu, agar tum hiañ rahta, to hamaar bhaiya nai marta.
Ab bhi ham janta hei ki, Parmeshwar wahi kari jon tum maañgega.”
Ispe Yeeshu bolis, “Tumhaar bhaiya fir se jinda hoy jaai.”
Maatha fir se bolis, “Ham janta hei ki aakhri roj u fir se jinda hoy jaai.”
Tab Yeeshu usse bolis, “Hamahi to hei jon mara ke fir se jinda karta hei! Jon koi bhi ham pe biswaas kari, u mar ke bhi fir se jinda hoy jaai.
Aur jon jinda hei aur ham pe biswaas kari, u kabhi nai mari. Kaa tum biswaas karti hei?”
Tab u bolis, “Haañ Prabhu, ham biswaas karta hei ki tumahi Maseeh hei aur Parmeshwar ke laṛka hei jon dunia meñ aay waala raha.”
Etna bol ke u aapan bahini Meri ke lage chali gais aur uske kaan meñ dheere se bolis, “Guru ji aay gais hei, aur tumme dekhe maañge hei.”
Jab Meri i sunis, to jaldi se uṭh ke Yeeshu se mile chali gais.
Yeeshu abhi gaaoñ tak nai pahuñchis raha, lekin abhi wahi jagha raha jahañ Maatha ke bheñṭ usse bhais raha.

Bahut Yahuudi log Meri ke ghar meñ uske dheeraj dewe ke khaatir aay rahin, aur jab u sab dekhin ki Meri uṭh ke jaldi jaldi jaay hei to sochin ki u kabar pe roy ke khaatir jaay hei. U sab uske pichchhe hoy leen.
Meri huañ pahuñchis jahañ Yeeshu raha. Aur jeisehiyeñ u uske dekhis uske goṛ pe gir paṛis aur bolis, “Prabhu, agar tum hiañ rahta to hamaar bhaiya nai marta.”
Jab Yeeshu uske aur Yahuudi log ke rote dekhis to uske dil bhar aais, aur u bahut dukhi hoy gais.
Tab u puuchhis, “Tum log uske kahañ dafnaaya hei?” “Aao aur dekho, Prabhu.” ulog bolin.
Yeeshu roy laga.
Tab sab log bolin, “Dekho u Laazras se ketna prem karat raha”
Kuchh to i bhi bolin, “I to añdha ke aañkhi dees raha, to kaahe ke i Laazras ke mare se nai bachaais?”
Yeeshu bahut udaas raha aur ek gahira saas lees aur kabar ke taraf chala gais, jon ek gufa raha, aur jiske muh pe ek patthar rakha raha.
Yeeshu bolis, “Patthar haṭaao!” Laazras ke bahini Maatha bolis, “Prabhu, ab tak to usman se kharaab gandh nikre laga hoi. U to chaar roj se gaaṛa gais hei!”
Yeeshu usse bolis, “Kaa ham tum se i nai bola ki agar tum biswaas karegi to Parmeshwar ke mahima dekhegi?”
Log patthar haṭaay deen. Yeeshu uppar dekhis aur bolis, “He Pita, ham tumme dhanbaad deta hei, ki tum hamaar sunta hei.
Ham janta hei ki tum hamme hardam sunta hei, lekin ham ilog ke khaatir fir se bolta hei, ki jisse ilog biswaas kari ki tumahi hamme bheja hei.”
I baat bol ke Yeeshu jor se bolis, “Laazras, bahire nikro!”
Laazras bahire aais, uske haath aur goṛ abhi bhi kafan ke kapṛa se bañdha raha, aur muh pe bhi kafan ke kapṛa lapṭaan raha. Yeeshu ulog se bolis, “Iske khol deo aur jaay deo.”
Bahut Yahuudi log, jon Meri ke lage khaṛa rahin dekhin ki Yeeshu kaa karis raha, aur uspe biswaas karin.
Lekin kuchh kuchh lauṭ ke Farisi aur agua log se jaay ke bataain ki Yeeshu kaa karis raha.
Ispe Baṛa Paadri aur Farisi log ek sabha bulaain aur bolin, “Ham kaa kari? I to bahut se chamatkaar kare hei!
Agar ham iske eise chhoṛ dega to sab log ispe biswaas kar lei aur Romi adhikaari hamaar agaiñsṭ kaam kari aur hamaar Mandir aur hamaar des ke barbaad kar dei!”
Usman se ek jiske naam Kaaifa raha, aur jon u saal ek Baṛa Paadri ban gais raha, bolis, “Tum sab pagla hei!
Kaa tum i nai samajhta ki tumhaar bhalaai yahi meñ hei ki ham sab ke khaatir ek ke maar deo ki jis se ham sab bach jaai?”
I baat u aapan bagal se nai bolis raha, lekin u saal ke Baṛa Paadri hoy ke naate bolis raha, u i profasi karis raha, ki Yeeshu Yahuudi jaat ke waaste mari.
Aur khali ulog ke waaste nai lekin Parmeshwar ke log jon idhar udhar chhitraay gais hei, u sab ke ek sañghe laay ke waaste.
Aur wahi roj se Yahuudi log Yeeshu ke maare ke waaste kosis kare lagin.
Yahi kaaran Yeeshu Juḍia meñ sab ke saamne ghuume nai sakis, aur u aapan chela log ke sañghe Efraim meñ chala gais aur huañ rahe lagis, jahañ aur koi nai raha.
Fasah ke teohaar ke ṭaaim aay waala raha, aur yahi kaaran gaaoñ ke bahut log Yarushalam meñ aain ki jisse u apne aap ke fasah ke teohaar se pahile safa kar le.
U sab Yeeshu ke khojat rahin, aur chech meñ khaṛa hoy ke aapas meñ baat kare lagin, “Tum kaa sochta hei? Kaa u teohaar meñ aai?”
Udhar Baṛa Paadri aur agua log bataain raha ki agar koi Yeeshu ke pata jaane hei to usse aay ke bataay ki jisse ulog uske pakṛe saki.
Fasah ke chhe din pahile Yeeshu Bethni gaaoñ meñ aais jahañ Laazras rahat raha aur jiske Yeeshu jinda karis raha.
Huañ pe Yeeshu ke welkam ke khaatir khaana taiyaar kara gais. Maatha khaana parosat rahi aur Laazras ulog ke sañghe beiṭhis raha.
Tab Meri lagbhag aadha leeṭa bahut mahañga aur mahke waala pefeum laay ke Yeeshu ke goṛ pe ḍaar ke aur aapan baar se uske goṛ pochhis. Uske mahak se puura ghar mahke laga.
Yeeshu ke ek chela jiske naam Juḍas Iskariyoti raha, aur baad meñ jon Yeeshu ke pakaṛwaai, bolis,
“Kaahe nai i pefeum jaada peisa meñ bech ke aur gareeb meñ baaṭ dewa jaay hei?”
U i baat bolis raha, iske waaste nai ki u gareeb ke baare meñ sochat raha, lekin i kaaran ki u ek chor raha.
Tab Yeeshu jawaab dees, “Uske akele chhoṛ deo! U hamme dafnaay ke roj ke waaste i pefeum rakkhis hei.
Gareeb to tumhaar sañghe hardam rahi, lekin ham to tumhaar sañghe hardam nai rahega.”
Bahut log ke pata laga ki Yeeshu huañ hei, tab u sab huañ aain, i kaaran nai ki ulog Yeeshu ke dekhi, lekin u sab Laazras ke dekhe maañgat rahin jiske Yeeshu mara meñ se jinda karis raha.
Tab Baṛa Paadri log Laazras ke bhi maare ke waaste kosis karin.
Iske kaaran i raha ki bahut se Yahuudi log dharam guru ke saath chhoṛ ke Yeeshu pe biswaas kare lagin raha.
Dusra roj jon sab log fasah ke teohaar manaay ke waaste aain raha, sunin ki Yeeshu Yarushalam aais hei.

Tab u sab log khajuur ke ḍaari leke Yeeshu se mile ke khaatir chal deen, aur chillaay ke bole lagin, “Parmeshwar ke jay ho! Prabhu ke bagal se jon aay hei, uspe Prabhu ke aasheesh hoy! Prabhu ke aasheesh Israayel ke raaja pe bhi rahe!”
Yeeshu ke ek gadha mila aur uspe beiṭh ke u chal paṛis, jeise Baaibal meñ likhaan raha.
“Yarushalam ke log, ghabraana nai! Dekho ek gadha pe sawaar hoy ke tumhaar Raaja aay hei.”
Uske chela log u ṭaaim i sab samajh nai paain raha, lekin Yeeshu ke mahima hoy ke baad ulog ke yaad aais ki Yeeshu ke baare meñ Baaibal meñ kaa likha raha aur log uske sañghe wahi sab karin.
Jon log Yeeshu ke sañghe rahin jab u Laazras ke kabar meñ se bolaay ke mara se jinda karis raha, i baat ke gawaahi deen.
Wahi kaaran bheeṛ Yeeshu se mile rahin, kaahe ki u sab sune rahin ki Yeeshu i chamatkaar karis raha.
Farisi log tab ek dusra se bolin, “Dekho, ham to kuchh nai kar paata hei! Sab koi to Yeeshu ke pichchhe bhaage hei!”
Kuchh Greek log huañ rahin jon teohaar ke ṭaaim Yarushalam preya ke khaatir aay rahin.
Ulog Filip ke lage gain, jon Galeel ke Beithseida ke rahe waala raha. U sab usse binti karin, “Bhaiya ham Yeeshu se mile mañgta hei.”
Filip tab Enḍru ke lage gais aur duuno jaay ke Yeeshu se baat cheet karin.
Yeeshu tab jawaab dees, “U ṭaaim aay gais hei jab Manush ke laṛka ke mahima mili.
Ham tum se sachche bolta hei, jab tak geñhu ke ek daana maṭṭi meñ gir ke mar nai jaay hei, tab tak u akele rahe hei, aur jeisehiyeñ u daana mar jaay hei, u bahut fare hei.
Jon aapan laaif se pyaar kare hei, uske khoy dei, aur jon aapan laaif se prem nai kare hei aur dusra ke khaatir jie hei, uske anant jeewan mili.
Agar koi hamaar sewa kare maañge hei to hamaar pichchhe hoy le, ki jisse jahañ ham hei huañ hamaar sewa kare waala bhi rahi. Aur hamaar Pita uske aadar kari jon hamaar sewa kare hei.
“Ab hamaar dil bahut dukhi hei, aur ham kaa bole sakta hei? Kaa ham i boli, ‘He Pita, hamme i ṭaaim se bachaay leo’? Nai, yahi kaaran to ham aaya hei, to hamme i dukh ke ṭaaim ke saamna kare ke paṛi.
He Pita, aapan naam ke mahima karaao!” Tab asmaan se awaaj aais, “Ham wahi naam ke mahima kara hei aur aage bhi karte rahega!”
Jon log huañ bagal meñ khaṛa rahin, u sunin aur bolin, ki baadar garjis hei, lekin aur log bolin, “Ek ainjal usse bolis hei!”
Ispe Yeeshu ulog se bolis, “I awaaj hamaar khaatir nai raha, lekin tum sab ke waaste raha.
Ab sansaar ke nyaay kare ke ṭaaim aay gais hei, aur i dunia pe raaj kare waala saitaan ke nikaara jaai.
Aur jab ham jameen se uppar uṭhaawa jaayga tab ham sab ke aapan bagal kheechega.”
Yeeshu i baat bol ke ishaara kar dees raha ki uske maut keise hoi.
Bheeṛ Yeeshu se bolis, “Hamaar niyam ke buk i bataay hei ki Maseeha janam janam jee to tum keise bolta hei ki Manush ke laṛka ke uucha uṭhaawa jaai? I Manush ke laṛka kon hei?”

Yeeshu jawaab dees, “Ujera thoṛa deri aur tumhaar sañghe rahi. Jab tak ujera hei, tab tak chalte raho, eise nai ki añdhera tumme aay ke gher le. Jon añdhera meñ chale hei, u nai jaane ki u kahañ jaay hei.
Jab tak añjora tumhaar sañghe hei u añjora pe biswaas karo ki jisse tum añjora ke laṛkan bana raho.” I baat bole ke baad Yeeshu akele meñ jaay ke chhip gais.
Yeeshu ulog ke saamne bahut se chamatkaar karis raha, fir bhi ulog uspe biswaas nai karin.
Yahi kaaran ki jisse Aayzaaya nabi ke u sab baat puura hoi, “Prabhu, hamaar vachan pe kon biswaas karis? Prabhu ke sakti ke kon pahichaanis?”
Aur u sab Yeeshu pe biswaas nai kare sakin, kaahe ki Aayzaaya i bhi bolis raha,

“Parmeshwar uske aañkhi añdha kar dees raha aur u sab ke dil kaṛa kar dees raha, ki jisse u sab ke aañkhi dekhe nai sake, aur u sab ke dimaag samajhe nai sake, aur ulog Parmeshwar ke lage bhi nai aai, ki ulog ke achchha kare.”
Aayzaaya i sab bolis, kaahe ki u apne aap Yeeshu ke mahima ke dekhis raha aur uske baare meñ bataais raha.

I bhi bhais ki bahut se Yahuudi adhikaari Yeeshu pe biswaas karin, lekin Farisi log ke kaaran ulog sab ke saamne uske apnaay nai sakin, kaahe ki kahiñ eise nai hoy ki u sab ke chech se nikaar dewa jaay.
Iske alaawa u agua log Parmeshwar ke aadar se jaada aapan baṛaai jaada pasand karat rahin.
Ek jordaar awaaj meñ Yeeshu bolis, “Jon ham pe biswaas kare hei, u khali ham pe nai, lekin uspe bhi biswaas kare hei jon hamme bhejis hei.
Aur jon bhi koi hamme dekhi, u uske bhi dekhi jon hamme bhejis hei.
Ham dunia meñ añjora ban ke aaya hei ki jon koi bhi ham pe biswaas kari, u añdhera meñ nai rahi.
Agar koi hamaar sandesa sune aur uske mutaabik nai chale to ham uske dos nai dega kaahe ki ham sansaar ke dos lagaay ke khaatir nai, lekin uske bachaay ke khaatir aaya hei.
Jon hamaar apmaan kare hei, aur hamaar vachan nai sune hei, uspe dos lagaay waala khali ek hei, jon vachan ham bola hei u aakhri roj uske dosi ṭhaharaai. ?
I sachchaai hei, kaahe ki ham aapan bagal se kuchh nai bola hei, lekin hamaar Pita jon hamme bhejis hei, hamme bataais hei ki ham kaa boli.
Aur ham i janta hei ki Pita ke hukum anant jeewan laay hei. Yahi kaaran jon bhi ham bolta hei uske jeise Pita ham se bolis hei, weisaiyeñ ham bolta hei.

Fasah ke teohaar se ek din pahile ke baat hei. Yeeshu jaanat raha ki u ṭaaim aay gais hei jab uske i dunia ke chhoṛ ke Pita ke lage jaay ke hei. U aakhri ṭaaim tak i dunia meñ, jon uspe biswaas kare hei, ulog se prem karis raha.
Yeeshu aur uske chela log khaana khaat rahin. Wahi ṭaaim saitaan, Saayman ke laṛka Juḍas Iskariyoti ke man meñ i bichaar bhar dees raha ki wahi Yeeshu ke pakaṛwaai.
Yeeshu jaanat raha ki Pita sab kuchh uske haath meñ de dees hei, aur i bhi ki u Parmeshwar ke bagal se aais hei aur Parmeshwar ke lage jaai.
Yeeshu khaana pe se uṭha aur aapan uppar ke kapṛa sab utaar dees, aur aapan kamar meñ taul baañdh lees.
Tab u ek thariya meñ paani leke aapan chela log ke goṛ dhoy laga aur jon taul uske kamar meñ bañdha raha, usse pochhis.
Jab Yeeshu Saayman Peeṭa ke lage aais tab Peeṭa bolis, “Prabhu, kaa tum hamaar goṛ dhoyga?”
Yeeshu tab bolis, “Tum abhi nai samjhega ki ham kaa karta hei, lekin baad meñ jaruur samajh jaayga.”
“Tum hamaar goṛ kabhi nai dhoyga!” Peeṭa bolis. “Agar ham tumhaar goṛ nai dhoyga,” Yeeshu bolis, “tab tum hamaar chela nai rahe paayga.”
Tab Saayman Peeṭa bolis, “Prabhu, tab to tum hamaar goṛ khali nai lekin hamaar haath aur muuṛ bhi dhoy deo.”
Yeeshu tab bolis, “Jon nahaay lees hei, u puura safa hoy gais hei. Uske goṛ ke alaawa aur kuchh dhoy ke jaruuri nai hei. Hiañ ek ke chhoṛ ke sab safa hei.”
Yeeshu jaanat raha ki uske kon pakaṛwaai, tabbe u bolis, “Ek ke chhoṛ ke sab safa hei.”
Jab Yeeshu sab ke goṛ dhoy lees aur aapan kapṛa pahin ke beiṭh gais, tab u bolis, “Kaa tum sab samajh gaya ki ham tumhaar sañghe kaa kara?
Tum sab hamme ‘Guru’ aur ‘Prabhu’ bolaata hei, aur i achchha bhi hei ki tum sab eise hee bolo, kaahe ki ham wahi hei.
Ham, tumhaar Guru aur Prabhu, tumhaar goṛ dhoya. Ab tumme ek dusra ke goṛ dhoy ke chaahi.
Ham tumme ek rasta dekhaaya ki jeise ham kara hei, weisaiyeñ tum bhi karo.
Ham tum se sachche bolta hei ki ek naukar aapan maalik se baṛa nai hei, aur u bhi jon sandes ke sañghe bheja gais hei, u bhi uske bheje waala se baṛa nai hei.
Ab jab tum sab, i sab jaan gaya hei, aur yahi ke mutaabik chalta hei, to Parmeshwar tumme bahut saara aasheesh dei.”
“Ham tum sab ke baare meñ nai bolta hei, khali wahi ke baare meñ bolta hei jiske ham chuna hei. Lekin Baaibal ke i baat puura hoy ke hei, ‘Jon hamaar roṭi khaay hei, wahi ham pe laat uṭhaai.’
I ghaṭna hoy se pahile ham tumme sab bataata hei, ki jab i baat hoi, to tum sab biswaas karega ki ham wahi hei jon hamme hoy ke chaahi.’
Ham tum se sachche bolta hei ki jon koi jiske ham bheja hei, uske apnaay hei, to wahi hamaar bhejewaala ke bhi apnaay hei.
I sab baat bole ke baad Yeeshu dukhi hoy ke aapan chela log se bolis, “Ham tum se sachche bolta hei ki tum meñ se ek hei jon hamme pakaṛwaai.”
Ispe chela log ghabraay ke ek dusra ke dekhe lagis ki usman se kon hei jiske baare meñ i baat bola gais hei.
Ek chela jisse Yeeshu bahut prem karat raha, Yeeshu ke bagal meñ beiṭha raha.
Saayman Peeṭa uske sankaay ke bolis, “Usse puuchho, u kis ke baare meñ bole hei?”
Wahi rakam Yeeshu ke taraf jhuke jhuke u puuchhis, “Prabhu u kon hei?”
Yeeshu jawaab dees, “Ham roṭi ke ṭukṛa sos meñ ḍubaay ke jiske dega, wahi admi hei.” Aur u ek roṭi ke ṭukṛa lees, sos meñ ḍubaay ke Saayman ke laṛka Juḍas Iskariyoti ke dees.
Jeisehiyeñ Juḍas roṭi ke ṭukṛa lees, saitaan usman ghus gais. Tab Yeeshu usse bolis, “Jon bhi kuchh tumme kare ke hei jaldi se karo!”
Jon sab khaana khaat rahin, usman se koi bhi nai samajh sakin ki Yeeshu kaa bole hei.
Koi koi to samjhin ki Juḍas ke lage peisa ke theili hei, aur Yeeshu usse bole hei ki teohaar ke khaatir jon kuchh bhi jaruuri hei uske khareed ke, ya gareeb meñ bhi kuchh baaṭ de.
Juḍas roṭi ke ṭukṛa leke wahi lage bahire chala gais. U ṭaaim raat hoy gais raha.
Jab Juḍas Iskariyoti bahire chala gais tab Yeeshu bolis, “Ab Manush ke laṛka ke mahima saamne aai, aur yahi se Parmeshwar ke mahima bhi hoi.
Agar Parmeshwar ke mahima Yeeshu ke kaaran saamne aay hei to Parmeshwar bhi Manush ke laṛka ke mahima khud saamne dekhaai aur u bhi bahut jaldi hoi.

Hamaar bachcha log, ham tumhaar sañghe bahut deri tak nai rahega. Tum sab hamme khojega lekin jeise ham Yahuudi log se bola hei, weisaiyeñ ab ham tum sab se bolta hei, jahañ ham jaata hei huañ tum sab nai aay sakta hei.
Aur ab ham tumme ek nawa hukum deta hei, ek dusra se prem karna. Jeise ham tum sab se prem kara wahi rakam tum ek dusra se prem karo.
Agar tum ek dusra se prem karega to eisehiyeñ sab log jaani ki tum sab hamaar chela hei.”
Saayman Peeṭa tab puuchhis, “Prabhu tum kahañ jaata hei?” Yeeshu jawaab dees, “Ham abhi jahañ jaata hei, tum hamaar pichchhe nai aay sakta hei, lekin baad meñ aay sakega.”
“Prabhu, kaahe ke ham tumhaar pichchhe nai aay sakta hei?” Peeṭa puuchhis. “Ham tumhaar khaatir mare ke bhi taiyaar hei.”
Yeeshu tab jawaab dees, “Kaa tum sachche ke hamaar khaatir jaan de dega? Ham tum se sachche bolta hei ki murga ke bole se pahile tum teen dafe bolega ki tum hamme nai janta.”
Yeeshu tab aapan sab chela log se bolis, “Dukhi nai ho aur ghabraao bhi nai. Parmeshwar pe bharosa rakkho aur ham pe bhi.”
Hamaar Pita ke ghare bahut se rahe ke jagha hei. Agar nai hota to ham tum se bol deta. Ham tumhaar khaatir jagha taiyaar kare jaata hei.
Jab ham huañ jaay ke tumhaar waaste jagha taiyaar kar lega, tab fir lauṭ ke aayga aur tum sab ke hiañ se aapan sañghe le jaayga, ki jisse jahañ ham rahega wahiñ tum bhi rahega.
Tum u rasta janta hei jahañ ham jaata hei.”
Tab Thomas Yeeshu se bolis, “Prabhu, ham to i bhi nai janta ki tum kahañ jaata hei! To ham rasta keise jaanega?”
Yeeshu tab bolis, “Rasta, jeewan aur sachchaai hamahi hei! Hamaar bina koi bhi Pita ke lage nai jaay sake.
Agar tum sab hamme janta hei, to hamaar Pita ke bhi janta. Lekin ab se tum sab Pita ke jaan lia hei kaahe ki tum sab uske dekha hei.”
Filip tab bolis, “Prabhu, hamme Pita ke dekhaao, ham to khali yahi mañgta hei.”

Tab Yeeshu jawaab dees, “Filip, ham ketna ṭaaim se tumhaar sañghe raha, fir bhi tum hamme nai janta? Jon bhi koi hamme dekhis hei, u Pita ke bhi dekhis hei, fir tum kaahe ke bolta hei, ‘Hamme Pita ke dekhaao’?

Kaa tum sab biswaas nai karta ki ham Pita meñ hei aur Pita ham meñ hei? Tab u sab chela log se bolis, “Jon bhi kuchh ham tum se bolta hei u aapan bagal se nai bolta hei, lekin ham meñ rahe waala Pita, aapan sab kaam kare hei.
Hamaar biswaas karo ki ham Pita meñ hei aur Pita ham meñ. Agar nai to jon sab kaam ham karta hei wahi ke dekh ke tab biswaas karo.
Ham tum se sachche bolta hei, hamaar biswaas kare waala u sab kaam kare saki jon ham karta hei, aur usse bhi baṛa kaam kare saki kaahe ki ham Pita ke lage jaata hei.
Aur tum hamaar naam se jon kuchh bhi maañgega, ham uske puura karega, ki jisse laṛka ke bagal se Pita ke mahima hoi.
Ham wahi karega, jon tum ham se kare ke bolega.”
“Agar tum ham se prem karta hei, to jon ham bolta hei, u karo.
Ham Pita se maañgega ki u tumhaar khaatir ek dusra madadgaar bheje, jon tumhaar sañghe hardam rahe saki.

U Aatma hei, jon Parmeshwar ke baare meñ sachchaai bataay hei. Dunia uske nai apnaai kaahe ki u naa to uske dekhi, aur naa to uske jaani. Lekin tum to uske janta hei, kaahe ki u tumhaar sañghe rahe hei, aur tumhaar sañghe hee hardam rahi.”
“Ham tumme anaath nai chhoṛega, ham tumhaar lage lauṭ aayga.
Thoṛa deri meñ dunia hamme nai dekhi, lekin tum hamme dekhega, kaahe ki ham jinda hei aur tum bhi jinda rahega.
U din jab aai, tab tum jaanega ki ham aapan Pita meñ hei aur tum ham meñ hei, jeise ham tum meñ hei.”
“Jon hamaar baat maane hei aur uspe chale hei, wahi ham se prem kare hei. Hamaar Pita wahi se prem kari, jon ham se prem kare hei, ham bhi wahi log se prem karega aur uske saamne aayga.”
Juḍas Iskariyoti nai lekin dusra Juḍas tab puuchhis, “Prabhu, i keise hei ki tum khali hamme dekhaayga lekin puura dunia ke nai dekhaayga?”
Yeeshu tab jawaab dees, “Jon koi ham se prem kare hei wahi hamaar baat pe chali. Hamaar Pita uske pyaar kari, aur ham aur hamaar Pita ulog ke lage aayga aur ulog ke sañghe rahega.
Jon ham se prem nai kare hei, u hamaar kaha nai maani. I sab baat jon tum sunta hei, hamaar nai hei lekin hamaar Pita ke hei jon hamme bhejis hei.
“Jab tak ham tumhaar sañghe hei, ham tum se i sab baat bolta hei.
Lekin jon madat kare waala Pawitr Aatma jiske hamaar Pita, hamaar naam se bheji, u tumme sab baat sikhaay dei, aur jon baat ham tumme bataaya hei, uske hardam yaad karaai.”
“Ham tumme saanti deta hei, aur i hamaar aapan saanti hei jon ham tumme deta hei. Ham u rakam ke saanti nai deta jon dunia tumme dei. Yahi kaaran ghabraao nai aur wari nai karo, aur ḍaro bhi nai.

Tum to sun lia hei ki ham tum se kaa bola hei, ‘Ham jaata hei, aur fir tumhaar lage aayga.’ Agar tum ham se prem karta hei, to khusi hoyga kaahe ki ham aapan Pita ke lage jaata hei, aur Pita ham se bahut baṛa hei.
I sab hoy se pahile ham tum se sab kuchh bataay dia hei, ki jisse jab i sab hoi, tab tum biswaas karega.
Ab ham bahut deri tak tum se baat nai kare sakta, kaahe ki dunia ke raaja, saitaan aay waala hei. U to hamaar kuchh nai bigaaṛe sake hei.
Lekin dunia ke log ke jaane ke hei ki ham aapan Pita se prem karta hei, wahi kaaran ham wahi karta hei jon u hamme bataay hei. Aao, i jagha se chalo.”
Yeeshu aapan chela log se bolis, “Sachcha ḍaar ham hei, aur hamaar Pita uske gaaḍna hei.
Wahi hamaar u sab ḍaar ke kaaṭe hei jon fare nai hei, aur jon ḍaar fare hei uske chhaañṭ ke rakkhe hei, ki jisse usman aur far lage.
Hamaar vachan se tum sab safa hoy gaya hei.

Hamaar sañghe raho, aur ham tumhaar sañghe rahega. Ek ḍaar akele meñ nai fare hei, lekin jab u dusra ḍaari meñ juṛ jaay hei to fare hei. Yahi rakam jab tak tum hamaar meñ nai rahega, tab tak tum bhi nai fal laay sakega.”
“Ham peṛ hei, aur tum sab uske ḍaar hei. Jon ham meñ rahe hei, aur ham usman, wahi jaada fari, kaahe ki tum hamaar bina kuchh nai kare sakta hei.
Agar koi ham meñ nai rahe to u kaṭa ḍaar ke rakam feñk dewa jaai, aur suukhaay jaai, log u sab ke baṭor ke aagi meñ jhok de hei aur sab jar jaay hei.
Agar tum ham se juṛa rahega aur hamaar vachan tum meñ bana rahi, tab tum jon kuchh bhi maañgega, u tumme mil jaai.
Hamaar Pita ke mahima yahi meñ hei ki tum bahut se fal laao, tabahi tum hamaar chela bana rahega.
Ham tumme weisaiyeñ pyaar karta hei jeise hamaar Pita ham se kare hei, hamaar prem meñ bañdha raho.
Agar tum hamaar sab baat maanega, to hamaar prem meñ bana rahega, jeise ham aapan Pita ke sab baat ke maanta hei aur uske prem meñ bana rahta hei.”
“I sab baat ham tum se i kaaran bola hei ki hamaar khusi meñ tum bhi mila raho, aur tumhaar khusi puura hoy jaai.”
Ab ham tumme bataata hei ki jeise ham tum se prem kara hei, weisaiyeñ tum bhi ek dusra se prem karo.
Pyaar ke sab se baṛa sabuut wahi hei jon aapan dost ke waaste aapan jaan de de hei.
Tum sab hamaar dost rahega, agar tum hamaar sab baat sunega aur uske maanega.
Ham tumme naukar nai maanta kaahe ki ek naukar nai jaane hei ki uske maalik kaa kare hei. Ham tumme dost bolaata hei kaahe ki ham tumme u sab bataay dia jon ham aapan Pita se suna raha.
Tum hamme nai chuna, lekin ham tumme chuna aur dunia meñ bheja ki jisse tum sab fal laao, eisan fal jon hardam rahe. Hamaar Pita tumme u sab dei jon tum hamaar naam se maañgega.
Yahi hei jon ham tum se mañgta hei. Sab se prem karo.”
“Agar dunia tum se jaran kare hei, to yaad rakkho u tum se pahile ham se jaran karis.
Agar tum dunia ke hota, tab dunia tum se aapan rakam prem rakhta. Lekin ham tumme i dunia se chuna hei, yahi kaaran dunia tum se jaran kare hei.
Yaad rakhna ham tumme kaa bataaya hei, ‘Naukar aapan maalik se baṛa nai hei.’ Agar log hamme sataais hei, tab u tumme bhi sataai, agar u hamaar vachan maani to u tumhaar baat bhi maani.
Ilog tumhaar sañghe wahi kari jon ilog hamaar sañghe karis hei kaahe ki tum sab hamaar hei, aur ulog hamaar bheje waala ke nai jaane hei.
Agar ham aay ke ulog se baat nai kara hota, to ulog ke paap nai lagta, lekin ab to ulog ke paap se bache ke koi rasta nai.
Jon koi ham se jaran kare hei u hamaar Pita se bhi jaran kare hei.

U sab paapi nai hota agar ham u sab ke beech meñ u kaam nai karta jon aur koi nai kare sakat raha, lekin ab to u sab dekh leen hei ki ham kaa kara raha, fir bhi ulog ham se aur hamaar Pita se jaran kare hei.
I sab i kaaran bhais ki uske niyam ke buk meñ likha hei ki i baat puura hoi, ‘Ulog ham se bekaar meñ jaran rakkhis.” ’
“Ham tumhaar lage ek madadgaar bhejega, jon Pita ke bagal se hoi, aur u tumme hamaar bagal se gawaahi dei.
Aur tum bhi hamaar baare meñ sab se bataayga, kaahe ki suru se tum hamaar sañghe raha hei.”
“Ham tum se i sab bataata hei ki tumhaar biswaas kamti nai hoi.
U log tumme aapan sabha meñ se nikaar dei, aur eisan ṭaaim bhi aai jab ulog tumme maar dei aur sochi ki eise kare se ulog Parmeshwar ke sewa kare hei.
U log tumhaar sañghe i sab kari kaahe ke ulog naa to hamme jaane hei aur naa to Pita ke jaane hei.
Lekin ham tumme i sab baat abhi bataata hei ki jab ṭaaim aai, ulog i sab kaam kari, tab tumme yaad aai ki ham kaa bola raha.
Lekin ab ham lauṭ ke uske lage jaata hei jon hamme bhejis hei, aur tum meñ se koi bhi nai i puuchhis ki ham kahañ jaata hei.
I baat sun ke tum bahut dukhi hei.

Lekin ham tum se sachche bolta hei, ki i tumhaar khaatir achchha hoi ki ham chala jaai, kaahe ki agar ham nai jaayga to madadgaar tumhaar lage nai aai. Aur jeise ham jaayga, weise madadgaar tumhaar lage bhej dega.
Aatma aay ke, dunia ke log ke paap, dharam, achchha, bura aur nyaay ke baare meñ samjhaai.
Paap ke baare meñ dunia ke log nai jaane hei, kaahe ki ulog ham pe biswaas nai kare hei.
I log i bhi nai jaane hei ki kaa sach hei aur kaa jhuuṭ, kaahe ki ham Pita ke lage jaata hei, aur tum fir hamme nai dekhega.
Nyaay ke baare meñ bhi ilog nai jaane hei, kaahe ki dunia ke agua ke nyaay mil gais hei.”
“Hamme tum se aur bahut kuchh bataay ke hei, lekin tum uske abhi sahe nai sakega.

Lekin jab Pawitr Aatma aai aur Parmeshwar ke baare meñ sachcha baat bataai, tab u sachchaai ke bagal sab ke le chali. U aapan bagal se kuchh nai boli, lekin wahi boli jon u sunis hei aur aage chal ke hoy waala hei.
U hamme mahima dei, kaahe ki u hamaar sandesa tumme bataai.
Jon bhi kuchh Pita ke hei u sab hamaar hei, yahi khaatir ham bola ki u hamaar baat tumme bataai.”
“Thoṛa deri meñ tum hamme nai dekhega, lekin thoṛa deri ke baad fir se hamme dekhe sakega.”

Uske kuchh chela log aapas meñ bole lagin, “Iske matlab kaa hei? U bole hei ki thoṛa deri ke baad ham uske nai dekhe sakega, aur fir thoṛa deri ke baad ham uske dekhe sakega, aur u i bhi bole hei, ki u Pita ke lage jaay hei.”
‘I thoṛa deri’ ke matlab kaa hei? Ham nai samajhe sakta ki u kaa bole hei!”

Yeeshu jaan gais ki ulog usse kuchh puuchhe maañge hei aur tab u bolis, “Ham bola raha, ‘Thoṛa deri meñ tum hamme nai dekhega, aur fir thoṛa deri ke baad tum hamme dekhe sakega.’ Kaa yahi tum aapas meñ puuchh taachh karta hei?
Ham tum se sachche bolta hei, tum sab royga aur soch karega lekin sab dunia khusi manaai, tum dukhi hoyga, lekin tumhaar dukh, sukh meñ badal jaai.

Jab ek aurat bachcha ke janam dewe ke ṭaaim rahe hei, tab u bahut dukhi rahe hei, kaahe ke u peeṛa sahe ke ṭaaim hoy hei, lekin jab bachcha ke janam de de hei tab u sab dukh bhuul jaay hei, aur bachcha ke dunia meñ aay ke waaste khusi manaay hei.
Yahi abhi tumhaar sañghe hoy hei, tum abhi udaas hei, lekin ham tumme fir dekhega, to tumhaar man khusi se bhar jaai, eisan khusi jiske tum se koi chheene nai saki.”
“Jab u roj aai, tab tum ham se kuchh nai maañgega. Ham tum se sachche bataata hei, agar tum Pita se hamaar naam pe kuchh bhi maañgega, u tumme hamaar naam se de dei.
Abhi tak to tum hamaar naam se kuchh nai maañga, lekin ab maañgo to tumme mili, tab tumhaar khusi puura hoy jaai.”
“Ham tum se i sab bañdha baat meñ bola hei. Lekin jab ṭaaim aai tab ham sab khula baat meñ Pita ke baare meñ baat karega.
U roj jab aai, tum hamaar naam se usse maañgega, ham i nai bolta ki ham tumhaar khaatir maañgega.
Pita to apne tum se prem kare hei, kaahe ki tum ham se prem karta hei, aur i biswaas kara ki ham Parmeshwar ke bagal se aaya hei.
Ham Pita ke taraf se dunia meñ aay raha aur fir i dunia ke chhoṛ ke Pita ke lage jaata hei.”
Tab chela log Yeeshu se bolin, “Ab tum chhupa baat meñ nai lekin safa safa bolta hei.
Ham sab ab jaan gaya hei ki tum sab janta hei, ab i jaruurat nai ki koi tum se sawaal kare. Yahi hamme biswaas karaais hei ki tum Parmeshwar ke taraf se aaya hei.”
Yeeshu ulog ke jawaab dees, “Kaa ab tum ham pe biswaas karta hei?

Ṭaaim aay hei, nai! nai! aay gais hei, jab tum sab chhitraay jaayga, aur tum sab ek ek karke aapan aapan ghare bhaag jaayga, aur ham akele rahe jaayga. Fir bhi ham akele nai hei, kaahe ki Pita hamaar sañghe hei.
Ham tumme i sab bataaya, ki jisse tum ham se saanti paao, kaahe ki tum ham se juṭa hei. Dunia tumme sataai. Lekin himmat rakkho! Ham dunia ke jeet lia hei!”
I sab baat bole ke baad, Yeeshu asmaan ke bagal dekh ke bolis, “He Pita, u ṭaaim aay gais hei. Aapan laṛka ke mahima deo, ki jisse tumhaar laṛka tumhaar mahima dekhaay saki.
Tumahi to uske sab ke uppar adhikaar dia hei, ki jisse u sab log ke anant jeewan dei, jon ke tum uske dia hei.
Anant jeewan ke matlab hei ki ulog tumme, ek sachcha Parmeshwar jaani, aur Yeeshu Maseeh ke bhi jaani jon ke tum bheja hei.
Jon kaam tum hamme kare ke waaste dia raha, uske ham puura karke i dharti pe tumhaar mahima kara hei.
Aur ab, He Pita, tum aapan saamne hamaar mahima karaao, wahi mahima jon hamme tumhaar sañghe, dunia ke bane se pahile raha.”
“Ham tumme u sab ke dekhaaya ki tum keisan hei, jon ke tum hamme i dunia meñ dia hei. U sab tumhaar rahin, aur tum ulog ke hamme dia. U log tumhaar vachan maanin.
Aur ab ulog jaan gain hei ki jon sab tum hamme dia hei, sab tumhaar taraf se aais hei.

Ham ulog ke wahi sandesa dia jon tum hamme dia raha, aur ulog sab maan ke biswaas bhi kar leen, ulog jaane hei ki yahi sachaai hei ki ham tumhaar taraf se aaya hei, aur i bhi biswaas kare hei ki tumahi hamme bheja hei.
Ham dunia ke waaste nai lekin uske waaste jiske ham tumme dia hei, binti karta hei, kaahe ki u sab tumhaar hei.
Aur jon kuchh bhi hamaar hei, u sab tumhaar bhi hei, aur jon tumhaar hei, u hamaar hei, aur yahi se hamaar mahima karis hei.

Ham i dunia ke chhoṛ ke tumhaar lage aata hei, aur aapan chela log ke yahi dunia meñ chhoṛta hei. He Pawitr Pita, tum jon naam dia hei wahi ke sakti se i sab ke dekh bhaal karna ki jisse i sab ek hoy ke rahe jeise ki tum aur ham ek hei.
Jab tak ham uske sañghe raha, tumhaar naam ke sakti se ham i sab ke gaaḍ kara. Khali ek ke chhoṛ ke koi aur naas nai bhais ki jisse Baaibal meñ likha baat puura hoi.
Ab ham tumhaar lage aata hei. Ham dunia meñ i sab baat bataata hei ki u sab hamaar khusi ke aapan man meñ puura bhar le aur samajh bhi le.
Ham u sab ke tumhaar vachan sunaay dia hei, lekin dunia ke log usse jaran kare hei, kaahe ki u i dunia ke nai hei jeise ki ham i dunia ke nai hei.
Ham i preya i khaatir nai karta ki tum u sab ke dunia se uṭhaay lo, lekin i kaaran ki tum ulog ke saitaan se bachaay ke rakhna.
Jeise ham i dunia ke nai hei, weisaiyeñ u sab bhi i dunia ke nai hei.
Sachchaai se u sab ke pawitr karo kaahe ki tumhaar vachan sachcha hei.
Jeise tum hamme dunia meñ bheja wahi rakam ham bhi u sab ke dunia meñ bheja hei.
Ham apne aap ke uske khaatir puura rakam se de dia hei, ki jisse u sab sachchaai se pawitr hoy jaay.
Ham khali u sab ke khaatir nai, lekin ulog ke khaatir preya karta hei jon sab uske vachan se ham pe biswaas kari.
Hamaar binti hei, He Pita, u sab ek hoy jeise ham tum meñ hei aur tum ham meñ hei, wahi rakam u sab ham meñ bhi rahi, jisse dunia boli ki tumahi hamme bheja hei.
Jon mahima tum hamme dia hei, wahi ham u sab ke dia hei ki jisse jeise ham ek hei, u sab bhi ek hoy jaay.
Ham u sab meñ aur tum ham meñ hei ki jisse u sab puura rakam se ek hoy jaay, aur dunia jaane ki tum hamme bheja hei, aur jeise tum ham se prem kara hei, weise u sab se bhi prem kara hei.
He Pita, ham i mañgta hei ki jon ke tum hamme dia hei, u sab hamaar sañghe rahe ki jisse jahañ ham rahi wahiñ u sab bhi rahe, aur u mahima ke dekhe jon ke tum dunia ke bane se pahile hamme dia raha.
He Pawitr Pita, dunia to tumme nai jaanis, lekin ham to tumme jaana hei, aur ilog to i jaan gain hei ki tumahi hamme bheja hei.
Ham to tumhaar naam se i sab se bataay dia hei, aur bataate rahega ki jon pyaar tum hamme dia hei, u sab meñ hoi, aur ham bhi u sab meñ rahega.”
Yeeshu preya kare ke baad aapan chela log ke sañghe Kidron valley ke paar gais. Huañ ek gaaḍan raha aur Yeeshu aapan chela log ke sañghe huañ gais.
Uske pakaṛwaay waala Juḍas u jagha jaanat raha kaahe ke Yeeshu aapan chela log ke sañghe huañ hardam jaat raha.
Juḍas bhi u gaaḍan meñ gais, aur uske sañghe Romi saulja, Baṛa Paadri aur Farisi log ke bagal se chech ke sardaar bhi gais. U log aapan sañghe batti, mashaal aur laṛe ke hatiaar bhi leke aain raha.
Yeeshu to sab kuchh jaanat raha, ki kaa hoy waala hei. U aage baṛh ke puuchhis, “Tum kiske khojta hei?”
U log jawaab deen, “Naasrat ke rahewaala Yeeshu ke.” Tab Yeeshu bolis, “U hamahi hei.” Uske pakaṛwaay waala Juḍas wahiñ sab ke sañghe khaṛa raha.
Jeise Yeeshu bolis, “U hamahi hei”, sab log pichchhe haṭin aur maṭṭi pe gir paṛin.
Yeeshu fir se puuchhis, “Tum log kis ke khojta hei?” U log fir jawaab deen, “Naasrat ke rahewaala Yeeshu ke.”
Yeeshu jawaab dees, “Ham to tum se bol dia hei ki hamahi u hei. Aur agar tum sab hamme khojta hei to ilog ke jaay deo.”
“Jisse uske bole waala vachan puura hoi. Tum jon ke hamme saupa hei ham usman se koi ke bhi naas nai hoy dega.”
Saayman Peeṭa ke lage ek talwaar raha. U aapan talwaar nikaar ke Baṛa Paadri ke ek naukar ke raaiṭ kaan kaaṭ dees. U naukar ke naam Malkus raha.
Yeeshu, Peeṭa ke ḍaaṭis, “Talwaar bhittar rakkho. Kaa tum sochta hei ki ham u dukh ke pyaala nai piyega jon Pita hamme dees hei?”
Tab Romi saulja aur uske admi Yeeshu ke pakaṛ ke baañdh deen.
Aur u sab Yeeshu ke pakaṛ ke pahile to Annas ke lage le gain, jon u saal Baṛa Paadri Kaaifa ke sasur raha.
I wahi Kaaifa raha jon Yahuudi log ke bataais raha ki sab ke bhalaai yahi meñ hei ki khali ekke admi maara jaay.
Saayman Peeṭa aur ek aur chela Yeeshu ke pichchhe pichchhe gain. I chela Baṛa Paadri ke jaana pahichaana raha, aur u Yeeshu ke sañghe Baṛa Paadri ke añgna meñ gais.
Peeṭa bahire duaari pe khaṛa hoy gais. U dusra chela jon Baṛa Paadri ke jaanat raha, bahire aay ke duaari pe khaṛi aurat se puuchh ke Peeṭa ke bhittar le gais.
Duaari pe khaṛi aurat Peeṭa se puuchhis, “Kaa tum u admi ke chela to nai?” Peeṭa jawaab dees, “Nai. Ham nai hei.”
Huañ bahut ṭhanḍa raha aur sab naukar aur sipaahi koyla ke aagi jaraay rakkhin raha, aur us ke chaaro bagal khaṛa hoy ke aagi taapat rahin. Peeṭa bhi u sab ke sañghe khaṛa hoy ke aagi taape laga.
Tab Baṛa Paadri log Yeeshu se uske chela log aur uske updes ke baare meñ puuchhin.
Yeeshu jawaab dees, “Ham sab log se khula ruup meñ baat kara hei. Ham hardam sabha meñ aur chech meñ jahañ log baṭurat rahin huañ updes deta raha aur chhupaay ke to kuchh nai kara.
Tab tum ham se kaahe ke puuchhta hei? Jon log hamaar baat sunin hei, wahi log se puuchho ki ham kaa bola hei. U sab jaane hei ki ulog se kon kon baat bola.
Yeeshu ke i baat pe, ek saulja jon uske bagal meñ khaṛa raha, Yeeshu ke ek thappaṛ maaris, aur bolis, “Tum purohit se i rakam baat karta hei?”
Yeeshu tab jawaab dees, “Agar ham kuchh ulṭa baat bola hei, to sab ke bataao ham kaa bola hei. Aur agar ham ṭheek bola hei to hamme fir kaahe ke maarta hei?”
Tab Annas, Yeeshu ke weisaiyeñ bañdha, Kaaifa Baṛa Paadri ke lage bhej dees.
Saayman Peeṭa khaṛa hoy ke aagi taapat raha, tab huañ ke log usse puuchhin, “Kahiñ tum bhi uske chela meñ se ek to nai hei?” Peeṭa muuṛ hilaay ke naa kar dees, “Ham nai hei.”
Baṛa Paadri ke naukar meñ se ek naukar jon u admi ke palwaar raha, jiske kaan Peeṭa kaaṭis raha, usse puuchhis, “Kaa ham gaaḍan meñ tumme uske sañghe nai dekha raha?”
Peeṭa ek dafe fir nai kar dees, aur wahi ṭaaim murga bolis.

Sabere hoy waala raha, aur Yeeshu ke Kaaifa ke lage se gavna ke jagha laawa gais. U log u jagha nai gain, kaahe ke u sab apne aap ke safa rakkhe maañgat rahin, ki jisse u sab fasah ke teohaar ke khaana khaay sake.
Paaylaṭ bahire nikar ke uske lage aais aur puuchhis, “I admi pe kaa dos hei?”
U log jawaab deen, “Agar i admi kharaab kaam nai kare hota, to ham iske aap ke haath meñ nai deta.”
Tab Paaylaṭ ulog se bolis, “Tum log iske le jaao aur aapan kaanuun ke mutaabik iske saja deo.” Tab Yahuudi log usse bolis, “Koi ke maare ke hamaar lage hak nai hei.”
Ab eise bhais ki Yeeshu jon baat bolis raha, puura hoi. Aur i ek saain raha ki keise uske maut hoi.
Paaylaṭ fir bhittar chala gais. U Yeeshu ke bhittar bolaay ke bolis, “Kaa tum Yahuudi ke raaja hei?”
Tab Yeeshu bolis, “Kaa tum i baat apne aap bolta hei, ki aur sab log bhi hamaar baare meñ yahi bole hei?”
Paaylaṭ jawaab dees, “Kaa ham Yahuudi hei? Khud tumhaar admi log aur Baṛa Paadri log tumme hamaar haath meñ deen hei. Tum kaa galti kara raha?”

Yeeshu jawaab dees, “Hamaar raaj i dunia ke nai hei. Agar hamaar raaj i dunia ke rahta, to hamaar naukar hamaar bagal se laṛta aur ham Yahuudi agua log ke haath meñ nai paṛta, lekin hamaar raaj hiañ ke nai hei.”

Tab Paaylaṭ bolis, “To kaa tum raaja hei?” Ispe Yeeshu jawaab dees, “Tumahi to bolta hei ki ham raaja hei. Ham to yahi kaaran janam lia raha aur yahi kaaran dunia meñ aaya hei ki sachchaai ke baare meñ sab se bataai. Jon bhi koi sachchaai ke apnaay hei u hamaar baat sune hei.”
Tab Paaylaṭ puuchhis, “Sachchaai kaa hei?” Fir Paaylaṭ sab log ke lage jaay ke bolis, “Ham koi kaaran nai paata ki iske ham saja dei.”
“Lekin reeti riwaaj ke kaaran ham hardam fasah ke teohaar pe, ek keidi ke chhoṛ deta hei. Kaa tum sab i maañgo hei ki ham Yahuudi ke raaja ke chhoṛ dei?”
Sab log chillaay ke bolin, “Nai, uske nai! Ham Baarabba ke mañgta hei.” (Baarabba ek chor raha.)
Tab Paaylaṭ hukum dees ki Yeeshu ke chaabuk lagaawa jaay.
Saulja log kaaṭa ke ek taaj banaain, aur Yeeshu ke muuṛ pe rakh deen, aur tab uske pepal rang ke kapṛa pahinaain.
Tab saulja aay ke Yeeshu se bolin, “Yahuudi ke raaja, jeete raho!” Aur aage jaay ke uske thappaṛ maarin.
Ek dafe fir Paaylaṭ bahire aay ke bolis, “Dekho ham iske bahire laata hei aur tum apne dekhna ki ham isman koi dos nai paaya hei, ki iske saja dei.”
Tab Yeeshu bahire aais, u kaaṭa ke taaj aur pepal rang ke kapṛa pahine raha. Tab Paaylaṭ ulog se bolis, “Dekho! yahi hei u admi!”

Jab Baṛa Paadri aur chech ke saulja Yeeshu ke dekhin to chillaay uṭhin, “Uske kros pe chaṛhaao! Kros pe chaṛhaao!” Paaylaṭ fir se bolis, “Tumahi iske le jaao aur kros pe chaṛhaao. Ham isman kuchh dos nai dekha.”
Tab bheeṛ jawaab dees, “Ham log ke kaanuun bataay hei ki iske maare ke chaahi, kaahe ki i apne aap ke Parmeshwar ke laṛka bataay hei.”
Jab Paaylaṭ i baat sunis to aur ghabraay gais.
U bhittar lauṭ ke gay aur Yeeshu se puuchhis, “Tum kahañ ke rahe waala hei?” Lekin Yeeshu jawaab nai dees.
Tab Paaylaṭ Yeeshu se bolis, “Tum ham se kaahe nai baat karta hei? Kaa tum i nai janta ki ham tumme chhoṛ de sakta hei? Aur kros pe bhi chaṛhwaay sakta hei?”
Yeeshu tab jawaab dees, “Agar Parmeshwar tumme hak nai deta, to tum hamme kuchh nai kare sakta. Lekin jon hamme tumhaar haath saupis hei u to aur bhi baṛa paap karis hei.”
Tab Paaylaṭ, Yeeshu ke chhoṛe maañgat raha. Lekin bheeṛ aur jor se chillaain, “Agar tum iske chhoṛa to tum Raaja ke dusman hoy jaayga! Jon koi bhi apne aap ke raaja bole hei u Raaja ke dusman hei.”
Jab Paaylaṭ i baat sunis to Yeeshu ke bahire laais. Tab u ek jagha (chabutra) pe, jon ke Heebru meñ ‘Gabattha’ bola jaay hei huañ nyaay kare waala jagha pe beiṭhis.
U roj fasah ke taiyaari ke roj raha, aur Paaylaṭ sab se bolis, “Dekho, aapan raaja ke dekho!”

“Maar ḍaalo! Maar ḍaalo!” u sab chillaay ke bolin, “Kros pe laṭkaay deo!” Tab Paaylaṭ u sab se bolis, “Kaa ham tumhaar raaja ke kros pe chaṛhaai?” Baṛa Paadri log jawaab deen, “Raaja Keisar ke chhoṛ ke hamaar koi aur raaja nai hei!”
Tab Paaylaṭ, Yeeshu ke kros pe chaṛhaay ke khaatir ulog ke haath meñ de dees. Tab u sab Yeeshu ke aapan adhikaar meñ le leen.
Yeeshu aapan kros u jagha le gais jahañ ke naam ‘Khopṛi ke jagha’ bola jaay hei. (Heebru meñ i jagha ke ‘Gulgutha’ bola jaay hei).
Huañ pe ulog Yeeshu ke kros pe chaṛhaain, aur uske duuno bagal dui aur chor ke bhi laṭkaay deen.
Paaylaṭ ek noṭis likhwaay ke kros pe lagwaay dees. Uspe likhaan raha, “Naasrat ke rahe waala, Yahuudi ke raaja.”

Bahut log i noṭis ke paṛhin kaahe ki suuchna Heebru, Leṭin aur Greek meñ likhaan raha. Aur jon jagha Yeeshu ke kros pe chaṛhaaya gais raha, u jagha ṭaaun ke nagichche raha, aur bahut se Yahuudi iske paṛhin.
Baṛa Paadri log Paaylaṭ se jaay ke bolin, “Kaahe ke tum ‘Yahuudi ke raaja’ likha? I likho, ‘I apne aap bolis hei ki i Yahuudi ke raaja hei.” ’
Tab Paaylaṭ u sab se bolis, “Jon kuchh bhi likhaan hei badla nai jaai!”

Jab saulja log Yeeshu ke kros pe chaṛhaay deen, tab uske kapṛa ke chaar hissa meñ baaṭ deen, chaaro saulja ke waaste. Lekin uske uppar waala kapṛa khali ek kapṛa ke bana raha, aur usman koi siyan nai raha.

Saulja apne meñ baat karin, “Iske faaṛo nai. Iske daaoñ lagaay ke dekho ki kiske mile hei.” I sab i kaaran bhais ki jon kuchh bhi Baaibal meñ likhaan raha, u sachche hoy ke raha, “Ulog hamaar kapṛa ke baaṭi aur wahi kapṛa ke waaste jua kheli.” Tab saulja log wahi karin, jon ke baare meñ baat cheet kare rahin.
Yeeshu ke amma wahiñ kros ke bagal meñ khaṛi rahi. Uske sañghe uske bahini Meri, aur Clopas ke amma, aur Meri Magdalini bhi khaṛi rahin.
Jab Yeeshu aapan amma ke, aur aapan sab se pyaara chela ke dekhis jon uske bagal meñ khaṛa raha, tab u aapan amma se bolis, “Ab se i admi tumhaar beṭa hei.”
Tab u aapan chela se bolis, “Ab se i tumhaar amma hei.” Wahi ṭaaim se u chela uske aapan ghare le gais.
Yeeshu jaanat raha ki ab uske kaam khalaas hoy gais hei. Aur jon likhaan raha uske puura kare ke waaste, bolis, “Ham pyaasa hei!”
Huañ pe sasta waain raha. Log waain meñ spanj bhijaay ke, ek peṛ ke ḍaari se uske muh ke lage le gais.
Jab Yeeshu waain pee lees tab bolis, “Puura hoy gais!” Tab u aapan muuṛ nichche kar lees aur mar gais.

Dusra roj sabat aur fasah ke teohaar ke din raha. I Yahuudi log ke ek khaas din raha. Yahuudi agua log nai maañgat rahin ki murda kros pe sabat ke roj laṭka rahe, aur Paaylaṭ se maañg karin ki duuno chor ke goṛ tuuṛ dewa jaay aur kros se nichche utaar dewa jaay.
Sab se pahile saulja log u duuno chor ke goṛ tuuṛ deen, jon huañ kros pe laṭkin raha.
Lekin jab ulog Yeeshu ke lage aain, to dekhin ki u to mar gais hei, aur uske goṛ nai tuuṛin.
Ek saulja, Yeeshu ke bagal meñ spia bhokis, aur khuun aur paani nikre laga.
Ham janta hei ki i sachche hei, kaahe ke i baat u bataais raha jon huañ pe raha. Ab tum bhi biswaas karo.
I sab i kaaran bhais hei ki Baaibal sachche hoy, jon bole hei, “Uske deñhi ke ek bhi haḍḍi nai ṭuuṭi”
Aur, “U log uske dekhi jiske bagal meñ spia se bhoka jaai.”

Josaf, jon Armathia se aais raha, Yeeshu ke ek chela raha. I baat u chhupaay ke rakkhis raha, kaahe ki u Yahuudi agua se ḍarat raha. Lekin ab u Paaylaṭ se puuchhis, ki u Yeeshu ke boḍi le lei. Paaylaṭ uske haañ kar dees, aur Josaf Yeeshu ke boḍi kros pe se utaar lees.
Nikoḍimas bhi aais, u aapan sañghe lagbhag tees (30) kilo gandhras aur peṛ patti se bana achchha mahke waala masaala le ke aais. I wahi Nikoḍimas raha jon ek raat ke Yeeshu ke lage aais raha.
Duuno admi Yeeshu ke boḍi ke le ke Yahuudi rasam ke mutaabik uske deñhi meñ mahke waala tel lagaay ke aur kafan meñ lapeṭ deen.
Jahañ pe Yeeshu ke kros pe chaṛhaawa gais raha, huañ pe ek gaaḍan raha, u gaaḍan meñ ek kabar raha, jon abhi tak kaam meñ nai laawa gais raha.
Dusra din sabat ke din raha, aur Yahuudi log yahi taiyaari meñ lage rahin. Yahi kaaran raha ki ulog jaldi se Yeeshu ke u nagichche waala kabar meñ rakh deen.
Etwaar ke sabere jab thoṛa añdhera raha, tab Meri Magdalini kabar ke lage gais aur dekhis ki huañ kabar ke muh se patthar haṭa hei.
I dekh ke u dauṛ ke Saayman Peeṭa aur dusra chela log ke lage gais aur bolis, “Ulog Prabhu ke, kabar meñ se le ke chala gain hei! Ham nai janta ki uske kahañ rakkhin hei.”
Peeṭa aur dusra chela log kabar pe gain.
U dauṛin, lekin u jon dusra chela raha, u Peeṭa se jor dauṛ ke kabar pe pahile pahuñch gais.
U kabar meñ jhaañk ke dekhis ki kafan ke kapṛa wahi paṛa hei, lekin u kabar ke bhittar nai gais.
Jab Saayman Peeṭa huañ pahuñchis, tab u seedha kabar ke bhittar chala gais aur huañ kafan ke kapṛa gira paais.
U i bhi dekhis ki jon kapṛa Yeeshu ke muuṛ pe bañdha raha, thoṛa duur pe alag lapṭaan rakha raha.
Jon chela sab se pahile huañ pahuñchis raha, u bhittar jaay ke dekhis aur biswaas karis.
U ṭaaim Peeṭa aur baaki chela log ke i nai pata raha ki Baaibal meñ likhaan raha ki Yeeshu fir se jinda hoy jaai.
Tab u duuno dusra chela log ke lage ghare chala gain.
Meri kabar ke bahire khaṛi rowat rahi. Rote rote u kabar meñ jhaañkis.
Huañ pe u dekhis ki jahañ pahile Yeeshu ke boḍi rakha raha, wahiñ pe dui ainjals ujjar kapṛa pahine beiṭhin raha, ek muuṛ ke bagal aur dusra goṛ ke bagal.
"He aurat, tum kaahe roti hei?” U duuno usse puuchhin. Meri jawaab dees, “Ulog hamaar Prabhu ke uṭhaay le gain hei! Aur ham nai janta ki uske kahañ rakkhin hei.”
Jeise Meri i baat bol ke pichchhe ghuumis to dekhis ki Yeeshu huañ pe khaṛa hei. Lekin Meri nai jaan paais ki u Yeeshu hei.
Yeeshu usse puuchhis, “Tum kaahe roti hei? Tum kiske khojti hei?” U sochis u gaaḍna hei aur bolis, “Agar tum uske kahiñ le gaya hei to hamme bataao, ham jaay ke uske leke aayga.”
Tab Yeeshu usse bolis, “Meri!” Meri uske bagal ghuum ke Aramik meñ bolis, “Rabbuni!” (Iske matlab hei, ‘Hamaar guru.)

Yeeshu usse bataais, “Hamme nai pakṛo, kaahe ki ham abhi tak Pita ke ghare nai jaay paaya hei. Lekin hamaar chela log se jaay ke bol dena ki ham u sab ke Pita aur hamaar Pita, aur aapan Prabhu aur u sab ke Parmeshwar ke lage jaata hei.”
Meri Magdalini jaay ke sab chela log ke bataais ki u Prabhu ke dekhis hei aur baat bhi karis hei. U bhi bataais jon Prabhu ulog se bataay ke waaste bolis raha.

Wahi etwaar ke sanjha ke ṭaaim jab chela log, Yahuudi agua log se ḍar ke maare palla band kar ke ghar ke bhittar beiṭha rahin, tab Yeeshu aay ke ulog ke saamne khaṛa hoy gais. U bolis, “Tumme shaanti mile!”
I bol ke Yeeshu aapan haath aur saaiḍ dekhaais. Sab chela log Yeeshu ke dekh ke khusi hoy gain.
Tab Yeeshu usse fir bolis, “Jeise Pita hamme bhejis hei, weise ham bhi tumme bhejta hei.”
I bol ke Yeeshu ulog ke uppar fuuñkis aur bolis, “Pawitr Aatma leo!
Jiske paap ke tum maaf karega, u sab ke maafi mili. Agar tum uske maaf nai karega, to ulog ke maafi nai mili.”
Thomas jiske Didumas bhi bola jaat raha, baarah chela log meñ se ek raha, lekin jab Yeeshu ulog ke saamne aais raha tab u huañ nai raha.

Aur ulog usse bataain, “Ham sab Prabhu ke dekha hei!” Lekin Thomas bolis, “Jab tak ham uske haath meñ neela ke cheenha aur saaiḍ nai dekh leta aur u jagha pe aapan uñgri nai ḍaar leta tab tak ham biswaas nai karega.”
Ek hapta ke baad jab Yeeshu ke chela log ghar meñ rahin, aur Thomas bhi huañ raha, aur palla bhi band raha, tab achaanak Yeeshu u sab ke beech meñ khaṛa hoy ke bolis, “Tumme saanti mile!”
Tab u Thomas se bolis, “Aapan uñgri se hamaar haath chhuo. Aur aapan haath hamaar saaiḍ meñ ḍaaro! Ḍaauṭ nai karo, aur biswaas karo!”
Thomas jawaab dees, “Hamaar Prabhu! Hamaar Parmeshwar!”
Yeeshu bolis, “Thomas, tum hamme dekh ke biswaas kara hei. Ulog dhann hei jon hamme bina dekhe ham pe puura bharosa rakkhe hei, aur biswaas kare hei!”
Yeeshu aur bahut se achambha waala kaam aapan chela log ke saamne karis raha, jiske baare meñ i buk meñ nai likha hei.
Lekin jon kuchh bhi likhaan hei, u i kaaran likha hei ki tum biswaas karo ki Yeeshu Parmeshwar ke laṛka Maseeh hei aur tum sab biswaas karke uske naam se sachcha laaif paao.
Is ke baad Yeeshu ek dafe fir Tibiriyaas laik ke kinaare aapan chela log ke saamne aais. I sab eise bhais.
Saayman Peeṭa, Thomas jiske naam Didumas bhi raha, Natanyel jon Galeel ke Kaana ṭaaun ke rahe waala raha, Jabdi ke duuno laṛkan, aur dui aur chela, sab ek jagha pe baṭure rahin.
Saayman Peeṭa bolis, “Ham machhri maare jaata hei!” Aur log bolin, “Ham bhi tumhaar sañghe chalega.” Sab aapan bauṭ meñ beiṭh ke chal paṛin. Lekin u raat ulog ek bhi machhri nai pakṛin.
Sabere hote jab Yeeshu laik ke kinaare aay ke khaṛa bhais, tab chela log uske nai pahichaanin.
Yeeshu u sab se puuchhis, “Kuchh machhri pakṛa ki nai?” “Nai,” ulog bolin.
Tab Yeeshu u sab se bolis, “Aapan jaal bauṭ ke raaiṭ saaiḍ meñ ḍaaro, aur tab tumme machhri mili.” Ulog wahiñ jaal ḍaar deen, aur jaal meñ etna ḍher machhri aay gais ki ulog jaal kheeche nai sakin.
Yeeshu ke ek pyaara chela Peeṭa se bolis, “I to Prabhu hei!” Jab Peeṭa sunis ki u Prabhu hei, tab u aapan kapṛa pahin lees jon utaaris raha, aur paani meñ kuud gais.
Bauṭ khali ek sao meeṭa kinaare se duur raha. Aur dusra chela log machhri se bhara jaal kheech ke kinaare laain.
Jab sab chela log laik ke kinaare aain, to dekhin ki koyla ke aagi pe machhri aur roṭi rakhaan hei.
Yeeshu aapan chela log se bolis, “Jon machhri tum pakṛa hei, usman se kuchh hiañ laao.”
Saayman Peeṭa, bauṭ meñ lauṭ gais aur jaal ke ghaseeṭ ke kinaare laais. Usman ek sao aur tirpan (153) baṛa baṛa machhri raha. Etna jaada machhri jaal meñ raha, fir bhi jaal nai faṭa.
Yeeshu bolis, “Aao aur khaana khaao!” Chela log meñ se koi ke bhi himmat nai raha ki usse puuchhe ki u kon hei. Ulog to jaan gain raha ki u Prabhu hei.
Tab Yeeshu ulog ke aapan haath se kuchh roṭi aur machhri dees.
I tisra dafe raha jab ke Yeeshu fir se jinda hoy ke baad aapan chela log ke saamne aais raha.

Jab Yeeshu aur uske chela log khaana khaay leen, tab u Saayman Peeṭa se puuchhis, “Saayman, Yuhanna ke laṛka, kaa tum hamme i sab log se jaada pyaar karta hei?” Saayman Peeṭa bolis, “Haañ Prabhu, tum to janta hei ham tum se ketna pyaar karta hei!” “Hamaar bheṛa ke bachcha ke dekh bhaal karna,” Yeeshu usse bolis.

Tab Yeeshu fir se dusra dafe puuchhis, “Saayman, Yuhanna ke laṛka, kaa tum ham se prem karta hei?” Peeṭa bolis, “Haañ Prabhu, tum to janta hei ki ham tumme ketna pyaar karta hei!” “Hamaar bheṛa ke dekh bhaal karna,” Yeeshu usse bolis.

Tab Yeeshu tisra dafe fir puuchhis, “Saayman, Yuhanna ke laṛka, kaa tum ham se prem karta hei?” Peeṭa dukhi bhais, kaahe ki Yeeshu usse teen dafe puuchhis ki u usse prem kare hei ki nai. U bolis, “Prabhu, tum to sab kuchh janta hei. Tum to i bhi janta hei ki ham tum se ketna prem rakhta hei.” “Achchha to hamaar bheṛa ke khaana dena,” Yeeshu usse bolis.

“Ham tum se sachche bolta hei, ki jab tum jawaan raha, tab kamar baañdh ke jahañ maañgat raha huañ jaat raha, lekin jab tum buḍḍha hoy jaayga, tab aapan haath feilaayga, tab dusra tumhaar kamar pe peṭi baañdhi aur tum jahañ nai maañgega, huañ tumme le jaai.”
Yeeshu i baat i kaaran bolis raha, ki jisse sab jaan jaay ki Peeṭa kon rakam se mari aur Parmeshwar ke khaatir mahima laai. Tab u Peeṭa se bolis, “Hamaar pichchhe aao!”
Peeṭa ghuumis aur dekhis ki Yeeshu ke pyaara chela uske pichchhe aay hei. I wahi raha jon khaana khaaay ke ṭaaim Yeeshu ke bagal meñ beiṭha raha aur puuchhis raha, “Prabhu tumme kon pakaṛwaai?”
Jab Peeṭa uske dekhis tab Yeeshu se puuchhis, “Prabhu, iske kaa hoi?”
Tab Yeeshu jawaab dees, “Isse tumme kaa, agar ham maañgi to u hamaar lauṭe tak jinda rahi? Tum hamaar pichchhe aao.”

Chela log ke beech i baat feil gais, ki u chela kabhi nai mari. Lekin Yeeshu i to nai bolis raha ki u kabhi nai mari. U to khali bolis raha, “Isse tumme kaa, agar ham chaahi to u hamaar lauṭe tak jinda rahi.”
I wahi chela hei, jon i sab ke gawaahi dees raha. Wahi i sab likhis raha, aur ham janta hei ki u sachche bole hei.
Yeeshu aur bahut kaam karis raha. Agar u sab ek ek kar ke likha jaay, to ham samajhta hei ki, jon buk meñ likha jaata u i dunia meñ nai aṭta.

Theofilus, ham tumhaar lage pahile u sab baat likha hei jon Yeeshu karis aur sikhaais hei, jab talak u swarag meñ uppar nai uṭhaay lewa gais. Lekin uppar jaay se pahile Yeeshu Pawitr Aatma ke madat se prerit log ke chun ke hukum dees.

Yeeshu chaalis din tak dukh uṭhaay ke aur mare ke baad bahut rakam se saabit karis ki u fir se jinda hoy gais hei. U aapan prerit log ke saamne aais aur Parmeshwar ke raaj ke baare meñ ulog se baat karis.
Jab ki u chela log ke sañghe hee raha, u bolis,“Yarushalam se bahire abhi nai jaana aur Pita ke promis puura hoy ke khaatir agorna jeise ham tumse bataay raha.”
Yuhanna to paani se baptisma dees raha lekin thoṛa din meñ tumme Pawitr Aatma se baptisma mili.
Jab tak chela log Yeeshu ke sañghe rahin, ulog usse puuchhin, “Prabhu, kaa yahi ṭaaim Israayel ke aapan raaja fir se dega?”
Yeeshu ulog se bolis, “Kon ṭaaim kon cheej hoi, i baat tumme jaane ke koi kaam nai hei, sab hamaar Pita ke haath meñ hei.
Lekin tumhaar uppar Pawitr Aatma aai aur tumme taagat mili aur tum hamaar baare meñ Yarushalam meñ, puura Juḍia meñ, Samaaria meñ aur dunia bhar meñ parchaar karega.”
I sab bole ke baad jab sab log Yeeshu ke dekhte rahin, tab uske uppar uṭhaay lewa gais aur u baadar ke beech meñ gaayab hoy gais. Ulog uske dekhe nai sakin,
lekin jeise u uppar gais sab log asmaan ke bagal dekhte rahe gain. Achaanak wahi ṭaaim dui admi ujjar kapṛa pahine ulog ke bagal meñ aay ke khaṛa hoy gain.

Ulog bolin, “Tum Galeel ke log, kaahe khaṛa hoy ke asmaan ke taraf dekhta hei? Yahi Yeeshu jon tumhaar lage se swarag meñ uṭhaay lewa gay hei, yahi rakam aai jeise tum log uske swarag meñ uppar jaate dekha hei.”

Jaituun Pahaaṛ Yarushalam se lagbhag ek kilomeeṭa duur raha. Jon prerit log huañ gay rahin ulog ke naam i rakam hei, Peeṭa, Yuhanna, Jeims, Andriyaas, Filip, Thomas, Bartimaais, Methiu, Halfai ke laṛka Jeims, Saayman Jelotel aur Jeims ke laṛka Juḍas. Lauṭe ke baad sab uppar ke ruum meñ chala gain jahañ ulog rahat rahin.
Ulog hardam ek sañghe mil ke preya karat rahin. Kuchh aurat log, Yeeshu ke amma Meri aur Yeeshu ke bhaiya log bhi ek sañghe mil ke preya karat rahin.
Ek din lagbhag ek sao bees (120) Maseehi log ke sabha meñ, Peeṭa khaṛa hoy ke ulog ke beech meñ bolis.

Hamaar dost log, Baaibal ke baat ekdam sachche nikra. Pawitr Aatma ke taagat se Ḍeiviḍ jon cheej Juḍas Iskariyoti ke baare meñ bolis raha u aaj sachche bhais. Juḍas, Yeeshu ke pakaṛwaais raha. Uske ham log ke kaam meñ haath baṭaay ke waaste chuna gay raha.
U aapan paap ke peisa se ek chhoṭa jameen khareedis, jahañ u muh ke bal gira, peṭ faṭ gais aur uske atṛi bahire nikar gais.
Yarushalam ke sab log i baat jaan gain aur i kaaran se ulog aapan bhaasha meñ u jagha ke naam “Hakaldama” yaane “Khuun ke khet rakkhin.”
Bhajan Sañhita ke buk meñ eise likhaan hei, “Uske ghar khaali rakkho, usman koi ke rahe nai deo.” Aur i bhi likhaan hei, “Uske kaam koi aur ke kare ke waaste de deo.”

Ham log mañgta hei ki koi aur admi ham log ke sañghe hoy jaay jon Yeeshu Maseeh ke baare meñ gawaahi de sake ki u mar ke jinda hoy gay. Aur u admi eisan hoy jon ham log ke sañghe suru se raha. U ham log ke sañghe u ṭaaim se raha hoy jab se Yeeshu Maseeh ke Yuhanna se baptisma se leke u din tak jab tak u swarag meñ uppar uṭhaay lewa gais raha.
Ulog dui naam chunaao ke waaste rakkhin. Ek raha Josaf jon ke Barsaba Yustus bhi bolat rahin, aur dusra Methiaas raha.
Tab log preya karin, “Prabhu ji, tum janta hei ki sab log keisan hei, ham log ke dekhaao ki tum kiske chuna hei
jon Juḍas ke jagha prerit ban ke sewa kare sake. Juḍas jeise karis weise bharis.”
Tab chune ke waaste ulog vauṭ karin. Methiaas ke naam nikra aur u gyaara prerit log ke sañghe kaam kare laga.
Penṭikosṭ ke din sab Maseeh bhaai ek jagha jama bhain.
Achaanak asmaan se baṛa jor se hawa ke jhoka ke awaaj aais. Awaaj se puura ghar jahañ ulog beiṭha rahin bhar gais.
Tab ulog kuchh dekhin jon dekhe meñ aagi ke rakam jeebh chaaro taraf ghuumat raha aur ek jeebh aay ke sab ke uppar utar gais.
Sab log Pawitr Aatma se bhar gain aur Pawitr Aatma ke taagat se bole ke suru kar deen. Ulog rakam rakam ke bhaasha bole lagin.
Dunia ke sab des ke Yahuudi dharam premi log Yarushalam meñ rahat rahin.
Aur jab ulog i awaaj sunin, ek bheeṛ baṭur gais. Lekin ulog chakit bhain, kaahe ke ulog sab kuchh apne bhaasha meñ sunat rahin.
Ulog achambha karin aur chakit bhain, aur bolin, Kaa i sab jon baat kare hei, Galeel se nai aain hei?
Tab kaahe ke ham ilog ke aapan bhaasha meñ bolte sunta hei?
Ham meñ se kuchh log Paarthi, Media, Yelaam ke hei. Aur log Mesopotaamia, Juḍia, Kappduukia, Pontus, Eshia,
Frugia, Pamfuulia, Ijipt, aur Cyrenee ke nagichche Leebia ke kuchh bhaag, Raom,

Kreeṭ aur Arebia ke rahin. Ham meñ se kuchh Yahuudi peida bhay raha, aur kuchh chunin ki Yahuudi rahe. Fir bhi ham ulog ke sunta hei ki ham log ke bhaasha meñ achchha achchha baat sunaay hei jon cheej Parmeshwar karis raha.
Sab chakit rahe gain aur ghabraay ke ek dusra se bole lagin, “Iske kaa matlab hei?”
Lekin aur log i baat bol ke chela log ke hasi uṛaawe lagin, “I log nasa meñ hei.”
Tab Peeṭa gyaara (11) chela log ke sañghe khaṛa hoy ke jor se aur safa se bolis: Dost log aur Yarushalam ke rahe waala log, hamaar baat ke achchha se suno!
I baat samajh lo, ki i log nasa meñ nai hei jeise tum log sochta hei, kaahe ki abhi saber hei aur khali nao baja hei.
Lekin baat yahi hei ki jon Parmeshwar nabi Joyel se bolwaais raha,
“Aakhri din jab aai, ham aapan Aatma sab ke dega. Tumhaar beṭa, beṭi aay waala ṭaaim ke baare meñ bataai. Tumhaar naojawaan ke nawa khayaal dega, aur tumhaar buḍḍha log sapna dekhiyeñ.
Aur u ṭaaim ham aapan sewak, duuno aurat aur admi ke aapan Aatma dega jon bhawish ke baare meñ bataai.
Ham uppar asmaan meñ chamatkaari kaam aur neeche dharti pe adbhut cheenha jeise ki khuun, aagi aur dhuañ ke baadar dekhaayga.
Prabhu ke mahaan din aawe se pahile, suuraj añdhera hoy jaai, aur chaañd khuun ke rakam laal rahi.
Lekin jon koi Prabhu ke naam lei, uske bachaay lewa jaai.

Ab suno, Naasrat ke rahewaala Yeeshu ke baare meñ ham kaa bolta hei. Uske Parmeshwar sakti dees raha ki aapan chamatkaari kaam se saabit kar de, aur i sab kaam Yeeshu tumhaar saamne karis, jon tum sab log janta hei.
Ishwar pahile se plen banaay lees raha ki keise Yeeshu ke tum log ke saup dewa jaai. Aur tum log uske dushṭ log ke haath meñ deke kros pe chaṛhaay ke maar ḍaala.
Lekin Parmeshwar uske maut ke bandhan se bachaay lees aur fir jinda kar dees. Eise hoy nai sakat raha ki maut uske aapan sakti se roke rahe.
Jon Ḍeiviḍ bolis, u sachche ke Yeeshu ke vachan hei, “Ham hardam Prabhu ke aapan lage dekhta hei, u hamaar raaiṭ taraf hei ki ham kabhi bhi ḍarega nai.
Yahi ke waaste hamaar man khusi hei dil aanand se bhara hei, ab ham aasha meñ jeewan bitaayga
Prabhu hamme kabar meñ nai chhoṛi. Ham uske Pawitr jan hei aur u hamaar deñhi ke saṛe nai dei.
U hamme jeewan ke rasta dekhaais hei, aur u hamme aapan sañghe rakh ke hamme khusi kare hei.”
Hamaar dost log, ham tumse aapan ensesṭa Ḍeiviḍ ke baare meñ bataay mañgta hei. U mar gais, uske maṭṭi dewa gais aur uske kabar aaj bhi hei.
Lekin Ḍeiviḍ ek nabi raha, aur u jaanat raha ki Parmeshwar aapan promis puura kari. Parmeshwar uske bataais raha ki ek din uske palwaar meñ se ek jan ke raaja banaai.
Ḍeiviḍ jaanat raha ki i hoi, aur u hamlog ke bataais ki Maseeh fir se jinda hoi. U bolis ki Parmeshwar uske kabar meñ nai rahan dei ya uske deñhi saṛan dei.
Ham log sab tumme bataay sakta hei ki Parmeshwar Yeeshu ke jinda kar dees!

Yeeshu ke uppar swarag meñ le gain jahañ Ishwar ke raaiṭ saaiḍ beiṭhi. Yeeshu ke Pawitr Aatma mila jeise Parmeshwar promis karis raha. Yeeshu ham log ke Pawitr Aatma dees jon ham log dekhta aur sunta hei.
Ḍeiviḍ uppar swarag meñ nai gais. U aapan baare meñ nai bolat raha jab u bolis,“Prabhu hamaar Prabhu se bolis hei, hamaar raaiṭ saaiḍ beiṭho,
jab tak u hamaar Prabhu ke dusman log ke aapan goṛ ke nichche nai kar dei.”
Israayel meñ sab ke i baat jaan jaay ke chaahi ki tum Yeeshu ke kros pe chaṛhaay ke maar ḍaala, lekin Parmeshwar, wahi ke Prabhu aur Maseeh duuno banaay dees.
I baat sunke sab log baṛa dukhi bhain. Ulog Peeṭa aur uske saathi log se puuchhin, “Bhaai log, ham kon cheej kari?”
Peeṭa bolis “Dil badlo! Aapan paap chhama kare ke waaste Yeeshu Maseeh ke naam se baptisma leo, tab tumme Pawitr Aatma mili.
I promis tumhaar aur tumhaar laṛkan ke waaste hei aur u sab ke waaste hei jiske Prabhu Parmeshwar chuni, chaahe ulog jahañ bhi rahi.”
Peeṭa aur bahut baat ulog ke bataais. Tab u bolis, “Ham chirauri karta hei ki apne aap ke bachaay ke rakkho u sab cheej se jon i bura log ke saathe hoi.”
Jon log Peeṭa ke updes ke maan leen ulog baptisma le leen, aur u roj lagbhag teen hajaar log Maseeh ke biswaasi ban gain.
Ulog prerit log se shikte rahin, aur ek palwaar ke rakam ek dusra ke sañghe rahin, aur Prabhu bhoj meñ bhaag leen, aur ek saathe preya karin.
Chela log ke chamatkaari kaam dekh ke sab log chakit rahin.
Sab biswaasi log hardam milat rahin aur ek dusra ke cheej bina rukaawaṭ ke kaam meñ laawat rahin.
Ulog aapan cheej aur samaan bech ke peisa ulog ke de dewat rahin jiske jaruurat raha.
Sab roj Mandir meñ milat rahin, paari paari sab ke ghare Prabhu bhoj lewat rahin. Aur khusi khusi khaana baaṭ ke khaawat rahin,
aur Parmeshwar ke baṛaai karte rahin. Sab koi ulog ke laaik karin, aur har roj jon log bachaawa gain raha Prabhu ulog ke grup meñ joṛ dees.
Peeṭa aur Yuhanna preya ke ṭaaim lagbhag teen baje sanjha ke Mandir meñ jaawat rahin.

Sab roj wahi ṭaaim ek janam ke langṛa admi ke log le jaay ke Mandir ke duaari pe beiṭhaay dewat rahin. Mandir ke duaari ke naam Sundar Gaiṭ raha jahañ langṛa admi beiṭh ke bhittar jaay waala log se bheek maañgat raha.
Jab langṛa bhikhaari Peeṭa aur Yuhanna ke Mandir ke bheetar jaate dekhis tab u ulog se peisa maañgis.
Lekin u duuno seedha u langṛa bhikhaari ke dekh ke bolin, “Hamaar taraf dekho!”
Bhikhaari ulog ke taraf taake laga, i baat soch ke ki ulog uske kuchh dewe maañge hei.
Peeṭa bolis, “Hamaar lage koi chaañdi ya sona nai hei! Lekin jon cheej hamaar lage hei u deta hei. Naasrat ke rahe waala Yeeshu Maseeh ke naam se uṭho aur chalo.”
Peeṭa uske raaiṭ haath pakaṛ ke uṭhaais. Jurte uske goṛ aur haḍḍi meñ taagat aay gais
U kuud ke khaṛa hoy gais, aur chale laga, aur Peeṭa aur Yuhanna ke sañghe chalte-firte Ishwar ke baṛaai karte karte Mandir ke bhittar chala gais.
Sab log uske chalte firte aur Parmeshwar ke baṛaai karte dekhin.
Ulog jaan gain ki i wahi bhikhaari hei jon Sundar Gaiṭ ke bagal meñ beiṭh ke bheek maañga karat raha. Sab log i chamatkaari kaam dekh ke ghabraay gain. Ulog soche nai sakin ki u admi ke kaa bhais.
Jab ki bhikhaari Peeṭa aur Yuhanna ke pichchhe laga raha, bheeṛ chakit hoy ke ulog ke lage u jagha dauṛin, jon Soloman ke poch ke naam se jaana jaat raha.

Peeṭa dekhis ki ek bheeṛ jama hoy gais hei, aur u bolis, “Dost log, jon cheej bhais hei, uske dekh ke kaahe ghabraata hei? Kaahe ke hamaar bagal eise dekhta hei? Kaa tum sochta hei ki ham log ke koi aapan sakti hei? Kaa tum log sochta hei ki hamlog i admi ke chale laayk banaaya hei, kaahe ke ham log dhaarmik hei?

Abraham, Aayzak aur Jaykab ke Parmeshwar, aur hamaar baap-daada ke Parmeshwar aapan sewak Yeeshu ke maan aur ijjat deen. Lekin tum log uske dusman ke haath pakaṛwaay dia. Jab Paaylaṭ uske chhoṛe maañgat raha tab tum log uske agaiñsṭ hoy gaya.
Tum log ek hatyaara ke chhoṛwaay ke khaatir pawitr aur achchha Yeeshu jon sab ke jeewan det raha, uske saja dewaay ke marwaay dia.
Aur tum log uske maar dia jon log ke jeewan dewat raha. Lekin Parmeshwar uske jinda kar dees, aur hamlog tumme sab bataay sakta hei ki u kon cheej karis raha.

Tum i admi ke dekhta hei, aur iske tum janta hei. U Yeeshu ke naam pe biswaas karis aur uske goṛ meñ sakti aay gais. Uske biswaas Yeeshu pe raha aur yahi kaaran sab koi ke saamne, u ekdam achchha hoy gais.
Hamaar dost log, ham janta hei ki tum aur tumhaar dharam ke agua log i kaam jaan buujh ke nai karin.
Ishwar pahile se sab nabi log se bataay dees raha, uske Maseeh bahut dukh uṭhaai, aur jeise bola gay raha weise bhais.
To aapan dil ke badlo aur Parmeshwar ke nagichche jaao ki jisse tumhaar paap chhama hoy jaay.
Tab u ṭaaim aai jab Prabhu tumme aapan saanti dei. U Yeeshu ke jon Maseeha hei fir tumhaar lage bhej dei.
I jaruuri hei ki Yeeshu swarag meñ rahe jab tak sab cheej nawa nai hoy jaay jiske baare meñ bahut pahile Parmeshwar nabi log ke dwaara promis karis raha.
Maozas bolis, “Prabhu tumhaar Parmeshwar tumhaar waaste ek nabi bheji jeise u hamme bhejis raha aur u tum meñ se ek hoi. U jon kuchh tumse bole hei, sab dhyaan se sunna.
Jon admi nabi ke baat nai maani u aapan log ke beech Parmeshwar ke log nai rahi”
Semuel aur jetna nabi log baad meñ aain raha i baat ke baare meñ baat karin ki abhi kaa howe hei.

Ishwar ke promis jon nabi log se aais hei u sab tumhaar waaste hei, aur u vaacha ke bhi hakdaar hoi jon Parmeshwar tumhaar baap-daada se karis raha. U Abraham se bolis, 'Tumhaar palwaar meñ se koi ke kaaran puura sansaar meñ sab jaati ke aasheesh mili.’
Parmeshwar aapan chuna laṛka ke sab se pahile tumhaar paas bhejis, kaahe ke Parmeshwar tumme aasheesh dewe maañgat raha aur chaahat raha ki tum sab aapan bura kaam chhoṛ deo.”
Prerit log sab se baat karte rahin jab ki kuchh paadri, Mandir ke rakhwaali karewaala log ke agua aur kuchh Saduuki log uske lage aain.
I log gussa meñ rahin kaahe ki i prerit log Yeeshu ke ekzaampal deke bataat rahin ki mare ke baad ek aur jeewan hei.
Ulog Peeṭa aur Yuhanna ke pakṛin aur raat bhar jel meñ bañd kar deen kaahe ki sanjha hoy gais raha.
Lekin bahut log Peeṭa ke parchaar sunin, aur biswaas karin. Ab Prabhu meñ biswaasi log lagbhag paañch hajaar hoy gain raha.
Dusra din sabere, kaanuun ke guru log, agua log aur baṛkuan log, Yarushalam meñ baṭurin.
Huañ pe baṛa paadri Hanna, aur Kaaifa, Elekszenḍa aur baṛa paadri ke palwaar rahin.
Ulog Peeṭa aur Yuhanna ke sab ke saamne laay ke khaṛa karke puuchhin, “Kiske sakti se, aur kiske naam se tum i kaam kara hei?”
Pawitr Aatma se bhar ke Peeṭa, des ke agua log aur baṛkuan log ke jawaab dees:
“Agar tum log jaane mañgta hei ki i langṛa admi ke khaatir kon se achchha kaam kara gais raha ki u achchha hoy gay hei.

To ham tumse aur puura Israayel ke log se bataay mañgta hei, Naasrat ke rahewaala Yeeshu ke naam se i admi tumhaar saamne puura achchha hoy ke khaṛa hei. Yeeshu ke tum log kros pe chaṛhaay ke maar ḍaala raha, lekin Parmeshwar uske fir se jinda kar dees.
I wahi patthar hei jiske tum ghar banaawe waala log bekaar samajh ke alag kar dia raha, lekin ab wahi sab se khaas patthar hei.
Aur koi dusra ke naam se bache nai sakta hei, khali Yeeshu ke paas bachaawe ke sakti hei. Dunia meñ wahi ek naam hei jisse log bache sake hei.”
Ofisa log, Peeṭa aur Yuhanna ke himmat dekh ke, aur i baat jaan ke ki ulog paṛha likha nai hei lekin seedha-saada log hei, hairaan rahe gain. Ulog i baat jaanat rahin ki i log Yeeshu ke sañghe raha.
Jon cheej huañ bhay raha ulog ke maane ke paṛa. U langṛa admi achchha hoy ke prerit log ke sañghe khaṛa raha.
Agua log ulog ke hukum dees ki kaaunsal ruum se chala jaay. Tab agua log apne meñ baat kare lagin aur bolin,
“Ham log i admi ke kaa kari? Yarushalam meñ i chamatkaari kaam ke baare meñ sab jaan gain hei, aur ham log i baat ke jhuuṭa saabit nai kare sakta hei.
Lekin i baat aur jaada nai feile paawe, ham log i log ke dhamkaayga ki kabhi bhi koi se Yeeshu ke naam nai lei.”
Tab ulog Peeṭa aur Yuhanna ke bhittar bulaay ke bolin ki chaahe kuchh bhi kaaran hoy, Yeeshu ke naam se kuchh bhi nai sikhaana.
Lekin Peeṭa aur Yuhanna jawaab deen, “Tum kaa sochta hei ki Parmeshwar maañge hei ki ham uske baat maani ki tumhaar?
Jon cheej ham log suna aur dekha hei uske baare meñ ham chuppe nai rahe sakta.”

Tab ulog Peeṭa aur Yuhanna ke dhamki deke chhoṛ deen kaahe ki ulog ke saja dewe ke waaste koi kaaran nai mila. Jon admi ke achchha kara gay raha uske umar chaalis (40) saal se kuchh jaada raha, aur sab log chamatkaari kaam dekh ke Parmeshwar ke jayjaykaar karat rahin.
Jeise Peeṭa aur Yuhanna ke huañ se bahire nikaarin, ulog jaay ke sab log se u sab baat bataain jon ulog se baṛa paadri aur agua log bole rahin.
Jab aur chela log i baat sunin tab sab mil ke preya karin, aur bolin: “He Prabhu, tumahi asmaan, dharti, samundar aur usman jon kuchh hei, sab banaaya hei!
Tum Pawitr Aatma se ham log ke baap-daada Ḍeiviḍ se bola. U tumhaar sewak raha, aur tum usse bataaya ki i bolo, 'Sab jaat ke log kaahe ke etna gussa kare hei? Kaahe ke log bekaar ke plen banaawe hei?
Prabhu aur uske Maseeha ke agaiñsṭ dharti ke raaja aur adhikaari log ek sañghe hoy ke laṛaai ke taiyaari meñ laga hei.’
Hiañ Yarushalam meñ Heraḍ, Pontias Paaylaṭ, geir Yahuudi log aur Israayel ke log jama bhain. Yeeshu, jon tumhaar sewak hei, jon ke tum Maseeha banaaya, uske agaiñsṭ hoy gain.
Ki jisse ilog wahi kare jon cheej tum aapan buddhi aur sakti se socha hei ki hoi.
He Prabhu, ulog ke dhamki ke suno! Ham log tumhaar sewak hei. Ham log ke himmat deo ki tumhaar sandes bataay saki.
Aapan mahaan sakti dekhaao, ki jeise ham tumhaar pawitr sewak Yeeshu ke naam se log ke bimaari se achchha kari aur chamatkaari kaam dekhaai.”
Preya kare ke baad, jahañ pe ulog rahin, u jagha hil gais. Ulog Pawitr Aatma se bhar gain aur bina ḍar se Parmeshwar ke sandes sunaawe lagin.
Sab biswaasi ekke rakam mahsuus karin. Koi bhi aapan cheej aapan nai samjhat rahin aur ek dusra ke sañghe baaṭin.
Baṛa jor tor se prerit log sab se bataat rahin ki Yeeshu fir se jinda hoy gay hei. Parmeshwar ke aasheesh sab ke uppar raha.
Koi bhi gareeb nai raha. Jon log ke lage jameen ya ghar raha, ulog uske bech ke peisa laay ke
prerit log ke deen. Fir u peisa uske dewat rahin jiske jaruurat paṛat raha.

Saaypras ke rahewaala Josaf naam ke admi aapan jameen bech ke sab peisa prerit log ke de dees. I admi jon ek Levi raha, uske prerit log Baranbaas bolat rahin, uske matlab hei, “Dusra ke himmat de waala.”
Ananias naam ke ek admi aur uske aurat Safeera kuchh jameen bechin.
Lekin ulog chalaaki kare ke raaji bhain aur kuchh peisa aapan waaste rakh leen. To jab Ananias bacha peisa le jaay ke prerit log ke dees,
Peeṭa bolis, “Kaahe ke saitaan tumhaar man meñ i baat laais ki tum Pawitr Aatma se jhuuṭ bolo aur jameen ke kuchh peisa aapan lage rakh lo?
Jameen beche se pahile tumhaar raha, aur beche ke baad jon peisa usse mila u bhi tumhaar raha, to eisan bichaar aapan man meñ kaahe laaya? Tum admi log se nai lekin Parmeshwar se jhuuṭ bola hei.”
I baat jeise Ananias sunis, u wahiñ gir ke mar gais, aur jetna log i baat sunin, sab ḍar gain.
Kuchh naojawaan aay ke u laash lapeṭ ke siṭi se bahire le jaay ke maṭṭi de deen.
Lagbhag teen ghanṭa ke baad Safeera aais. U nai jaanat rahi ki uske admi ke kon cheej bhay.
Peeṭa usse puuchhis, “Hamse bataao, kaa tum aapan jameen etna peisa meñ becha hei?” “Haañ, itne meñ to becha hei,” aurat jawaab dees.
Tab Peeṭa bolis, “Tum duuno mil ke kaahe ke Prabhu ke Aatma ke parkhe mañgta hei? Tumhaar admi ke maṭṭi dewe waala log lauṭ aain hei aur wahi log tumme bhi le jaaiyeñ.”
Jurte aurat Peeṭa ke goṛ pe giris aur mar gais. Jab naojawaan log bheetar aay ke dekhin ki Safeera mari paṛi hei to ulog uske bahire le jaay ke uske admi ke bagal meñ maṭṭi de deen.
Sab chech ke memba log aur jetna log i baat sunin sab ḍar gain.
Prerit log bahut chamatkaar aur chakit kaam sab log ke beech meñ karke dekhaain. Sab biswaasi log hardam Soloman ke poch meñ milat rahin.
Dusra log ulog se mile ke himmat nai karat rahin jab ki sab log ulog ke baṛaai karat rahin.
Bahut se aurat aur admi log Parmeshwar pe biswaas kare lagin.
Tab bimaar log ke, khaṭia aur chaṭaai pe leṭaay ke rasta pe rakh dewat rahin, ki jab Peeṭa aawe to uske parchhaaiñ ulog meñ se koi ke uppar paṛ jaay aur ulog achchha hoy jaay.
Yarushalam ke agal bagal ke ṭaaun meñ rahewaala bimaar log ke aur saitaan se jakaṛa log ke leke aate rahin aur sab changaai paawat rahin.
Baṛa paadri aur Saduuki log jon uske sañghe rahin jaran kare lagin.
Ulog prerit log ke pakaṛ ke siṭi ke jel meñ band kar deen.
Lekin Prabhu ke ek duut wahi raat meñ jel ke palla khol dees, aur prerit log ke bahire le jaay ke bolis,
“Jaao, Mandir meñ khaṛa hoy ke sab log se i nawa laaif ke baare meñ bataao.”

I baat sunke ulog ekdam sabere Mandir meñ chala gain aur huañ updes dewe lagin. Baṛa paadri aur uske saathi log Israayel ke log ke agua ke sañghe ek sabha karin. Tab hukum dewa gay ki prerit log ke jel meñ se nikaar ke saamne leke aao.
